2048 (tsone).original_desc: 2048 is an originally Smartphone Game. You must play with tile to add them pair by pair to obtain 2048.
2048 (tsone).desc: 2048 最初是一款智能手機遊戲。您必須玩方塊將它們一對一相加才能獲得 2048。

Tecmo Super Bowl (USA).name: 特克摩超級碗
Tecmo Super Bowl (USA).original_desc:
Tecmo Super Bowl is the follow-up to the NES football arcade/simulation Tecmo Bowl.  While the basic gameplay of the original is intact, a host of new features and improvements have been added.  

Features include: 28 real NFL teams/mascots with real NFL players (circa 1991), 11 players on the field per team, player substitutions, fumbles, improved control over kicks and punts, eight plays to choose from during games, customizable playbooks, arcade/coach/computer simulation options for one or two players, pre-season/regular season/Pro-Bowl games, regular season team standings and rankings, regular season player statistics and rankings, end-of-game boxscores, and a 12-team playoff following the NFL format.
Tecmo Super Bowl (USA).desc:
Tecmo Super Bowl 是 NES 足球場/模擬 Tecmo Bowl 的後續產品。雖然原版的基本遊戲玩法完好無損，但添加了許多新功能和改進。

功能包括：28支真實的NFL球隊/吉祥物與真正的NFL球員（大約1991年），每支球隊有11名球員，球員替換，掉球，改進對踢球和棄踢的控制，比賽期間可供選擇的八種比賽，可定制的戰術手冊，為一名或兩名球員提供的街機/教練/計算機模擬選項，季前賽/常規賽/職業碗比賽，常規賽球隊排名和排名，常規賽球員統計數據和排名，比賽結束時的比分，以及按照 NFL 格式進行的 12 隊季后賽。

Tetris (USA).name: 俄羅斯方塊
Tetris (USA).original_desc:
This version of Tetris is one of many conversions of the famous block-stacking game, as well as the best-known (but not the only) version on Nintendo's first home console. The goal is to place pieces made up of four tiles in a ten-by-twenty well, organizing them into complete rows, which disappear. As rows are cleared, the pace of the game increases, and the game ends if the stack reaches the top of the well.

The game offers two different modes of play, "Type A" and "Type B". "Type A" is a standard endless mode, where the speed of the game increases every ten lines, with an option for the starting level when beginning the game. "Type B", on the other hand, is a race to clear 25 lines, with options for both drop speed and starting garbage. In both modes, successful play is rewarded with cute animations. There are also three different background songs to choose from.
Tetris (USA).desc:
這個版本的俄羅斯方塊是著名的方塊堆疊遊戲的眾多轉換之一，也是任天堂第一台家用遊戲機上最著名（但不是唯一）的版本。目標是將由四塊瓷磚組成的碎片放入十乘二十的井中，將它們組織成完整的行，然後消失。隨著行被清除，遊戲的節奏會加快，如果堆棧到達井的頂部，遊戲就會結束。

該遊戲提供兩種不同的遊戲模式：“A 型”和“B 型”。“A型”是標準的無盡模式，遊戲速度每十行增加一次，並且可以在開始遊戲時選擇起始級別。另一方面，“B 型”是一場清除 25 條線的比賽，可以選擇下降速度和起始垃圾。在這兩種模式下，成功的遊戲都會獎勵可愛的動畫。還有三首不同的背景歌曲可供選擇。

Ganbare Goemon Gaiden 2 - Treasures of t.key: Ganbare Goemon Gaiden 2 - Treasures of the World (Japan) (Translated)
Ganbare Goemon Gaiden 2 - Treasures of t.original_name: Ganbare Goemon Gaiden 2 : Tenka no Zaihou
Ganbare Goemon Gaiden 2 - Treasures of t.name: 盡力而為 五右衛門外傳 2：天下之巔
Ganbare Goemon Gaiden 2 - Treasures of t.original_desc:
This is a sequel to the  first Ganbare Goemon Gaiden (side-story) RPG. Goemon, a cunning thief and an avid treasure hunting, has nothing to do and sits in his house, bored. But his trusty friend Ebisumaru has good news: there is a big treasure to find somewhere in a big city across the sea. Of course the treasure won't be just given to Goemon: he'll have to perform a dangerous mission before. The two friends board a ship and thus the journey begins...

The game is very similar to its predecessor, as well as to most other console-style RPGs of the period. You talk to people in towns, buy various equipment, descend into dungeons, and fight random enemies and bosses in turn-based combat. The combat perspective is slightly changed in this sequel (over-the-shoulder view of the battle instead of semi-animated pictures).
Ganbare Goemon Gaiden 2 - Treasures of t.desc:
這是第一部《Ganbare Goemon Gaiden》（支線故事）RPG 的續集。五右衛門是一個狡猾的小偷，熱衷於尋寶，他無事可做，坐在自己的房子裡，感到無聊。但他值得信賴的朋友惠比須丸帶來了好消息：在隔海相望的一座大城市的某個地方，有一個巨大的寶藏可以找到。當然，寶藏不會只交給五右衛門：他之前必須執行一項危險的任務。兩個朋友登上了船，旅程就這樣開始了……

該遊戲與其前身以及當時大多數其他主機風格的角色扮演遊戲非常相似。你與城鎮中的人們交談，購買各種裝備，深入地下城，並在回合製戰鬥中與隨機的敵人和頭目戰鬥。在這部續集中，戰鬥視角略有改變（戰鬥的過肩視圖而不是半動畫圖片）。

Elite (Europe) (En,Fr,De).name: 精英
Elite (Europe) (En,Fr,De).original_desc: You have a ship with virtually no equipment. Take her and trade among the different star systems. You can be safe and trade on razor-thin margins among the safe systems, or take some risks and trade with anarchic systems while watching out for pirates. You can save on fuel costs by buying a fuel scoop and fly near the sun, but again, watch out for pirates! Or be a pirate yourself and raid other ships...  Don't get a bad rep as the police will come after you... Dock with space stations and do your trades (some may take contraband...) Upgrade your ship with your proceeds with better weapons,  shields, and other equipment. With 8 different galaxies, each with HUNDREDS of planets, there are plenty of room for exploration! Can you make your reputation all the way up to "elite"?
Elite (Europe) (En,Fr,De).desc: 您擁有一艘幾乎沒有任何設備的船。帶她去不同的星系之間進行交易。您可以安全地在安全系統中以微薄的利潤進行交易，也可以承擔一些風險並在無政府主義系統中進行交易，同時提防盜版。您可以通過購買油勺並在太陽附近飛行來節省燃油成本，但再次提醒您，小心海盜！或者自己成為一名海盜，襲擊其他船隻...不要留下壞名聲，因為警察會來追捕你...與空間站對接並進行交易（有些可能會帶走違禁品...）用更好的武器、盾牌和其他設備升級你的船隻。有 8 個不同的星系，每個星係都有數百顆行星，有足夠的探索空間！你能讓你的聲譽一路上升到“精英”嗎？

Famicom Wars (Japan) (Translated).name: 紅白機戰爭
Famicom Wars (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
The Red Star nation and the Blue Moon nation are at war. Each has deployed troops and works to obtain enough funds so as to buy the necessary military hardware to overcome the other side.

Famicom Wars is a turn-based strategy game. The player takes the role of commander of military forces for either the Red Star or Blue Moon armies. The goal of each battle map is to overcome the other side's forces, destroying all enemy units and capturing all enemy-held landmarks. Each side of the battle takes their turn, moving units across the map. The capture of cities will give that side extra funds which can be used to build new units at factories and shipyards.

Famicom Wars features 17 maps total to battle across.
Famicom Wars (Japan) (Translated).desc:
紅星國和藍月國正在交戰。雙方都部署了軍隊，並努力獲得足夠的資金，以購買必要的軍事硬件來戰胜對方。

Famicom Wars 是一款回合製策略遊戲。玩家扮演紅星或藍月軍隊的軍事指揮官的角色。每張戰斗地圖的目標都是戰胜對方的軍隊，摧毀所有敵方單位並佔領所有敵方控制的地標。戰鬥雙方輪流在地圖上移動單位。佔領城市將為該方提供額外資金，可用於在工廠和造船廠建造新單位。

Famicom Wars 共有 17 張地圖可供戰鬥。

Batman - Return of the Joker (USA).name: 蝙蝠俠:小丑歸來
Batman - Return of the Joker (USA).original_desc:
The Joker lives again in SunSoft's sequel to their NES 
original. The Joker has somehow managed to escape from Arkham Asylum once again, and Batman must fight him across seven stages to restore peace to Gotham City.

Batman carries a gauntlet shooting basic bullets by default. This can be upgraded with weapon powerups located in boxes throughout the level, giving access to homing and energy weapons. Every upgrade weapon can be charged up for a secondary attack, different for each weapon. Batman also has a slide useful against most enemies and some bosses. 

Boss fights introduce a system where life is measured by points instead of tick marks or bars. In these sections, Batman has significantly more health, and can take many more hits when rumbling with these stronger foes.

Levels include a snowy landscape, moving train, military base, and sewers. Two levels require you to run and dodge explosions while vehicles keep pace in the background. Some levels also have Batman activate a jetpack and play through a short side-scrolling shooter. 

This game is one of the few Batman games that was not based directly on a movie or television series.
Batman - Return of the Joker (USA).desc:
小丑再次出現在 SunSoft 的 NES 續集中
原創。小丑不知何故再次逃離了阿卡姆瘋人院，蝙蝠俠必須在七個階段與他戰鬥，以恢復哥譚市的和平。

蝙蝠俠默認攜帶手套射擊基本子彈。這可以通過位於整個關卡中的盒子中的武器強化進行升級，從而可以使用尋的武器和能量武器。每個升級武器都可以為二次攻擊充電，每種武器的情況不同。蝙蝠俠還有一個對付大多數敵人和一些首領的幻燈片。

Boss 戰引入了一種系統，其中生命是通過點而不是刻度線或條來衡量的。在這些部分中，蝙蝠俠的生命值顯著提高，並且在與這些更強大的敵人戰鬥時可以承受更多的打擊。

關卡包括雪景、移動的火車、軍事基地和下水道。兩個關卡要求您奔跑並躲避爆炸，同時車輛在後台保持速度。有些關卡還讓蝙蝠俠激活噴氣背包並通過短篇橫向捲軸射擊遊戲進行遊戲。

該遊戲是少數不直接基於電影或電視劇的蝙蝠俠遊戲之一。

R.name: R.C.職業業餘選手 II
R.original_desc: This second Pro-Am racing game for NES introduces some innovations compared to its predecessor. Once again, you have to bring your red radio-controlled car to victory, score points, hit turbo speed lines, and leave no chance to your blue, green, and yellow adversaries. But you can also upgrade your engine and tires - if you can afford it, which means you'll have to think seriously about gathering those dollar signs scattered on the track. The tracks themselves have more variety, some have unusual enemies (little planes bombing you from above), and more kinds of obstacles. You also have several lives and don't die immediately if you arrived last.
R.desc: 與前作相比，NES 的第二款 Pro-Am 賽車遊戲引入了一些創新。再一次，你必須駕駛你的紅色無線電控制汽車取得勝利，得分，達到渦輪速度線，不給你的藍色、綠色和黃色對手留下任何機會。但你也可以升級你的引擎和輪胎——如果你能負擔得起的話，這意味著你必須認真考慮收集散落在賽道上的那些美元符號。軌道本身有更多種類，有些有不尋常的敵人（小飛機從上面轟炸你），以及更多種類的障礙。你也有好幾條命，如果你最後到達也不會立即死亡。

Adventures of Lolo (USA).name: 洛洛歷險記
Adventures of Lolo (USA).original_desc:
The lovely princess Lala was kidnapped by the Evil Demons of the Empire. You are Lolo, a round ball-like creature (just like the princess herself), and your mission is to sneak into the empire castle and to liberate the princess.

Adventures of Lolo is a puzzle game, and each level is a castle room. The goal in each room is to collect all the hearts. It is not always easy, because some hearts are blocked by enemies who will shoot you when you cross their path horizontally or vertically (or both). Once you collect all the hearts, a treasure chest will open and activate all the creatures in the room, even those who were not hostile until now. You must quickly cross the room to the exit which is now available to go to the next room. The game contains 50 rooms in total.

The difficulty level increases with each room, and after a few levels there is an especially hard room with tougher enemies.
Adventures of Lolo (USA).desc:
可愛的拉拉公主被帝國的惡魔綁架了。你是洛洛，一個圓球狀的生物（就像公主本人一樣），你的任務是潛入帝國城堡並解放公主。

Adventures of Lolo 是一款益智遊戲，每個關卡都是一個城堡房間。每個房間的目標是收集所有的心。這並不總是那麼容易，因為有些心被敵人擋住了，當你水平或垂直（或兩者）穿過他們的路徑時，他們會向你開槍。一旦你收集了所有的心，一個寶箱就會打開並激活房間裡的所有生物，甚至包括那些直到現在還沒有敵意的生物。您必須快速穿過房間到達出口，該出口現在可以通往下一個房間。遊戲總共包含 50 個房間。

每個房間的難度級別都會增加，經過幾個級別後，就會出現一個特別困難的房間，裡面有更難對付的敵人。

Bubble Bobble Part 2 (USA).name: 泡泡龍第 2 部分
Bubble Bobble Part 2 (USA).original_desc:
Cubby and Rubby, descendants of Bub and Bob from the original Bubble Bobble, must rescue their friend Judy, who has been kidnapped by the evil Skull Brothers!

The game plays much like the original game: You use a dinosaur that spits bubbles at their enemies, trapping them until you touch the bubbles to make them pop and defeat the trapped enemies. But Cubby and Rubby have two skills their ancestors did not: by holding down the attack button, they can float upwards - and by releasing it, they'll fire several bubbles at once. They can also pick up special items that increase their points, speed and attack power. This game features 80 levels, all-new enemies, and bonus mini-games.
Bubble Bobble Part 2 (USA).desc:
Cubby 和 Rubby 是原版《泡泡龍》中 Bub 和 Bob 的後代，他們必須營救被邪惡骷髏兄弟綁架的朋友朱迪！

該遊戲的玩法與原版遊戲非常相似：你使用恐龍向敵人吐泡泡，將他們困住，直到你觸摸泡泡使它們破裂並擊敗被困的敵人。但 Cubby 和 Rubby 擁有兩項他們的祖先沒有的技能：按住攻擊按鈕，它們可以向上漂浮，釋放它，它們會同時發射多個氣泡。他們還可以拾取特殊物品來增加他們的點數、速度和攻擊力。該遊戲有 80 個關卡、全新敵人和獎勵迷你游戲。

Zelda II - The Adventure of Link (USA).key: Zelda II - The Adventure of Link (USA)
Zelda II - The Adventure of Link (USA).original_name: Zelda II : The Adventure of Link
Zelda II - The Adventure of Link (USA).name: 林克的冒險
Zelda II - The Adventure of Link (USA).original_desc: The land of Hyrule is in chaos.  As Link, you'll be sent on a treacherous journey to return six precious Crystals to their origins in six stone statues.  Only by defeating the guardians of the six palaces will you gain passage to the seventh palace, take on the ultimate challenge that awaits you, and wake the Princess Zelda from her sleeping spell.  On your way, helpful villagers you encounter will offer clues and secret messages invaluable in your quest.  As you guide Link through the levels of Hyrule, close-ups and overviews will enhance your video vision.  Are you up to the challenge?
Zelda II - The Adventure of Link (USA).desc: 海拉爾大地一片混亂。作為林克，你將踏上一段危險的旅程，將六塊石雕像中的六顆珍貴水晶帶回它們的起源。只有擊敗六座宮殿的守護者，你才能進入第七座宮殿，接受等待著你的終極挑戰，並將塞爾達公主從沉睡的咒語中喚醒。在途中，您遇到的樂於助人的村民將為您的探索提供無價的線索和秘密信息。當您引導林克穿越海拉魯的各個關卡時，特寫鏡頭和概覽將增強您的視頻視野。你準備好迎接挑戰了嗎？

Panic Restaurant (USA).name: 恐慌餐廳
Panic Restaurant (USA).original_desc:
Panic Restaurant is a side-scrolling platform game where you play as chef Cookie. The rival chef Ohdove has taken over his restaurant and it's up to Cookie to reclaim it.

It is a fairly basic platform game. You run and jump, and enemies are placed all around to try and stop you. The entire game, backgrounds, enemies and bosses, is food-themed. You encounter things such as sausages, microwave ovens, onions and hamburgers on your way through the restaurant. To your help you always have a frying pan to beat the enemies with, and you can also find other items, such as a spoon, and plates to throw at the enemies.

The game contains 6 stages, each in a separate location in the restaurant, such as the kitchen, freezer and basement. At the end of each level you are faced with a boss. In between each level is a bonus game where you play a slot machine to try and win some extra health and lives.
Panic Restaurant (USA).desc:
《Panic Restaurant》是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲，您在其中扮演廚師 Cookie。競爭對手廚師 Ohdove 接管了他的餐廳，而 Cookie 則需要奪回它。

這是一個相當基本的平台遊戲。你奔跑跳躍，周圍遍布敵人試圖阻止你。整個遊戲，背景，敵人和老闆，都是以食物為主題的。你在穿過餐廳的路上會遇到香腸、微波爐、洋蔥和漢堡包等東西。為了幫助你，你總是有一個煎鍋來擊敗敵人，你還可以找到其他物品，如勺子和盤子來扔向敵人。

遊戲包含 6 個階段，每個階段都位於餐廳的不同位置，例如廚房、冰櫃和地下室。在每個關卡的最後，你都會遇到一個老闆。每個級別之間都有一個獎勵遊戲，您可以玩老虎機來嘗試贏得一些額外的健康和生命。

Legend of Zelda, The (USA) (Rev 1).name: 薩爾達傳說 王國之淚
Legend of Zelda, The (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
In one of the darkest times in the Kingdom of Hyrule, a young, pointy-eared boy named Link takes on an epic quest to restore the fragmented Triforce of Wisdom and save the Princess Zelda from the clutches of the evil, power-hungry Ganon.

The Legend of Zelda for the NES marks the first action-adventure title of the popular Nintendo series. Players must make their way through the various forests, graveyards, plains, and deserts of the Overworld to find the secret entrances of the eight dungeons in an attempt to piece together the broken Triforce. Once all pieces are joined, Link will be able to gain entry to Death Mountain, home of Ganon, and prison of Princess Zelda.

The game is drawn in a top-down perspective and is known for several factors that were revolutionary at the time: A full world that could be freely explored, power-ups that would permanently enhance your character's abilities, and a battery back-up save feature that allowed players to retain their progress instead of having to start over. The gameplay balanced out frequent action sequences with discovery, secrets, and exploration.
Legend of Zelda, The (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
在海拉魯王國最黑暗的時期之一，一個名叫林克的尖耳小男孩開始了一項史詩般的任務，以恢復支離破碎的智慧三角力量，並將塞爾達公主從邪惡、渴望權力的加農手中拯救出來。

NES 版《塞爾達傳說》是廣受歡迎的任天堂系列的首款動作冒險遊戲。玩家必須穿過主世界的各種森林、墓地、平原和沙漠，找到八個地下城的秘密入口，試圖將破碎的三角力量拼湊起來。一旦所有部件連接完畢，林克將能夠進入死亡山、加農的故鄉和塞爾達公主的監獄。

該遊戲以自上而下的視角繪製，並因幾個在當時具有革命性的因素而聞名：可以自由探索的完整世界，可以永久增強角色能力的能量提升，以及允許玩家保留進度而不必重新開始的電池備份保存功能。遊戲玩法平衡了頻繁的動作序列與發現、秘密和探索。

Kid Klown in Night Mayor World (USA).key: Kid Klown in Night Mayor World (USA)
Kid Klown in Night Mayor World (USA).original_name: Kid Klown in Night Mayor World
Kid Klown in Night Mayor World (USA).name: 夜間市長世界中的小丑小孩
Kid Klown in Night Mayor World (USA).original_desc:
Kid Klown and his family are on their way to perform in a circus when they meet the magician Night Mayor. He asks Kid Klown to help him open a treasure vault, but Kid Klown, having been warned about the evil magician by his parents, refuses. Not willing to give up so easily, Night Mayor kidnaps Kid Klown's family and dares him to follow him into his world if he ever wants to see his family again.

Kid Klown in Night Mayor World is a side-scrolling platformer. Kid Klown has to complete several different stages inhabited by various enemies. His most helpful tools are his balloons that he can throw at his enemies, use as a trampoline or cling to in order to float through the air. 

There are various items to be picked up as well, including bonus lifes, health power-ups, strawberries, lightnings that make Kid Klown temporarily invincible and question marks that can have the same effect as any of the other items, but might also reverse the controls.

After every completed stage, a bonus game can be played in which Kid Klown may win items by throwing balloons at them. The number of balloons available depends on the number of strawberries collected in the previous stage.
Kid Klown in Night Mayor World (USA).desc:
小小丑和他的家人在去馬戲團表演的路上遇到了魔術師夜市長。他請求小小丑幫他打開一個寶庫，但小小丑因為父母警告過邪惡魔法師而拒絕了。夜市長不願意輕易放棄，他綁架了小小丑的家人，並鼓勵他如果想再次見到他的家人就跟隨他進入自己的世界。

《夜間市長世界》中的小丑小子是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲。小丑小子必須完成幾個不同的階段，其中有不同的敵人。他最有用的工具是氣球，他可以向敵人扔氣球，將其用作蹦床或抓住氣球漂浮在空中。

還有各種物品可供拾取，包括額外生命、生命值提升、草莓、使小小丑暫時無敵的閃電，以及可以與任何其他物品產生相同效果但也可能逆轉控制的問號。

每個完成的階段後，可以玩一個獎勵遊戲，Kid Klown 可以通過向他們扔氣球來贏得物品。可用氣球的數量取決於前一階段收集的草莓數量。

Goonies II, The (USA).name: 七寶奇謀 II
Goonies II, The (USA).original_desc:
In a movie released in the 1980s, a group of youngsters formed a special gang and called themselves The Goonies.  Nintendo banked upon the movie’s popularity by releasing several games using the characters and music from it, including the theme song by Cyndi Lauper.  This is their second game on NES, The Goonies being released only for the Famicom system outside the United States.

You play Mikie, one of the gang members, whose friends have been kidnapped by the gang’s arch enemy – the Fratelli family.  Your buddies and Annie the Mermaid must be rescued, but it won’t be easy sneaking into the dark and creepy underground hideout where they are being held.  You must find a way to destroy their master computer and keep your friends from becoming road kill.  If Ma Fratelli or crazy Cousin Pipsqueak doesn’t stop you, one of her two crazy sons will!

Upon starting the game, Mikie is armed only with a yo-yo and the ability to jump.  As the game progresses, he will find boomerangs, a gun, bombs, molotave cocktails and even scuba gear to help him. Fight snakes, spiders, skeletons, man-eating fish while exploring the huge world full of cellars, secret caverns and elaborate mazes.

There is more than typical side-scrolling action, although there’s certainly a multitude of that.  Seventeen magic implements and many secret messages await you.  When Mikie enters a room he can talk to NPCs and try to find hidden items and doors by hitting the walls.  A password lets you keep your possessions for the next game.
Goonies II, The (USA).desc:
《機動戰士鋼彈》（機動戦士ガンダム）或簡稱鋼彈（ガンダム），是由富野由悠季與矢立肇為日升工作室創作的日本動畫系列，始於1979年。作為機甲題材作品，它包含太空戰爭、科技先進世界等科幻經典元素，但通過敘事與技術細節追求現實主義而實現創新。這一系列首次將巨型機器人——機甲題材的核心——降格為大規模量產武器。這一革新理念反映了動畫傳統受眾向成年群體的拓展，由此誕生了日本科幻的子類型「真實系機器人」。

儘管起步艱難，鋼彈在1980年代初取得成功並持續至今；該系列已推出約30部動畫、OVA及電影，另有數十部漫畫、小說、電子遊戲乃至通過SD鋼彈衍生的惡搞作品。雖視聽作品構成系列核心，但鋼彈系列實際依託衍生產品（特別是鋼普拉）作為第二支柱。從經濟角度看，該系列是萬代南夢宮最盈利的IP，年收入約5000億日元。多數批評聚焦於擔憂經濟需求可能壓倒創作需求。
鋼彈系列的成功首要體現在文化層面：鋼彈在中文文化圈裡有一定的知名度，在法語區幾近無名，但在日本卻是一個深刻的社會現象。多數學術研究者明確認定鋼彈系列對日本動畫與流行文化影響重大，常將系列與西方的《星球大戰》相比。這種影響具象化於日本日常生活的方方面面，無論是廣告、專賣店、藝術展覽，還是在東京附近建造的18米高立像。然而鋼彈系列未能稱霸全球，海外推廣有限且常與超時空要塞系列、新世紀福音戰士系列等作品競爭。

KickMaster (USA).name: 踢球大師
KickMaster (USA).original_desc:
The evil wizard Belzed and his forces have attacked the kingdom of Lowrel, killed its king and queen and kidnapped princess Silphee. Players take control of aspiring martial artist Thonolan who sets out to rescue Silphee and defeat Belzed.

Kick Master is a side-scrolling platformer in which enemies are defeated by using various kicks and spells. Defeated enemies drop three items that refill Thoalon's health or magic, grant an extra life, damage him or increase his experience. When Thoalan gains a level, his maximum MP is increased and he learns new kicks, such as sliding, flying, roundhouse or butterfly kicks. Along the way, he can also pick up different spells that damage his enemies, protect him or refill his health.
KickMaster (USA).desc:
邪惡巫師貝爾澤德和他的軍隊襲擊了洛雷爾王國，殺死了國王和王后，並綁架了希爾菲公主。玩家控制有抱負的武術家托諾蘭，他出發去營救西爾菲並擊敗貝爾澤德。

Kick Master 是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲，可以通過使用各種踢腿和法術來擊敗敵人。被擊敗的敵人會掉落三件物品，這些物品可以補充托阿隆的生命值或魔法、給予他額外的生命、對他造成傷害或增加他的經驗。當托阿蘭升級時，他的最大 MP 會增加，並且他會學習新的踢法，例如滑行、飛行、迴旋或蝴蝶踢。一路上，他還可以拾取不同的法術來傷害敵人、保護敵人或補充生命值。

Rampart (USA) (Jaleco).name: 壁壘
Rampart (USA) (Jaleco).original_desc:
A medieval masterpiece of power, strategy, and ingenuity!

The objective is brutally simple: engage your enemy in an all-out exchange of cannonfire, then assess the damage and rebuild your castle.

But the reality of RAMPART is far more complex. The key to victory lies in how quickly you can pick up the pieces and redesign, refortify, and extend your walls before the next battle begins.

Whether you're facing an onslaught from the computer's armada, or pitting your castle cannons against another player's, there's only one way out. Defend... or perish.
Rampart (USA) (Jaleco).desc:
權力、策略和獨創性的中世紀傑作！

目標非常簡單：與你的敵人進行全面的砲火交火，然後評估損失並重建你的城堡。

但 RAMPART 的現實要復雜得多。勝利的關鍵在於你能多快地收拾殘局並在下一場戰鬥開始之前重新設計、加固和擴展你的城牆。

無論你是面對計算機艦隊的猛攻，還是用你的城堡大砲對抗其他玩家，只有一種出路。保衛……或滅亡。

Genghis Khan (USA).name: 成吉思汗
Genghis Khan (USA).original_desc:
In a few words: Conquer all you can.
You have two options: Mongol conquest or World conquest. In the first campaign as Temujin (later known as Genghis Khan), you must unite all the little tribes of Mongolia. You can use force or diplomacy.
In the second campaign, you can be one of four characters. As in the first campaign, you must unite all the countries.
Genghis Khan (USA).desc:
簡而言之：征服一切。
你有兩個選擇：蒙古征服或世界征服。在鐵木真（後來的成吉思汗）的第一次戰役中，你必須團結蒙古所有的小部落。你可以使用武力或外交。
在第二個戰役中，您可以成為四個角色之一。與第一個戰役一樣，您必須團結所有國家。

Zombie Nation (USA).name: 殭屍國度
Zombie Nation (USA).original_desc:
In 1999 a mysterious object crashes into the desert and a mysterious creature, Darc Seed appears. Using magnetic powers, he soon turns the people of the United States into zombies and exerts influence over various weapons and objects. Among the weapons Darc Seed claims is the legendary samurai sword, Shura. When the great head of the samurai, Namakubi hears about this, he sets out for the United States to defeat Darc Seed and reclaim the sword.

What makes this so unusual however is that "great head of the samurai" is to be taken literally and Namakubi therefore is a giant disembodied head. His main weapon is the ability to shoot projectiles from his eyes and bombs from his mouth which he fires at various enemies, objects and buildings. Furthermore, should a zombie hostage fall out a window he can rescue them to slowly power up his attacks.
Zombie Nation (USA).desc:
1999 年，一個神秘物體墜入沙漠，神秘生物達爾克種子出現。利用磁力，他很快將美國人民變成殭屍，並對各種武器和物體施加影響。達克種子聲稱擁有的武器之一是傳說中的武士刀“修羅”。當偉大的武士首領納馬庫比聽說此事後，他出發前往美國，擊敗達克種子並奪回劍。

然而，這種現像如此不尋常的原因在於，“武士的偉大頭部”是按字面意思理解的，因此生馬庫是一個巨大的、沒有實體的頭部。他的主要武器是能夠從眼睛發射射彈和從嘴發射炸彈，向各種敵人、物體和建築物發射。此外，如果殭屍人質從窗戶掉下來，他可以營救他們以慢慢加強他的攻擊。

Dragon Warrior IV (USA).name: 最終幻想IV
Dragon Warrior IV (USA).original_desc:
Dragon Warrior 4, the fourth volume in the Dragon Warrior series (and the last on the NES), once again took the elements of the previous games and expanded them into a five chapter saga of epic proportions.
  The first four chapters are played from the viewpoint of one character per chapter, who will all meet up in the fifth chapter.  From a soldier to a merchant, the game weaves an intriguing story that ties all four characters together in the end.
  Also new in Dragon Warrior 4 is the introduction of battle tactics where the lineup of the characters is important to how much damage they deal.  The player is even given the opportunity to swap a character from reserve into the battle to add a whole new depth of strategy.
Dragon Warrior IV (USA).desc:
《龍戰士 4》是龍戰士系列的第四部作品（也是紅白機上的最後一部），再次吸收了前作的元素，並將其擴展為史詩般的五章傳奇。
前四章是從每章一個角色的角度來進行的，這些角色都將在第五章中相遇。從士兵到商人，遊戲編織了一個有趣的故事，最終將所有四個角色聯繫在一起。
《龍戰士 4》中的另一個新功能是引入了戰鬥策略，其中角色的陣容對於他們造成的傷害非常重要。玩家甚至有機會將角色從預備隊切換到戰鬥中，以增加全新的策略深度。

Gradius II (Japan).name: 步驟2
Gradius II (Japan).original_desc:
Gradius II is a sequel to Gradius, and Life Force, and is a horizontal space shooter composed of 7 levels.
Like it's predecessor, you can collect power up from enemies and chose which ones to use when. This time, this system is enhanced because you can chose between 4 different power-up sequences, allowing you to use differents types of weapons against your enemies. There is also the possibility to gain options, which are mysterious balls of fire that follows your spaceship closely and mimic all its movements (including shots). While you only could have 2 of them in Gradius, you now can have up to 4 of them.
Gradius II (Japan).desc:
《Gradius II》是《Gradius》和《Life Force》的續作，是一款由 7 個關卡組成的水平太空射擊遊戲。
和它的前身一樣，你可以從敵人那裡收集能量並選擇何時使用哪些能量。這次，這個系統得到了增強，因為你可以在 4 種不同的強化序列之間進行選擇，讓你可以使用不同類型的武器來對付敵人。還有機會獲得選項，這些選項是神秘的火球，緊密跟隨您的宇宙飛船並模仿其所有動作（包括射擊）。雖然在 Gradius 中只能擁有 2 個，但現在最多可以擁有 4 個。

Adventures of Lolo 3 (USA).name: 洛洛歷險記3
Adventures of Lolo 3 (USA).original_desc:
This time, Lolo has a red friend who will do some of the work for him. Unlike the two previous Lolo games, Adventures of Lolo 3 lets you wander around a world map to explore different locations in a non-linear fashion. However, some of the locations are blocked and will only open up after you earn the correct a key by completing another level.

The gameplay is very similar to the two previous games. You have to collect all the hearts in each room while avoiding the enemies trying to stop you. Once you have eaten all the hearts, more enemies will appear to try and keep you from reaching the exit. The puzzles involve mostly pushing things to prevent enemies from stopping you.
Adventures of Lolo 3 (USA).desc:
這次，洛洛有一個紅色朋友，他會為他做一些工作。與前兩款 Lolo 遊戲不同，Adventures of Lolo 3 讓您在世界地圖上漫步，以非線性方式探索不同的地點。然而，有些地點被封鎖，只有在您完成另一個關卡並獲得正確的鑰匙後才會開放。

遊戲玩法與前兩款遊戲非常相似。你必須收集每個房間裡的所有紅心，同時避開試圖阻止你的敵人。一旦你吃掉了所有的心，更多的敵人就會出現並試圖阻止你到達出口。這些謎題主要涉及推動物體以防止敵人阻止你。

Go for it! Goemon 2 (Japan) (Translated).name: 祝五右衛門2好運
Go for it! Goemon 2 (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
Sequel to Ganbare Goemon!, Goemon 2 puts you back in the shoes of Goemon as he traverses feudal Japan looking to bring justice to any corrupt baddies he may find. 

Joining Goemon in his adventure is the wacky ninja Ebisumaru which allows for simultaneous 2-player gameplay, marking the biggest difference in terms of gameplay with the original. The game keeps the straightforward side-scrolling beat 'em up formula and even removes some of the maze-like elements in the previous game, adding new weapons and upgrades to make the game more action-oriented. Wandering through the stages is still possible and you can enter several stores and locations and trigger amusing humorous sequences keeping in tone with the lighthearted spirit of the series.
Go for it! Goemon 2 (Japan) (Translated).desc:
《五右衛門 2》是《Ganbare Goemon!》的續作，讓您重新扮演五右衛門，穿越封建日本，尋求將他可能發現的腐敗壞人繩之以法。

與五右衛門一起冒險的還有古怪的忍者惠美須丸，它允許同時進行 2 人遊戲，這標誌著遊戲玩法與原版的最大區別。遊戲保留了簡單的橫向捲軸清版模式，甚至刪除了前作中的一些類似迷宮的元素，添加了新的武器和升級，使遊戲更加以動作為導向。仍然可以在舞台上漫步，你可以進入幾個商店和地點，並觸發有趣的幽默序列，與該系列輕鬆的精神保持一致。

Super Mario Bros.name: 超級瑪利歐兄弟 驚奇
Super Mario Bros.original_desc: Super Mario Bros. follows Mario and Luigi as they race to rescue Princess Peach from the evil Bowser. In their debut platforming quest, the brothers leap through enemy-filled levels, dodge traps, and uncover hidden bonuses. The Super Mushroom makes Mario grow, the Fire Flower gives him firepower, and the Star grants brief invincibility. Each level ends with a flagpole and the higher you grab it, the more points you score. Secret bonus areas and warp zones allow shortcuts through the game. A timeless classic that defined a genre.
Super Mario Bros.desc: 《超級馬里奧兄弟》講述了馬里奧和路易吉競相從邪惡的庫巴手中拯救碧琪公主的故事。在他們的首次平台跳躍任務中，兄弟倆跨越充滿敵人的關卡，躲避陷阱，並發現隱藏的獎勵。超級蘑菇讓馬里奧成長，火焰花賦予他火力，星星賦予他短暫的無敵能力。每個關卡都以一根旗桿結束，你抓住旗桿越高，得分就越多。秘密獎勵區域和扭曲區域允許在遊戲中走捷徑。定義了一種流派的永恆經典。

New Ghostbusters II (Europe).name: 新捉鬼敢死隊 II
New Ghostbusters II (Europe).original_desc:
New Ghostbusters II follows loosely the original Ivan Reitman's film plot. You start out by selecting two ghostbusters out of  five (The 5th one is Louis Tully). The first, player controlled buster will use proton pack and second, controlled by AI, uses the trap where ghosts end up, after been freezed by using the proton pack. Player controlled buster can get hurt, if touched by a ghost, while AI buster can't. 

The game's perspective is Top-Down, where you move from a one room to another and get rid of ghosts. The type of ghosts vary. After every level you have to fight against a boss, usually someone from the movie. For example, in the first courthouse level you fight against the Scoleri brothers. 

The game contains six levels, inspired by the movie:The Courthouse
2. Subways
3. Apartment
4. The Underground
5. The Museum of Art
6. Vigo's Altar
New Ghostbusters II (Europe).desc:
《新捉鬼敢死隊 II》大致遵循原版伊万·雷特曼的電影情節。首先，您從五個捉鬼敢死隊中選擇兩個（第五個是路易斯·塔利）。第一個，玩家控制的破壞者將使用質子包，第二個，由人工智能控制，使用幽靈在使用質子包被凍結後最終到達的陷阱。如果被鬼魂觸碰，玩家控制的破壞者可能會受傷，而人工智能破壞者則不會。

遊戲的視角是自上而下的，你從一個房間移動到另一個房間並擺脫鬼魂。鬼魂的種類各不相同。每個關卡之後，你都必須與老闆戰鬥，通常是電影中的人物。例如，在第一個法院關卡中，您將與斯科萊里兄弟作戰。

該遊戲包含六個關卡，靈感來自電影：法院
2. 地鐵
3. 公寓
4. 地下
5. 藝術博物館
6. 維戈祭壇

S.name: S.C.A.T. : 特別控制論攻擊小組
S.original_desc:
In a humorous take on the eighties' sci-fi judgment day films, you either play Arnold or Sigourney in a mission to save the world. The year is 2029 and an alien invasion, led by Supreme Commander Vile Malmort, threatens the earth.

The heroes are equipped with a jet pack and two orbiting cannons. These can be set to fire in one direction or in a fixed pattern. You can fly in all directions and use power-ups to gain new types of weapons or to restore health. Only seven lives per mission are provided, but there is an unlimited amount of continues.
S.desc:
在八十年代科幻末日電影的幽默演繹中，你要么扮演阿諾德，要么扮演西格妮，執行拯救世界的使命。2029 年，由最高指揮官維爾·馬爾莫特領導的外星人入侵威脅著地球。

英雄們配備了噴氣背包和兩門軌道炮。這些可以設置為向一個方向或以固定模式發射。你可以向各個方向飛行並使用能量提升來獲得新型武器或恢復生命值。每個任務只提供七條生命，但繼續次數是無限的。

Clash at Demonhead (USA).name: 惡魔頭的衝突
Clash at Demonhead (USA).original_desc: Professor Plum and his plans for the doomsday device, DEAD END, have been stolen by the LAWBREAKERS, a group determined to destroy humanity. As Sergeant Billy "Big Bang" Blitz from S.A.B.R.E., your mission is to rescue the professor and save the world from destruction. Your journey takes you to Demonhead Mountain, where he is being held captive. Along the way, you collect money from defeated enemies to purchase equipment such as a diving suit, a jetpack, or a shop card to aid you in your adventure.
Clash at Demonhead (USA).desc: 普拉姆教授和他的末日裝置“DEAD END”計劃已被決心毀滅人類的“違法者”組織竊取。作為來自 S.A.B.R.E. 的比利“大爆炸”閃電中士，你的任務是營救教授並拯救世界免遭毀滅。你的旅程將帶你前往惡魔頭山，他被囚禁在那裡。一路上，你可以從被擊敗的敵人那裡收集金錢來購買潛水服、噴氣背包或商店卡等裝備，以幫助你的冒險。

Yoshi's Cookie (USA).name: 耀西的餅乾
Yoshi's Cookie (USA).original_desc: Yoshi's Cookie is a fast-paced puzzle game that can be enjoyed by everyone as it is easy to play, but challenging to complete. To play, you move the randomly placed cookies into rows and columns of cookies with similar patterns. When you successfully assemble a row or column of the same cookies, the line will disappear, and you can begin on a new row or column. The "Yoshi" cookie is very special in both the 1-player and the 2-player game. Since the Yoshi Cookie is the key to both games, you must use it wisely.
Yoshi's Cookie (USA).desc: Yoshi's Cookie 是一款快節奏的益智遊戲，每個人都可以享受它，因為它很容易玩，但完成起來卻充滿挑戰。玩遊戲時，您將隨機放置的餅乾移動到具有相似圖案的餅乾行和列中。當您成功組裝一行或一列相同的cookie時，該行將消失，您可以開始新的行或列。“耀西”餅乾在 1 人遊戲和 2 人遊戲中都非常特別。由於耀西餅乾是這兩款遊戲的關鍵，因此您必須明智地使用它。

Balloon Fight (USA).name: 氣球大戰
Balloon Fight (USA).original_desc: In Balloon Fight you need to fly around with the aid of two balloons and try to pop your opponents balloons before they pop yours. Landing on top of your opponents will cause their balloon to pop and they will use a parachute to fall to safety. You then need to destroy the fallen opponent by running into it before it can blow up a new balloon and rejoin the battle. Should both of your balloons get popped, you will fall into the water below and lose a life. There is also a second game variation called "balloon trip" where you need to collect as many balloons as possible while avoiding the ocean below and lightning which forms maze like walls.
Balloon Fight (USA).desc: 在氣球大戰中，你需要藉助兩個氣球飛來飛去，並嘗試在對手爆破你的氣球之前將其爆破。降落在你的對手身上會導致他們的氣球爆炸，他們會使用降落傘落到安全的地方。然後，你需要通過撞倒倒下的對手來摧毀它，然後它才能吹起新的氣球並重新加入戰鬥。如果你的兩個氣球都爆了，你就會掉進下面的水中並失去生命。還有第二種遊戲變體，稱為“氣球之旅”，您需要收集盡可能多的氣球，同時避免下面的海洋和閃電，形成迷宮般的牆壁。

Whomp 'Em (USA).name: 打他們
Whomp 'Em (USA).original_desc:
Whomp 'Em tells the tale of a little Native American Indian named Soaring Eagle who is on a quest to fill his magic pouch with totems. These totems are guarded by fearsome bosses at the end of different environments spread throughout the land. Each totem gives Soaring Eagle a new power to help him complete his journey.

Whomp 'Em is a side scrolling action platformer. The hero can run, jump, and attack with his spear. Not only can he jab forward with his spear, Soaring Eagle can also stab upwards or downwards while jumping. Further, he can use his spear to defend from attacks coming from above.

Soaring Eagle must first conquer a bossless, introductory level. From there, he is free to choose from among 6 different lands to explore: Fire test, ice ritual, secret cliff, water test, magic forest, and sacred woods. Each level is highly unique with its own dangerous enemies and lethal boss. After completing these 6 areas and collecting the associated totems, Soaring Eagle is whisked off to a cloud realm where he must use all of his accumulated power to defeat a much larger enemy.
Whomp 'Em (USA).desc:
《Whomp 'Em》講述了一個名叫“飛鷹”的美洲原住民小印第安人的故事，他正在尋找用圖騰裝滿他的魔法袋的故事。這些圖騰由分佈在這片土地上不同環境盡頭的可怕首領守護。每個圖騰都賦予翱翔新的力量，幫助他完成旅程。

Whomp 'Em 是一款橫向捲軸動作平台遊戲。英雄可以奔跑、跳躍、用長矛攻擊。飛翔不僅可以用槍向前刺，還可以在跳躍時向上或向下刺。此外，他還可以使用長矛來防禦來自上方的攻擊。

飛翔的雄鷹必須首先征服無首領的入門關卡。從那裡，他可以自由地從 6 個不同的土地中進行選擇：火試煉、冰儀式、秘密懸崖、水試煉、魔法森林和神聖森林。每個級別都非常獨特，有自己危險的敵人和致命的老闆。完成這 6 個區域並收集相關圖騰後，翱翔鷹被帶到一個雲域，在那裡他必須使用他積累的所有力量來擊敗一個更大的敵人。

Flintstones, The - The Rescue of Dino &.key: Flintstones, The - The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy (USA)
Flintstones, The - The Rescue of Dino &.original_name: The Flintstones : The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy
Flintstones, The - The Rescue of Dino &.name: 摩登原始人:拯救迪諾和霍比
Flintstones, The - The Rescue of Dino &.original_desc:
The Flintstones and the Rubbles were enjoying a fine day when suddenly, someone from the future called Dr. Butler arrived and stole their pets, Dino and Hoppy!  Butler plans to feature the pets in his intergalactic zoo, and what's worse, he's destroyed the Great Gazoo's time machine so that no-one could stop him!  It's up to everyone's favourite caveman, Fred Flintstone, to find the pieces to the time machine and repair it, so that they can travel to the future and confront Dr. Butler once and for all!

The Flintstones: The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy is a side-scrolling platformer for the NES.  In it, you control Fred Flintstone through various locations such as Bedrock, Reef Rock, the Jungle and more as he searches for the missing pieces of Gazoo's time machine.  Fred has his trusty club which he can use to attack with, or charge up it's power by holding B for a more deadly attack.  Fred can collect coins after defeating enemies, which are used to pay for secondary weapons like slingshots and tomahawks, as well as special abilities such as flying and diving.

After completing the first level, the player is presented with an overworld map that allows you to choose which level you'd like to go to.  There are also basketball courts on the map - if you beat your opponent in a game of basketball, you can earn one of the special abilities which are required for use later.
Flintstones, The - The Rescue of Dino &.desc:
燧石一家和瓦礫一家正在享受美好的一天，突然，一個名叫巴特勒博士的未來人到來，偷走了他們的寵物迪諾和霍比！巴特勒計劃在他的星際動物園中展示這些寵物，更糟糕的是，他摧毀了大加佐的時間機器，這樣就沒有人可以阻止他了！大家最喜歡的穴居人弗萊德·燧石需要找到時間機器的碎片並修復它，這樣他們就可以前往未來，一勞永逸地對抗巴特勒博士！

《The Flintstones: The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy》是一款 NES 橫向捲軸平台遊戲。在遊戲中，你控制 Fred Flintstone 穿過基岩、礁石、叢林等不同地點，尋找 Gazoo 時間機器丟失的碎片。弗雷德擁有他值得信賴的棍棒，他可以用它來攻擊，或者按住 B 來充電以進行更致命的攻擊。弗雷德擊敗敵人後可以收集金幣，這些金幣可用於購買彈弓和戰斧等輔助武器，以及飛行和潛水等特殊能力。

完成第一個關卡後，玩家會看到一張世界地圖，您可以選擇要進入的關卡。地圖上還有籃球場——如果你在一場籃球比賽中擊敗了對手，你就可以獲得一種特殊能力，以後需要使用。

Kickle Cubicle (USA).name: 踢球小隔間
Kickle Cubicle (USA).original_desc:
Kickle Cubicle is a Lolo type sliding puzzle game where the Wicked Wizard King covered the kingdom with ice and hid the people and palaces deep within the ice.

Armed with his freezing breath, Kickle sets out to save his friends and attempts to rescue the kingdom from this puzzling predicament of perpetual winter.

Each level has a fixed time limit and enemies that will try and block your progress. The four lands (Garden, Fruit, Cake and Toy) have 17 or 18 puzzles in each. Beat all of those and there is a Special Stage with 30 more challenging puzzles.

Your main options are to move, make a block of ice and slide a block of ice.
Kickle Cubicle (USA).desc:
Kickle Cubicle 是一款 Lolo 類型的滑動益智遊戲，邪惡的巫師國王用冰覆蓋了王國，並將人民和宮殿隱藏在冰層深處。

基克爾用冰冷的呼吸武裝起來，出發去拯救他的朋友，並試圖將王國從這個令人費解的永久冬季困境中拯救出來。

每個級別都有固定的時間限制和會試圖阻止你前進的敵人。四個區域（花園、水果、蛋糕和玩具）每個區域都有 17 或 18 個謎題。通關所有這些後，就會出現一個包含 30 個更具挑戰性謎題的特殊關卡。

你的主要選擇是移動、製造冰塊和滑動冰塊。

Metroid (USA).name: 銀河戰士
Metroid (USA).original_desc:
It's you against the evil Mother Brain in the thrilling battle of Metroid!

You're inside the fortress planet Zebes. The planet of endless secret passageways where the Metroid are multiplying. Left alone the Metroid are harmless. But in the wrong hands they could destroy the galaxy. It's up to you to prevent the Mother Brain that controls Zebes from using the Metroid for evil purposes. But that won't be easy. You'll have to use your spacesuit to absorb valuable energy for your search to gain the use of power items like the Ice Beam, Wave Beam, High Jump Boots and Varia. If you survive, it will be you and your acquired powers against the Mother Brain.
Metroid (USA).desc:
在驚心動魄的銀河戰士之戰中，你將對抗邪惡的母腦！

你在堡壘星球 Zebes 內。這個星球上有無盡的秘密通道，銀河戰士在這裡繁衍生息。如果放任不管，銀河戰士是無害的。但如果落入壞人之手，它們可能會摧毀銀河系。你有責任阻止控制 Zebes 的母腦利用銀河戰士達到邪惡目的。但這並不容易。你必須使用你的宇航服吸收寶貴的能量來進行搜索，以獲得使用冰束、波束、跳高靴和瓦里亞等能量物品的能力。如果你活了下來，那將是你和你獲得的力量對抗母腦。

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II - The Ar.key: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II - The Arcade Game (USA)
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II - The Ar.original_name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II : The Arcade Game
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II - The Ar.name: 忍者神龜 II : 街機遊戲
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II - The Ar.original_desc:
April O'Neil, the reporter friend of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, is kidnapped by the villainous Shredder and his two goons, Bebop and Rocksteady. The four ninja turtles: Raphael, Michelangelo, Donatello and Leonardo fight their way through hordes of Foot Soldiers in order to rescue April. They battle familiar foes such as the mad scientist Baxter Stockman, General Traag from Dimension X and the evil alien brain Krang, up to the final showdown with Shredder himself.

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Arcade Game is a port of the popular arcade game made by Konami during the height of the cartoon series' popularity. Depending on the version of the game, up to two, three or four players can take part in the action. The game plays like a simplified Double Dragon. While most of the standard Foot Soldier enemies are easily dispatched, some attack with knives or ray guns and are thus more dangerous. At the end of each level, players encounter a boss (or in certain cases two bosses working in tandem, such as Bebop and Rocksteady).

The NES version of the game features additional content not present in other versions of the game: two new levels (Snowy Central Park and The Dojo), new bosses (including Tora, Shogun and Baxter Stockman as a fly), additional music tracks as well as more variations of Foot Soldiers.
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II - The Ar.desc:
艾普麗爾·奧尼爾是《忍者神龜》的記者朋友，被邪惡的施萊德和他的兩個暴徒 Bebop 和 Rocksteady 綁架。四隻忍者神龜：拉斐爾、米開朗基羅、多納泰羅和萊昂納多在成群的步兵中殺出一條血路，拯救艾普麗爾。他們與熟悉的敵人戰鬥，如瘋狂科學家巴克斯特·斯托克曼、來自 X 維度的特拉格將軍和邪惡的外星大腦克朗，直到與施萊德本人進行最後的對決。

《忍者神龜：街機遊戲》是科樂美在卡通系列最流行期間製作的流行街機遊戲的移植版。根據遊戲版本的不同，最多可以有兩名、三名或四名玩家參與行動。遊戲玩法就像簡化的雙龍。雖然大多數標準步兵敵人很容易被消滅，但有些敵人會用刀或射線槍攻擊，因此更加危險。在每個關卡結束時，玩家都會遇到一個 Boss（或者在某些情況下會遇到兩個協同工作的 Boss，例如 Bebop 和 Rocksteady）。

該遊戲的 NES 版本具有其他遊戲版本中沒有的附加內容：兩個新關卡（白雪皚皚的中央公園和道場）、新 Boss（包括 Tora、Shogun 和作為蒼蠅的 Baxter Stockman）、額外的音樂曲目以及更多變化的步兵。

Rescue - The Embassy Mission (USA).name: 救援：大使館任務
Rescue - The Embassy Mission (USA).original_desc: Terrorists have overrun an embassy and hold the people inside as hostages. You control six counter-terrorists whose mission is to eliminate the terrorists. In the first part of the game, you have to bring three men into position so they can snipe the building. The second part involves entering the building with the other three men to kill the terrorists and rescue the hostages. Depending on how well you positioned your snipers, you can use them to assist you on that mission.
Rescue - The Embassy Mission (USA).desc: 恐怖分子佔領了大使館，並將裡面的人扣為人質。你控制六名反恐人員，他們的任務是消滅恐怖分子。在遊戲的第一部分，你必須讓三名男子就位，這樣他們就可以狙擊建築物。第二部分是與其他三人一起進入大樓殺死恐怖分子並營救人質。根據你對狙擊手的定位，你可以使用他們來協助你完成任務。

Faxanadu (USA) (Rev 1).name: 法卡納杜
Faxanadu (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Disaster strikes the once peaceful Elf town of Eolis. The sky rains meteorites upon the World Tree - wild animals and evil monsters terrorize the citizens - the water supply from the wells is dwindling - plants are withering - people are dying. Only you can restore peace to the land by conquering the Evil One, who lives in the Evil Place.
There are many places you must visit during your quest including the medieval town, where you begin, country villages, fortresses, caves, and gloomy bogs - each with its own ambiance and musical score. You will be talking with the villagers, collecting gold to buy weapons, armor and other objects, jumping over obstacles and using items. Attack zombies, dwarves, giant snakes, wyverns, evil gnomes, or one-eyed one-footed things with a large collection of swords and daggers or zap them with a magic spell.
Faxanadu (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
災難襲擊了曾經平靜的精靈小鎮伊奧利斯。天空中的隕石落在世界樹上 - 野生動物和邪惡的怪物恐嚇著居民 - 水井的供水正在減少 - 植物正在枯萎 - 人們正在死亡。只有你可以通過征服居住在邪惡之地的邪惡者來恢復這片土地的和平。
在你的探索過程中，你必須參觀許多地方，包括你開始的中世紀城鎮、鄉村、堡壘、洞穴和陰暗的沼澤——每個地方都有自己的氛圍和樂譜。你將與村民交談，收集黃金來購買武器、盔甲和其他物品，跳過障礙並使用物品。使用大量劍和匕首攻擊殭屍、矮人、巨蛇、雙足飛龍、邪惡侏儒或獨眼單足生物，或使用魔法咒語消滅它們。

Mendel Palace (USA).name: 孟德爾宮
Mendel Palace (USA).original_desc: In Mendel Palace, you are Bun-Bun and you have to rescue your girlfriend Candy, who has fallen asleep and is now trapped in her dream. To progress, you have to go through various areas that feature dolls as enemies. Games are played on a board of 7x5 sliding tiles, using an overhead view. By sliding floor tiles, you'll be able to put them off balance and make the crash in the wall, leading to their destruction.
Mendel Palace (USA).desc: 在孟德爾宮，你是Bun-Bun，你必須營救你的女朋友Candy，她已經睡著了，現在被困在夢中。為了前進，你必須穿過以玩偶為敵人的各個區域。遊戲是在 7x5 滑動塊的棋盤上使用俯視圖進行的。通過滑動地磚，您將能夠使它們失去平衡並撞到牆上，導致它們被毀壞。

Bomberman (USA).name: 炸彈人
Bomberman (USA).original_desc:
Bomberman was a robot in a bomb making factory who longed for his freedom. Rumors circulated that escaping to the surface would allow the robot to become human. Getting out would be the trick. Each room is inhabited by monsters that must be neutralized and the exit itself hidden underneath bricks.

The first of the Bomberman series. Bomberman is a single player game with a top down view and simplistic controls. In fact, in addition to movement, you only have a single ability: placing bombs. Each bomb explodes into a cross-shaped blast (4 directions) which can destroy either enemies or blocks. Power-ups may be found to increase the size of the blast, place additional bombs, increase the speed of the Bomberman or to walk through walls. Your goal on each level is to destroy all enemies and escape through the exit before the time limit is up.. Hitting the exit with a bomb blast releases more enemies which must also be destroyed.
Bomberman (USA).desc:
炸彈人是炸彈製造工廠裡的一個機器人，他渴望自由。有傳言稱，逃到地表將使機器人變成人類。出去就是訣竅。每個房間都居住著必須消滅的怪物，出口本身隱藏在磚塊下面。

炸彈人系列的第一部。炸彈人是一款單人遊戲，具有自上而下的視角和簡單的控制。事實上，除了移動之外，你只有一個能力：放置炸彈。每個炸彈都會爆炸成十字形爆炸（4 個方向），可以摧毀敵人或方塊。能量提升可能會增加爆炸的規模、放置額外的炸彈、提高炸彈人的速度或穿過牆壁。您在每個級別的目標是消滅所有敵人並在時間限制結束之前從出口逃脫。用炸彈爆炸擊中出口會釋放更多的敵人，這些敵人也必須被消滅。

Tombs & Treasure (USA).name: 古墓與寶藏
Tombs & Treasure (USA).original_desc:
While exploring Central America, Professor Ime has disappeared.  He was last known to be going to the Mayan Tomb of Chichen Iza.  You lead two kids in their search for the professor.

This is a point and click adventure.  The directional buttons move a pointer on screen.  You'll be able to interact with items and switches after choosing from a list of keywords such as: look, use, and get.  The save feature uses passwords in order to continue your progress.
Tombs & Treasure (USA).desc:
在探索中美洲時，伊梅教授失踪了。據了解，他最後一次前往奇琴伊扎的瑪雅古墓。你帶領兩個孩子尋找教授。

這是一款點擊式冒險遊戲。方向按鈕可移動屏幕上的指針。從關鍵字列表中進行選擇後，您將能夠與項目和開關進行交互，例如：查看、使用和獲取。保存功能使用密碼來繼續您的進度。

Ice Hockey (USA).name: 冰球比赛中的暴力
Ice Hockey (USA).original_desc: Ice Hockey is an action game for one or two players. Start of by selecting a team and customizing your players. Each team member can be one of three player types: small and skinny (very fast, but not good at checking or shooting), very large (slow, but with a strong body check and outstanding shooting strength) or average (medium speed, with average checking and shooting strength). After the teams are set up, it's time to play some ice hockey! Gameplay features a scrolling screen to follow the action, and lets you choose which of the players you wish to control when on defense (on offense you always control the player with the puck). Fights can break out between players, and the loser may end up in the penalty box. There are five different speed settings for the game, and periods can be either 7, 10, or 15 minutes long.
Ice Hockey (USA).desc: 冰球是一種適合一到兩名玩家的動作遊戲。首先選擇一支球隊並定制您的球員。每個隊員可以是三種類型的球員之一：小而瘦（速度非常快，但不擅長阻擊或射門），非常大（速度慢，但身體阻擊能力強，射門力量突出）或一般（中等速度，阻擊和射門強度一般）。球隊組建完畢後，就該打冰球了！遊戲玩法有一個滾動屏幕來跟隨動作，並讓你選擇在防守時想要控制的球員（在進攻時你總是用冰球控制球員）。玩家之間可能會爆發爭鬥，失敗者可能會被送進禁區。遊戲有五種不同的速度設置，時間長度可以是 7 分鐘、10 分鐘或 15 分鐘。

Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom (US.key: Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom (USA)
Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom (US.original_name: Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom
Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom (US.name: 沙拉王國的番茄公主
Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom (US.original_desc:
Many growing seasons ago, the Salad Kingdom was a peaceful land. But one day, minister Pumpkin betrayed king Broccoli, kidnapped princess Tomato, stole the royal Turnip Emblem, and took them to his castle in Zucchini mountains. He sent his cruel Farmies to terrorize the Salad Kingdom. Shortly thereafter, the king died, unable to recover from the loss of his beautiful daughter. But he promised you, the brave Sir Cucumber, the princess' hand and the entire kingdom, if you save the beautiful Tomato from the clutches of the evil Pumpkin. 

Princess Tomato is an adventure game in which you interact with the environment by choosing commands from a menu, such as the traditional "check" or "give", and the less traditional "praise" or "percy". Percy is a little persimmon who will be your trusty side-kick throughout your quest and who will help you on many occasions. The puzzles are on the simple side, and are primarily based on talking to characters, finding items and giving them.
Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom (US.desc:
許多生長季節之前，沙拉王國還是一片和平的土地。但有一天，南瓜部長背叛了西蘭花國王，綁架了番茄公主，偷走了皇家蘿蔔徽章，並將它們帶到了他位於西葫蘆山的城堡。他派出殘忍的法米斯去恐嚇沙拉王國。此後不久，國王去世了，無法從失去美麗女兒的陰影中恢復過來。但他向你承諾，勇敢的黃瓜爵士，如果你從邪惡南瓜的魔掌中拯救出美麗的番茄，他將成為公主的手和整個王國。

番茄公主是一款冒險遊戲，您可以通過從菜單中選擇命令來與環境進行交互，例如傳統的“檢查”或“給予”，以及不太傳統的“讚美”或“珀西”。珀西是一隻小柿子，他將是你在整個任務過程中值得信賴的伙伴，並且會在很多情況下為你提供幫助。謎題很簡單，主要基於與角色交談、尋找物品並給予它們。

Bomberman II (USA).name: 炸彈人II
Bomberman II (USA).original_desc:
Our hero Bomberman Shiro was walking down the street one day when he witnessed a robbery. It was Bomberman Kuro who was the robber. But Kuro knocked Shiro to the ground, and then left the money so that he would be framed. Now Shiro has been taken to jail and must fight his way out of this place using the only method he knows: explosive bombs.

Dynablaster is the second Bomberman game in the series and plays similar to the first, only all gameplay has been reduced to a single screen. Your goal however remains the same on a smaller playing area. You are to destroy all enemies on a level and then find the exit to the next one. Bombing the exit is always a bad idea. The occasional power-up will increase your bomb blast, number of bombs on the screen at one time, player speed or give you the ability to walk through walls.

This game introduces a Versus Mode for 2 players and a Battle Mode for 3. Your goal in these is to destroy the other players while staying alive yourself.
Bomberman II (USA).desc:
有一天，我們的英雄炸彈人四郎走在街上，目睹了一場搶劫。強盜正是炸彈人庫洛。但黑卻把白打倒在地，然後留下錢，讓他被陷害。現在，白被關進了監獄，他必須使用他所知道的唯一方法：爆炸炸彈，奮力逃離這個地方。

Dynablaster 是該系列中的第二款炸彈人遊戲，其玩法與第一款類似，只是所有遊戲玩法都被簡化為一個屏幕。然而，您的目標在較小的比賽區域中保持不變。你要消滅一個關卡上的所有敵人，然後找到通往下一個關卡的出口。轟炸出口總是一個壞主意。偶爾的強化會增加你的炸彈爆炸、屏幕上一次的炸彈數量、玩家速度或讓你有能力穿過牆壁。

該遊戲引入了 2 名玩家的對戰模式和 3 名玩家的戰鬥模式。您的目標是消滅其他玩家，同時保持自己的生命。

Bubble Bobble (USA).name: 泡泡龍
Bubble Bobble (USA).original_desc: Bubble Bobble tells the story of Bub and Bob, two humans who wander into a mysterious monster cave and are magically transformed into dragons. To return to their human form, they must reach the end of the cave. The game is a platform adventure where each level takes place on a single screen. The goal is to defeat all enemies by trapping them in bubbles and then popping them to turn them into fruit. Bubbles can also act as platforms, while power-ups such as lightning or water currents help clear enemies more quickly. Collectible items like fruit give bonus points, but if you take too long, the relentless Baron Von Blubba appears to hunt you down.
Bubble Bobble (USA).desc: 《泡泡龍》講述了巴布和鮑勃這兩個人類走進一個神秘的怪物洞穴並神奇地變成龍的故事。為了恢復人類形態，他們必須到達洞穴的盡頭。該遊戲是一款平台冒險遊戲，每個關卡都發生在一個屏幕上。目標是通過將所有敵人困在氣泡中然後將其彈出將其變成水果來擊敗所有敵人。氣泡還可以充當平台，而閃電或水流等能量提升裝置可以幫助更快地清除敵人。水果等收藏品會給予獎勵積分，但如果你花的時間太長，無情的馮·布魯巴男爵似乎會追捕你。

Young Indiana Jones Chronicles, The (USA.name: 少年印第安納瓊斯編年史
Young Indiana Jones Chronicles, The (USA.original_desc:
The Young Indiana Jones Chronicles is based on the television series of the same name, which is in turn based on the Lucas/Spielberg movie franchise starring Harrison Ford. In this game, a young Indiana Jones embarks on globetrotting adventures in which he gathers treasure and fights for what is good and right.

The game features side-scrolling action where young Indy trots along the ground, jumps, crawls flat, and can collect and wield a variety of weapons against copious enemies in the game. Indy starts with a whip and can find such weapons as throwing knives, grenades, pistols, rifles, and others. He can also collect hat powerups which allow him to sustain more damage.
Young Indiana Jones Chronicles, The (USA.desc:
《少年印第安納瓊斯編年史》改編自同名電視劇，該電視劇又改編自哈里森·福特主演的盧卡斯/斯皮爾伯格電影系列。在這款遊戲中，年輕的印第安納·瓊斯開始了環球冒險，收集寶藏並為正義而戰。

該遊戲以橫向捲軸動作為特色，年輕的印地沿著地面小跑、跳躍、平地爬行，並且可以收集和使用各種武器來對抗遊戲中的大量敵人。印第從鞭子開始，可以找到飛刀、手榴彈、手槍、步槍等武器。他還可以收集帽子強化道具，讓他承受更多傷害。

Gargoyle's Quest II (USA).name: 石像鬼的任務 II
Gargoyle's Quest II (USA).original_desc:
The Ghoul realm is under attack by a mysterious force and aspiring warrior Firebrand sets out to save it.

As in its predecessor, gameplay in Gargoyle's Quest II is divided into an adventure and an action part. During the adventure parts, Firebrand explores a world map and several villages from a top-down perspective, talking to his fellow ghouls and zombies to advance the story or receive important items. Action parts are seen from a side-scrolling perspective. In these parts of the game, Firebrand has the ability to jump, cling to walls, fly for a limited amount of time and shoot fireballs at his enemies. As the game progresses, Firebrand becomes more and more powerful, receiving items that improve his agility, armor or attack power.
Gargoyle's Quest II (USA).desc:
食屍鬼國度正受到神秘力量的攻擊，有抱負的戰士火燒決定拯救它。

與前作一樣，Gargoyle's Quest II 的遊戲玩法分為冒險和動作部分。在冒險部分，Firebrand 從自上而下的角度探索世界地圖和幾個村莊，與他的食屍鬼和殭屍同伴交談以推進故事或接收重要物品。動作部分是從橫向滾動的角度來看的。在遊戲的這些部分中，Firebrand 能夠跳躍、緊貼牆壁、在有限的時間內飛行並向敵人發射火球。隨著遊戲的進行，Firebrand 變得越來越強大，收到的物品可以提高他的敏捷性、護甲或攻擊力。

Final Fantasy III (Japan) (Translated).name: 最終幻想III
Final Fantasy III (Japan) (Translated).original_desc: In a remote village of Ur, four orphan boys were raised by the priest Topapa. Once, the Crystal of Wind, guarded by the people of Ur, sank deep into the earth. The four boys decided to retrieve it from there and went down into an underground cave. But when they found the crystal, it spoke to them and from its words they understood they were chosen for a much more important and world-embracing mission...
Final Fantasy III (Japan) (Translated).desc: 在烏爾的一個偏遠村莊，四個孤兒由牧師托帕帕撫養長大。曾經，烏爾人民守護的風之水晶沉入了地底深處。四個男孩決定從那裡取回它，並進入了一個地下洞穴。但當他們找到水晶時，它對他們說話，從它的話語中，他們明白自己被選中執行一項更重要、更包容世界的使命……

DuckTales 2 (USA).name: 迪士尼鴨子故事 2
DuckTales 2 (USA).original_desc: Scrooge McDuck is hot on the trail of the richest adventure ever. Pieces to the map of the Lost Treasure of McDuck have been scattered across the globe, and Scrooge must find them before the greedy Flintheart Glomgold grabs them. It's going to be a race to the finish as both of them try to find the treasure and become the richest duck in the world! Join Scrooge and his nephews as they explore the ancient pyramids of Egypt and do battle with swash-buckling pirates in the Bermuda Triangle. Help them search the haunted halls of an ancient Scottish castle and scale the watery heights of Niagara Falls. Aid Scrooge in his quest for the secret of the island of Mu and you'll gain the final clue to unravel the hidden location of the Lost Treasure of McDuck!
DuckTales 2 (USA).desc: 史克魯奇·麥克老鴨正在踏上有史以來最豐富的冒險之旅。麥克老鴨失落寶藏的地圖碎片散落在全球各地，史克魯奇必須在貪婪的燧心·格洛姆戈德抓住它們之前找到它們。這將是一場沖向終點的競賽，他們都試圖找到寶藏並成為世界上最富有的鴨子！與斯克魯奇和他的侄子們一起探索埃及古代金字塔，並在百慕大三角與虛張聲勢的海盜作戰。幫助他們搜索古老蘇格蘭城堡的鬧鬼大廳，並攀登尼亞加拉瀑布的水流高度。幫助斯克魯奇尋找穆島的秘密，你將獲得最終的線索，揭開麥克老鴨失落寶藏的隱藏位置！

Burai Fighter (USA).name: 壞鬥士
Burai Fighter (USA).original_desc:
The Burai, a race of evil super-brain aliens, have launched their plan to conquer the universe with their army of half-organic, half-robot creatures -- the robo-mutants.  It's up to you to stop them!  Strap on your jet pack, and get ready to become the ultimate Burai Fighter.

Burai Fighter is an arcade shooter with two modes of play.  Most levels are side- and vertical-scrolling with pre-designed layouts.  A few levels are different, though: top-down perspective, with a randomized layout.  Either way, you'll be armed with a variety of weapons, including different guns (laser, missile, ring) and the powerful cobalt bomb which kills everything onscreen.

Burai Fighter uses a slightly different gameplay mechanic when compared to other shooters. You can shoot in 8 directions, and when you hold down the fire button you keep shooting in that direction.
Burai Fighter (USA).desc:
布萊人是一個邪惡的超級大腦外星人種族，他們已經啟動了他們的計劃，用他們的半有機、半機器人生物軍隊——機器人變種人征服宇宙。由你來阻止他們！帶上你的噴氣背包，準備好成為終極布萊戰士。

Burai Fighter 是一款具有兩種遊戲模式的街機射擊遊戲。大多數關卡都是橫向和垂直滾動的，具有預先設計的佈局。不過，有幾個級別是不同的：自上而下的視角，具有隨機的佈局。無論哪種方式，你都將配備各種武器，包括不同的槍（激光、導彈、戒指）和強大的鈷炸彈，它可以殺死屏幕上的一切。

與其他射擊遊戲相比，《Burai Fighter》使用的遊戲機制略有不同。你可以向 8 個方向射擊，當你按住射擊按鈕時，你會一直向那個方向射擊。

Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle, The (USA).name: 兔八哥瘋狂城堡
Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle, The (USA).original_desc: This game is the first in the Crazy Castle series of Bugs Bunny games for the Game Boy. The object of this game is to move Bugs around the 80 levels of a castle and collect all of the carrots. Preventing Bugs' progress are the usual Warner Bros. characters, such as Daffy Duck, Yosemite Sam, and Sylvester. Bugs himself does not have any attack moves, but you can find various objects like anvils and boxing gloves to thwart your enemies.
Bugs Bunny Crazy Castle, The (USA).desc: 該遊戲是 Game Boy 上的兔八哥遊戲《瘋狂城堡》系列中的第一款。該遊戲的目標是在城堡的 80 層中移動蟲子並收集所有胡蘿蔔。阻礙蟲蟲前進的是常見的華納兄弟角色，如達菲鴨、優勝美地山姆和西爾維斯特。蟲子本身沒有任何攻擊動作，但你可以找到各種物品，如鐵砧和拳擊手套來挫敗你的敵人。

Jackal (USA).name: 豺狼
Jackal (USA).original_desc:
The enemy army has captured too many of your forces. Being held in P.O.W. camps, these soldiers are effectively out of the war, unless some kind of rescue operation can be mounted. Heavy Forces are too slow and visible to be of any use, but a small jeep, maybe two, crewed by about 4 people, would be minimal enough not to represent too much of a loss and yet suitable enough to aid in rescue. But of course, if these brave men want to succeed AND come back alive; they'll need to fight like animals... they'll need to fight like jackals...

Jackal is an overhead game for up to 2 players. The controller moves in four directions, button A fires your grenades (upgradable to bazooka) and button B your machine gun which ALWAYS fires to the top of the screen. Your mission is to locate facilities where soldiers are being held prisoner, rescue as many as possible, escort them to a safe landing zone and fight a boss battle.
Jackal (USA).desc:
敵軍俘獲了太多你的部隊。被關押在戰俘營營地中，這些士兵實際上已經脫離了戰爭，除非可以開展某種救援行動。重型部隊速度太慢，而且太明顯，沒有任何用處，但是一輛小型吉普車，也許是兩輛，乘員大約是 4 人，足夠小，不會造成太大損失，但又足夠適合救援。但當然，如果這些勇敢的人想要成功並活著回來；他們需要像動物一樣戰鬥……他們需要像豺狼一樣戰鬥……

Jackal 是一款最多可供 2 名玩家玩的架空遊戲。控制器向四個方向移動，按鈕 A 發射手榴彈（可升級為火箭筒），按鈕 B 發射機槍，始終向屏幕頂部發射。你的任務是找到關押士兵的設施，營救盡可能多的人，護送他們到安全著陸區並進行一場boss戰。

Wacky Races (USA).name: 古怪的比賽
Wacky Races (USA).original_desc:
Despite what the name implies, Wacky Races for NES is not a racing game, and has nothing to do with the other games bearing the same name but the license. In this game, the player takes control of Muttley, the grumbling, but loyal dog from the popular Hanna-Barbera cartoon. His master Dastardly sends his on three different missions, each taking place in a different location, which in its turn is divided into smaller levels. 

Muttley has to complete those levels in a rather standard platformer fashion, moving from left to right, jumping, overcoming obstacles and fighting various creatures and boss enemies from the cartoon movie. The dog's primary weapon is, unsurprisingly, his own mouth - biting regular enemies will usually lead to their instant death. Muttley can also collect bones scattered across the levels, which will grant him powerful weapons and skills of limited use, such as a bomb, a projectile attack, and the ability to heal.
Wacky Races (USA).desc:
不管顧名思義，Wacky Races for NES 並不是一款賽車遊戲，並且與除許可證外的其他同名遊戲沒有任何關係。在這款遊戲中，玩家將控制來自流行的漢納-巴伯拉卡通片中的穆特利，一隻愛發牢騷但忠誠的狗。他的主人卑鄙地派他去執行三個不同的任務，每個任務都在不同的地點進行，而任務又分為更小的級別。

Muttley 必須以相當標準的平台遊戲方式完成這些關卡，從左到右移動、跳躍、克服障礙並與卡通電影中的各種生物和頭目敵人戰鬥。毫不奇怪，狗的主要武器是它自己的嘴——咬住普通的敵人通常會導致它們立即死亡。Muttley 還可以收集散落在各個關卡中的骨頭，這將賦予他強大的武器和有限用途的技能，例如炸彈、投射物攻擊和治療能力。

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III - The M.key: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III - The Manhattan Project (USA)
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III - The M.original_name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III : The Manhattan Project
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III - The M.name: 忍者神龜 III : 曼哈頓計劃
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III - The M.original_desc:
This was the last side-scrolling Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles game for NES. It followed the highly acclaimed Turtles II over a year later and, unlike its predecessor, doesn't have an Arcade counterpart.

The third game in the series is basically the same as the second. The story and the stages are different, of course, but it doesn't really matter. Choose your favourite turtle and kill as many Foot Clan soldiers as you can, fight the bosses and reach Shredder in a Double Dragon-styled game.

The graphics and gameplay were improved. And, if the choice of the turtle depended only on personal taste in the second game (as they were all the same, in different colors), in this third episode they gained individual special moves.
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles III - The M.desc:
這是 NES 上最後一款橫向捲軸《忍者神龜》遊戲。它是在一年多後推出廣受好評的《海龜 II》之後推出的，與前作不同的是，它沒有街機版本。

該系列的第三場比賽與第二場比賽基本相同。當然，故事和階段不同，但這並不重要。選擇你最喜歡的烏龜，殺死盡可能多的腳族士兵，在雙龍風格的遊戲中與頭目戰鬥並到達粉碎者。

圖形和遊戲玩法得到了改進。而且，如果在第二場比賽中烏龜的選擇僅取決於個人品味（因為它們都是相同的，顏色不同），那麼在第三集中他們獲得了個人特殊動作。

Shadowgate (USA).name: 暗影之門
Shadowgate (USA).original_desc:
Using the same graphical interface as Deja Vu, Shadowgate is an adventure game set in a fantasy world. Players take the part of an adventurer sent to the ancient keep of Shadowgate on a quest to find a mystic artifact known as the Staff of Ages and stop the evil Warlock Lord from summoning a horrific demon known as the Behemoth. However Shadowgate has become infested with the Warlock Lord's demonic minions, not to mention the castle's still functional booby-traps.

Unlike Deja Vu, death comes at you suddenly, unexpectedly, and most of all OFTEN. Such simple acts as pulling the wrong switch or opening the wrong door can cause you to be skewered by a booby-trap or disemboweled by a monster. It's allso worth mentioning the fact that if your torch burns out (this happens quite regularly) and you forget to light a new one, you'll trip in the dark and break your neck.

A Windows 3.x update to this game was created in 1991.
Shadowgate (USA).desc:
Shadowgate 使用與 Deja Vu 相同的圖形界面，是一款以奇幻世界為背景的冒險遊戲。玩家扮演一名冒險家，被派往古老的暗影之門要塞，尋找名為“萬古之杖”的神秘神器，並阻止邪惡的術士領主召喚名為“巨獸”的可怕惡魔。然而，暗影之門已經充斥著術士領主的惡魔爪牙，更不用說城堡中仍然有效的誘殺裝置了。

與似曾相識不同的是，死亡突然、出乎意料地降臨到你身上，而且最重要的是經常發生。像拉錯開關或打開錯誤的門這樣簡單的行為都可能導致你被陷阱刺穿或被怪物開膛破肚。值得一提的是，如果你的手電筒燒壞了（這種情況經常發生）並且你忘記點燃新的手電筒，你就會在黑暗中絆倒並摔斷脖子。

該遊戲的 Windows 3.x 更新於 1991 年創建。

StarTropics (USA).name: 熱帶之星
StarTropics (USA).original_desc: In StarTropics, you play the part of Michael Jones. Mike's uncle (Dr. Jones, a famous archaeologist) is on C-Island looking for some lost ruins and has invited Mike to come visit him. However, shortly after arriving on the island Mike learns from Chief Coralcola that Dr. Jones has recently been abducted! Now it is up to Mike to locate Dr. Jones and find out why he was abducted. StarTropics is a combination of an adventure and action game played from an overhead point of view. Starting out with just an island yo-yo, Mike will need to search the island for Dr. Jones. The villagers may be able to offer some clues, there are many dangerous enemies to defeat, and along the way there are a variety of new weapons and other items to be found which will help Mike on his quest. The cartridge uses a battery backup to allow games to be saved.
StarTropics (USA).desc: 在 StarTropics 中，您扮演邁克爾·瓊斯的角色。邁克的叔叔（著名考古學家瓊斯博士）正在C島上尋找一些失落的廢墟，並邀請邁克來拜訪他。然而，到達島上後不久，邁克從珊瑚酋長那裡得知瓊斯博士最近被綁架了！現在，邁克要找到瓊斯博士並找出他被綁架的原因。StarTropics 是一款結合了冒險和動作遊戲的遊戲，從頭頂的角度進行遊戲。從一個島嶼溜溜球開始，邁克需要在島上尋找瓊斯博士。村民們也許能夠提供一些線索，有許多危險的敵人需要擊敗，沿途會發現各種新武器和其他物品，這將有助於邁克完成他的任務。該卡帶使用備用電池來保存遊戲。

Mega Man (USA).name: 洛克人2 威利博士之謎
Mega Man (USA).original_desc: In the future city of Monsteropolis, the use of robot labour has helped civilization grow more than ever before. At the forefront of this technology is Dr. Light and his assistant Dr. Wily, who are commissioned to build six robots to handle a variety of specific tasks. They are named Bombman, Gutsman, Iceman, Cutman, Elecman, and Fireman in reference to their individual prime functions. Dr. Wily, however, has bigger plans and chooses to take control of the robots and let loose destruction in a bid for world control. Dr. Light fights back with the best tool he has, an experimental human-like robot, Rock aka Mega Man, who had been tested to perform cleaning duties. Now properly armed, it's up to Mega Man to take on the maverick robots, fight his way into Dr. Wily's castle, and end this madness.
Mega Man (USA).desc: 在未來的蒙斯特羅波利斯市，機器人勞動力的使用幫助文明比以往任何時候都更加發展。處於這項技術前沿的是 Light 博士和他的助手 Wily 博士，他們受命建造六台機器人來處理各種特定任務。它們根據各自的主要功能被命名為 Bombman、Gutsman、Iceman、Cutman、Elecman 和 Fireman。然而，威利博士有更大的計劃，他選擇控制機器人並釋放破壞力，以控制世界。萊特博士用他擁有的最好的工具進行反擊，這是一個實驗性的類人機器人，洛克又名洛克人，它已經過測試以執行清潔任務。現在，全副武裝的洛克人將與特立獨行的機器人較量，殺入威利博士的城堡，結束這場瘋狂。

Splatter House - Wanpaku Graffiti (Japan.name: 潑濺屋：Wanpaku 塗鴉
Splatter House - Wanpaku Graffiti (Japan.original_desc:
Wanpaku Graffiti is the first Splatterhouse game to appear on a home console. It is not clear how it fits in the series' timeline, but it starts with Jennifer mourning over Rick's grave (her boyfriend). Lightning strikes his grave and he is resurrected. Before she can rejoice, another bolt strikes the grave next to him and a jack-o-lantern appears. This pumpkin king kidnaps Jennifer and Rick barely has the time to wipe off the dust from his clothes before he sets off to rescue his girlfriend.

Although the game is not as gory as the other titles, there is still plenty of disturbing enemies such as headless chickens, severed hands and zombies. Through seven side-scrolling levels, including a graveyard, a mansion, a Japanese pagoda and an Egyptian pyramid, you chase the pumpkin king with your cleaver and a shotgun you can pick up along the road. Just like the other games in the series, there are lots of movie references. The game often needs good timing and pixel perfect jumps, as falling down from platforms will regenerate the enemies. You can pick up candy, hamburgers and cans of soda to restore your health.
Splatter House - Wanpaku Graffiti (Japan.desc:
Wanpaku Graffiti 是第一款出現在家用遊戲機上的 Splatterhouse 遊戲。目前尚不清楚它如何適應該系列的時間線，但它始於詹妮弗在瑞克（她的男朋友）的墳墓前哀悼。閃電擊中了他的墳墓，他復活了。還沒等她高興起來，另一道閃電擊中了他旁邊的墳墓，出現了一個南瓜燈。這個南瓜王綁架了詹妮弗，瑞克幾乎沒有時間擦掉衣服上的灰塵，就出發去營救他的女朋友。

雖然遊戲不像其他遊戲那麼血腥，但仍然有很多令人不安的敵人，如無頭雞、斷手和殭屍。通過七個橫向捲軸關卡，包括墓地、豪宅、日本寶塔和埃及金字塔，你用切肉刀和沿路撿到的獵槍追逐南瓜王。就像該系列中的其他遊戲一樣，有很多電影參考。遊戲通常需要良好的時機和像素完美的跳躍，因為從平台上掉下來會重新生成敵人。你可以拿起糖果、漢堡包和汽水罐來恢復健康。

Ghost Lion (USA).name: 鬼獅
Ghost Lion (USA).original_desc: Legend of the Ghost Lion is a Dragon Quest style turn-based role-playing video game. It is an adaptation of a 1988 Japanese movie, "Piramiddo no Kanata ni Howaito Raion Densetsu". The legend of the White Lion tells that one day, a Lion attacked and ravaged the village. The lion was wounded by the spear of a brave soldier and disappeared in a cave. One day, the parents of a young girl named Maria, decided to go and solve the mystery of the White Lion, leaving her alone. They never returned. While searching for her parents, Maria falls into a river and wakes up in a fantasy world.
Ghost Lion (USA).desc: 《鬼獅傳說》是一款勇者鬥惡龍風格的回合製角色扮演視頻遊戲。該片改編自 1988 年的日本電影《Piramiddo no Kanata ni Howaito Raion Densetsu》。白獅的傳說講述了有一天，一隻獅子襲擊並蹂躪了村莊。獅子被一名勇敢士兵的長矛刺傷，消失在山洞裡。有一天，一位名叫瑪麗亞的小女孩的父母決定去解開白獅之謎，留下她獨自一人。他們再也沒有回來。在尋找父母的過程中，瑪麗亞掉入河中，並在一個幻想世界中醒來。

Little Nemo - The Dream Master (USA).name: 小尼莫:夢想大師
Little Nemo - The Dream Master (USA).original_desc: Based on a comic strip for the 1940's, Nemo is a young boy from London summoned to the kingdom of Slumberland, a fantasy realm filled with strange creatures and dream-like locations.  You soon learn that the King of Slumberland has been kidnapped by the Prince of Nightmares, and you are requested to save him by Princess Camille.  Using your only weapon, a sack of candy, you stun enemies and lull friendly animals into helping you through levels like the Mushroom Forest and Train Land.  This platformer featured licensed characters and artwork from the comic, along with using the animals, such as apes and moles, to traverse through the different terrain.
Little Nemo - The Dream Master (USA).desc: 改編自 1940 年代的漫畫，尼莫是一個來自倫敦的小男孩，被召喚到斯林百蘭王國，這是一個充滿奇怪生物和夢幻之地的奇幻王國。你很快就得知斯林伯蘭國王被噩夢王子綁架了，卡米爾公主要求你營救他。使用你唯一的武器，一袋糖果，你可以擊暈敵人並安撫友好的動物來幫助你通過蘑菇森林和火車之地等關卡。這款平台遊戲採用了漫畫中的授權角色和藝術作品，並使用猿和鼴鼠等動物穿越不同的地形。

Super Dodge Ball (USA).name: 超級躲避球
Super Dodge Ball (USA).original_desc:
This ain't elementary school and it sure as heck ain't gym class. This is Super Dodge Ball. Control your team of six players to pummel the opposing team into submission using only the ball and your team's unique skills. Each player has his own special attacks and each team has their own unique attributes.

Play the World Cup mode and take on teams from around the world to claim the championship. You play as the star USA team and must work your way through teams from countries such as England, Iceland, Japan, and more to finally take on the current ruling world champions, the Soviet Union.

Or you can challenge a friend in Versus mode and go head to head with whatever teams you choose.

Or, if you just feel like cutting loose, you can play Bean Ball mode which is just a free-for-all every-man-for-himself romp in the school yard. Be the last man standing. You can play this alone or with a friend, but the computer will control the remaining 4-5 players.
Super Dodge Ball (USA).desc:
這不是小學，也不是體育課。這是超級躲避球。控制你的六名球員組成的球隊，僅使用球和你球隊的獨特技能來擊敗對方球隊。每個玩家都有自己的特殊攻擊，每個團隊都有自己獨特的屬性。

玩世界杯模式，與來自世界各地的球隊爭奪冠軍。你扮演明星美國隊，必須與英格蘭、冰島、日本等國家的球隊進行較量，最終戰勝當前的世界冠軍蘇聯。

或者，您可以在對戰模式中挑戰朋友，並與您選擇的任何團隊進行正面交鋒。

或者，如果你只是想放鬆一下，你可以玩“豆球”模式，這是一種在校園裡自由玩耍的人人嬉戲的模式。成為最後一個站著的人。你可以單獨玩，也可以和朋友一起玩，但電腦將控制剩下的 4-5 名玩家。

Ninja Gaiden II - The Dark Sword of Chao.key: Ninja Gaiden II - The Dark Sword of Chaos (USA)
Ninja Gaiden II - The Dark Sword of Chao.original_name: Ninja Gaiden II : The Dark Sword of Chaos
Ninja Gaiden II - The Dark Sword of Chao.name: 忍者龍劍傳II:黑暗混沌之劍
Ninja Gaiden II - The Dark Sword of Chao.original_desc: A year after the events of the original Ninja Gaiden, a new villain named Ashtar receives word of Jaquio's defeat. Ashtar uses this opportunity to hatch a new plan to plunge the world into darkness. The ninja, Ryu Hayabusa, hits the trail to destroy all.
Ninja Gaiden II - The Dark Sword of Chao.desc: 原版《忍者龍劍傳》事件發生一年後，一位名叫阿斯塔的新反派收到了賈奎奧被擊敗的消息。阿斯塔利用這個機會制定了一個新計劃，讓世界陷入黑暗。忍者隼龍踏上征程，消滅一切。

Mr.name: 吉米克先生
Mr.original_desc:
Mr. Gimmick is a little doll with a life of its own, that's given to a girl for her birthday. The girl's other toys quickly become jealous of the attention given to Mr. Gimmick, and they decide to carry her away to a mystical land. Mr. Gimmick goes after them to bring his owner back. 

The game Mr. Gimmick is a platform game where you take control of Mr. Gimmick over the course of six levels. You defend yourself by throwing bouncing stars that take a second to form and are then thrown downward. You can also ride the stars thrown to gain access to higher platforms. The inventory you have allows you to store bombs, potions, and fireballs.

The game has two endings. The easier way is to just run through all of the levels. Each level has a treasure hidden that can be a bit difficult to get, and finding all of these gives access to an extra level. But if you lose all of your lives and have to continue, the game will take all of your treasures away, and not allow you to get to the final level.
Mr.desc:
吉米克先生是一個有自己生命的小娃娃，是送給一個女孩的生日禮物。女孩的其他玩具很快就嫉妒了吉米克先生受到的關注，他們決定把她帶到一個神秘的土地。吉米克先生追趕他們，把他的主人帶回來。

Mr. Gimmick 遊戲是一款平台遊戲，您可以在六個關卡中控制 Mr. Gimmick。你可以通過投擲彈跳的星星來保護自己，這些星星需要一秒鐘才能形成，然後被向下扔。您還可以騎著拋出的星星進入更高的平台。你擁有的庫存可以讓你儲存炸彈、藥水和火球。

遊戲有兩個結局。更簡單的方法是遍歷所有級別。每個級別都隱藏著一個可能有點難以獲得的寶藏，找到所有這些寶藏可以進入額外的級別。但如果你失去了所有的生命並且必須繼續，遊戲將奪走你所有的寶藏，並且不允許你到達最終關卡。

Arkanoid (USA).name: 打磚塊
Arkanoid (USA).original_desc:
The original Breakout concept involves controlling a bat at the bottom of the screen and using it to catch and direct a ball so as to hit all the bricks which are arranged at the top of the screen. It was unpopular for over a decade, before Taito revived it with some new ideas in this arcade game.
The game's plot redefines the bat as a Vaus spaceship, the ball as an energy bolt, and the bricks form a mysterious wall stopping the ship from progressing to safety.
By the mid-80s, power-ups were popular in most types of arcade games, and Arkanoid features them. They are caught by positioning the bat below them as they fall (meaning that you risk missing the ball if you go for them at the wrong time). The power-ups include lasers (which are mounted to each side of the ship and allow you to shoot out the blocks), a catching device (so as to be able to fire the ball off at a different angle every time you hit it) and one that slows the bolt down.
Arkanoid (USA).desc:
最初的Breakout概念是控制屏幕底部的球棒，並用它來接住並引導球，從而擊中屏幕頂部排列的所有磚塊。它在十多年來一直不受歡迎，直到 Taito 在這款街機遊戲中通過一些新想法使其重新煥發活力。
遊戲的情節將蝙蝠重新定義為沃斯宇宙飛船，將球重新定義為能量螺栓，而磚塊則形成一堵神秘的牆，阻止飛船駛向安全。
到了 80 年代中期，強化道具在大多數類型的街機遊戲中都很流行，而《打磚塊》就是其中之一。當他們下落時，通過將球棒放在他們下方來抓住他們（這意味著如果你在錯誤的時間去抓住他們，你就有可能錯過球）。動力裝置包括激光器（安裝在船的每一側，讓你可以射出方塊）、捕捉裝置（以便每次擊中球時都能以不同的角度發射球）和減慢螺栓速度的裝置。

Tecmo Bowl (USA) (Rev 1).name: 特克摩碗
Tecmo Bowl (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Tecmo Bowl pits the player vs. the computer in 11 game single-elimination playoff action, or you can go head-to-head with a human opponent in action or coach mode. There are 12 teams of real NFL players (circa 1988) to choose from, but don't look for official NFL team logos or mascots.

There are four plays to choose from on offense--usually two runs and two passes. The player takes control of the quarterback before the snap and then either hands off to the running back or works through his receiver progression from the top to the bottom of the screen. Defense consists of trying to guess which offensive play the opponent will select and then taking control of one of the defensive players before the snap. A very simple power meter system is used for kicking field goals, extra points, and punts.

There are no game or season stats and there is no way to save your season, but there is a password feature allowing you to resume tournament play where you left off.
Tecmo Bowl (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
Tecmo Bowl 是玩家與電腦進行 11 場單淘汰淘汰賽的比賽，您也可以在動作或教練模式下與真人對手正面交鋒。有 12 支真正的 NFL 球員球隊（大約 1988 年）可供選擇，但不要尋找官方 NFL 球隊徽標或吉祥物。

進攻時有四種戰術可供選擇——通常是兩種跑動和兩種傳球。球員在開球前控制四分衛，然後將手交給跑衛，或者從屏幕頂部到底部完成接球手的進程。防守包括嘗試猜測對手會選擇哪種進攻方式，然後在開球前控制一名防守球員。一個非常簡單的功率計系統用於踢射門、加分和棄踢。

沒有比賽或賽季統計數據，也無法保存您的賽季，但有一個密碼功能可以讓您從上次中斷的地方繼續比賽。

Ice Climber (USA, Europe, Korea).name: 攀冰者
Ice Climber (USA, Europe, Korea).original_desc: In Ice Climber one or two players need to climb their way to the top of 32 different mountains. Each mountain is broken up into eight levels of platforms along with a bonus stage at the top. Attempting to stop you from making upward progress are different creatures ranging from polar bears to condors as well as treacherous landscapes with falling icicles, moving platforms, and icy floors. To help out, your only weapon is a mallet which can be used to knock out enemies as well as bust away bricks in the platforms to give you some room to jump up to the next level. When you finally reach the top, it's time to move on to the next, more difficult level.
Ice Climber (USA, Europe, Korea).desc: 在 Ice Climber 中，一到兩名玩家需要攀登 32 座不同的山峰。每座山都分為八層平台，頂部還有一個獎勵階段。從北極熊到禿鷹等各種生物，以及冰柱墜落、移動平台和冰冷地板等險惡景觀，都會試圖阻止你向上前進。為了提供幫助，你唯一的武器是木槌，它可以用來擊倒敵人，也可以打破平台上的磚塊，為你提供一些空間來跳到下一個級別。當您最終到達頂峰時，就該進入下一個更困難的關卡了。

David Crane's A Boy and His Blob - Troub.key: David Crane's A Boy and His Blob - Trouble on Blobolonia (USA)
David Crane's A Boy and His Blob - Troub.original_name: David Crane's A Boy and His Blob - Trouble on Blobolonia
David Crane's A Boy and His Blob - Troub.name: 大衛·克蘭 (David Crane) 的《男孩和他的斑點》(A Boy and His Blob) - Trouble on Blobolonia
David Crane's A Boy and His Blob - Troub.original_desc: Blob has come from the distant planet Blobolonia in search of an earth boy to help him save his world. Join him on this fantastic adventure in mysterious caverns beneath the earth searching for treasure. then travel to Blobolonia to battle the evil emperor. Discover Blob's amazing appetite for jellybeans and the different transformations that occur with each flavor. Learn to use these shapes to overcome even the most outrageous obstacles.
David Crane's A Boy and His Blob - Troub.desc: 布洛布來自遙遠的布洛博洛尼亞星球，尋找地球男孩來幫助他拯救他的世界。與他一起踏上這場奇妙的冒險，在地下的神秘洞穴中尋找寶藏。然後前往布洛博洛尼亞與邪惡的皇帝戰鬥。探索 Blob 對軟心豆粒糖的驚人胃口以及每種口味所發生的不同轉變。學習使用這些形狀來克服最令人震驚的障礙。

Legacy of the Wizard (USA).name: 巫師的遺產
Legacy of the Wizard (USA).original_desc:
Long ago, an evil dragon named Keela was imprisoned inside a magical dungeon. However time has passed and the magic that sealed the dragon away is weakening. The Drasle family decides that it's time to destroy the dragon once and for all. However only one weapon is capable of doing this, the Dragon Slayer, which is itself sealed away by four magical crowns. The Drasle family decides to take on this quest, and will use every member of the family in order to accomplish it.

Legacy of the Wizard is an side-scrolling action platform game with role-playing elements.  The player chooses a character from among five different members of the Drasle family. The choices are: Xemm the father and woodcutter, Mayna the magic-using mother, Roas the brave warrior son, Lyll the athletic daughter and Pochi the domesticated monster-pet. Each character has unique abilities (including attack and jumping abilities) and can only use certain items from those collected. Players can travel back to the Drasle household at any point to change characters.

The object of the game is to enter the large dungeon, itself divided into 5 areas, collecting a variety of items (which as mentioned, can only be used by particular characters) and use them to progress through the dungeon, defeating monsters. Power-ups dropped by monsters include gold, keys, health-restoring bread, magic-resoring potions and health-damaging poison. Gold can be spent on items and other power-ups that are available at various shops hidden inside the dungeon. The player must eventually defeat the four bosses guarding the crowns that seal the Dragon Slayer and then use that weapon to defeat the Kress.
Legacy of the Wizard (USA).desc:
很久以前，一條名叫基拉的惡龍被囚禁在一個魔法地牢裡。然而隨著時間的流逝，封印巨龍的魔法正在減弱。德拉塞爾家族決定是時候一勞永逸地消滅這條龍了。然而只有一種武器能夠做到這一點，那就是屠龍者，它本身被四個魔法王冠封印。德拉斯勒家族決定接受這一任務，並將利用家族的每一位成員來完成它。

《巫師之遺》是一款帶有角色扮演元素的橫向捲軸動作平台遊戲。玩家從德拉塞爾家族的五個不同成員中選擇一個角色。選擇是：Xemm（父親兼樵夫）、Mayna（使用魔法的母親）、Roas（勇敢的戰士兒子）、Lyll（運動女兒）和Pochi（馴養的怪物寵物）。每個角色都有獨特的能力（包括攻擊和跳躍能力），並且只能使用收集到的某些物品。玩家可以隨時回到德拉塞爾家來改變角色。

遊戲的目標是進入大型地牢，它本身分為 5 個區域，收集各種物品（如上所述，只能由特定角色使用）並使用它們在地牢中前進，擊敗怪物。怪物掉落的能量道具包括黃金、鑰匙、恢復健康的麵包、恢復魔法的藥水和損害健康的毒藥。金幣可以用來購買隱藏在地牢內的各種商店中的物品和其他能量道具。玩家必須最終擊敗守衛封印屠龍者王冠的四個頭目，然後使用該武器擊敗克雷斯。

Ivan 'Ironman' Stewart's Super Off Road.name: 伊万“鋼鐵俠”斯圖爾特的超級越野
Ivan 'Ironman' Stewart's Super Off Road.original_desc:
Enter the world of off-road racing as 4 vehicles will face each other, on a series of tracks which are based around flipped and reversed versions of a core selection. Fame, glory and bikini clad women await your victories and the taste of dirt awaits if you fail. Let a computer car beat you and you lose one of your 3 credits.

Successful races bring more money, which can be used to soup up their machine. Boosts to top speed, grip and acceleration can be purchased, and your nitro boost must be kept topped up. If you are desperate for upgrades, you can buy into your spare credits.
Ivan 'Ironman' Stewart's Super Off Road.desc:
進入越野賽車世界，4 輛車將在一系列基於核心選擇的翻轉和反轉版本的賽道上相互對峙。名譽、榮耀和穿著比基尼的女人等待著你的勝利，如果你失敗了，泥土的味道也在等待著你。如果一輛電腦汽車打敗了你，你就會失去 3 個學分中的一個。

成功的比賽會帶來更多的錢，可以用來升級他們的機器。可以購買最高速度、抓地力和加速度的增強劑，並且您的硝基增強劑必須保持充足。如果您迫切需要升級，可以購買備用積分。

Adventures of Tom Sawyer (USA).name: 湯姆索亞歷險記
Adventures of Tom Sawyer (USA).original_desc:
Tom Sawyer's famous literary exploits come to life in this adventure where you play Tom Sawyer (or Huck Finn in a 2 player game).  The adventure begins in Tom's dream while he sleeps in school.

Control in this typical platform game consists of jumping and throwing rocks.  Avoid many obstacles such as rolling barrels; defeat persistent enemies such as pirates, mice, and even a giant octopus.  Help Tom navigate down the Mississippi River, through forests, haunted houses, and the sky above.
Adventures of Tom Sawyer (USA).desc:
湯姆·索亞 (Tom Sawyer) 著名的文學功績在這場冒險中栩栩如生，您將扮演湯姆·索亞 (Tom Sawyer)（或 2 人遊戲中的哈克·費恩 (Huck Finn)）。冒險從湯姆在學校睡覺時的夢中開始。

這個典型平台遊戲的控制包括跳躍和投擲石塊。避開滾桶等許多障礙物；擊敗頑固的敵人，如海盜、老鼠，甚至巨型章魚。幫助湯姆沿著密西西比河航行，穿過森林、鬼屋和頭頂的天空。

Wrath of the Black Manta (USA) (Rev 1).name: 黑蝠鱝之怒
Wrath of the Black Manta (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: The Big Apple is being overrun with crime, and the cities children have been mysteriously disappearing. It is up to the Black Manta to rescue the children and stop whomever is behind this. In addition to your ninja skills, you will be able to find additional powers (including invisibility and teleportation) to help you out against the numerous and well armed villians. Wrath of the Black Manta is a side scrolling arcade style action game with five different levels. Throughout each level you may come across various clues to help you find where to go next or lead you to a hidden location.
