Some of the bad guys you come across may also possess useful knowledge and can be interrogated (if they don't kill you first that is!)
Wrath of the Black Manta (USA) (Rev 1).desc: 紐約犯罪猖獗，城市裡的孩子也神秘失踪。黑蝠鱝有責任拯救孩子們並阻止幕後黑手。除了你的忍者技能之外，你還可以找到額外的能力（包括隱形和傳送）來幫助你對抗眾多裝備精良的惡棍。黑蝠鱝之怒是一款橫向捲軸街機風格動作遊戲，有五個不同的關卡。在每個關卡中，您可能會遇到各種線索，幫助您找到下一步該去哪里或引導您到達隱藏的位置。你遇到的一些壞人也可能擁有有用的知識並且可以被審問（如果他們沒有先殺了你的話！）

Tiny Toon Adventures (USA).name: 小卡通歷險記
Tiny Toon Adventures (USA).original_desc: These Tiny Toons have big problems. That's right. The arch enemy of Acme Acres, Montana Max, has kidnapped the ever-so-popular Babs Bunny. Now the furry female's fate rests in the paws of Buster Bunny and his crime fighting pals - Dizzy Devil, Furrball and Plucky Duck. Four kooky buddies with their own special talent. Buster can bounce over bad guys with the best of them. Furrball uses his feline claws to climb walls. Dizzy Devil prefers to spin through them. And Plucky can glide through the air and swim like a fish. Choose which partner you want at the beginning of each level before you face-off against time and goofballs gone bad in 6 zany wonderlands. So you better get jumping or it will be curtains for our playful pals!
Tiny Toon Adventures (USA).desc: 這些小卡通有大問題。這是正確的。Acme Acres 的宿敵 Montana Max 綁架了廣受歡迎的 Babs Bunny。現在，這只毛茸茸的雌性的命運掌握在巴斯特兔子和他的打擊犯罪夥伴——頭暈魔鬼、毛球和勇敢鴨的爪子上。四個有著各自特殊才能的怪異夥伴。巴斯特可以用最優秀的人來擊敗壞人。毛球用他的貓爪子爬牆。頭暈惡魔更喜歡在它們之間旋轉。勇敢可以在空中滑翔並像魚一樣游泳。在每個關卡開始時選擇你想要的搭檔，然後在 6 個滑稽仙境中對抗時間和變壞的傻瓜。所以你最好跳起來，否則我們頑皮的朋友們就完蛋了！

Jackie Chan's Action Kung Fu (USA).name: 成龍的動作功夫
Jackie Chan's Action Kung Fu (USA).original_desc:
Jackie Chan and his twin sister Josephine were great kung fu fighters in China and trained under a great master. One day when Jackie and Josephine were out walking, the Master's great enemy, The Sorcerer appeared. The Sorcerer had come to rule over China and knew the twins would stand in his way... so he cast a spell to make Josephine disappear. Now it's up to Jackie Chan to follow after the Sorcerer and battle his minions in order to rescue his sister and save China.

Jackie Chan's Action Kung Fu is a side-scrolling fighting game. Jackie's controls are one button to jump and another one to attack or be used in combination with a direction for a special attack. On his quest, Jackie must punch and kick his way past frogs, ninjas, birds and other enemies. Jackie can acquire special-moves such as the Tornado attack, the 180 degree spin kick, the 360 degree spin kick and the Sky Attack. Other power-ups include energy refills and bonus points.
Jackie Chan's Action Kung Fu (USA).desc:
成龍和他的雙胞胎妹妹約瑟芬是中國偉大的功夫戰士，並在一位大師的指導下接受訓練。有一天，當傑基和約瑟芬外出散步時，師父的死敵魔法師出現了。魔法師已經統治了中國，他知道這對雙胞胎會阻礙他……所以他施了一個咒語讓約瑟芬消失。現在，成龍要追隨魔法師並與他的爪牙戰鬥，以拯救他的妹妹並拯救中國。

成龍動作功夫是一款橫向捲軸格鬥遊戲。傑基的控制按鈕是跳躍按鈕，另一個按鈕是攻擊按鈕，或者與方向結合使用進行特殊攻擊。在他的任務中，傑基必須拳打腳踢地越過青蛙、忍者、鳥類和其他敵人。傑基可以獲得龍捲風攻擊、180度旋轉踢、360度旋轉踢和天空攻擊等必殺技。其他能力提升包括能量補充和獎勵積分。

Break Time - The National Pool Tour (USA.key: Break Time - The National Pool Tour (USA)
Break Time - The National Pool Tour (USA.original_name: Break Time : The National Pool Tour
Break Time - The National Pool Tour (USA.name: 休息時間：國家泳池之旅
Break Time - The National Pool Tour (USA.original_desc: Time to "rack 'em up" in this late release from FCI. Choose one of four different games - Rotation, 8-ball, 9-ball, and 14-1 Rack Game - each based on professional pool rules. As if that wasn't enough, also included are Practice and Watch Modes and the "National Pool Tour," where you must test your skills against five different pros in five different cities on your way to becoming the champion. Features digitized commentary and password save.
Break Time - The National Pool Tour (USA.desc: 是時候在 FCI 最新發布的版本中“把它們搞起來”了。從四種不同的遊戲中選擇一種 - 輪換、8 球、9 球和 14-1 球賽 - 每種遊戲均基於專業台球規則。好像這還不夠，還包括練習和觀看模式以及“國家台球巡迴賽”，您必須在五個不同城市與五位不同的職業選手測試您的技能，才能成為冠軍。具有數字化評論和密碼保存功能。

Holy Diver (Japan) (Translated).name: 神聖潛水員
Holy Diver (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
Randy, the Holy Diver, is setting out to retrieve the five emblem seals belonging to the King Crimson Family in order to expel the greatest evil, the Black Slayer, back into another dimension.

Holy Diver is an action game much in the vein of Castlevania. The player controls the Diver as he uses magic powers such as shooting energy balls and freezing time to traverse the game's eight levels. Enemies throughout the levels respawn and there are destroyable objects in your path. At the end of each level a tougher boss character must be beaten. Once defeated a power-up spell becomes available to the player. To use these spells the player must pause the game and select it from the inventory menu. The player has the ability to shoot horizontally as well as up. Difficult paths may sometimes be crossed by the combination of the right spell at the right time such as the freezing spell that freezes quicksand. 

Though scheduled for release in North America, the game never went beyond its release in Japan.
Holy Diver (Japan) (Translated).desc:
聖潛者蘭迪正著手取回屬於猩紅王家族的五枚徽章封印，以便將最大的邪惡黑殺手驅逐回異次元。

《Holy Diver》是一款頗具《惡魔城》風格的動作遊戲。玩家控制潛水員使用魔法力量，例如發射能量球和凍結時間來穿越遊戲的八個關卡。整個關卡中的敵人都會重生，並且您的路徑上有可摧毀的物體。在每個關卡結束時，必須擊敗更強硬的老闆角色。一旦被擊敗，玩家就可以使用強化咒語。要使用這些法術，玩家必須暫停遊戲並從庫存菜單中選擇它。玩家可以水平射擊，也可以向上射擊。有時，通過在正確的時間組合正確的法術（例如凍結流沙的冰凍法術），可以跨越困難的道路。

儘管該遊戲計劃在北美髮行，但從未在日本以外的地區發行。

Xexyz (USA).name: Xxyz
Xexyz (USA).original_desc:
It's the year 2777. Due to nuclear wars and natural disasters, Earth's population has decreased dramatically and only five island are left, forming the nation of Xexyz. In Xexyz, humans, spirits and faeries have lived peacefully for centuries under the reign of King Xeu Star. One day, Xexyz is attacked by Goruza who murders the king, builds mechanical castles on each island and captures the queen of each island. You take on the role of a soldier named Apollo who wants to put an end to Goruza's reign.

Controlling Apollo, it is your task to free all five islands. Freeing an island is done in several different phases that feature 'Jump'n Shoot' as well as 'Shooter' levels (called "Action Mode" and "Shooting Mode"). The first level of each island is a Jump'n Shoot level that contains many doors to shops, bonus games, friendly NPCs or mid-bosses. NPCs will sometimes give you important hints, items or weapons; bonus games can be played to win some money ("Balls"); defeating mid-bosses (and thereby freeing a Fairy) will get you a cash reward and shops also offer weapons and items. Weapons differ largely in attack power and range. Items have temporary effects such as invincibility or improved jumping abilities. In an island's first level, you will have to find a secret room and defeat a boss, for which you will receive a Force Star that is needed to gain access to a mechanical castle. Mechanical castles look similar to other Jump'n Shoot levels but are more complex.

Once you have made your way to a "Cyborg Rider", a self-scrolling Shooter sequence starts in which you have to shoot your way through lots of enemies while picking up speed and weapon power-ups.
At the end of this sequence you will leave the Cyborg Rider, and step onto a floating platform for a boss fight. After the boss is defeated, another Shooter sequence with another boss at the end awaits, but this time, the boss if fought from the Cyborg Rider. After defeating this boss, you start the process over with a Jump'n Shoot level.
Xexyz (USA).desc:
這是 2777 年，由於核戰爭和自然災害，地球人口急劇減少，只剩下五個島嶼，形成了 Xexyz 國家。在 Xexyz，人類、靈魂和精靈在 Xeu 王星的統治下和平地生活了幾個世紀。有一天，Xexyz 遭到戈魯扎的襲擊，戈魯扎謀殺了國王，在每個島嶼上建造了機械城堡，並俘虜了每個島嶼的女王。你扮演一名名叫阿波羅的士兵，想要結束戈魯扎的統治。

控制阿波羅，你的任務是解放所有五個島嶼。釋放島嶼是通過幾個不同的階段完成的，這些階段具有“跳躍射擊”和“射擊”級別（稱為“動作模式”和“射擊模式”）。每個島嶼的第一個關卡是跳躍射擊關卡，其中包含許多通往商店的門、獎勵遊戲、友好的 NPC 或中級首領。NPC有時會給你重要的提示、物品或武器；可以玩獎勵遊戲來贏取一些錢（“球”）；擊敗中頭目（從而釋放仙女）將為您帶來現金獎勵，商店還提供武器和物品。武器在攻擊力和射程方面差異很大。物品具有暫時效果，例如無敵或提高跳躍能力。在島嶼的第一個關卡中，你必須找到一個秘密房間並擊敗一個 Boss，為此你將獲得進入機械城堡所需的原力之星。機械城堡看起來與其他跳躍射擊關卡相似，但更為複雜。

一旦你成功成為“機器人騎士”，一個自動滾動的射擊序列就會開始，你必須在加快速度和武器強化的同時射擊大量的敵人。
在此序列結束時，您將離開機械騎士，並踏上浮動平台進行 Boss 戰鬥。擊敗 Boss 後，最後會有另一個 Boss 的射擊序列等待著，但這一次，Boss 是從機械騎士那裡戰鬥的。擊敗這個 Boss 後，您將通過“跳躍射擊”關卡重新開始該過程。

Mega Man 5 (USA).name: 洛克人 5
Mega Man 5 (USA).original_desc:
Dr. Cossack, humbled by his defeat and his allowing of Dr. Wily to influence his ways, decides to help Dr. Light by providing him and Rockman with tools and weapons to help foil Dr. Wily for good. All seems calm and peaceful, until...

A sudden rampage breaks out, and the cause is found to be a group of robots, led by a mysterious figure. As Dr. Light begins to investigate this rampage and attempts to find a way to stop it, he is kidnapped by the leader of the robots. Rockman hurries to save Dr. Light, but is too late...the only thing he can find at the scene is a yellow scarf...one that almost seems to belong to...Blues!?

Could Rockman's supposed brother, the strange but good-hearted Blues, be the one who kidnapped Dr. Light? Is Blues the one responsible for the rampages? With these questions racing through his mind, Rockman sets off to find Blues and get the answers he wants.

Like the other early Rockman / Mega Man games, the Playstation version was only released in Japan, as part of the Complete Works series.
Mega Man 5 (USA).desc:
哥薩克博士因自己的失敗和允許威利博士影響他的行為而感到謙卑，決定幫助萊特博士，為他和洛克曼提供工具和武器，以幫助永遠挫敗威利博士。一切看起來平靜祥和，直到……

一場突然的暴亂爆發了，原因是一群機器人，由一個神秘人物領導。當萊特博士開始調查這一暴行並試圖找到阻止它的方法時，他被機器人首領綁架了。洛克曼急忙去救萊特博士，但為時已晚……他在現場唯一能找到的就是一條黃色圍巾……一條幾乎屬於……布魯斯的圍巾！ ？

洛克曼所謂的兄弟，奇怪但心地善良的布魯斯，會是綁架萊特博士的人嗎？布魯斯是造成這些暴亂的罪魁禍首嗎？帶著這些問題在洛克曼的腦海中盤旋，洛克曼出發尋找布魯斯並得到他想要的答案。

與其他早期《洛克人》/《洛克人》遊戲一樣，PlayStation 版本僅在日本發行，作為全集系列的一部分。

Adventure Island II (USA).name: 冒險島2
Adventure Island II (USA).original_desc:
In Adventure Island II: Aliens in Paradise, Master Higgins has to save his cavegirl from aliens which also want to dominate the Earth. Master Higgins walks through the levels while fighting against various enemies. One hit results in his untimely death unless he carries one of the various power ups, e.g. weapons or a skateboard which improves his speed. He also needs to collect food to fill up his steadily decreasing starvation bar - death awaits if it hits zero.
There are overall eight worlds with different themes which are represented by a overhead map. Sometimes there are different paths and at the end of each world, Master Higgins has to fight a boss.
Adventure Island II (USA).desc:
在《冒險島 II：天堂裡的外星人》中，希金斯大師必須從也想統治地球的外星人手中拯救他的穴居女孩。希金斯大師在與各種敵人戰鬥的同時穿過各個關卡。除非他攜帶各種能力之一，否則一擊就會導致他過早死亡。武器或滑板可以提高他的速度。他還需要收集食物來填滿他不斷減少的飢餓條——如果飢餓條為零，他就會死亡。
總共有八個不同主題的世界，由俯視圖表示。有時會有不同的路徑，在每個世界的盡頭，希金斯大師必須與老闆戰鬥。

Digital Devil Story - Megami Tensei (Jap.name: 數碼惡魔物語：女神轉生
Digital Devil Story - Megami Tensei (Jap.original_desc: A high-school student and skillful computer programmer named Akemi Nakajima created a software called "Devil Summoning Program". At first Nakajima intended to use the software to gain revenge on a classmate who bullied him. However, things went out of control and Nakajima summoned malicious demons. Together with his friend Yumiko Shirasagi, a transfer student, he now must fight the demons he unleashed!
Digital Devil Story - Megami Tensei (Jap.desc: 高中生、熟練的計算機程序員中島明美創建了一個名為“惡魔召喚程序”的軟件。起初，中島打算利用該軟件來報復欺負他的同學。然而，事情失去了控制，中島召喚出了惡毒的惡魔。他現在必須與轉校生朋友白鷺由美子一起對抗他釋放的惡魔！

Bionic Commando (USA).name: 仿生突擊隊
Bionic Commando (USA).original_desc: Bionic Commando puts you in the role of a specially chosen soldier equipped with a unique bionic arm. This arm extends and retracts, granting you unprecedented strength and agility. Armed with rapid-fire, armor-piercing, and heat-seeking weapons, you are your people's last hope after two years of relentless invasion. Your mission takes you across a heavily patrolled desert and into the enemy stronghold itself. What seems like an impossible challenge becomes a battle only the Bionic Commando can endure and win.
Bionic Commando (USA).desc: 仿生突擊隊讓你扮演一個特別挑選的士兵的角色，配備了獨特的仿生手臂。該手臂可以伸展和縮回，賦予您前所未有的力量和敏捷性。裝備了速射、穿甲和熱追踪武器，你是你的人民在經歷了兩年無情入侵後的最後希望。你的任務將帶你穿過一片戒備森嚴的沙漠，進入敵人的據點。看似不可能的挑戰變成了一場只有仿生突擊隊才能忍受並獲勝的戰鬥。

Gemfire (USA).name: 寶石火
Gemfire (USA).original_desc:
Koei made an incursion into the fantasy worlds of magic with this game.

Six magicians, each trapped inside a magical gem, are liberated from the crown Gemfire by Princess Robyn, daughter of the tyrannical ruler of Ishmeria, King Eselred.  Fleeing across the length and breadth of the island nation, they each choose a leader from the greatest noble houses as their champion to topple Eselred and bring peace to Ishmeria. 

Players select one of these noblemen and seek to unite all the provinces under their banner through a combination of warfare and diplomacy.
Gemfire (USA).desc:
Koei 通過這款遊戲闖入了魔法的奇幻世界。

六名魔法師被困在魔法寶石中，被伊什梅里亞暴虐統治者埃塞爾雷德國王的女兒羅賓公主從寶石之火王冠中解救出來。他們逃離了這個島國的四面八方，各自從最偉大的貴族家族中選出了一位領袖作為他們的冠軍，以推翻埃塞爾雷德並為伊什梅里亞帶來和平。

玩家選擇其中一位貴族，並尋求通過戰爭和外交的結合將所有省份統一在他們的旗幟下。

Excitebike (Japan, USA).name: 興奮自行車
Excitebike (Japan, USA).original_desc:
Race by yourself against the clock or compete with other motocross riders on 5 tracks full of long straights, large jumps and obstacles to win the Excitebike championship.

Create your own tracks by placing jumps and obstacles of all different sizes and shapes on the track and choosing how many laps each race will have, then race against the clock or other riders to see how your track fares in competition.
Excitebike (Japan, USA).desc:
自己與時間賽跑，或與其他越野摩托車手在 5 條充滿長直道、大跳躍和障礙的賽道上競爭，贏得 Excitebike 冠軍。

通過在賽道上放置各種不同尺寸和形狀的跳躍和障礙物並選擇每場比賽的圈數來創建自己的賽道，然後與時間或其他騎手比賽，看看你的賽道在比賽中的表現如何。

Over Horizon (Europe).name: 越過地平線
Over Horizon (Europe).original_desc:
Over Horizon is a side-scrolling shooter in which the player has to guide a spaceship through various levels and destroy numerous enemies. The ship's weapons can be fired in tow directions and defeated enemies sometimes drop power-ups that equip the ship with different weapons and up to two options. There are three different weapons in addition to the standard shot: Laser, homing missiles and bombs.

The "Edit Mode" presents an unusual feature. In it, players can determine the options positions (which can be changed by pressing the A and B button simultaneously), as well as the properties of the weapons. It is, for example, possible to have the laser behave like homing missiles or the homing missiles like bombs.
Over Horizon (Europe).desc:
《Over Horizon》是一款橫向捲軸射擊遊戲，玩家必須引導宇宙飛船通過各個關卡並消滅眾多敵人。飛船的武器可以向兩個方向發射，被擊敗的敵人有時會掉落為飛船配備不同武器和最多兩個選項的能量提升裝置。除了標準射擊之外，還有三種不同的武器：激光、尋的導彈和炸彈。

“編輯模式”呈現出一個不尋常的功能。在其中，玩家可以確定選項位置（可以通過同時按下A和B按鈕來更改）以及武器的屬性。例如，可以讓激光像尋的導彈一樣工作，或者讓尋的導彈像炸彈一樣工作。

Rolling Thunder (World) (Namcot Collecti.key: Rolling Thunder (World) (Namcot Collection, Namco Museum Archives Vol 2)
Rolling Thunder (World) (Namcot Collecti.name: 雷霆滾滾
Rolling Thunder (World) (Namcot Collecti.original_desc: Rolling Thunder is the worlds most powerful secret police force and you are its best agent. Your mission is to stop an underground conspiracy to conquer the world and to save agent Leila, who has been captured. Starting out armed only with a handgun, you have to make your way through heavily guarded hallways and secret passages to find Leila and stop the enemy. Rolling Thunder features side scrolling action based on the arcade game.
Rolling Thunder (World) (Namcot Collecti.desc: 滾雷是世界上最強大的秘密警察部隊，而你是它最好的特工。你的任務是阻止一場征服世界的地下陰謀，並拯救被抓獲的特工萊拉。一開始你只攜帶手槍，必須穿過戒備森嚴的走廊和秘密通道才能找到萊拉並阻止敵人。Rolling Thunder 具有基於街機遊戲的橫向捲軸動作。

Super Spike V'Ball (USA).name: 超級釘子 V' 球
Super Spike V'Ball (USA).original_desc:
Bump, Set, Spike, Kabooom!!

Warm up with a few exercise games then face contenders in the American Circuit. For the ultimate challenge play against the best in the World Cup.

Jump and block opponent's spikes, dive to dig a a cross court spike, or set one up for a smash that only the best player can return. Kabooom!! Your Super Spike blasts your opponent off his feet! "X" marks the spot so you can track the ball.

Pick players with speed, strong defense, or killer offense. Your quick reflexes and competitive spirit complete the team.

Play againt the computer, by yourself or challenge a friend. With the NES Satellite or the NES Four Score, any combination of 1 to 4 can play - even two vs. two!

Now you can play on sand courts from Daytona to Los Angeles. Face off international teams in Hawaii, or challenge the hot Navy team aboard an aircraft carrier.

Watch the sand fly! Hear the applause. Soak up the rays! It's Super Spike V'Ball or World Class fun!
Super Spike V'Ball (USA).desc:
碰撞、設置、尖刺、卡布姆！ ！

進行幾場運動比賽熱身，然後在美國巡迴賽上面對競爭者。為了迎接終極挑戰，與世界杯上最好的球員比賽。

跳躍並阻擋對手的扣球，俯衝挖出跨場扣球，或者設置一個只有最優秀的球員才能接出的扣球。卡布姆！ ！你的超級釘鞋將你的對手轟得神魂顛倒！“X”標記該位置，以便您可以跟踪球。

選擇速度快、防守強或進攻殺手的球員。你的快速反應和競爭精神使團隊更加完整。

與電腦對戰，自己玩或挑戰朋友。借助 NES Satellite 或 NES Four Score，可以進行 1 到 4 的任何組合 - 甚至是二對二！

現在，您可以在從代托納到洛杉磯的沙場上玩耍。在夏威夷與國際隊伍對決，或在航空母艦上挑戰熱門海軍隊伍。

看沙子飛舞！聽到掌聲。吸收光線！這是超級釘球 V'Ball 或世界級的樂趣！

Kirby's Adventure (USA) (Rev 1).name: 卡比的冒險
Kirby's Adventure (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
The Dream Spring, the source of all dreams, has dried up, causing all the dreams of Dream Land to disappear. Now it's up to Kirby to rescue Dream Land! 

Kirby's Adventure is an action/adventure side scrolling platform game. As the pink puffball Kirby you will explore numerous, colorful lands with a variety of enemies to defeat. To help out on his journey, Kirby has the ability to eat enemies and spit them out as projectiles. With certain enemies Kirby can capture their abilities and e.g. gain a sword, shoot lasers, or even fly around the level. There are seven different stages, each broken up into multiple levels, and sometimes also containing a couple of bonus mini-games. The game cartridge features a battery backup allowing games to be saved without the need for passwords.
Kirby's Adventure (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
一切夢想之源的夢泉已經乾涸，導致夢境之地的一切夢想都消失了。現在輪到卡比拯救夢想之地了！

《卡比的冒險》是一款動作/冒險橫向捲軸平台遊戲。作為粉色馬勃卡比，你將探索無數色彩繽紛的土地，並擊敗各種敵人。為了幫助他的旅程，卡比有能力吃掉敵人並將它們作為射彈吐出來。對於某些敵人，卡比可以捕獲他們的能力，例如獲得一把劍，發射激光，甚至在關卡中飛行。有七個不同的階段，每個階段分為多個級別，有時還包含幾個獎勵迷你游戲。遊戲卡帶有備用電池，無需密碼即可保存遊戲。

Sword Master (USA).name: 劍聖
Sword Master (USA).original_desc:
Sword Master establishes the tale of an evil wizard in league with a monstrous demon who have dared to kidnap a damsel. The Sword Master is a knight who seeks to rescue the fair lady and destroy the evil people and creatures in the castle in which they dwell.

It is a parallax side-scrolling action game in which the player must use sword and shield to battle through 7 game levels, from the forest, to a cursed town, to multiple levels of the villain's castle lair. The player will encounter giant bats, wolves, skeleton warriors, evil knights, wizards, lizard men, gargoyles, and other fierce enemies on his quest. The Sword Master can swing his sword, defend with his shield, and gather power-ups which enable him to change his form; for example, the Sword Master can transform into a magic user himself and cast offensive magic spells.
Sword Master (USA).desc:
《劍聖》講述了一個邪惡巫師與一個敢於綁架少女的可怕惡魔勾結的故事。劍聖是一位騎士，他的目標是拯救美麗的女士並消滅他們所居住的城堡中的邪惡人和生物。

這是一款視差橫向捲軸動作遊戲，玩家必須使用劍和盾牌在 7 個遊戲關卡中戰鬥，從森林到被詛咒的城鎮，再到惡棍城堡巢穴的多個關卡。玩家在任務中會遇到巨型蝙蝠、狼、骷髏戰士、邪惡騎士、巫師、蜥蜴人、石像鬼和其他凶猛的敵人。劍聖可以揮舞他的劍，用他的盾牌進行防禦，並收集能量來改變他的形態；例如，劍聖可以自己變身為魔法使用者並施展攻擊性魔法。

Final Fantasy II (Japan) (Translated).name: 最終幻想II
Final Fantasy II (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
The ruthless emperor of Paramekia leads his demonic armies across the land, laying waste to all in his path. One by one the nations fall, and those without the will to resist are forced into servitude. When the conflict reaches the borders of Phin, its people choose to fight, and are all but annihilated. After the loss of Castle Phin, the survivors flee to nearby Althea, where the rebellion makes a temporary headquarters.

Among the survivors are Frioniel, Maria, and Guy; rescued by the rebel leader Princess Hilda and the white mage Ming-wu. Though young and implusive, they gain Hilda's trust and are allowed to join her battle against the empire. While the road ahead may be paved with loss and sacrifice, each victory brings them closer to reclaiming their homeland.
Final Fantasy II (Japan) (Translated).desc:
殘酷的帕拉美基亞皇帝率領他的惡魔軍隊橫掃這片土地，摧毀了他所經過的一切。國家一一淪陷，那些沒有抵抗意願的國家被迫淪為奴役。當衝突蔓延到費恩邊境時，當地人民選擇了戰鬥，但幾乎全軍覆沒。失去芬城堡後，倖存者逃到附近的阿爾西婭，叛軍在那裡設立了臨時總部。

倖存者包括弗里尼爾、瑪麗亞和蓋伊；被叛軍首領希爾達公主和白魔法師明悟所救。儘管年輕且衝動，他們還是贏得了希爾達的信任，並被允許加入她對抗帝國的戰鬥。雖然前方的道路可能充滿了損失和犧牲，但每一次勝利都讓他們離奪回家園更近了一步。

Romance of the Three Kingdoms (USA).name: 三個王國的浪漫
Romance of the Three Kingdoms (USA).original_desc:
Based on the events of the Three Kingdoms era in China (3rd century), and on Luo Guanzhong's famous novel Sanguo Yanyi, you take command of one of the many warlords rivaling for control after the Yellow Turban Rebellion.

This strategy/RPG game introduces hundreds of historically real characters of the Three Kingdoms era. The main purpose of the game is to be supreme ruler of the remnants of the falling Han Dynasty. To do this you have to build a mighty empire by conquering provinces and recruiting generals worthy of command. Fight massive battles, triumph over natural disasters and capture the enemy stronghold is the name of the game. In the end, can you unite China?
Romance of the Three Kingdoms (USA).desc:
以中國三國時代（公元 3 世紀）的事件為背景，以羅貫中的著名小說《三國演義》為背景，您將指揮黃巾之亂後爭奪控制權的眾多軍閥之一。

這款策略/角色扮演遊戲引入了數百個三國時代歷史上真實的角色。遊戲的主要目的是成為衰落的漢朝殘餘的最高統治者。為此，你必須通過征服省份並招募值得指揮的將軍來建立一個強大的帝國。進行大規模的戰鬥，戰勝自然災害並佔領敵人的據點就是遊戲的名稱。最後你能統一中國嗎？

Low G Man - The Low Gravity Man (USA).key: Low G Man - The Low Gravity Man (USA)
Low G Man - The Low Gravity Man (USA).original_name: Low G Man : The Low Gravity Man
Low G Man - The Low Gravity Man (USA).name: 低重力人：低重力人
Low G Man - The Low Gravity Man (USA).original_desc: The year is 2284, and the human race has perfected space travel and is colonizing the galaxy. To help out, robots of all types are used in exploring new planets. There are even entire planets dedicated to manufacturing new robots. But then an alien race captured one of the robot manufacturing planets and reprogrammed the robots to destroy humans! Now it's up to you to go in and take back the planet. Using a low gravity backpack, you have the ability to jump higher than normally possible. You also have a wide variety of weapons to help battle the robots guarding the planet, and additional weapons can be found by destroying certain robots.  Some robots will be riding in vehicles. If you destroy the driver, you can capture the vehicle to help you out on your mission.
Low G Man - The Low Gravity Man (USA).desc: 公元2284年，人類已經完善了太空旅行，正在銀河系殖民。為了提供幫助，各種類型的機器人都被用來探索新的行星。甚至有整個星球都致力於製造新機器人。但後來一個外星種族佔領了一顆機器人製造星球，並對機器人進行了重新編程以毀滅人類！現在輪到你進去奪回星球了。使用低重力背包，您可以跳得比平時更高。你還擁有各種各樣的武器來幫助對抗守衛地球的機器人，並且可以通過摧毀某些機器人來找到額外的武器。一些機器人將乘坐車輛。如果你摧毀了司機，你就可以捕獲車輛來幫助你完成任務。

Downtown Special - Kunio-kun no Jidaigek.key: Downtown Special - Kunio-kun no Jidaigeki Dayo Zenin Shuugou! (Japan) (Translated)
Downtown Special - Kunio-kun no Jidaigek.original_name: Downtown Special : Kunio-kun no Jidaigeki Da yo Zenin Shuugou!
Downtown Special - Kunio-kun no Jidaigek.name: Down and Won S Special 國夫君的日常生活！
Downtown Special - Kunio-kun no Jidaigek.original_desc:
Downtown Special: Kunio-kun no Jidaigeki da yo Zenin Shugo! is a beat 'em up set in medieval Japan using the same engine as River City Ransom.
This is the Sixth NES Episode of the prolific "Nekketsu Koha Kunio-kun" series which can roughly be translated as "Nekketsu High School Thug Kunio" and which has brought over a dozen titles to the NES (Renegade, Nintendo World Cup, Crash 'n the Boys: Street Challenge, etc.).
Bunzo, Kunio's sensei has been affected by a mysterious illness. Kunio and his brother Tsuu must go in search of Kanpou to cure him, but many adventures will occur on the road.
Downtown Special - Kunio-kun no Jidaigek.desc:
市中心特別節目：國夫君的時代劇大喲澤仁守護！是一款以中世紀日本為背景的清版遊戲，使用與 River City Ransom 相同的引擎。
這是多產的“Nekketsu Koha Kunio-kun”系列的第六集，該系列可以大致翻譯為“Nekketsu High School Thug Kunio”，並為 NES 帶來了十多個遊戲（Renegade、Nintendo World Cup、Crash 'n the Boys: Street Challenge 等）。
國男的老師文藏得了一種神秘的疾病。國夫和他的兄弟 Tsuu 必須去尋找 Kanpou 來治愈他，但路上會發生許多冒險。

Door Door (Japan).name: 通過 通過
Door Door (Japan).original_desc: DoorDoor is platform game in which you have to lock up the monster creatures that pursue you. Only one creature can be locked up behind one door. Don't forget to close the door or the creatures will walk out and pursue you again.
Door Door (Japan).desc: DoorDoor 是一款平台遊戲，您必須將追趕您的怪物生物鎖起來。一扇門後面只能鎖一個生物。不要忘記關上門，否則生物會走出去再次追趕你。

North and South (USA).name: 北和南
North and South (USA).original_desc:
Based on the Belgian comic book, "Les Tuniques Bleues", this strategy game allows you to replay the American Civil War from both the North and the South sides.

In the strategy part of the game, you can move your troops on a map of the US. If two opposing armies enter the same state, the battle is played out in an action sequence. Additional action sequences must be accomplished when capturing an enemy fort or train.

The game also offers a two-player-mode.
North and South (USA).desc:
這款策略遊戲以比利時漫畫《Les Tuniques Bleues》為藍本，讓您從南北雙方重演美國內戰。

在遊戲的策略部分，你可以在美國地圖上移動你的部隊。如果兩支敵對軍隊進入相同的狀態，則戰鬥將按動作順序進行。當佔領敵人的堡壘或火車時，必須完成額外的動作序列。

該遊戲還提供兩人遊戲模式。

Castlevania (USA) (Rev 1).name: 惡魔城
Castlevania (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Enter at your own risk!

If you think it's scary on the outside, wait till you see the basement. You're in for the longest night of your life. Ghosts, goblins, demons, wolves, bats – creatures lurking around every corner. As you descend deeper and deeper, they get thicker and thicker. Better stick close to the cavern floor - it's your only chance of finding a weapon or two. You're gonna need 'em. Because when you finally meet the Count, you know he'll be going for the jugular. So keep your courage up and your stake sharp. And say your prayers.
Castlevania (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
進入需要您自擔風險！

如果你覺得外面很嚇人，那就等看到地下室再說吧。你將迎來一生中最長的一夜。鬼魂、妖精、惡魔、狼、蝙蝠——潛伏在每個角落的生物。隨著你下降得越來越深，它們變得越來越厚。最好靠近洞穴地面——這是你找到一兩件武器的唯一機會。你會需要它們。因為當你最終見到伯爵時，你知道他會直擊要害。因此，請保持勇氣並保持銳利。並說出你的祈禱。

Kiwi Kraze - A Bird-Brained Adventure! (.name: Kiwi Kraze：鳥腦冒險！
Kiwi Kraze - A Bird-Brained Adventure! (.original_desc:
One day, a kiwi tribe was having fun and games outside the zoo, only to be kidnapped by the evil-minded Leopard Seal, who plans to sell them at the black market. Fortunately, during the kidnapping process, Tiki, leader of the tribe, managed to escape the sack, and her job is to rescue Phee-Phee and the other kiwis scattered around New Zealand, and are held in cages in various locations that include Auckland, Rotorua, Waitomo Caves, Strait Cook, and Mt. Cook. 

If Tiki doesn't rescue a kiwi in a limited amount of time, the devil will appear and try to kill her. When Tiki reaches the outskirts of each city, except Strait Cook, there is a boss waiting to meet Tiki, and kill her by using their own choice of weapons. Also making the rescue mission difficult are several nasties that attempt to throw their own weapons, like bombs and arrows, at her. To defeat these enemies, Tiki shoots at them using her crossbow and arrows. More often than not, when Tiki shoots at enemies, they will leave behind pieces of fruit that she can pick up for points. However, it is likely that Tiki may get other weapons or the letters E, X, T, E, N, and D. Collecting all these letters will result in an extra life, and as for the weapons, they include laser shots, bombs, and fireballs. 

In some levels, a few areas are located further up than just left or right, and the only way that Tiki can go up is by snatching something off the enemy that gives her the ability to fly up. Other areas are underwater, and when Tiki goes underwater, her oxygen  meter decreases, so she has to rise up to the surface again to restore her oxygen levels. Apart from her own weapons, Tiki is able to squirt water at enemies if she gets to the top of the water.
Kiwi Kraze - A Bird-Brained Adventure! (.desc:
有一天，一群奇異鳥部落在動物園外玩耍，卻被心懷邪惡的豹海豹綁架，並打算在黑市上出售。幸運的是，在綁架過程中，部落首領Tiki成功逃脫了劫難，她的工作就是營救Phee-Phee和其他分散在新西蘭各地的幾維鳥，並被關在奧克蘭、羅托魯瓦、懷托摩洞穴、庫克海峽、庫克山等多個地點的籠子裡。

如果蒂基在有限的時間內沒有救出幾維鳥，惡魔就會出現並試圖殺死她。當蒂基到達每個城市的郊區時，除了庫克海峽外，都有一個老闆等著迎接蒂基，並使用他們自己選擇的武器殺死她。同樣讓營救任務變得困難的是幾個壞人試圖向她扔炸彈和箭等自己的武器。為了擊敗這些敵人，蒂基用她的十字弓和箭射向他們。通常，當蒂基向敵人射擊時，他們會留下一些水果，她可以撿起這些水果來得分。不過，Tiki很可能會得到其他武器或字母E、X、T、E、N和D。收集所有這些字母將獲得額外的生命，至於武器，包括激光彈、炸彈和火球。

在某些關卡中，一些區域的位置比左側或右側更靠上，蒂基上升的唯一方法是從敵人身上搶奪一些東西，使她能夠飛起來。其他區域都在水下，當蒂基進入水下時，她的氧氣計會下降，因此她必須再次上升到水面以恢復氧氣水平。除了她自己的武器之外，如果蒂基到達水面，她還可以向敵人噴射水。

Gun.name: 槍
Gun.original_desc:
Gun.Smoke is a top-down scrolling shooter that casts the gamer as a lone gunman, out to save the gold rush town of Hicksville from a fearsome group of bandits known as the Wingates. Each level has a particular target enemy, although his or her henchmen must also be taken out.

Although it largely takes place on foot, the gameplay resembles Commando, with its top-down action. The screen scrolls at a constant rate, and enemies come at you from the edges, to be shot or avoided. You can grab various power-ups along the way. Finding a horse will allow you to get hit twice before you die rather than just once. There are scenes in which you raft up a river and use the tracks of a railway line.

On the NES you can tap the A button to fire up and right, the B button to fire up and left, or A and B simultaneously to fire straight ahead. One-button control systems mimic all this.
Gun.desc:
Gun.Smoke 是一款自上而下的捲軸射擊遊戲，玩家將扮演一名孤獨的槍手，從一群被稱為“溫蓋特”的可怕強盜手中拯救淘金小鎮希克斯維爾。每個關卡都有一個特定的目標敵人，儘管他或她的追隨者也必須被消滅。

雖然它主要是步行進行的，但遊戲玩法類似於突擊隊，採用自上而下的動作。屏幕以恆定的速度滾動，敵人從邊緣向你襲來，要么被射擊，要么被躲避。一路上你可以獲取各種能量。找到一匹馬可以讓你在死前被擊中兩次而不是一次。在某些場景中，您需要在河上漂流並使用鐵路線的鐵軌。

在 NES 上，您可以點擊 A 按鈕來向上和向右射擊，點擊 B 按鈕來向上和向左射擊，或者同時點擊 A 和 B 來向前射擊。一鍵控制系統模仿了這一切。

Pro Wrestling (USA) (Rev 1).name: 職業摔跤
Pro Wrestling (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: Pro Wrestling is an action wrestling game for one or two players. By using different controller combinations you can perform a wide variety of moves to try and beat your opponent in a 5 minute match. In the one player version, you need to fight your way to first place (but the game will be over if you fall below 6th place). There are seven different wrestlers to fight before you can be declared the Video Wrestling Association champion!
Pro Wrestling (USA) (Rev 1).desc: 職業摔跤是一種適合一到兩名玩家的動作摔跤遊戲。通過使用不同的控制器組合，您可以執行各種動作，嘗試在 5 分鐘的比賽中擊敗對手。在單人遊戲版本中，你需要奮力爭取第一名（但如果你低於第六名，遊戲就會結束）。在您被宣佈為視頻摔跤協會冠軍之前，有七位不同的摔跤手需要戰鬥！

Just Breed (Japan) (Translated).name: 剛剛繁殖
Just Breed (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
The town of Astholm is protected by a Sapphire, one of the magical stones mentioned in old legends. Generation of honorable priestesses protect the stone, and with it the town. Tonight is the annual Sapphire Festival, and the young priestess Firis is going to conduct the ceremony. But just after the joyous event, the priestess is kidnapped by Gel du Rey, the henchman of the evil Lord Ezelkiel. You play the role of the captain of Astholm's guards. You and Firis have been close friends ever since the childhood. You decide to rescue the priestess, with the help of your loyal guards and friends you meet on your journey.

Just Breed is a hybrid of traditional console-style RPG like Dragon Warrior or Final Fantasy, and strategy RPG. During confrontations with the enemies, the battle screen occupies the entire location, and large parties of allies and enemies fight each other in turn-based style, moving on the field to perform physical attacks (melee as well as ranged) or to cast magic spells.
Just Breed (Japan) (Translated).desc:
阿斯托姆鎮受到藍寶石的保護，藍寶石是古老傳說中提到的神奇寶石之一。一代又一代尊貴的女祭司保護著這塊石頭，也保護著這座城鎮。今晚是一年一度的藍寶石節，年輕的女祭司菲莉絲將主持這一儀式。但就在歡樂的事件結束後，女祭司被邪惡領主以澤基爾的追隨者蓋爾·杜雷綁架了。你扮演阿斯索爾姆衛兵隊長的角色。你和菲麗絲從小就是親密的朋友。你決定在忠誠的守衛和旅途中遇到的朋友的幫助下營救女祭司。

Just Breed 是《龍戰士》或《最終幻想》等傳統遊戲機風格角色扮演遊戲與策略角色扮演遊戲的混合體。在與敵人的對抗中，戰鬥畫面佔據了整個場地，大隊的盟友和敵人以回合製的方式互相戰鬥，在場上移動進行物理攻擊（近戰和遠程）或施展魔法。

Vice - Project Doom (USA).name: 副：末日計劃
Vice - Project Doom (USA).original_desc:
Quinn Hart and his partner, Detective Reese of the VICE squad both work to stop the trafficking of illegal substances. But something new has appeared on the scene, a neon gel with great addictive properties. During investigations as to the origin of the gel, Reese mysteriously disappears and leaves Hart without a lead. Time passes and Hart is about to get a brand new lead...

Vice: Project Doom is a game that features both overhead driving modes and side-scrolling platform adventure sequences. Hart's vehicle can accelerate or slow down and fire his weapon straight ahead. During side-scrolling sequences, he can jump, duck, climb or use his selected weapon. Weapons that can be selected include a Katana sword, a pistol and a grenade-type weapon. These weapons feature limited ammunition with the exception of the katana. Power-ups include ammunition, coins, and health.
Vice - Project Doom (USA).desc:
奎因·哈特 (Quinn Hart) 和他的搭檔、VICE 小組的偵探里斯 (Reese) 都致力於阻止非法物質的販運。但現在出現了一些新的東西，一種具有很強的成癮性的霓虹燈凝膠。在調查凝膠的來源期間，里斯神秘失踪，讓哈特失去了線索。時間流逝，哈特即將獲得全新的領先優勢……

Vice: Project Doom 是一款同時具有架空駕駛模式和橫向捲軸平台冒險序列的遊戲。哈特的車輛可以加速或減速，並向前方開火。在橫向捲軸序列中，他可以跳躍、躲避、攀爬或使用他選擇的武器。可選擇的武器包括武士刀、手槍和手榴彈型武器。除武士刀外，這些武器的彈藥有限。能量提升包括彈藥、金幣和生命值。

Mappy-Land (USA).name: 地圖樂園
Mappy-Land (USA).original_desc: Mappy the mouse has a girlfriend named Mapica. In order to please his girlfriend, Mappy goes on a mission to collect gifts for his significant other. Unfortunately the boss cat Nyamco and his legion of pink cats want to track Mappy down so they can make a meal out of him. The goal of the game is to collect 6 of 1 item in each stage without getting eaten by a cat. The items you collect (either pieces of cheese, wedding rings, christmas trees, or baseballs) vary depending on what stage your playing.  There are also stage specific items in the background that will help you defeat your feline adversaries.
Mappy-Land (USA).desc: 老鼠馬皮有一個女朋友，名叫馬皮卡。為了取悅女友，馬皮執行一項任務，為他的另一半收集禮物。不幸的是，貓老大尼亞姆科和他的粉紅貓軍團想要追踪馬皮，這樣他們就可以用他來做一頓飯了。遊戲的目標是在每個階段收集 1 種物品中的 6 種而不被貓吃掉。你收集的物品（奶酪片、結婚戒指、聖誕樹或棒球）根據你玩的階段而有所不同。背景中還有特定階段的物品，可以幫助您擊敗貓科動物對手。

Shadow of the Ninja (USA).name: 忍者之影
Shadow of the Ninja (USA).original_desc:
In the 21st century, the evil Emperor Garuda has taken over the city of New York, killing many of its inhabitants. You play as either Hayate or Kaede, two ninjas who are attempting to free the city from Garuda's control.

Shadow of the Ninja is a typical side-scrolling action game, consisting of running, slashing and jumping through 5 levels, each with 4 sub-stages with numerous and varied foes, and a boss enemy at their end.

Kaede and Hayate can not only jump; as ninjas, they can hang from platforms and make swift saltomortals between floors. Sometimes, canisters containing powerups can be found. Typical powerups extend range of the default sword, or they may be additional weapons such as throwing stars and a ninja weapon that looks like a big grappling hook on a string.

The game allowed two players to play cooperatively, a rare feature for action games outside of the Contra series.
Shadow of the Ninja (USA).desc:
21世紀，邪惡的迦樓羅皇帝佔領了紐約市，殺死了許多居民。你扮演疾風或楓，這兩個忍者試圖將這座城市從 Garuda 的控制中解放出來。

《忍者之影》是一款典型的橫版捲軸動作遊戲，由跑、砍、跳等 5 個關卡組成，每個關卡又包含 4 個子關卡，敵人數量眾多且各不相同，最後還有一個 Boss 敵人。

楓和疾風不僅可以跳躍，還可以跳躍。作為忍者，他們可以懸掛在平台上並在樓層之間快速移動。有時，可以找到含有能量的罐子。典型的能量提升會擴展默認劍的範圍，或者它們可能是額外的武器，例如飛鏢和看起來像繩子上的大抓鉤的忍者武器。

該遊戲允許兩名玩家合作玩，這對於魂斗羅系列之外的動作遊戲來說是罕見的功能。

Dr.name: 馬里奧博士
Dr.original_desc:
In this Tetris-style game, you play as Dr. Mario, who must drop differently coloured pills onto viruses to remove them from the bottle. Each pill is split into two, with each side a different colour. Match that colour to the colour of the virus, and it will be removed from the bottle.

Included in the game is the normal mode, a time trial, and a two player battle mode to see who can remove the most viruses.
Dr.desc:
在這款俄羅斯方塊風格的遊戲中，您扮演馬里奧博士，他必須將不同顏色的藥丸扔到病毒上，以將其從瓶子中清除。每個藥丸被分成兩部分，每一面都有不同的顏色。將該顏色與病毒的顏色相匹配，病毒就會從瓶子中被清除。

遊戲包括普通模式、計時賽和兩人對戰模式，看看誰能清除最多的病毒。

Ganbare Goemon! (Japan) (Translated).name: 加油五右衛門吧！: 卡拉庫里土中
Ganbare Goemon! (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
First title in the Ganbare Goemon game series of action/adventure titles. Karakuri Douchuu stars Goemon as he has to make his way through several parts of feudal Japan fending off bandits and other evil-doers.

The game is played as a side-scrolling beat 'em up, but with the added challenge of having to find the exit for the maze-like stages besides beating all the baddies. Goemon fights using his smoking pipe, but he can upgrade his weapon with power-ups found in the game or bought at several shops using the money collected from fallen enemies à la River City Ransom. Features hot-seat alternating 2 player gameplay.
Ganbare Goemon! (Japan) (Translated).desc:
Ganbare Goemon 動作/冒險遊戲系列中的第一款遊戲。《卡拉庫裡豆中》由五右衛門主演，他必須穿越日本封建的多個地區，抵禦土匪和其他惡人。

這款遊戲是一款橫向捲軸清版遊戲，但除了擊敗所有壞人之外，還面臨著額外的挑戰，即必須找到迷宮般階段的出口。五右衛門使用煙斗進行戰鬥，但他可以使用遊戲中找到的強化武器來升級他的武器，或者使用從倒下的敵人那裡收集的錢在幾家商店購買，就像河城贖金一樣。具有熱座交替 2 人遊戲玩法。

Chip 'n Dale - Rescue Rangers 2 (USA).name: 奇普戴爾：救援隊 2
Chip 'n Dale - Rescue Rangers 2 (USA).original_desc:
Following the first Rescue Rangers game, the Rangers' overcame the plot of their arch-nemesis Fatcat, and locked him up in the prison/pound. However, Fatcat's henchmen have sprung him from prison by blimp. Suddenly a television news anchor is reporting that there is a bomb threat in a local restaurant. The Rescue Rangers take it upon themselves to save the day only to learn that the whole bomb scare was a diversion in order to allow Fatcat to steal an artifact known as the Urn of the Pharoah. The team must track Fatcat and learn what he has in store for the stolen goods.

Like the previous game, Chip & Dale's Rescue Rangers 2 is a side-scrolling action game where 2 players can play simultaneously as Chip & Dale, or 1 player can control either chipmunk. Our heroes must conquer a series of oversized (from their perspective) stages in order to thwart Fatcat's nefarious schemes. For example, the first stage has the chipmunks hopping across the tables, chairs, and counters of a restaurant, and on through the kitchen. Many enemies try to slow the player's progress. The chipmunks' offensive ability is to pick up any of the copious blocks that litter the landscape and toss it in any of 5 directions (sideways, up, and diagonal-up). Along the way, there are scattered RR blocks for the heroes to collect. The other members of the Rescue Rangers -- Monty, Gadget, and Zipper -- are on hand to lend help out at key junctures.
Chip 'n Dale - Rescue Rangers 2 (USA).desc:
在第一場救援遊騎兵隊比賽之後，遊騎兵隊戰勝了他們的宿敵胖貓的陰謀，並將他關進了監獄/收容所。然而，胖貓的追隨者用飛艇把他從監獄裡救了出來。突然，一位電視新聞主播報導說當地一家餐館有炸彈威脅。救援隊義無反顧地拯救世界，卻發現整個炸彈恐慌只是為了轉移注意力，讓肥貓偷走一件被稱為法老王甕的神器。團隊必須追踪 Fatcat 並了解他所藏匿的贓物。

與前作一樣，Chip & Dale's Rescue Rangers 2 是一款橫向捲軸動作遊戲，其中 2 名玩家可以同時扮演 Chip & Dale，或者 1 名玩家可以控制其中一隻花栗鼠。我們的英雄必須征服一系列超大（從他們的角度來看）的關卡，才能挫敗胖貓的邪惡計劃。例如，第一階段讓花栗鼠跳過餐廳的桌子、椅子和櫃檯，然後穿過廚房。許多敵人試圖減慢玩家的進度。花栗鼠的進攻能力是撿起散佈在地面上的任何大量方塊，並將其向 5 個方向中的任意一個方向（側向、向上和對角向上）投擲。沿途有分散的RR塊供英雄們收集。救援隊的其他成員——蒙蒂、加吉特和拉鍊——隨時準備在關鍵時刻提供幫助。

Kid Icarus (USA, Europe) (Rev 1).name: 伊卡洛斯小子
Kid Icarus (USA, Europe) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Far away in peaceful Angel Land lived a young angel warrior named Pit, who has been given the task of defeating the monstrous Medusa, who wishes to destroy Angel Land and all of the people, and she has started by kidnapping Palutena, the Princess of Angel Land.

Young Pit must rescue the Princess and restore peace to Angel Land. He will travel from the deep caverns of the Underworld to Medusa's palace in the sky on his journey, and deadly monsters will attack him every step of the way. But he has the power of the Gods on his side! A powerful bow and arrows, Water of Life, and Angel Feathers will assist Pit on his quest to destroy Medusa and save the princess!

Kid Icarus is a platform game where the player goes through several vertically outlaid levels, shooting enemies with his bow on the way and collecting hearts they leave behind. Pit's bow can shoot both forward and upwards. As Pit continues upwards, more and more of the level ends up beyond the bottom of the screen and if Pit falls down out of the screen, he dies. 

The levels contain doors which lead to chambers of various types - some chambers are filled with enemies, some are treasuries which allow Pit to obtain a power-up, some are stores where Pit can buy stuff, some will replenish his health, in some Pit will be able to take a test in hopes of getting a powerful weapon, and finally some chambers give Pit a chance of receiving a strength upgrade, therefore increasing the amount of damage his attacks deal. 

Pit earns experience as he defeats enemies, and he gains levels from this experience. The more levels Pit has, the more maximum health he has. 

Hearts taken from enemies are used in shops to buy various items and power-ups. Items include a protective shield which harms enemies, a more powerful bow, a mallet which allows you to smash the poor Palutena's warriors turned to stone who will later help you to fight a boss, a torch to see yourself in dark areas and others.
Kid Icarus (USA, Europe) (Rev 1).desc:
遙遠的和平的天使之地，住著一位名叫皮特的年輕天使戰士，她被賦予了擊敗想要毀滅天使之地和所有人民的怪物美杜莎的任務，她從綁架天使之地的公主帕魯特娜開始。

小皮特必須營救公主並恢復天使之地的和平。他將從地底深處的洞穴前往天空中美杜莎的宮殿，一路上都會有致命的怪物襲擊他。但他的身邊卻有著諸神的力量！強大的弓箭、生命之水和天使羽毛將協助皮特消滅美杜莎並拯救公主！

《Kid Icarus》是一款平台遊戲，玩家將經歷幾個垂直佈局的關卡，沿途用弓箭射擊敵人並收集他們留下的心。皮特的弓可以向前和向上射擊。隨著皮特繼續向上，越來越多的關卡最終會超出屏幕底部，如果皮特掉出屏幕，他就會死。

這些關卡包含通向各種類型房間的門 - 有些房間充滿了敵人，有些房間是可以讓 Pit 獲得能量的寶藏，有些是 Pit 可以購買東西的商店，有些可以補充他的生命值，有些房間可以進行測試以獲得強大的武器，最後有些房間讓 Pit 有機會獲得力量升級，從而增加他的攻擊造成的傷害量。

皮特在擊敗敵人時會獲得經驗，並從這些經驗中獲得等級。皮特的等級越高，他的最大生命值就越高。

從敵人身上奪取的心臟可在商店中用來購買各種物品和能量提升。物品包括傷害敵人的防護盾、更強大的弓、可以讓你粉碎可憐的帕盧特納戰士變成石頭的木槌，他們稍後會幫助你對抗老闆、在黑暗區域看到自己的火把等等。

Castelian (USA).name: 卡斯特利安
Castelian (USA).original_desc: Julius is his name. Demolition is his game. Eight colossal towers that almost crack the sky! You and Julius - the Anurian Hybrid - are charged with the task of collapsing the alien towers. As Julius climbs and leaps across the face of each tower, he is confronted by potent and very deadly adversaries. Roving Hexalons, scanning I-Balls, orbiting Spheroids and dissolving pathways threaten you at every turn. Their mere touch will cost you your life! Yet, somehow, you must reach the tower's top in order to detonate your powerful D-bombs! Your courage, skill and determination will guide you to the summit of Castelian. Fire your Carbonobombs, catch the high-speed elevator, and escape into the doorways of the unknown. The island's future depends upon you and Julius. Watch him, learn his secrets and demolition will become your game!
Castelian (USA).desc: 朱利葉斯是他的名字。拆除是他的遊戲。八座幾乎衝破天際的巨塔！你和朱利葉斯——阿努里亞混血兒——肩負著摧毀外星塔的任務。當朱利葉斯攀爬並跳過每座塔樓的表面時，他遇到了強大且非常致命的對手。移動六面體、掃描 I 球、繞軌道運行的球體和溶解路徑處處威脅著您。他們的觸碰就會讓你喪命！然而，無論如何，你必須到達塔頂才能引爆強大的 D 炸彈！你的勇氣、技巧和決心將引導你登上卡斯特利安的頂峰。發射碳炸彈，搭乘高速電梯，逃進未知世界的門口。該島的未來取決於你和朱利葉斯。觀察他，了解他的秘密，拆除將成為你的遊戲！

Wario's Woods (USA).name: 瓦里奧的森林
Wario's Woods (USA).original_desc:
Wario's Woods is a puzzle game similar to Tetris or Columns, but with a twist. Instead of directly controlling the monsters and bombs that are falling down, the player controls Toad who has to carry around stacks of monsters and bombs and to combine them in the right way. One bomb plus at least two monsters of the same color have to be combined to make them disappear. If five or more objects are cleared at the same time, a diamond will appear. Destroying the diamond will clear all monsters of the diamond's color.
There are four different ways to pick up objects. The A button lets Toad pick up the whole stack that is in front of him, the B button lets him only pick up one object, even if it's in the middle of a stack, the Y button lets him kick a monster or bomb that's in front of him and the X button places him on top of the stack that he is carrying. He can also run up walls and stacks to catch falling objects out of the air or to pick up certain parts of a stack.
Wario's Woods (USA).desc:
瓦里奧森林是一款類似於俄羅斯方塊或方塊的益智遊戲，但有所不同。玩家不是直接控制掉落的怪物和炸彈，而是控制蟾蜍，蟾蜍必須攜帶成堆的怪物和炸彈，並以正確的方式將它們組合起來。一枚炸彈加上至少兩個相同顏色的怪物必須組合才能使它們消失。如果同時清除五個或更多物體，則會出現菱形。摧毀鑽石將會清除所有與鑽石顏色相同的怪物。
有四種不同的方式來拾取物體。A 按鈕讓蟾蜍撿起他面前的整堆物體，B 按鈕讓他只撿起一個物體，即使它位於一堆物體的中間，Y 按鈕讓他踢他面前的怪物或炸彈，X 按鈕讓他站在他攜帶的物體堆的頂部。他還可以跑上牆壁和堆垛來接住從空中掉落的物體或撿起堆垛中的某些部分。

Adventures of Lolo 2 (USA).name: 洛洛歷險記2
Adventures of Lolo 2 (USA).original_desc: Lolo and Lala are back in this sequel to the popular puzzle game Adventures of Lolo. On his return from the haunted castle, Big Demon has once again kidnapped Lala to challenge Lolo. Can he overcome the challenge of the mazes of the tower and the castle of Big Demon and free her? To succeed, Lolo will have to make his way through the mazes by collecting the jewels on each level. He'll also have to push tiles, collect heart boxes, temporarily turn enemies into eggs with his magic attacks and repel enemy attacks by moving the emerald blocks. It's up to you to help Lolo and Lala escape the clutches of Big Demon and defeat him!
Adventures of Lolo 2 (USA).desc: 洛洛和拉拉在流行益智遊戲《洛洛歷險記》的續集中回歸。從鬼城回來後，大惡魔再次綁架了拉拉來挑戰洛洛。他能克服塔樓迷宮和大惡魔城堡的挑戰並釋放她嗎？為了取得成功，洛洛必須通過收集每個級別的珠寶來穿過迷宮。他還必須推動瓷磚，收集心盒，用魔法攻擊暫時將敵人變成雞蛋，並通過移動綠寶石塊來擊退敵人的攻擊。你要幫助洛洛和拉拉逃離大惡魔的魔掌並擊敗他！

Pirates! (USA).name: 海盜！
Pirates! (USA).original_desc:
Modern warfare is no match for the fierce realism of six historically accurate severteenth century pirate raids along the Spanish Main. Aye, matey! That's why plundering and pillaging are back in style, as you command the role of a high seas high-jacker. Either an English Buccaneer, Dutch Adventurer, Spanish Renegade or French Explorer, each with a different skill level and strategic impact.
As a swashbuckling scoundrel, you'll barter with enemy merchants, trade for hidden treasure maps, negotiate with unscrupulous governors and forge alliances with monarchs who'd just as soon stab you in the back than float you a loan for new ships. Buth that's only half the battle! You'll also assault towns, sword fight with garrison commanders, lay siege to forts, and fire your cannons broadside at an armada of naval foes, including Spanish War Galleons, Dutch Frigates, French Merchantment and English Sloops.
Pirates! (USA).desc:
現代戰爭無法與 17 世紀西班牙美因河沿岸六次歷史上準確的海盜襲擊的激烈現實相媲美。是的，伙計！這就是為什麼掠奪和掠奪重新流行起來，因為你扮演的是公海劫掠者的角色。英國海盜、荷蘭冒險家、西班牙叛徒或法國探險家，每個人都有不同的技能水平和戰略影響。
作為一個虛張聲勢的惡棍，你將與敵方商人進行物物交換，交易隱藏的藏寶圖，與無良的總督談判，並與君主結成聯盟，他們會在背後捅你一刀，而不是向你提供購買新船的貸款。但這只是成功的一半！你還將攻擊城鎮，與駐軍指揮官進行劍戰，圍攻堡壘，並向包括西班牙戰艦、荷蘭護衛艦、法國商船和英國單桅帆船在內的海軍敵人艦隊開火。

Rush'n Attack (USA).name: 衝鋒攻擊
Rush'n Attack (USA).original_desc:
Depending on which title you use, and how you interpret it, this game is about a guy who a)rushes in before attacking b)attacks Russians (this was the mid-80s, when the US helped bin Laden do the same), or c)wears a rather goofy hat. One way or another, this arcade conversion arms you with a knife and sends you on a kamikaze mission against hordes of enemy fighters.

There are four distinct sections of gameplay, taking in a Missile Base, a Harbour, a Bridge, and an enemy Prison Camp. Extra weapons with limited ammunition can be collected along the way, which will make the task a lot easier. The level is divided into 3 horizontal levels, which can be moved between either by jumping or using ladders, and this gives a chance to avoid the more threatening mobs of enemy fighters
Rush'n Attack (USA).desc:
根據你使用的標題以及你如何解釋它，這個遊戲是關於一個人a）在攻擊之前衝進去b）攻擊俄羅斯人（這是80年代中期，當時美國幫助本拉登做同樣的事情），或者c）戴著一頂相當愚蠢的帽子。無論如何，這款街機轉換遊戲會為你配備一把刀，並派你執行神風特攻隊任務，對抗成群的敵方戰士。

遊戲有四個不同的部分，包括導彈基地、港口、橋樑和敵人的監獄營地。沿途可以收集彈藥有限的額外武器，這將使任務變得更加容易。該關卡分為 3 個水平關卡，可以通過跳躍或使用梯子在各個關卡之間移動，這樣就有機會避開更具威脅性的敵方戰士。

Ninja Gaiden III - The Ancient Ship of D.key: Ninja Gaiden III - The Ancient Ship of Doom (USA)
Ninja Gaiden III - The Ancient Ship of D.original_name: Ninja Gaiden III : The Ancient Ship of Doom
Ninja Gaiden III - The Ancient Ship of D.name: 忍者龙剑传III 黄泉的方船
Ninja Gaiden III - The Ancient Ship of D.original_desc:
This is the third entry in the series of fast-paced ninja action games, and is the last game in the series to be released on the Nintendo Entertainment System.

Some time has passed since the defeat of Ashtar and the resurrected Jaquio, and Irene Lew has received a new mission to complete. She is to observe a strange factory that has been constructed recently for an unknown purpose, and investigate it. She proceeds to reconnoiter it, but is intercepted and apparently assassinated by her friend Ryu Hayabusa...except it isn't Ryu. It is an imposter. The real Ryu, angered over her death, and the subsequent false accusation that he murdered her, continues her mission and proceeds to investigate the factory.

As stated, this was the last game in the regular series produced for the NES. It had many features the previous games in the series did not, such as a power up to extend the length of your sword, a new vertical "wave" attack and vertically-scrolling levels. The US version of the game is reputed to be the hardest in the series, due to the extra damage incurred when hit, slightly shorter regular sword length, limited continues and more enemies.

The Lynx port is the second Ninja Gaiden game on the platform, the first being a port from the Arcade Version. This port is identical to the NES game, but the in-game picture is compressed for the smaller screen of the Lynx.
Ninja Gaiden III - The Ancient Ship of D.desc:
這是快節奏忍者動作遊戲系列的第三款作品，也是該系列中在任天堂娛樂系統上發布的最後一款遊戲。

自從擊敗阿斯塔和復活的賈奎奧以來已經過去了一段時間，艾琳·盧接到了新的任務要完成。她要觀察並調查最近出於未知目的而建造的奇怪工廠。她繼續偵察，但被她的朋友 Ryu Hayabusa 攔截並顯然暗殺了……只不過不是 Ryu。這是一個冒名頂替者。真正的 Ryu 對她的死以及隨後他謀殺她的錯誤指控感到憤怒，繼續她的任務並繼續調查工廠。

如前所述，這是為 NES 製作的常規系列中的最後一款遊戲。它具有該系列之前的遊戲所沒有的許多功能，例如延長劍長度的能力、新的垂直“波浪”攻擊和垂直滾動關卡。該遊戲的美國版本被認為是該系列中最難的，因為擊中時會產生額外傷害，常規劍長度稍短，持續時間有限且敵人更多。

Lynx 移植版是該平台上的第二款忍者龍劍傳遊戲，第一款是街機版的移植版。該端口與 NES 遊戲相同，但遊戲中的圖像針對 Lynx 的較小屏幕進行了壓縮。

Nobunaga's Ambition (USA).name: 信長的野心
Nobunaga's Ambition (USA).original_desc:
In the 16th century, Japan's Sengoku period divided the nation into numerous feudal states, each ruled by a daimyo. Many dreamt of conquering the land, becoming the Shogun and ruling the entire country. One of those daimyos was the ambitious Nobunaga Oda, a merciless ruler and a renowned strategist. Players take on the role of Nobunaga Oda or one of many other daimyos to try to conquer Japan.

Nobunaga's Ambition is a turn-based strategy game which can be played in different modes.  Players begin by selecting either a 17 regions scenario or a larger 50 scenario. Then, the player must select a daimyo, each of which is rated attributes in several categories; Age, Health, Ambition, Luck, Charm and IQ. As the game progresses, these values change depending on events in the game. The age value represents a time limit of sorts, as an elderly daimyo becomes increasingly likely to die of old age or sickness.
Nobunaga's Ambition (USA).desc:
16 世紀，日本戰國時代將國家劃分為眾多封建國家，每個國家都由一位大名統治。許多人夢想征服這片土地，成為幕府將軍並統治整個國家。其中一位大名是野心勃勃的織田信長，他是一位無情的統治者和著名的戰略家。玩家扮演織田信長或其他眾多大名之一，試圖征服日本。

《信長的野心》是一款回合製策略遊戲，可以以不同的模式進行。玩家首先選擇 17 個區域場景或更大的 50 個場景。然後，玩家必須選擇一個大名，每個大名都有多個類別的屬性評級；年齡、健康、野心、運氣、魅力和智商。隨著遊戲的進行，這些值會根據遊戲中的事件而變化。年齡值代表了某種時間限制，因為年老的大名越來越有可能死於年老或疾病。

Super C (USA).name: 超級任天堂
Super C (USA).original_desc: The alien Red Falcon is back, and planning on taking over the planet Earth. Now it's up to Scorpion and Mad Dog to battle through five levels and save the planet. Based on the arcade game, Super C is the sequel to Contra. Gameplay is a combination of side scrolling/platform and top down view. There is a wide variety of enemies to defeat, starting with earthly locations, and progressing to more alien. To help out, weapon upgrades can be found as the game progresses. Two players can play simultaneously, or one player can attempt to take on Red Falcon himself.
Super C (USA).desc: 外星紅隼回來了，併計劃接管地球。現在，蝎子和瘋狗需要通過五個關卡來戰鬥並拯救地球。《Super C》基於街機遊戲，是《魂斗羅》的續作。遊戲玩法是側向滾動/平台和自上而下視圖的組合。有各種各樣的敵人需要打敗，從地球上的地方開始，逐漸發展到更外星的地方。為了提供幫助，隨著遊戲的進行，可以找到武器升級。兩名玩家可以同時玩，或者一名玩家可以嘗試親自對抗紅隼。

Solomon's Key (USA).name: 所羅門的鑰匙
Solomon's Key (USA).original_desc: Solomon's Key is a platform game with both action and strategy elements. On each level your goal is to retrieve a key which can then be used to unlock the exit. To help out, you have a magic wand which can be used to create and destroy blocks (though some blocks can't be destroyed). In order to reach the key you will need carefully to arrange the blocks on the screen so you can jump your way around safely. Wandering around each level are a variety of enemies which will cause you to lose a life if you're caught. Some creatures can be killed by destroying the block they are standing on, others must be dodged. Hidden bonuses and magic can be found on many of the levels, sometimes even hidden in blocks. Some treasures give you bonus points, others can form magic spells to help deal with the enemies. To make the game more difficult, each level has a time limit in which it must be completed.
Solomon's Key (USA).desc: 所羅門之匙是一款兼具動作和策略元素的平台遊戲。在每個級別上，您的目標都是檢索一把鑰匙，然後可以使用該鑰匙來解鎖出口。為了提供幫助，您有一根魔杖，可用於創建和銷毀塊（儘管有些塊無法銷毀）。為了到達鑰匙，你需要小心地排列屏幕上的方塊，這樣你才能安全地跳躍。每個關卡中都有各種各樣的敵人，如果你被抓住，你就會失去生命。有些生物可以通過摧毀它們所站立的方塊來殺死，而其他生物則必須躲避。在許多關卡中都可以找到隱藏的獎勵和魔法，有時甚至隱藏在方塊中。有些寶藏會給你加分，有些則可以形成魔法咒語來幫助對付敵人。為了使遊戲變得更加困難，每個級別都有必須完成的時間限制。

Life Force (USA) (Rev 1).name: 漫威神威戰隊
Life Force (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: In a distant part of the universe, an alien creature called Zelos was born. As he grew so did his appetite, and soon he began devouring galaxies, planets, and stars by the hundreds. Now your planet has appeared in Zelos' path, and it is up to you and a partner to fly into battle to save your world. Life Force is an action packed shooter based on the arcade game. There are six levels which alternate between side and vertical scrolling, each of them ending with a powerful guardian. Throughout the game, destroying certain enemies will release power ups which can be used to equip your ship with more powerful weapons, extra speed, and shields. Gameplay is for one player or two players simultaneously.
Life Force (USA) (Rev 1).desc: 在宇宙的遙遠地方，誕生了一種名叫澤洛斯的外星生物。隨著他的胃口越來越大，很快他就開始吞噬數百個星系、行星和恆星。現在你的星球已經出現在澤洛斯的路徑上，你和你的伙伴需要飛入戰鬥來拯救你的世界。Life Force 是一款基於街機遊戲的動作射擊遊戲。有六個級別在橫向和垂直滾動之間交替，每個級別都以強大的守護者結束。在整個遊戲中，消滅某些敵人會釋放能量提升，可以用來為你的飛船配備更強大的武器、額外的速度和護盾。遊戲適合一名玩家或同時兩名玩家。

Chip 'n Dale - Rescue Rangers (USA).name: Chip 'N Dale : 救援隊
Chip 'n Dale - Rescue Rangers (USA).original_desc: The rescue rangers are tiny heroes. Consisting of two chipmunks, two mice and a fly... these heroes may be small but there's no case too big for them to take on. This game starts out simply enough, with a mission to rescue a small kitten, but soon escalates into a wider plot that pits the rescue rangers against their arch-nemesis, the feline kingpin, Fat Cat.
Chip 'n Dale - Rescue Rangers (USA).desc: 救援人員是小英雄。由兩隻花栗鼠、兩隻老鼠和一隻蒼蠅組成……這些英雄可能很小，但沒有什麼大事是他們無法應對的。這款遊戲一開始的任務很簡單，就是拯救一隻小貓，但很快就升級為更廣泛的情節，讓救援人員對抗他們的宿敵貓科動物頭目肥貓。

Rainbow Islands - Bubble Bobble 2 (Europ.name: 彩虹群島 : 泡泡龍 2
Rainbow Islands - Bubble Bobble 2 (Europ.original_desc: There's trouble in the Rainbow Sea, home of Bubby and many other peaceful people. An old monster named Krabo has cast an evil spell over the land. Only Bubby, with his ability to create magical rainbows, can stop Krabo and save the Rainbow Sea. In Rainbow Islands, you control Bubby on his quest to stop Krabo. Your power to create rainbows will help you climb obstacles and destroy enemies. There are seven levels for you to complete, each with its own level-ending boss. After you have defeated each boss and claimed the Rainbow Diamond for the stage you will have saved the Rainbow Sea from Krabo's treachery.
Rainbow Islands - Bubble Bobble 2 (Europ.desc: 彩虹海是巴比和許多其他愛好和平的人們的家園，這裡遇到了麻煩。一個名叫克拉博的古老怪物對這片土地施下了邪惡的咒語。只有巴比擁有創造魔法彩虹的能力，才能阻止克拉博並拯救彩虹海。在《彩虹群島》中，你控制巴比去阻止克拉博。你創造彩虹的能力將幫助你越過障礙並消滅敵人。有七個關卡等待你完成，每個關卡都有自己的關卡結束boss。當你擊敗每個頭目並獲得舞台上的彩虹鑽石後，你就可以從克拉博的背叛中拯救彩虹海。

Gremlins 2 - The New Batch (USA).name: 小魔怪2：新一批
Gremlins 2 - The New Batch (USA).original_desc: As Gizmo, you must reach the Gremlin Control Centre to wipe them out. This is an isometric action game differing from the Elite title. You can gain items such as a bow and arrow and matches after each level to help. Mr Wing's Shop also contains many goodies, so watch out for its door magically appearing. Hazards include spiders, electrified wires, ground-mounted hazards, and a boss at the end of each level.
Gremlins 2 - The New Batch (USA).desc: 作為 Gizmo，您必須到達 Gremlin 控制中心才能消滅它們。這是一款不同於精英遊戲的等距動作遊戲。每個關卡後您都可以獲得弓箭和火柴等物品來提供幫助。Mr Wing's Shop 裡也有很多好東西，所以要小心它的門會神奇地出現。危險包括蜘蛛、電線、地面危險以及每個關卡末端的 Boss。

Blades of Steel (USA).name: 鋼刃
Blades of Steel (USA).original_desc: Based on the arcade game, Blades Of Steel is a hockey arcade action game (gameplay doesn't require the need to worry about statistics or provide the ability to customize teams.) Two players can play against each other, or one player against the computer. In one player mode there are single game and tournament mode options.  From time to time a fight may break out, which will provide a close up view of the two players. The player has control during the miniature fight game sequence, with the loser having to spend time in the penalty box.  The referee will break up fights that go on too long, and calls a few penalties such as icing. Several short clips of digitized voices are also featured.
Blades of Steel (USA).desc: 基於街機遊戲，Blades Of Steel 是一款曲棍球街機動作遊戲（遊戲玩法不需要擔心統計數據或提供自定義球隊的能力。） 兩個玩家可以互相對戰，也可以一個玩家與電腦對戰。在單人模式下，有單人遊戲和錦標賽模式選項。有時可能會爆發戰鬥，這將提供兩名玩家的近距離觀察。在微型格鬥遊戲序列中，玩家擁有控制權，失敗者必須在禁區裡度過一段時間。裁判會制止持續時間過長的打鬥，並判以冰球等處罰。還收錄了幾個數字化聲音的短片。

Perman 2 - Down with the Secret Madou So.key: Perman 2 - Down with the Secret Madou Society! (Japan) (Translated)
Perman 2 - Down with the Secret Madou So.original_name: Perman 2 - Down with the Secret Madou Society! (Japan) (Translated)
Perman 2 - Down with the Secret Madou So.name: 帕爾曼2 - 打倒秘密麻豆會！

Batman Returns (USA).name: 蝙蝠俠歸來
Batman Returns (USA).original_desc:
Like Konami's other adaptation of Batman Returns, the NES version is a side-scrolling beat 'em up. Next to brawling action, it also features two sections where the player controls the Batmobile and the Batskiboat seen in the movie.

In the beat 'em up sections, Batman has to defeat a large number of enemies (members of the Penguin's circus gang) to advance. Possible attacks include punches, sliding attacks, drop kicks and a powerful 360° cape slash attack which will drain Batman's health bar. Gadgets to be used include a limited number of batarangs and a grappling hook. The hook is useful for many things: it can take down flying enemies, pull Batman up to higher levels, lets him climb into open windows and more. Hidden in background items somewhere in the levels are power-ups, including hearts that refill the health bar and extra batarangs.

Each of the six levels in the game concludes with a boss fight against one or more especially powerful enemies.

The Batmobile is armed with machine guns and bat discs, used to dispatch the enemy bikes and cars in the driving level. The Batskiboat section is similar, except that there are no enemies and the only goal is to collect coins for extra points.
Batman Returns (USA).desc:
與 Konami 改編的《蝙蝠俠歸來》一樣，NES 版本也是一款橫向捲軸清版遊戲。除了打鬥動作之外，它還包括兩個部分，玩家可以在電影中控制蝙蝠車和蝙蝠艇。

在清版遊戲部分，蝙蝠俠必須擊敗大量敵人（企鵝馬戲團成員）才能晉級。可能的攻擊包括拳擊、滑動攻擊、踢腿和強大的 360° 斗篷斜砍攻擊，這會耗盡蝙蝠俠的生命值。使用的小工具包括數量有限的蝙蝠鏢和抓鉤。鉤子有很多用處：它可以擊落飛行的敵人，將蝙蝠俠拉到更高的水平，讓他爬進打開的窗戶等等。隱藏在關卡某處的背景物品中的是能量道具，包括補充生命值的心和額外的蝙蝠鏢。

遊戲的六個關卡中的每一關都以與一個或多個特別強大的敵人的老闆戰鬥結束。

蝙蝠車配備機槍和蝙蝠盤，用於在駕駛關卡中消滅敵人的自行車和汽車。Batskiboat 部分類似，只是沒有敵人，唯一的目標是收集硬幣以獲得額外積分。

Bio Miracle Baby Upa!! (Japan) (Translat.name: 生物奇蹟 Bokutte Upa
Bio Miracle Baby Upa!! (Japan) (Translat.original_desc: In this game, you control a little baby! The baby crawls through imaginary worlds, made of candy, chocolate, toys, and other things a baby would dream of. It has to traverse those platform levels to defeat or avoid various enemies. The way the baby deals with the enemies is quite unusual: it inflates them. When inflated, the enemies lose control and begin to float, until they finally explode. The baby can use this to its advantage, riding the enemies while they are floating, kicking them to various directions, making them bounce off walls, using them as projectiles to hit other enemies, etc. Such strategies are necessary when dealing with the bosses you encounter. There are various items scattered through the levels, such as milk, which restores your health completely.
Bio Miracle Baby Upa!! (Japan) (Translat.desc: 在這個遊戲中，你控制一個小寶寶！寶寶在由糖果、巧克力、玩具和其他寶寶夢想的東西組成的想像世界中爬行。它必須穿越這些平台關卡才能擊敗或避開各種敵人。嬰兒對付敵人的方式很不尋常：它讓敵人膨脹。膨脹後，敵人會失去控制並開始漂浮，直到最終爆炸。寶寶可以利用這一點，騎在漂浮的敵人身上，將他們踢向不同的方向，讓他們從牆壁上彈起，用他們作為投射物擊中其他敵人等等。這些策略在對付你遇到的老闆時是必要的。關卡中散佈著各種物品，例如牛奶，它可以完全恢復你的健康。

NES Open Tournament Golf (USA).name: NES 高爾夫公開賽
NES Open Tournament Golf (USA).original_desc: In NES Open Tournament Golf, you can play a round of golf on one of three different courses. One or two players can play in the U.S., Japan, or the U.K. and choose a stroke or match play game. Gameplay is from two point of views, starting with an overhead view allowing you to set up the shot and choose a club, then switching to a 3-D point of view. Hitting the ball uses the common power meter where tapping the button starts the meter, tap the button a second time to select the amount of power in the shot, then tap the button a third time to select the amount of slice or hook. If you are unable to finish a round in one play, NES Open Tournament Golf features a battery back-up allowing you to save the game and continue later.
NES Open Tournament Golf (USA).desc: 在 NES Open Tournament Golf 中，您可以在三個不同球場之一打一場高爾夫球。一到兩名選手可以在美國、日本或英國比賽，並選擇比杆賽或比洞賽。遊戲玩法有兩個視角，首先是俯視圖，允許您設置擊球並選擇球桿，然後切換到 3D 視角。擊球使用常見的功率計，點擊按鈕即可啟動功率計，第二次點擊按鈕可以選擇擊球的力量大小，然後第三次點擊按鈕可以選擇右曲或左曲的大小。如果您無法在一次比賽中完成一輪比賽，NES Open Tournament Golf 具有備用電池，可讓您保存比賽並稍後繼續。

Star Wars (Japan) (Namco) (Translated).name: STAR WARS：最後的絕地武士
Star Wars (Japan) (Namco) (Translated).original_desc: Only the people who made the movie could bring you this much action and adventure... Control your favorite Star Wars heroes - Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Princess Leia. Enlist the help of Obi-Wan Kenobi, C-3PO, and R2-D2. Outfight and outsmart the intergalactic bad guys - stormtroopers, jawas, Banthas, bounty hunters, sinister droids, and more. Explore the spectacular worlds of Star Wars - from the Tatooine Desert to the Mos Eisley Spaceport to inside the Death Star. And if you get very, very good... destroy the Death Star and save the Rebel Alliance from Darth Vader!
Star Wars (Japan) (Namco) (Translated).desc: 只有電影的製作者才能為您帶來如此多的動作和冒險……控制您最喜歡的星球大戰英雄 - 盧克·天行者、漢·索羅、萊婭公主。尋求歐比旺·克諾比、C-3PO 和 R2-D2 的幫助。與星際壞人鬥智斗勇——衝鋒隊、賈瓦人、班薩人、賞金獵人、險惡的機器人等等。探索星球大戰的壯觀世界 - 從塔圖因沙漠到莫斯艾斯利太空港再到死星內部。如果你做得非常非常好...摧毀死星並從達斯維德手中拯救叛軍聯盟！

Mitsume ga Tooru (Japan) (Translated).name: 目光穿過
Mitsume ga Tooru (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
Mitsume ga Tooru (translates to The Three-Eyed One) is based on the manga and anime of the same name. You control Hosuke Sharaku - a boy with a third eye on his forehead and of terrifying power. This power is unleashed when his third eye is open so he is wearing a bandage to seal his power and remove any memories of his true nature.
In the game, another three-eyed man with great powers appears and attacks a city. He also kidnaps Sharaku's friend Wato who watches unable to do anything. Sharaku then, with the bandage removed, begins his quest to save Wato from this man.
Mitsume ga Tooru (Japan) (Translated).desc:
《Mitsume ga Tooru》（翻譯為《三眼人》）改編自同名漫畫和動畫。你控制的是寫樂穗介——一個額頭上有第三隻眼、擁有可怕力量的男孩。當他的第三隻眼睜開時，這種力量就會被釋放，因此他戴著繃帶來密封他的力量並消除他真實本性的任何記憶。
遊戲中，另一個擁有強大力量的三眼人出現並襲擊了一座城市。他還綁架了寫樂的朋友和藤，而和藤卻眼睜睜地看著他無能為力。然後，撕掉繃帶的寫樂開始了從這個男人手中拯救和藤的任務。

Pizza Pop! (Japan) (Translated).name: 披薩流行！
Pizza Pop! (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
A pizza delivery guy is in love with a girl named Betty. He's going about his careless job, delivering in hopes of big tips, when something catches his eye. It's a beautiful diamond ring, and it's impossible to resist! Unfortunately, it costs $10,000 - way beyond his budget. And to make matters worse, another man named Nick has eyes for Betty. Now our hero will have to work extra, EXTRA hard to buy it and impress Betty!

In Pizza Pop!, the player fights through seven crazy neighborhoods populated by a whole host of pizza-hungry characters. The player can, however, defeat his enemies by jumping on them, or whacking them with his pizza pan. The player can also run through the level or use motor vehicles to get around, but he can't run for too long or else he'll get tired - unless he jumps while running. In addition, there are two pizza-stacking mini-games which can earn the player points and extra lives.
Pizza Pop! (Japan) (Translated).desc:
一個披薩送貨員愛上了一個名叫貝蒂的女孩。他正在粗心地做著自己的工作，希望能得到大筆小費，這時有什麼東西引起了他的注意。這是一枚美麗的鑽戒，讓人無法抗拒！不幸的是，它花費了 10,000 美元——遠遠超出了他的預算。更糟糕的是，另一個名叫尼克的男人也看上了貝蒂。現在我們的英雄必須付出額外的努力才能買到它並給貝蒂留下深刻的印象！

在《Pizza Pop!》中，玩家將在七個瘋狂的社區中戰鬥，這些社區居住著一群渴望披薩的角色。然而，玩家可以通過跳到敵人身上或用披薩盤敲擊他們來擊敗他們。玩家還可以跑過關卡或者使用機動車輛四處走動，但是他不能跑太久，否則他會累——除非他在跑的時候跳躍。此外，還有兩個堆積披薩的小遊戲，可以為玩家贏得積分和額外的生命。

Zoda's Revenge - StarTropics II (USA).name: 佐達的複仇：星際熱帶 II
Zoda's Revenge - StarTropics II (USA).original_desc: You are Mike Jones, the main character in the game. One day at Dr. Jones' office, the Oxford Wonder Word is opened and while saying the magic words; a time rift opens up and you fall in. This game is a journey through time and space, going through 8 different time shifts, and meeting some of the historical figures from the past. Your mission is to get the mystical tetrads that are located in these time periods. You run into the alien creature Zoda who is out to steal and destroy the tetrads.
Zoda's Revenge - StarTropics II (USA).desc: 你是邁克瓊斯，遊戲的主角。有一天，在瓊斯博士的辦公室，牛津奇蹟詞被打開，同時說出了神奇的話語；時間裂縫打開，你就會掉進去。這款遊戲是一次穿越時空的旅程，經歷8個不同的時空轉換，並遇見一些過去的歷史人物。你的任務是找到這些時期的神秘四分體。你遇到了外星生物佐達，他想要偷走並摧毀四分體。

Marble Madness (USA).name: 大理石瘋狂
Marble Madness (USA).original_desc: A port of the arcade game. The idea is deceptively simple: Guide a marble down a path without hitting any obstacles or straying off the course. The game is viewed from an isometric perspective, which makes it harder to stay focused on the direction the ball is to follow. There are tight corridors to follow and enemies to avoid. There is a 2-player mode in which players must race to the finish; otherwise you're racing against the clock.
Marble Madness (USA).desc: 街機遊戲的移植版。這個想法看似簡單：引導彈珠沿著路徑前進，而不會撞到任何障礙物或偏離路線。比賽是從等距視角觀看的，這使得人們更難專注於球的移動方向。有狹窄的走廊要走，有敵人要躲避。有 2 人模式，玩家必須跑到終點；否則你就是在與時間賽跑。

QIX (USA).name: QIX
QIX (USA).original_desc: In this game, you guide a marker which must draw rectangles and other weird objects in order to claim your territory, and you can either draw these rectangles fast or slow. Drawing the rectangles using the "slow" method awards you the most points. Once a rectangle has been made, it will be colored in to show that you have claimed your territory. While drawing the rectangles, you need to watch out for Qix (pronounced "kicks"), a series of colored lines that crawl the screen. In addition to Qix, you also need to avoid the Sparks who travel around the border, as well as any lines that you have made, as well as The Fuse, who travels along the line that you are drawing. Once you have claimed enough territory, you proceed to the next level.
QIX (USA).desc: 在這個遊戲中，你引導一個標記，它必須繪製矩形和其他奇怪的物體才能聲明你的領土，並且你可以快速或緩慢地繪製這些矩形。使用“慢”方法繪製矩形會給您最高分。一旦繪製了一個矩形，它就會被著色以表明你已經聲明了你的領土。在繪製矩形時，您需要注意 Qix（發音為“kicks”），這是一系列在屏幕上爬行的彩色線條。除了 Qix 之外，您還需要避開沿著邊界移動的 Sparks 以及您繪製的任何線條，以及沿著您繪製的線條移動的 The Fuse。一旦你佔領了足夠的領土，你就可以進入下一個級別。

Rygar (USA) (Rev 1).name: 背板
Rygar (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc: A hero has arrived to defeat the forces of evil in the land of Argool, and you are this hero. Do you have what it takes? This game was one of the first adventures to hit the NES and the remarkable aspect on top of this was the multiple viewpoints the games offers. When you are in an action zone, the game is a side-scrolling action game; however, then you are travelling between zones, the game takes on an overhead view that can also lead to combat situations.
Rygar (USA) (Rev 1).desc: 一位英雄已經到來，要打敗阿爾古爾土地上的邪惡勢力，而你就是這位英雄。你有能力嗎？這款遊戲是最早登陸 NES 的冒險遊戲之一，最引人注目的是遊戲提供的多種視角。當你處於動作區域時，遊戲是橫向捲軸動作遊戲；然而，當你在區域之間旅行時，遊戲會呈現俯視圖，這也可能導致戰鬥情況。

Mega Man 6 (USA).name: 洛克人 6
Mega Man 6 (USA).original_desc: In Mega Man 6, the world celebrates the first global Robot Design Contest, where hundreds of inventors present their most powerful creations. But when the mysterious sponsor, Mr. X, kidnaps the eight winning robots and declares his plan to take over the world, chaos erupts. When confronted, Mr. X shocks Mega Man by revealing that Dr. Wily was merely his puppet all along. Determined to end this threat once and for all, Mega Man sets out to battle the eight new Robot Masters — and finally face Mr. X himself.
Mega Man 6 (USA).desc: 在《洛克人 6》中，全世界慶祝了首屆全球機器人設計大賽，數百名發明家展示了他們最強大的創作。但當神秘贊助商 X 先生綁架了八個獲勝機器人並宣布他統治世界的計劃時，混亂爆發了。當面對時，X 先生透露威利博士一直只是他的傀儡，這讓《洛克人》感到震驚。決心一勞永逸地結束這一威脅，洛克人開始與八位新機器人大師作戰，並最終面對 X 先生本人。

Chronicle of the Radia War (Japan) (Tran.name: 雷迪亞戰記：靈命篇
Chronicle of the Radia War (Japan) (Tran.original_desc:
You wake up in the middle of a forest. Your head hurts. You don't remember anything: you don't know who you are, and you vaguely recall your name. A man approaches you and says his name is Darus. After realizing that you are suffering from a strange amnesia, Darus takes you to a nearby village and soon reveals to you that he is a sorcerer on a quest for revenge. You join forces, and soon become involved in a complex mystery of a kidnapped princess, the destruction of the world, and search for your own identity...

Radia Senki is set in a semi-modern, semi-medieval environment, and introduces an unusual blend between action and strategic RPG. During the pre-set (not random) battles, your party and the enemies can freely move around the battle screen. You control the main character by attacking in real time, but you can pause at any time and give a command to other party members: attack a specified enemy, be offensive in general, use a healing or other technique, pretend to be dead, etc.
Chronicle of the Radia War (Japan) (Tran.desc:
你在森林中央醒來。你的頭很痛。你什麼都不記得了：你不知道自己是誰，也隱約記得自己的名字。一個男人走近你並說他的名字是達魯斯。在意識到你患有奇怪的失憶症後，達魯斯帶你去了附近的一個村莊，並很快向你透露，他是一名尋求復仇的巫師。你們聯手，很快就捲入了一場關於公主被綁架、世界毀滅的複雜謎團，並尋找自己的身份……

《Radia Senki》以半現代、半中世紀的環境為背景，引入了動作與策略角色扮演遊戲的不同尋常的融合。在預設（非隨機）戰鬥中，你的隊伍和敵人可以在戰鬥屏幕上自由移動。你通過實時攻擊來控制主角，但你可以隨時暫停並向其他隊員發出命令：攻擊指定的敵人、總體進攻、使用治療或其他技術、裝死等。

Snake's Revenge (USA).name: 蛇的複仇
Snake's Revenge (USA).original_desc:
An unofficial sequel to the original Metal Gear for the NES. Three years has passed since the Outer Heaven incident. FOX-HOUND has gained intelligence that an unknown terrorist group has seized a remote facility containing mass-produced Metal Gear tanks, as well as a new Metal Gear prototype which was under development. The newly-promoted Lt. Solid Snake is called back into action to infiltrate the terrorists' base with the help of two FOX-HOUND rookies, former marine Nick Myer and navy intelligence agent John Turner.

The player once again assume the role of Snake. The objective is similar to the previous game, as the player must avoid any kind of visual contact (even moreso than the first game), while collecting weapons and equipment on-site. There is a greater variety of areas such as a jungle, a warehouse, a train, a couple of prisons and even a cargo ship containing the mass-produced Metal Gears. The player must also overcome new traps such as searchlights, soldiers in gyrocopters, door-sealing devices and even suicide bombers. The player must also interrogate captured enemy officers by injecting them with a truth serum to increase their rank, in addition to saving hostages like in the first game. Side-scrolling areas are also included in addition to the main overhead game, where the game takes a more action-oriented route (while still maintaining the stealth premise).
Snake's Revenge (USA).desc:
NES 版《合金裝備》的非官方續作。距離天外事件已經過去三年了。獵狐犬獲得情報稱，一個未知的恐怖組織佔領了一個偏遠設施，其中包含大量生產的《合金裝備》坦克，以及正在開發的新型《合金裝備》原型機。新晉升的索利德·斯內克中尉被召回，在兩名獵狐犬新秀——前海軍陸戰隊員尼克·邁爾和海軍情報特工約翰·特納的幫助下滲透到恐怖分子的基地。

玩家再次扮演蛇的角色。目標與前一款遊戲類似，因為玩家在現場收集武器和裝備時必須避免任何形式的視覺接觸（甚至比第一款遊戲更嚴重）。這裡有各種各樣的區域，如叢林、倉庫、火車、幾座監獄，甚至還有一艘裝有大量生產的合金裝備的貨船。玩家還必須克服新的陷阱，如探照燈、旋翼機士兵、門密封裝置，甚至自殺式炸彈襲擊者。除了像第一款遊戲中那樣拯救人質之外，玩家還必須審問被俘的敵方軍官，給他們注射吐真劑以提高他們的等級。除了主要的架空遊戲外，還包括橫向捲軸區域，遊戲採取更加以動作為導向的路線（同時仍然保持隱身前提）。

Fire Emblem Gaiden (Japan) (Translated).name: 火焰紋章外傳
Fire Emblem Gaiden (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
In a coup d'etat, a general deposes the king and it's up to a young hero, Alm, to join up with a rebel army and fight against this unjust rule.

Game takes place on battle maps in which the player moves all characters in his turn (or lets them assault/group via menu). If the characters enter close combat the display changes to a side view and the characters attacks the enemy once or multiple times (usually provoking a counter attack) for which the character receive experience points.
Fire Emblem Gaiden (Japan) (Translated).desc:
在一場政變中，一位將軍廢黜了國王，年輕的英雄阿爾姆需要加入叛軍，反抗這一不公正的統治。

遊戲發生在戰斗地圖上，玩家輪流移動所有角色（或讓他們通過菜單攻擊/分組）。如果角色進入近戰，顯示會變為側視圖，並且角色會攻擊敵人一次或多次（通常會引發反擊），角色會獲得經驗值。

Guardian Legend, The (USA).name: 薩爾達傳說 智慧的再現
Guardian Legend, The (USA).original_desc:
In the far future, Earth is a peaceful place with very few worries.  To ensure it stays that way, a top secret project was authorized: the creation of the guardian suit.  It's a suit of flight armor that allows the guardian to survive any environment.  It's a good thing too, because a giant space station is spotted on a collision course with Earth.

You take the role of the guardian.  Your mission is to activate the station's self-destruct and destroy it before it collides with Earth.  As you travel through the station NAJU, you'll find increased armor and better weapons to help you defeat waves of enemies.  You'll battle through the station in a human form and also as a jet in certain areas.
Guardian Legend, The (USA).desc:
在遙遠的未來，地球是一個沒有什麼憂慮的和平之地。為了確保這種情況保持下去，一個絕密項目被授權：創造守護者套裝。這是一套飛行裝甲，可以讓守護者在任何環境下生存。這也是一件好事，因為人們發現一個巨大的空間站正在與地球相撞。

你扮演監護人的角色。你的任務是啟動空間站的自毀裝置並在它與地球相撞之前將其摧毀。當你穿越 NAJU 空間站時，你會發現更多的盔甲和更好的武器來幫助你擊敗一波又一波的敵人。你將以人類形態在空間站中戰鬥，在某些區域也可以以噴氣式飛機的形式進行戰鬥。

Conquest of the Crystal Palace (USA).name: 征服水晶宮
Conquest of the Crystal Palace (USA).original_desc: Long ago the Crystal Palace was a thriving kingdom, however the evil war spirit Zaras appeared one day and brought destruction to the lands! The people of the Crystal Palace left as Zaras and his henchman took over, changing the kingdom into a maze of many dangers. You control Farron, the hero of the story who needs to enter the Crystal Palace and destroy the bad guys in order to restore peace. The game is an action platform game that scrolls both horizontally and vertically. On each of five stages you'll need to fight various enemies throughout the varied terrain, and finally defeat the boss at the end. You'll start with just a simple sword, but additional weapons can be found or bought in order to help you out. If you get into trouble, you can also call your dog Zap onto the screen; he'll jump around causing damage to the enemies giving you a chance to escape. You may also come across Kim's shops along your journey. Here you can buy various items, including additional  lives, replenish your health, more powerful weapons, and other useful items. To purchase items, you'll need money which can be collected after defeating enemies in battle.
Conquest of the Crystal Palace (USA).desc: 很久以前，水晶宮是一個繁榮的王國，然而邪惡的戰魂扎拉斯有一天出現，給這片土地帶來了毀滅！水晶宮的人民離開了，扎拉斯和他的追隨者接管了這個王國，把這個王國變成了一個充滿危險的迷宮。你控制故事的英雄法倫，他需要進入水晶宮並消滅壞人以恢復和平。該遊戲是一款橫向和縱向滾動的動作平台遊戲。在五個階段中的每一個階段，你都需要在不同的地形上與不同的敵人戰鬥，並最終擊敗最後的頭目。一開始你只會使用一把簡單的劍，但可以找到或購買額外的武器來幫助你。如果您遇到麻煩，您還可以在屏幕上呼叫您的狗 Zap；他會跳來跳去，對敵人造成傷害，讓你有機會逃跑。您在旅途中還可能會遇到 Kim 的商店。在這裡你可以購買各種物品，包括額外的生命、補充生命值、更強大的武器和其他有用的物品。要購買物品，您需要金錢，這些金錢可以在戰鬥中擊敗敵人後收集。

Kid Niki 2 (Japan) (Translated).original_name: Kaiketsu Yancha Maru II : Karakuri Land
Kid Niki 2 (Japan) (Translated).name: 凱傑調皮丸井：Karakuri Andd
Kid Niki 2 (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
One day, a mysterious theme park called Karakuri Land appeared in Edo. In it were various mechanical attractions, built around different themes. Many people went to visit, and the park was very popular. The princess asked Yanchamaru if he would like to go with her, but since he was busy with his training, she went by herself. However, she didn't come back, and so Yanchamaru must make his way through the oddly-aggressive attractions to find and rescue the princess!

Kaiketsu Yanchamaru 2 is the sequel to Kid Niki, and once again stars the big-headed, sword-spinning, headband-sporting fighter Yanchamaru. Each stage is based around a theme, such as a world built from cakes and a world built from volcanoes, and each is filled with animatronic enemies, with a boss at the end. Yanchamaru has his trusty spinning sword, and can also find bonus items to improve his abilities and increase his score.
Kid Niki 2 (Japan) (Translated).desc:
有一天，江戶出現了一座名為“卡拉庫裡樂園”的神秘主題公園。裡面有各種圍繞不同主題建造的機械景點。很多人去參觀，公園很受歡迎。公主問岩茶丸是否願意和她一起去，但因為他忙於訓練，她就自己去了。然而，她並沒有回來，所以岩茶丸必須穿過這些奇怪的攻擊性景點來尋找並營救公主！

《Kaiketsu Yanchamaru 2》是《Kid Niki》的續集，主角是大頭、旋轉劍、戴著頭帶的戰士 Yanchamaru。每個階段都圍繞一個主題，例如用蛋糕建造的世界和用火山建造的世界，每個階段都充滿了電子動畫敵人，最後還有一個老闆。Yanchamaru 擁有值得信賴的旋轉劍，還可以找到獎勵物品來提高他的能力並增加他的分數。

Dragon Warrior III (USA).name: 龍戰士III
Dragon Warrior III (USA).original_desc:
Dragon Warrior III is the concluding game of the first Dragon Quest/Dragon Warrior trilogy, and its story takes us back to the time period of the legendary Erdrick (also known as Loto), the ancestor of the first game's hero. You are the son of a powerful warrior Ortega, skillful in physical combat and spellcasting. Your father went out to fight the evil Baramos, who is responsible for the appearance of monsters in your region, and never returned. You are sent by the king on a quest to continue your father's brave deeds and to defeat Baramos.

Dragon Warrior III is a top-down role-playing game where you travel around the overworld, caves, castles, cities and other locations while battling random encounters, buying equipment, and talking to people. You and your party members receive experience when they beat up monsters and level up with enough experience, increasing their stats. The game features a day/night cycle - as you travel, day slowly changes to night and vice versa; shops are typically closed at night. 

You begin with control of just the main character but can quickly recruit three more members to your party. During the game you can choose to drop your current characters and recruit others at any time. The recruitable characters are divided into six classes: soldier, fighter, merchant, goof-off, pilgrim and wizard.

The game has a unique job system, giving you the ability to switch your hired characters' classes after they have achieved at least level 20 in their base class. Characters can switch to the other beginning classes, as well as the sage class, which is not available at the beginning. When a character switches classes, they lose all earned experience points, and half of their stats, but retain all of the abilities of the previous class. In this way, you can create powerful combination characters that are able to cast spells and fight effectively.
Dragon Warrior III (USA).desc:
《勇者鬥惡龍 III》是《勇者鬥惡龍》/《勇者鬥惡龍》三部曲的收官遊戲，它的故事將我們帶回到第一款遊戲英雄的祖先傳奇人物厄德里克（又名洛托）的時代。你是強大的戰士奧爾特加的兒子，擅長肉搏和施法。你的父親出去與邪惡的巴拉莫斯作戰，他是你地區怪物出現的罪魁禍首，但再也沒有回來。國王派你去延續你父親的英勇事蹟並擊敗巴拉莫斯。

Dragon Warrior III 是一款自上而下的角色扮演遊戲，您可以在世界各地、洞穴、城堡、城市和其他地點旅行，同時與隨機遭遇戰、購買裝備和與人交談。當你和你的隊伍成員打敗怪物並獲得足夠的經驗升級時，他們會獲得經驗，從而增加他們的統計數據。遊戲具有晝夜循環的特點——當你旅行時，白天慢慢地變成夜晚，反之亦然；商店通常在晚上關門。

你一開始只控制主角，但可以快速招募另外三名成員加入你的隊伍。在遊戲過程中，你可以隨時選擇放棄當前角色並招募其他角色。可招募的角色分為六類：士兵、戰士、商人、傻瓜、朝聖者和巫師。

遊戲有一個獨特的工作系統，讓你能夠在僱傭角色的基礎等級至少達到 20 級後切換他們的等級。角色可以切換到其他起始職業，以及一開始不可用的賢者職業。當角色切換職業時，他們會失去所有獲得的經驗值和一半的統計數據，但保留前一職業的所有能力。通過這種方式，你可以創造出強大的組合角色，能夠施展法術並有效地戰鬥。

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (USA).name: 忍者神龜
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (USA).original_desc:
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles on NES is an action game in which you control the famous ninja turtles Donatello, Michelangelo, Leonardo, and Raphael. You can switch between them whenever you want to take advantage of each one's weapons and characteristics and thus defeat the evil Shredder.

Gameplay takes place in two perspectives: a top-down view, which lets you run around and explore buildings, sewers and other places.
