When entering places from the top-down view, the perspective shifts to a side-scrolling view, where most of the battling takes place. In addition to each turtle's main weapon, sub-weapons (such as shuriken) can be acquired, to use at foes - these have a limited use.
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (USA).desc:
NES 上的《忍者神龜》是一款動作遊戲，您可以在其中控制著名的忍者神龜多納泰羅、米開朗基羅、萊昂納多和拉斐爾。當你想利用每個人的武器和特性時，你可以在他們之間切換，從而擊敗邪惡的粉碎機。

遊戲有兩個視角：自上而下的視角，讓你四處奔跑並探索建築物、下水道和其他地方。當從自上而下的視圖進入地點時，視角會轉變為橫向滾動視圖，大部分戰鬥都發生在橫向滾動視圖中。除了每隻烏龜的主武器外，還可以獲取副武器（例如手裡劍）來對付敵人 - 這些武器的用途有限。

Power Blade (USA).name: 動力刀片
Power Blade (USA).original_desc:
It is the year 2191, and Earth's blissful existence was governed by a master computer. Then suddenly, its master control program malfunctioned, and people panicked ensuring total chaos. Secret Agent Nova is called in to gain access to 6 security rooms, access the control center and destroy the computer in order to restore our society.

Power Blade is a platform game, in which you must run through the level, destroying various enemies, and exit through the door. However, you can't leave each sector without locating agents. By destroy enemies, you can get power-ups which restore your energy or upgrade your weapon. Occasionally, you can get a special power-up which transforms you into a Mech, which has a special attack mode and an three units of energy.

You must get through each sector before time runs out. You can leave a sector without getting the ID card and go to another sector, and come back when you're ready.
Power Blade (USA).desc:
這是 2191 年，地球的幸福存在是由一台主計算機管理的。然後突然，它的主控製程序發生故障，人們驚慌失措，一片混亂。特工 Nova 被召喚進入 6 個安全室、進入控制中心並摧毀計算機，以恢復我們的社會。

Power Blade 是一款平台遊戲，您必須跑過關卡，消滅各種敵人，然後從門出去。然而，你不能在沒有找到特工的情況下離開每個區域。通過消滅敵人，你可以獲得能量提升，恢復你的能量或升級你的武器。有時，你可以獲得特殊的能量提升，將你變成機甲，具有特殊的攻擊模式和三個單位的能量。

您必須在時間用完之前通過每個部分。您可以在沒有拿到身份證的情況下離開一個區域並前往另一個區域，準備好後再回來。

Silk Worm (USA).name: 蠶
Silk Worm (USA).original_desc:
Silkworm is a classic horizontally-scrolling shoot-em-up based on the 1988 Tecmo arcade game. The main difference between this game and many other side-scrolling shoot-em-ups is that you got to be on land as well as in the air.

Player 1 would play as a helicopter, but if a second player joined the game, they would play as a jeep. Both players would have to protect each other as well as themselves. After a certain number of kills, a "goose" helicopter would form on the screen. If the players managed to destroy it they would get a weapons powerup. This would go on throughout the entire game (a "goose" could appear even during the end of level baddie!).
Silk Worm (USA).desc:
Silkworm 是一款基於 1988 年 Tecmo 街機遊戲的經典水平滾動射擊遊戲。這款遊戲與許多其他橫向捲軸射擊遊戲的主要區別在於，你必須在陸地上和空中。

玩家 1 將扮演直升機，但如果第二個玩家加入遊戲，他們將扮演吉普車。兩名球員都必須保護彼此以及自己。擊殺一定數量後，屏幕上會形成一架“鵝”直升機。如果玩家成功摧毀它，他們將獲得武器強化。這將貫穿整個遊戲（甚至在壞人關卡結束時也可能出現一隻“鵝”！）。

Monster Party (USA).name: 怪物派對
Monster Party (USA).original_desc:
You are a young boy with a baseball bat named Mark. On your way home from a baseball game, you encounter a monster named Bert. Bert needs your help in saving his planet from the evil monsters. You learn how to fuse with Bert and become a monster fighting gargoyle. You'll spend most of the game attacking bad guys by swinging your bat at them or volleying their fire.

This is a side scrolling adventure, similar in play to Super Mario Bros., but with monsters and skulls. The game itself is infamous for its outlandish quotes.
Monster Party (USA).desc:
你是一個拿著棒球棒的小男孩，名叫馬克。在看完棒球比賽回家的路上，你遇到了一個名叫伯特的怪物。伯特需要你的幫助，從邪惡的怪物手中拯救他的星球。你學習如何與伯特融合併成為與怪物戰鬥的石像鬼。在遊戲的大部分時間裡，你都會通過向壞人揮動球棒或向他們射擊來攻擊他們。

這是一款橫向捲軸冒險遊戲，玩法與《超級馬里奧兄弟》類似，但有怪物和頭骨。遊戲本身就因其古怪的台詞而臭名昭著。

Bugs Bunny Birthday Blowout, The (USA).name: 兔八哥生日井噴
Bugs Bunny Birthday Blowout, The (USA).original_desc:
The Bugs Bunny Birthday Blowout takes place as Bugs is invited to his 50th birthday. Because some of the other Warner Bros. toons weren't invited (including Wile E. Coyote), they decided to stop Bugs from going to this party.

A Warner Bros licensed game, The Bugs Bunny Birthday Blowout is a 2d side-scrolling platform game. Bugs can jump over and on some enemies and try to collect as many carrots as possible. Bugs can use his hammer in order to smash enemies as well as to find some secrets.
Bugs Bunny Birthday Blowout, The (USA).desc:
兔八哥受邀參加他的 50 歲生日，兔八哥生日大爆發就此展開。由於華納兄弟的其他一些卡通人物沒有受到邀請（包括懷爾·狼），他們決定阻止巴格斯參加這個聚會。

《兔八哥生日井噴》是華納兄弟授權的一款 2D 橫向捲軸平台遊戲。蟲子可以跳過一些敵人並嘗試收集盡可能多的胡蘿蔔。蟲子可以使用他的錘子來粉碎敵人並找到一些秘密。

River City Ransom (USA).name: 河城贖金
River City Ransom (USA).original_desc:
The evil Slick has kidnapped Ryan's girlfriend and taken over the high school. The player is cast as either Ryan or Alex (second player) and has to fight his way through River City's merciless gangs before confronting Slick and freeing his girl. 

River City Ransom is a side-scrolling beat-em-up similar to Double Dragon. The player, or players, travel through the locations of River City, encountering various gangs along the way. Gang members can be defeated with punches and kicks, or beaten up with objects scattered around. Upon their defeat, gang members drop money which Alex and Ryan can spend in malls to buy items that restore health and improve their combat abilities. The main characters have RPG-like numerical stats that can be improved this way, and can also buy books to learn combat manoeuvres. To finish the game, the player(s) have to find and defeat all the bosses.
River City Ransom (USA).desc:
邪惡的斯利克綁架了瑞安的女朋友並接管了高中。玩家扮演瑞恩或亞歷克斯（第二個玩家），必須在河城的無情幫派中殺出一條血路，然後對抗斯利克並釋放他的女兒。

《River City Ransom》是一款類似於《雙截龍》的橫向捲軸格鬥遊戲。玩家在河城的各個地點旅行，沿途遇到各種幫派。幫派成員可以被拳打腳踢打敗，或者被散落的物體毆打。失敗後，幫派成員會扔下錢，亞歷克斯和瑞安可以在商場里花這些錢來購買恢復健康和提高戰鬥能力的物品。主角擁有類似角色扮演遊戲的數值統計數據，可以通過這種方式提高，也可以購買書籍來學習戰鬥技巧。要完成遊戲，玩家必須找到並擊敗所有老闆。

Tetris 2 (USA).name: 俄羅斯方塊2
Tetris 2 (USA).original_desc: Unlike the original Tetris, Tetris 2 has you clearing the field of blocks in a different way. Each play field starts with different colored dots (in this case black, gray and white), with one of each color flashing. The blocks are made up of the same three colors, and by matching blocks of the same color over the top or to the side of the dot will clear the dot and those blocks from the screen. If you clear a flashing dot, all the corresponding dots of the same color will be cleared. To complete the round just clear the dots, not the blocks themselves.
Tetris 2 (USA).desc: 與原版俄羅斯方塊不同，俄羅斯方塊 2 讓您以不同的方式清除方塊。每個遊戲區域都以不同顏色的點（在本例中為黑色、灰色和白色）開始，每種顏色中的一個會閃爍。這些塊由相同的三種顏色組成，通過將相同顏色的塊匹配到點的頂部或側面，可以清除屏幕上的點和這些塊。如果清除一個閃爍的點，則所有相應的相同顏色的點都將被清除。要完成這一輪，只需清除點，而不是塊本身。

Cowboy Kid (USA).name: 牛仔小子
Cowboy Kid (USA).original_desc: In this game you play the role of a young gunslinger who travels the land fighting baddies and playing mini games. The main game play involves you moving around the towns horizontally collecting gold by hitting chest whilst at the same time killing the bad guys before they kill you. There is also an RPG element to it where you have to visit people in the towns in order to proceed like at the very beginning where you need to first acquire a knife and you are then able to smash the chest and get money in order to buy a key which in turn allows you to enter the Sheriffs building. Once you are made sheriff you can go to various towns hunting down an outlaw for the bounty money. There are also mini-games such as the shooting range where you have to shoot the bad guy targets whilst avoiding shooting the innocent bystander targets.
Cowboy Kid (USA).desc: 在這個遊戲中，你扮演一個年輕的槍手，他在陸地上與壞人戰鬥並玩迷你游戲。主要遊戲玩法包括你在城鎮中水平移動，通過擊中胸部來收集黃金，同時在壞人殺死你之前殺死他們。它還有一個角色扮演元素，你必須拜訪城鎮中的人們才能繼續前進，就像一開始你需要先獲得一把刀，然後你才能砸碎箱子並獲得金錢來購買一把鑰匙，從而允許你進入警長大樓。一旦你被任命為警長，你就可以去各個城鎮追捕歹徒以獲得賞金。還有一些迷你游戲，例如射擊場，您必須射擊壞人目標，同時避免射擊無辜的旁觀者目標。

Samurai Pizza Cats (Japan) (Translated).name: Kat Jinten 與太陽一起畫畫
Samurai Pizza Cats (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
Edoropolis is home to a race of Animaloids, anthropomorphic animals which are a combination of flesh and cybernetic body parts. They are ruled by Shogun Tokugawa Lei Lei and his daughter, Tokugawa Usako. Unfortunately for them, the Prime Minister Kitsunezuka Ko'on No Kami is actively trying to depose both of them and wants to assume power by force! He's always got a plan up his sleeves, usually involving attacking the city using an army of Ninja Crows, led by Karamaru and Karasu Gennarisai (who also serves as Ko'on No Kami's advisor).

It's here where Inuyama Wanko-no-Kami, Chief of the Palace guard, steps in - by bringing in the Secret Ninja Team Nyankii! Whenever Wanko-No-Kami hears that Ko'on No Kami is plotting something, he dispatches the Nyankiis from their secret base at the Pizza Cat Restaurant so they can stop him before he is successful.

However, there are rumors that a foreign scientist called Dr. Purple is aiding Ko'on No Kami... but for what purpose? What could Ko'on No Kami be planning this time?

Kyatto Ninden Teyandee is a side-scrolling action game in the tradition of Ninja Gaiden, and it is based off the Japanese TV show produced in 1990 by Tatsunoko Productions and Sotsu agency. There are eleven stages in total, and you can play as any of the three main Secret Ninja Team Nyankii members: Yattaro, leader of the team, who uses his Cat's Eye Sword as his main weapon; Pururun, the only female on the team, who attacks with projectiles and her razor-sharp nails; and Sukashii, who uses an umbrella to dispatch his enemies.

By pausing the game, you can switch out and change places with one of the four Rescue Team members in order to use their special abilities: Rikinoshin can break boulders, Mietoru can fly for a limited time, Gotton can drill through certain walls, and Nekkii can swim easily and use water attacks. You can only use their abilities for a limited amount of time, which can be recovered by picking up items with a cat paw printed on it.

All seven playable characters have an upgradable special move, which can be used by pressing Up + B. Each move is more devastating than the last, but can only be used a certain amount of times, until the Ninpo bar is drained.
Samurai Pizza Cats (Japan) (Translated).desc:
埃多羅波利斯是類動物種族的家園，這些擬人化的動物是肉體和控制論身體部位的結合體。他們由將軍德川雷雷和他的女兒德川宇佐子統治。對他們來說不幸的是，首相狐塚公音神正積極地試圖廢黜他們兩人，並想通過武力奪取政權！他總是有一個計劃，通常包括使用由卡拉丸和卡爾土元成齋（同時也是古音神的顧問）領導的忍者烏鴉軍隊來攻擊這座城市。

正是在這裡，宮殿守衛長犬山万科神介入了——引入了秘密忍者團隊 Nyankii！每當 Wanko-No-Kami 聽說 Ko'on No Kami 正在密謀什麼事情時，他就會從披薩貓餐廳的秘密基地派遣 Nyankiis 人，這樣他們就可以在他成功之前阻止他。

然而，有傳言說，一位名叫紫博士的外國科學家正在幫助古音神……但目的是什麼？古音神這次又有何打算呢？

Kyatto Ninden Teyandee 是一款繼承忍者龍劍傳傳統的橫向捲軸動作遊戲，改編自 Tatsunoko Productions 和 Sotsu Agency 於 1990 年製作的日本電視節目。總共有十一個階段，你可以扮演秘密忍者團隊 Nyankii 的三位主要成員中的任何一個：Yattaro，團隊領導者，使用貓眼劍作為主要武器；普魯倫，團隊中唯一的女性，會用投射物和鋒利的指甲進行攻擊；還有用雨傘消滅敵人的須卡西。

通過暫停遊戲，你可以與四名救援隊成員之一交換位置，以使用他們的特殊能力：Rikinoshin可以打破巨石，Mietoru可以在有限的時間內飛行，Gotton可以鑽穿某些牆壁，而Nekkii可以輕鬆游泳並使用水攻擊。你只能在有限的時間內使用它們的能力，這可以通過拾取印有貓爪的物品來恢復。

所有七個可玩角色都有一個可升級的特殊動作，可以通過按 Up + B 來使用。每個動作都比上一個更具破壞性，但只能使用一定的次數，直到 Ninpo 條耗盡。

Castlevania II - Simon's Quest (USA).name: 惡魔城 II : 西蒙的任務
Castlevania II - Simon's Quest (USA).original_desc:
Castlevania II: Simon's Quest is the second one of three Castlevania games released on the NES. After the vampire killer Simon Belmont destroyed Count Dracula in the original Castlevania (1987), an evil curse possessed him. The only way Simon can break the count's curse is to find five of Dracula's body parts (which are mysteriously strewn throughout Transylvania) and burn them. 

Unlike most of the other Castlevania games, Simon's Quest does not feature the traditional stages but allows you to freely roam the land of Transylvania in the style of Nintendo's Metroid. In several towns Simon can talk with NPC's and buy items in shops, adding a touch of role-playing.
Castlevania II - Simon's Quest (USA).desc:
《惡魔城 II：西蒙的任務》是在 NES 上發布的三款《惡魔城》遊戲中的第二款。在原版《惡魔城》（1987 年）中，吸血鬼殺手西蒙·貝爾蒙特消滅了德古拉伯爵後，邪惡的詛咒降臨到了他身上。西蒙打破伯爵詛咒的唯一方法是找到德古拉的五個身體部位（它們神秘地散落在特蘭西瓦尼亞各地）並燒毀它們。

與大多數其他惡魔城遊戲不同，《西蒙的任務》沒有傳統的關卡，而是讓你以任天堂銀河戰士的風格在特蘭西瓦尼亞的土地上自由漫遊。在幾個城鎮中，西蒙可以與 NPC 交談並在商店購買物品，增加了角色扮演的感覺。

Batman - The Video Game (USA).name: 蝙蝠俠:電子遊戲
Batman - The Video Game (USA).original_desc:
The NES version of Batman: The Video Game is loosely based on the 1989 movie. It is a side-scrolling game with a blue-dressed Batman fighting enemies such as robots, jet-packed soldiers, ninjas, and mutants.

The game consists of five levels: Gotham City streets (with Killer Moth as the final boss), AXIS Chemical Factory (boss: Machine Intelligence System), Underground Conduit (boss: Electrocutioner), the Laboratory Ruins (boss: Dual-Container Alarm) and Gotham's Cathedral (boss: Firebug) where Batman finally faces the Joker. Before each level, a cutscene is shown using scenes from the movie.
Batman - The Video Game (USA).desc:
NES 版本的《蝙蝠俠：電子遊戲》大致是根據 1989 年的電影改編的。這是一款橫向捲軸遊戲，藍衣蝙蝠俠與機器人、噴氣士兵、忍者和變種人等敵人作戰。

遊戲由五個關卡組成：哥譚市街道（殺手蛾為最終boss）、AXIS化工廠（boss：機器智能係統）、地下管道（boss：電刑者）、實驗室廢墟（boss：雙容器警報）和哥譚大教堂（boss：螢火蟲），蝙蝠俠最終在這裡面對小丑。在每個關卡之前，都會使用電影中的場景顯示過場動畫。

Nobunaga's Ambition II (USA).name: 信長的野心 II
Nobunaga's Ambition II (USA).original_desc: Nobunaga's Ambition II is the sequel to Nobunaga's Ambition. The setting is 16th century feudal Japan, a period when ruthless daimyo (feudal lords) contended with each other for dominance. Ultimately, the winner in this struggle will become Shogun and hold actual power over the islands, while being nominally subject to the Emperor.The game casts the player as one of the daimyo, allowing them freedom to decide the fate and future of feudal Japan, through diplomacy and ultimately war. The objective is to unify Japan under the player's rule. If the player fails through death on the battlefield, assassination at the hands of a ninja, or through natural causes, they can choose a successor and play on. Functionally, the first job is to let prosper the fief (province) under the player's control through agricultural development and town investment.
Nobunaga's Ambition II (USA).desc: 《信長之野心II》是《信長之野心》的續作。故事背景是16世紀的封建日本，當時殘酷的大名（封建領主）相互爭奪統治地位。最終，這場鬥爭的勝利者將成為幕府將軍，擁有對島嶼的實際權力，同時名義上服從天皇。遊戲將玩家塑造為大名之一，讓他們可以通過外交和最終的戰爭自由決定封建日本的命運和未來。目標是在玩家的統治下統一日本。如果玩家因戰場死亡、忍者刺殺或自然原因而失敗，他們可以選擇繼承者並繼續遊戲。從功能上來說，第一個工作就是通過農業發展和城鎮投資讓玩家控制的封地（省份）繁榮起來。

DuckTales (USA).name: 迪士尼的鴨子故事
DuckTales (USA).original_desc:
Duck Tales for NES is a traditional platform game in which the player takes the role of greedy Scrooge McDuck in search of treasures around the globe. He counts on his three nephews and on other Duck Tales characters to help him in his quest through inospit places such as the Amazononic forest, the African Mines, the Himalayas, Transylvania (where he meets Dracula Duck) and even the Moon.

Each one of them reserves the old duck lots of adventure, different enemies and hidden rooms.

The game features a 2D side-scrolling platform gameplay very similar to Mega Man. Graphics are colorful and cartoonish, music remembers players of the TV series and controls are very simple.
DuckTales (USA).desc:
Duck Tales for NES 是一款傳統平台遊戲，玩家扮演貪婪的守財奴麥克老鴨，在全球範圍內尋找寶藏。他依靠他的三個侄子和《鴨子故事》中的其他角色來幫助他穿越亞馬遜森林、非洲礦井、喜馬拉雅山、特蘭西瓦尼亞（在那裡他遇到了德古拉鴨子）甚至月球等荒涼之地。

他們每一個人都為老鴨子保留了很多冒險、不同的敵人和隱藏的房間。

該遊戲採用 2D 橫向捲軸平台遊戲玩法，與《洛克人》非常相似。圖形色彩豐富且卡通化，音樂記住了電視劇的播放器，並且控制非常簡單。

Nekketsu! Street Basket - Go for it, Dun.key: Nekketsu! Street Basket - Go for it, Dunk Heroes! (Japan) (Translated)
Nekketsu! Street Basket - Go for it, Dun.original_name: Nekketsu! Street Basket : Ganbare Dunk Heroes
Nekketsu! Street Basket - Go for it, Dun.name: 熱結！街頭籃球：Ganbare Zunk 英雄
Nekketsu! Street Basket - Go for it, Dun.original_desc:
Another action/sports title in the Nekketsu High game series. Nekketsu Street Basket is exactly what it sounds like: a tournament of two-on-two "street" basketball matches all across the US featuring the characters of the Nekketsu High series.

The game uses the same base engine and graphics as the other games in the series, featuring super-deformed sprites moving across a side-scrolling stage trying to defeat the opposing team. You can pass the ball, shoot it, and attempt super dunks for added points. As with other Nekketsu games you can choose to play foul and beat the hell out of your opponents with your bare hands or any weapon you can find in the stages, and there are many other rule-bending features such as double and triple hoops that score extra points.
Nekketsu! Street Basket - Go for it, Dun.desc:
Nekketsu High 遊戲系列中的另一款動作/體育遊戲。Nekketsu Street Basket 顧名思義：一場在美國各地舉行的二對二“街頭”籃球比賽，以 Nekketsu High 系列的角色為主角。

該遊戲使用與該系列其他遊戲相同的基本引擎和圖形，具有超級變形的精靈在橫向捲軸舞台上移動，試圖擊敗對方球隊。你可以傳球、投籃，並嘗試超級扣籃來得分。與其他 Nekketsu 遊戲一樣，你可以選擇犯規，徒手或在階段中找到的任何武器擊敗對手，還有許多其他違反規則的功能，例如可以得分的雙環和三環。

Sweet Home (Japan) (Translated).name: 甜蜜之家
Sweet Home (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
"Sweet Home" follows the exploits of five members of
an investigation group: Kazuo, Akiko, Taro, Asuka, and Emi. The famous painter Mamiya Ichirou lived many years in a secluded mansion, and rumor says there are some valuable frescos to find inside. Our investigators decide to take some pictures of the frescos. However, upon entering the mansion, a ghost-like figure of Mamiya appears  and threatens them. After this, they find themselves trapped in the mansion. The heroes must now find a way out of the mansion, not forgetting the frescos they came there for, and the destiny of an earlier investigation group that has disappeared under mysterious circumstances.

"Sweet Home" is perhaps the first known example of survival horror genre, created by the same company that later made the famous  Resident Evil. However, "Sweet Home" is also a console-style RPG: characters fight random monsters in turn-based battles, equip various weapons and level up. You can (and must) form different teams from the five available characters, both for battles and for solving puzzles. Each character has his (or her) own item-based skill: Taro can take pictures, Emi can unlock almost any door, Kazuo has a lighter, Akiko uses a vacuum cleaner to remove dust and other obstacles, and Asuka has medical kits.

The game was never released outside of Japan.
Sweet Home (Japan) (Translated).desc:
《甜蜜之家》講述了五名成員的功績
調查組：一夫、明子、太郎、明日香、惠美。著名畫家間宮一郎在一座僻靜的宅邸裡生活了很多年，據說裡面有一些珍貴的壁畫。我們的調查員決定給壁畫拍一些照片。然而，進入宅邸後，間宮的幽靈般的身影出現並威脅他們。此後，他們發現自己被困在豪宅里。英雄們現在必須找到離開宅邸的出路，不要忘記他們來這裡尋找的壁畫，以及在神秘情況下消失的早期調查小組的命運。

《甜蜜之家》也許是已知的第一個生存恐怖類型的例子，它是由後來製作了著名的《生化危機》的同一家公司製作的。然而，《甜蜜之家》也是一款主機風格的角色扮演遊戲：角色在回合製戰鬥中與隨機怪物戰鬥，裝備各種武器併升級。您可以（並且必須）從五個可用角色中組建不同的團隊，以進行戰鬥和解決謎題。每個角色都有自己的基於物品的技能：太郎可以拍照，惠美可以打開幾乎所有的門，一夫有打火機，明子使用吸塵器清除灰塵和其他障礙物，明日香有醫療包。

該遊戲從未在日本以外地區發行。

Power Blade 2 (USA).name: 動力刀片2
Power Blade 2 (USA).original_desc:
Christmas Eve, 2200.

The Delta Foundation has just finished the development of a cyborg unit which represents a new generation of fighting robots. They want to sell it to the government's department of defense as it would pose a threat to the security of the nation if it is sold to a foreign country. They have asked the president, who is actually an alien from outer space, to consider their offer and respond in one week. The government takes this matter very seriously, and assigns Nova to destroy the Delta Foundation. Unfortunately, the government cannot be involved in the event that something might happen to him.

Power Blade 2 has six stages which involves you running through the level, while killing off enemies and avoiding hazards. At the start, you can choose which stage to start at, but unlike Power Blade, once you have chosen a stage, you can't exit and choose another one until you have completed the current one first. Nearly each stage involves you using your wits, as you dodge spikes, jumping towards the top of the screen to avoid fire, and getting fans to lift you onto platforms. You can also slide your way through tight spots, as long as you slide in the right place.

At the end of each stage, you fight a different boss. However, in the end, you must fight all the bosses you fought before before you get to fight the alien leader.
Power Blade 2 (USA).desc:
2200 年平安夜。

三角洲基金會剛剛完成了代表新一代戰鬥機器人的機器人單元的開發。他們想把它賣給政府國防部，因為如果賣給外國，就會對國家安全構成威脅。他們要求總統（實際上是來自外太空的外星人）考慮他們的提議並在一周內做出回應。政府非常重視此事，並指派諾瓦去摧毀三角洲基金會。不幸的是，如果他發生什麼事，政府無法介入。

Power Blade 2 有六個階段，您需要在關卡中奔跑，同時殺死敵人並避免危險。一開始，你可以選擇從哪個階段開始，但與《Power Blade》不同的是，一旦你選擇了一個階段，你就不能退出並選擇另一個階段，直到你先完成當前階段。幾乎每個階段都需要你運用你的智慧，躲避尖刺，跳向屏幕頂部以避免火災，並讓粉絲將你提升到平台上。您還可以滑過狹窄的地方，只要滑到正確的位置即可。

在每個階段結束時，你都會與不同的老闆戰鬥。然而，最終，你必須先與之前打過的所有 Boss 戰鬥，然後才能與外星人首領戰鬥。

Fire 'n Ice (USA).name: 火與冰
Fire 'n Ice (USA).original_desc: The peaceful island Coolmint is attacked by flame monsters sent by the evil wizard Druidle. The queen of the winter fairies chooses the novice wizard Dana to drive back the monsters. Fire 'n Ice is a puzzle game where the goal is to extinguish all flames by pushing or dropping blocks onto them. You can create or destroy ice blocks, climb blocks and push loose blocks. Ice is created diagonally in the direction faced, if there is already an ice block there, it will be destroyed. However, ice blocks cannot be created on a spot that is already occupied by a flame, so you have to find a way to create ice blocks next to or above a flame so that they can be pushed or dropped onto it. If an ice block is created next to another object or wall it will stick to it, meaning it can't be moved and won't fall down. So it's possible to create ice bridges to get over chasms. When a loose ice block is pushed, it slides above the ground until it hits another object. Rocks can also be used but they are indestructible and only move one space when pushed (unless on icy surface).
Fire 'n Ice (USA).desc: 和平的酷薄荷島遭到邪惡巫師德魯伊德爾派出的火焰怪物的攻擊。冬日仙女女王選擇新手巫師達納來擊退怪物。Fire 'n Ice 是一款益智遊戲，目標是通過推或扔方塊來撲滅所有火焰。您可以創建或摧毀冰塊、攀爬冰塊以及推動鬆散的冰塊。冰是在所面對的方向對角地產生的，如果那裡已經有冰塊，它就會被破壞。然而，冰塊不能在已經被火焰佔據的地方創建，所以你必須找到一種方法在火焰旁邊或上方創建冰塊，以便可以將它們推或扔到火焰上。如果在另一個物體或牆壁旁邊創建冰塊，它會粘在上面，這意味著它無法移動也不會掉落。因此，建造冰橋來跨越鴻溝是可能的。當推動鬆散的冰塊時，它會在地面上滑動，直到撞到另一個物體。也可以使用岩石，但它們堅不可摧，並且在推動時只能移動一格（除非在冰冷的表面上）。

Noah's Ark (Europe).name: 諾亞方舟
Noah's Ark (Europe).original_desc:
Noah has been commanded by God to put two of each animal aboard his ark to save them from the flood. However unhappy people from around the world have captured different animal species, preventing Noah from doing his job. Noah will need to visit these different locations and free the animals from the people holding them captive.

Noah's Ark is a side scrolling action game. The player, as Noah, must choose which level from several world locations to play. Once in a level, Noah can move left right, duck, jump and fire pellets directly in front of him. These pellets can be used to defeat enemy creatures and uncover hidden items. At the end of each level, Noah will encounter a stronger enemy creature who must be defeated. Noah's ultimate goal is to rescue the designated captive animals listed for each level.
Noah's Ark (Europe).desc:
上帝命令諾亞將每種動物中的兩隻放入他的方舟，以將它們從洪水中拯救出來。然而，來自世界各地的不滿的人們捕獲了不同的動物物種，阻止了諾亞完成他的工作。諾亞需要訪問這些不同的地點，並將動物從圈養牠們的人手中解救出來。

諾亞方舟是一款橫向捲軸動作遊戲。玩家作為諾亞，必須從多個世界地點中選擇要玩的關卡。一旦進入一個關卡，諾亞就可以左右移動、躲避、跳躍並直接在他面前發射彈丸。這些顆粒可用於擊敗敵方生物並發現隱藏的物品。在每個關卡結束時，諾亞都會遇到一個更強大的敵方生物，必須將其擊敗。諾亞的最終目標是拯救每個級別列出的指定圈養動物。

Crisis Force (Japan) (Translated).name: 危機力量
Crisis Force (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
The year is 199x and a robot army has invaded Tokyo City. A boy and a girl board their ships to fight off the threat.

This is a vertical scrolling shoot-em-up game viewed from overhead, where the player pilots a fighter ship through seven levels of intense shooting action. Each level hurls enemies and bullets at the player's ship, ending with a boss fight, except for one which instead is a boss rush level. The game allows for two players to play at the same time.

The player has a choice of two weapons; bullets or lasers. Weapons can be changed by picking up gems of different colors. Picking up the same color as you already have allows you to upgrade your current weapon a few times. The player's ship can change form and with it the way that the weapons work. This allows the player to pick the best weapon strategy for each situation. The player also has a limited amount of bombs that are useful to get out of tricky situations.

When a weapon is upgraded it also acts as a shield so the ship can take an enemy bullet without dying. This will however degrade the weapon down to the first level again. There are also pickups that alter the ship's speed and a special gem that, if five of them are collected, temporarily transforms the ship into an invincible super ship.
Crisis Force (Japan) (Translated).desc:
199x 年，一支機器人軍隊入侵了東京市。一個男孩和一個女孩登上了他們的船來對抗威脅。

這是一款從頭頂觀看的垂直捲軸射擊遊戲，玩家駕駛戰鬥機經曆七個關卡的激烈射擊動作。每個關卡都會向玩家的飛船投擲敵人和子彈，並以 Boss 戰結束，除了 Boss 衝刺關卡之外。該遊戲允許兩名玩家同時玩。

玩家可以選擇兩種武器；子彈或激光。武器可以通過拾取不同顏色的寶石來改變。選擇與您已有的顏色相同的顏色可以讓您多次升級當前的武器。玩家的飛船可以改變形狀以及武器的工作方式。這使得玩家可以針對每種情況選擇最佳的武器策略。玩家還擁有數量有限的炸彈，可用於擺脫棘手的情況。

當武器升級後，它還可以充當盾牌，這樣飛船就可以承受敵人的子彈而不會死亡。然而，這會將武器再次降級到第一級。還有一些可以改變船速的拾取物和一個特殊的寶石，如果收集到五個，可以暫時將船變成無敵的超級船。

Cocoron (Japan) (Translated).name: 科科隆
Cocoron (Japan) (Translated).original_desc: Tapir, an enigmatic blue wizard in spotted pajamas from the Dream World, sends the player on a quest to rescue princess Rua. But things quickly become more complicated and the player soon has to rescue other characters along the way, such as Santa Claus, the king of Trump castle and the blue fairy Cocoron. Tapir can manipulate people's dreams and this ability gives Cocoron an unique twist - the player can assemble his own character by combining one of the eight available heads to one of the eight available bodies (which both include several designs to choose from, resulting in literally hundreds of combinations! ). More than a mere physical appearance, each part also defines the character's attributes, such as his health, speed, how high he can jump and so forth.
Cocoron (Japan) (Translated).desc: 貘是一位來自夢幻世界、穿著斑點睡衣的神秘藍色巫師，他派玩家去營救魯阿公主。但事情很快變得更加複雜，玩家很快就必須拯救沿途的其他角色，例如聖誕老人、特朗普城堡的國王和藍色仙女可科隆。貘可以操縱人們的夢境，這種能力給 Cocoron 帶來了獨特的變化 - 玩家可以通過將八個可用頭部之一與八個可用身體之一（兩者都包括多種設計可供選擇，從而產生數百種組合！）來組裝自己的角色。每個部分不僅僅是物理外觀，還定義了角色的屬性，例如他的健康狀況、速度、他能跳多高等等。

Ring King (USA).name: 指环王：护戒使者
Ring King (USA).original_desc: Ring King is a port of an arcade game by the same name. Box your way from the lowest ranks up through the circuits, on your way to become world champion. Build your fighter up in training mode, or take on another player's boxer in a 2-player battle.
Ring King (USA).desc: 《Ring King》是一款同名街機遊戲的移植版。從最低級別到巡迴賽，一路拳擊，成為世界冠軍。在訓練模式中培養你的拳擊手，或在兩人對戰中與其他玩家的拳擊手較量。

Donkey Kong Classics (USA, Europe).name: 大金剛經典
Donkey Kong Classics (USA, Europe).original_desc: Donkey Kong Classics features both the original Donkey Kong and Donkey Kong Jr. on a single cartridge. In Donkey Kong, you need to guide Mario safely up the scaffolding to rescue his girlfriend, Pauline. In Donkey Kong Jr., the roles are reversed; you control Jr. who needs to rescue his father, who has been captured by Mario.
Donkey Kong Classics (USA, Europe).desc: 《Donkey Kong Classics》在一個卡帶上同時包含原版 Donkey Kong 和 Donkey Kong Jr.。在《大金剛》中，你需要引導馬里奧安全地爬上腳手架，營救他的女朋友波琳。在《大金剛》中，角色互換了。你控制Jr.，他需要營救被馬里奧抓獲的父親。

Ninja Gaiden (USA).name: 忍者龍劍傳
Ninja Gaiden (USA).original_desc:
Ninja Gaiden begins with a cinematic animation in which 2 ninjas duel to the death; one goes down. It is revealed that the doomed ninja is the father of Ryu Hayabusa. When Ryu learns of this, he embarks on a quest to find out who killed his father and why. This quest takes him to America to find an archaeologist with whom Ryu's father was working. From there, Ryu becomes embroiled in an evil, supernatural conspiracy involving a villain named Jaquio who has plans to use an ancient castle and some relics to unleash a terrifying evil upon the world.

Ninja Gaiden is a side scrolling game where Ryu the ninja can run, jump, and slash with his ninja sword. He can also attach to any vertical surface. Powerups are littered throughout the landscape that allow Ryu to toss fireballs and ninja stars, and perform other feats.
Ninja Gaiden (USA).desc:
《忍者龍劍傳》以電影動畫開始，其中 2 位忍者決鬥至死；一個掉下來。據透露，這位注定失敗的忍者是隼龍的父親。當 Ryu 得知此事後，他開始調查是誰殺了他的父親以及原因。這個任務讓他前往美國尋找一位與 Ryu 的父親一起工作的考古學家。從那時起，Ryu 捲入了一個邪惡的超自然陰謀，其中涉及一個名叫 Jaquio 的惡棍，他計劃利用一座古老的城堡和一些文物向世界釋放可怕的邪惡。

《忍者龍劍傳》是一款橫向捲軸遊戲，忍者龍可以奔跑、跳躍，並用他的忍者劍砍殺。他還可以附著在任何垂直表面上。整個場景中散佈著能量提昇道具，讓 Ryu 可以投擲火球和忍者之星，並執行其他壯舉。

Double Dragon (USA).name: 雙龍
Double Dragon (USA).original_desc:
Set in a post-apocalyptic New York, Double Dragon is the story of Billy and Jimmy Lee, twin brothers trained in the fighting style of Sou-Setsu-Ken. Together, they manage a small martial arts training school, teaching their students in self-defense. One day, Billy's girlfriend, Marian, is kidnapped off the street by the "Black Warriors", a savage street gang led by a man named Willy. The Black Warriors demand the Lee brothers disclose their martial arts secrets in exchange for Marian's freedom. The Lee brothers set out on a rescue mission to crush the Black Warriors and save Marian.

Using whatever techniques they have at their disposal, from the basic punches and kicks to the invulnerable elbow strike, as well any weapon that comes into their hands, the Lee brothers must pursue the gang through the city slum, industrial area and the forest before reaching their hideout to confront the big boss, Willy.
Double Dragon (USA).desc:
《雙截龍》以後世界末日的紐約為背景，講述了比利·李和吉米·李這對雙胞胎兄弟接受雙節劍格鬥風格訓練的故事。他們共同管理著一家小型武術培訓學校，教授學生自衛術。有一天，比利的女朋友瑪麗安在街上被“黑武士”綁架，“黑武士”是一個名叫威利的男子領導的野蠻街頭幫派。黑武士要求李氏兄弟公開他們的武術秘密，以換取瑪麗安的自由。李兄弟出發執行救援任務，粉碎黑武士並拯救瑪麗安。

李氏兄弟必須使用他們所掌握的一切技術，從基本的拳打腳踢到刀槍不入的肘擊，以及他們手中的任何武器，必須追擊該團伙，穿過城市貧民窟、工業區和森林，然後到達他們的藏身處，與大佬威利對峙。

Town & Country Surf Designs - Wood & Wat.key: Town & Country Surf Designs - Wood & Water Rage (USA)
Town & Country Surf Designs - Wood & Wat.original_name: Town & Country Surf Designs : Wood & Water Rage
Town & Country Surf Designs - Wood & Wat.name: 城鎮和鄉村衝浪設計：Wood & Water Rage
Town & Country Surf Designs - Wood & Wat.original_desc: T&C Surf Designs features both skateboarding and surfing games. The skating section (called Street Skate Session) is a side scrolling action game where you need to navigate through an obstacle course within the given time limit. Ideally you want to earn as many points as possible by performing tricks, jumping over items, and collecting bonuses. If you crash too many times (or fall into a hole, run out of time, etc...) then the game will be over. In the surfing section (called Big Wave Encounter) you need to surf a giant wave all the way to the beach. As with skating, you can earn points by performing tricks and collecting bonuses; likewise the game ends if you crash too many times. You can choose to play either game individually, or alternate between the two (the Wood & Water Rage option). You can select several T&C Surf Designs characters to play as, including Thrilla Gorilla, Kool Kat, Joe Cool, and Tiki Man.
Town & Country Surf Designs - Wood & Wat.desc: T&C Surf Designs 提供滑板和衝浪遊戲。滑冰部分（稱為 Street Skate Session）是一款橫向捲軸動作遊戲，您需要在給定的時間限制內穿過障礙賽道。理想情況下，您希望通過表演技巧、跳過物品和收集獎金來賺取盡可能多的積分。如果你崩潰太多次（或者掉進洞裡，時間用完等等......）那麼遊戲就會結束。在衝浪部分（稱為“巨浪遭遇”），您需要一路衝浪到海灘。與滑冰一樣，您可以通過表演技巧和收集獎金來賺取積分；同樣，如果你崩潰太多次，遊戲就會結束。您可以選擇單獨玩其中一個遊戲，也可以在兩者之間交替玩（木水狂暴選項）。您可以選擇多個 T&C Surf Designs 角色來扮演，包括 Thrilla Gorilla、Kool Kat、Joe Cool 和 Tiki Man。

Banana Prince (Germany) (Translated).name: 香蕉王子
Banana Prince (Germany) (Translated).original_desc:
In the great Banana kingdom, the Banana nation possesses a great symbol of prosperity - a big banana. One day, the Prince is engaged in a conversation with the Dragonmaster, when the evil Paprika Dragon flies over, saying "quack, quack!", and... oh horror - steals the holy banana! The Dragonmaster is desperate. "Fear not", - says the Prince, - "for I shall embark on the perilous journey and return our dearest possession to the folk". And that is exactly what he does!

"Banana Prince" in an action platformer. You travel between locations on the world map in a linear fashion, entering various platform levels - forests, caves, towers, etc. The Prince will find various weapons during his journey and use them to take care of the numerous enemies. You can also collect rings scattered everywhere and use them as currency in shops, where you can acquire various items.
Banana Prince (Germany) (Translated).desc:
在偉大的香蕉王國里，香蕉民族擁有一個偉大的繁榮象徵——大香蕉。有一天，王子正在與龍王交談，邪惡的辣椒龍飛了過來，嘴裡喊著“嘎嘎，嘎嘎！”，然後……哦，恐怖——偷走了聖香蕉！龍王絕望了。王子說：“不要害怕，因為我將踏上危險的旅程，把我們最珍貴的財產歸還給人民”。而這正是他所做的！

動作平台遊戲中的“香蕉王子”。你以線性方式在世界地圖上的各個地點之間旅行，進入不同的平台關卡——森林、洞穴、塔樓等。王子會在旅途中找到各種武器，並用它們來對付眾多的敵人。您還可以收集散落各處的戒指，並將其用作商店中的貨幣，在那裡您可以購買各種物品。

Contra (USA).name: 魂斗羅
Contra (USA).original_desc:
In the year 2631, a small meteorite has fallen into the Galuga archipelago, located 20km northeast off the coast of New Zealand. Two years later, a terrorist group known as Red Falcon has seized the island in preparation for an alien invasion. The earth's marines sent two members of their elite Contra unit, Bill Rizer and Lance Bean, to neutralize the terrorists.

As either, Bill (player 1) or Lance (player 2), the player must get to the end of each stage, shooting everything in sight, while avoiding enemy fire themselves. The player can upgrade their standard-issue rifle into one of four different weapons, including the powerful spread shot.
Contra (USA).desc:
2631年，一顆小隕石落入位於新西蘭海岸東北20公里處的加盧加群島。兩年後，一個名為“紅隼”的恐怖組織佔領了該島，為外星人入侵做準備。地球海軍陸戰隊派出了兩名精銳的反政府武裝成員比爾·里澤和蘭斯·比恩前去鎮壓恐怖分子。

無論是比爾（玩家 1）還是蘭斯（玩家 2），玩家都必須到達每個階段的末尾，射擊視線中的一切，同時避免敵人的火力。玩家可以將他們的標準步槍升級為四種不同武器之一，包括強大的散彈。

Crystalis (USA).name: 水晶
Crystalis (USA).original_desc:
October 1st, 1997 is known as END DAY. A great war encircles the globe and brings about an end to civilization. The surviving humans concluded that they could never repeat their mistakes and build a great tower in the sky to watch over the world and act accordingly to combat "evil". One hundred years have passed since then and a hidden cryogenic chamber in the mountains springs to life...

Crystalis is a top-down action RPG. Starting from the cryogenic chamber, the player takes the role of a mysterious hero who must uncover the mystery of the tower. He will meet up with the four wise people and learn their magic, while also obtaining the four elemental swords which will help him progress.
Crystalis (USA).desc:
1997 年 10 月 1 日被稱為“END DAY”。一場席捲全球的大戰導致了文明的終結。倖存的人類得出結論，他們永遠不能重蹈覆轍，在天空中建造一座巨大的塔來監視世界，並採取相應的行動來對抗“邪惡”。一百年過去了，山中隱藏的低溫室突然復活了……

Crystalis 是一款自上而下的動作角色扮演遊戲。從低溫室開始，玩家扮演一位神秘英雄，必須揭開塔樓的謎團。他將與四位智者會面並學習他們的魔法，同時還將獲得四把元素劍，這將有助於他的進步。

Lone Ranger, The (USA).name: 獨行俠
Lone Ranger, The (USA).original_desc:
In the early 1880's in Texas, a man has returned to bring  justice to the outlaw who murdered his brother and his former comrades, the Texas Rangers. His name is the Lone Ranger. The outlaw, whose name is Butch Cavendish, has now kidnapped the President. The time has come for the masked man to begin his journey of adventure for the purpose of safely rescuing the President and avenging the deaths of his brother and former comrades.

The game takes you through 8 western-themed regions, each 
with a different objective, all of which brings you closer to your nemesis, Butch Cavendish. The game features many points of view during gameplay. Most of the time, the game is played from a top-down perspective, as you travel through the country and walk through towns. At other times, the game switches to a side scrolling view when you are in a boss stage. On occasion, the view switches to a first person perspective and plays similar to a first person shooter.

Each bad guy you kill is worth money. You can use money to buy more bullets, dynamite, rifles or a patch up from a doctor. For example, you start with a short barreled gun which you can upgrade to either a medium or long barreled gun. Your gun shoots standard bullets but can also fire silver bullets which are stronger than the standard ones.
Lone Ranger, The (USA).desc:
1880 年代初，德克薩斯州一名男子回來將殺害他兄弟和前戰友德克薩斯遊騎兵隊的歹徒繩之以法。他的名字叫獨行俠。這個歹徒名叫布奇·卡文迪什，現已綁架了總統。為了安全營救總統並為死去的兄弟和前戰友報仇，蒙面人開始了他的冒險之旅。

遊戲將帶你穿越8個西部主題區域，每個區域
有著不同的目標，所有這些都讓你更接近你的宿敵布奇·卡文迪什。該遊戲在遊戲過程中具有許多觀點。大多數時候，當你穿越鄉村並穿過城鎮時，遊戲是從自上而下的角度進行的。有時，當您處於 Boss 階段時，遊戲會切換到側面滾動視圖。有時，視圖會切換到第一人稱視角，並且玩法類似於第一人稱射擊遊戲。

你殺死的每個壞人都值錢。你可以用錢從醫生那裡購買更多的子彈、炸藥、步槍或補丁。例如，您從短管槍開始，您可以將其升級為中型或長管槍。你的槍可以發射標準子彈，但也可以發射比標準子彈更強的銀子彈。

Gradius (USA).name: 步步
Gradius (USA).original_desc: The people of Gradius are in trouble. The ameoboid Bacterions have launched an all out attack against the planet, and it's up to you to fly into battle and save them. Along the way you'll be able to power up your ship with hyper speed, force fields, lasers, missiles, double beam cannons and more to help you battle. Based on the arcade game, Gradius is a side scrolling shooter. Shooting certain enemies will leave a power up pod behind which can be collected to add more power to your ship. Each level features a wide variety of enemies trying to stop you, with a large boss at the end. Gameplay is for one player or two players alternating.
Gradius (USA).desc: 格拉迪烏斯的人民有麻煩了。變形蟲細菌對地球發起了全面攻擊，你需要飛入戰鬥並拯救它們。一路上，你將能夠用超高速、力場、激光、導彈、雙光束加農炮等來增強你的飛船，以幫助你戰鬥。《Gradius》基於街機遊戲，是一款橫向捲軸射擊遊戲。射擊某些敵人會留下一個能量提升艙，可以收集它來為你的飛船增加更多能量。每個關卡都有各種各樣的敵人試圖阻止你，最後還有一個大老闆。遊戲玩法可供一名玩家或兩名玩家交替進行。

Ultima - Quest of the Avatar (USA).name: 創世紀:阿凡達的探索
Ultima - Quest of the Avatar (USA).original_desc: Following the defeat of the evil triad in the previous three Ultima games, the world of Sosaria changed beyond recognition: continents rose and sank, and new cities were built, heralding the advent of a different civilization. Unified by the reign of the benevolent monarch Lord British, the new world was renamed Britannia. Lord British wished to base people's well-being on the ethical principles of Truth, Love, and Courage, proclaiming the Eight Virtues (Honesty, Compassion, Valor, Justice, Sacrifice, Honor, Spirituality, and Humility) as the ideal everyone should strive for. The person who could accomplish full understanding and realization of these virtues would serve as a spiritual leader and a moral example for the inhabitants of Britannia; he alone would be able to obtain holy artifacts, descend into the Stygian Abyss, and access the Codex of Ultimate Wisdom. This person is the Avatar.
Ultima - Quest of the Avatar (USA).desc: 在前三屆《Ultima》遊戲中擊敗邪惡三合會之後，索薩利亞的世界發生了面目全非的變化：大陸升起又沉沒，新的城市拔地而起，預示著另一種文明的到來。在仁政君主不列顛勳爵的統治下統一，新世界更名為不列顛尼亞。英國勳爵希望將人們的福祉建立在真理、愛和勇氣的道德原則之上，宣稱八種美德（誠實、同情、勇敢、正義、犧牲、榮譽、靈性和謙遜）是每個人都應該努力追求的理想。能夠充分理解和實現這些美德的人將成為不列顛尼亞居民的精神領袖和道德榜樣；他一個人就能獲得聖器，深入冥淵，獲得終極智慧法典。這個人就是阿凡達。

G.original_name: G.I. Joe : A Real American Hero
G.name: 特種兵喬：真正的美國英雄
G.original_desc:
G.I Joe is a side-scrolling action game where you can select 3 out of a possible 5 characters to complete a mission. 

Each level is in three main parts:  The fight into the mission zone, the mission zone, and the escape from the mission zone.  The stages where you fight into and escape from the mission zone are straightforward action – just fight your way to the end of the stage, and defeat the stage boss.

The actual mission zone is a maze, where the object is to place bombs at pre-determined locations, then find and use the exit.  The mazes start out easy with the first one being only two screens high and 4 long.  Level 6 is 7 by 8 for a total of 56 screens.

Characters:

Duke (Tiger Force first sergeant/squad leader), Rock & Roll (gatling gunner), Capt. Grid-Iron (hand-to-hand combat specialist), Blizzard (arctic attack soldier), Snake Eyes (commando)
G.desc:
G.I Joe 是一款橫向捲軸動作遊戲，您可以從 5 個可能的角色中選擇 3 個來完成任務。

每個關卡分為三個主要部分：進入任務區、任務區和逃離任務區。你進入和逃離任務區的階段都是簡單的動作——只需一路戰鬥到階段的盡頭，並擊敗階段的老闆。

實際的任務區域是一個迷宮，目標是在預先確定的位置放置炸彈，然後找到並使用出口。迷宮一開始很簡單，第一個迷宮只有兩個屏幕高和 4 個屏幕長。6 層為 7 x 8，共有 56 個屏幕。

人物：

Duke（猛虎部隊第一軍士/班長）、Rock & Roll（加特林砲手）、Capt. Grid-Iron（肉搏戰專家）、Blizzard（北極攻擊士兵）、Snake Eyes（突擊隊）

Blaster Master (USA).name: 爆破大師
Blaster Master (USA).original_desc: The classic story of a boy and his frog who runs away, becomes radioactive and jumps into a hole. More importantly however, it's the story about a boy who finds a fully functional battletank, SOFIA the 3rd, and goes adventuring around the underground. His mission... to find new weapons and add-on parts to the battletank which will in turn allow him to explore more areas until eventually he finds that freedom-loving mutant frog. And while he's down there he might as well defeat the Evil Plutonium Boss who wishes to threaten the Earth.
Blaster Master (USA).desc: 這是一個經典的故事，講述了一個男孩和他的青蛙逃跑後變得帶有放射性並跳進洞裡的故事。然而更重要的是，這是一個關於一個男孩找到一輛功能齊全的主戰坦克“索菲亞三號”並在地下冒險的故事。他的任務是……為戰車尋找新武器和附加部件，這將使他能夠探索更多區域，直到最終找到那隻熱愛自由的突變青蛙。當他在那裡時，他還可以擊敗想要威脅地球的邪惡钚老大。

Gun Nac (USA).name: 岡納克
Gun Nac (USA).original_desc:
A Galactic Federation starfighter is sent off to destroy an alien armada (led by giant robotic rabbits this time around -- an unusually whimsical theme in keeping with the contemporary Parodius) threatening to collapse your system's sun into a supernova.

Gun-Nac is a top down shooter in which the player controls the Federation starfighter. Power ups and genre mechanics are as could be expected from a "shmup".  now with collectible money that allows you to shop for different weapons and bombs to complement your standard main gun in the inter-level weapons market. Directional weapons, attachments and up to four bomb types can also be bought to increase your survival chances, further aided by player control over the speed at which your ship moves through the levels. Single player only.
Gun Nac (USA).desc:
一架銀河聯邦星際戰鬥機被派去摧毀一支外星艦隊（這次由巨型機器兔子領導——這是一個與當代 Parodius 一致的異想天開的主題），威脅要將你們系統的太陽塌陷成超新星。

Gun-Nac 是一款自上而下的射擊遊戲，玩家控制聯邦星際戰鬥機。能量提升和類型機制正如“shmup”中所期望的那樣。現在有了可收藏的錢，您可以購買不同的武器和炸彈，以補充您在級間武器市場上的標準主槍。還可以購買定向武器、附件和最多四種炸彈類型來增加你的生存機會，並通過玩家控制你的飛船在關卡中移動的速度來進一步幫助你。僅限單人遊戲。

Wai Wai World 2 - SOS!! Parsley Castle (.key: Wai Wai World 2 - SOS!! Parsley Castle (Japan) (Translated)
Wai Wai World 2 - SOS!! Parsley Castle (.original_name: Wai Wai World 2 : SOS!! Paseri Jou
Wai Wai World 2 - SOS!! Parsley Castle (.name: 歪歪世界2：SOS！ ！帕塞里·朱
Wai Wai World 2 - SOS!! Parsley Castle (.original_desc:
Wai Wai World 2: SOS!! Parsley Jō, lit. "Wai Wai World 2: SOS!! Parsley Castle" is a 1991 Famicom platform game released only in Japan by Konami. It is a sequel to Konami Wai Wai World, and stars various Konami characters.

The player begins the game by choosing one of four character groups which consist of three different Konami characters. Most of the levels are spoofs of various different levels from Konami games. The gameplay is mostly like a straightforward platform game, similar to Contra. In these levels you start off with the main character Rickle (or Rikkuru), who by collecting a special power-up, can transform temporarily into one of the three different characters the player chose at the beginning of the game. There are also space shooter, driving, and puzzle levels. After certain levels you can choose different paths which consist of different stages.
Wai Wai World 2 - SOS!! Parsley Castle (.desc:
歪歪世界2：SOS！ ！歐芹喬，點燃。《Wai Wai World 2: SOS!! Parsley Castle》是一款 1991 年由 Konami 僅在日本發行的 Famicom 平台遊戲。它是《Konami Wai Wai World》的續集，由多個 Konami 角色主演。

玩家通過選擇由三個不同的 Konami 角色組成的四個角色組之一開始遊戲。大多數關卡都是對 Konami 遊戲中各種不同關卡的惡搞。遊戲玩法大多像一個簡單的平台遊戲，類似於魂斗羅。在這些關卡中，你從主角 Rickle（或 Rikkuru）開始，他通過收集特殊的能量提升，可以暫時轉變為玩家在遊戲開始時選擇的三個不同角色之一。還有太空射擊、駕駛和解謎關卡。在達到一定級別後，您可以選擇由不同階段組成的不同路徑。

Astyanax (USA).name: 阿斯蒂亞納克斯
Astyanax (USA).original_desc:
You are Astyanax, a sixteen year old boy that has the same dream night after night: A princess, calling for help. One afternoon, you are summoned to the world of Remlia by Cutie, a pixie, to save the realm's princess. You are the chosen one mentioned by their prophecies!

Astyanax is the English localization of The Lord of King. It's an ambitiously cinematic dark fantasy adventure. Along the way you'll find powerups that will make you stronger, and upgrade your weapon; and you can also unleash magical attacks that hit all enemies on the screen. As Astyanax, together with Cutie, you must save Princess Rosebud and the realm from Blackhorn's evil horde!
Astyanax (USA).desc:
你是 Astyanax，一個十六歲的男孩，夜復一夜都有同一個夢想：一位公主，正在呼救。一天下午，你被小精靈庫蒂召喚到雷姆利亞世界，去拯救王國的公主。你就是他們預言中提到的被選中的人！

Astyanax 是《The Lord of King》的英文本地化版本。這是一場雄心勃勃的電影黑暗奇幻冒險。一路上你會發現能讓你變得更強大的力量，併升級你的武器；你還可以釋放魔法攻擊，攻擊屏幕上的所有敵人。作為阿斯提亞納克斯，你必須與可愛的小可愛一起，從黑角的邪惡部落手中拯救玫瑰花蕾公主和王國！

Side Pocket (USA).name: 側袋
Side Pocket (USA).original_desc:
The main objective is to cross different USA cities and reach the predetermined scores to go ahead. But remember: you'll have only 16 balls and every error can be lethal!

The game also comes with modes for 2 players with two variants: 2P Pocket Game (the traditional mode) and 2P 9-Ball Game, where the premise is to sink 9 balls before the other player makes them first. If you prefer, test your target in Trick Game or even hear your favorite song in Jukebox.

After each stage completed (and some luck), a bonus stage will appear, as well as the chance to earn extra balls. You will only need a good target in the parquet block!
Side Pocket (USA).desc:
主要目標是穿越美國不同城市並達到預定分數才能繼續前進。但請記住：您只有 16 個球，每個錯誤都可能致命！

該遊戲還提供 2 名玩家的模式，有兩種變體：2P Pocket Game（傳統模式）和 2P 9-Ball Game，前提是在其他玩家先擊中 9 個球之前將其擊入。如果您願意，可以在 Trick Game 中測試您的目標，甚至在 Jukebox 中聆聽您最喜歡的歌曲。

每個階段完成後（以及一些運氣），將會出現一個獎勵階段，以及獲得額外球的機會。您只需要在鑲木地板塊中找到一個好的目標即可！

Arkista's Ring (USA).name: 阿基斯塔的指環
Arkista's Ring (USA).original_desc:
An evil character named Shogun has stolen the Elven ring of Arkista, and in so doing has plunged the whole Elf kingdom into darkness. All the elves hope lies in one elf warrior named Christine.  Equipped in the beginning with only a bow, she proceeds to find the ring and restore her home back to normal.

This is a game that may be compared to The Legend of Zelda, though more linear in it's game play. The game is broken down into many stages, the goal of each being to simply find a way into the next stage.  Playing out in puzzle fashion, you will shoot all the enemies on screen, earn the hidden key, and find the correct exit.  Defeated enemies will randomly drop bonuses that can be collected; these items include health restore, increased armor, and weapon improvements.

Beating the entire game requires successful progression through 125 stages.
Arkista's Ring (USA).desc:
一個名叫幕府將軍的邪惡角色偷走了阿基斯塔的精靈戒指，此舉使整個精靈王國陷入了黑暗。精靈們的全部希望都寄託在一位名叫克里斯汀的精靈戰士身上。一開始她只配備了一把弓，後來她找到了戒指並讓她的家恢復正常。

這是一款可以與《塞爾達傳說》相比較的遊戲，儘管它的遊戲玩法更加線性。遊戲分為多個階段，每個階段的目標都是找到進入下一階段的方法。以解謎方式進行遊戲，您將射擊屏幕上的所有敵人，獲得隱藏的鑰匙，並找到正確的出口。擊敗的敵人會隨機掉落可以收集的獎勵；這些項目包括生命值恢復、裝甲增加和武器改進。

通關整個遊戲需要成功通過 125 個階段。

Ufouria - The Saga (Europe).name: U-four-ia：傳奇
Ufouria - The Saga (Europe).original_desc:
Ufouria is a (side scrolling) platform adventure video game. You begin play as Hebereke (Bop Louie in PAL regions), a penguin (though in PAL release he is more humanoid and looks like the Stay-Puft Marshmallow Man), and must explore the world on which you and three other friends crash landed. As you encounter the new characters you must fight them to make them recover their memory.  Once you have recovered all 3 other characters you are then searching for Temple Keys which will lead back to your homeworld of Ufouria.

The world in which you interact is free form, meaning that you can wander around as you please. To get to new areas you will need to get power-ups and/or new characters with their own abilities. Character switching is done as needed, not defined by levels.  Sections of the game have bosses and mini-bosses which include the characters which have not had their memory returned yet.
Ufouria - The Saga (Europe).desc:
Ufouria 是一款（橫向捲軸）平台冒險視頻遊戲。你開始扮演 Hebereke（PAL 地區的 Bop Louie），一隻企鵝（儘管在 PAL 版本中他更像人形，看起來像呆呆的棉花糖人），並且必須探索你和其他三個朋友迫降的世界。當你遇到新角色時，你必須與他們戰鬥，讓他們恢復記憶。一旦你找回了所有其他 3 個角色，你就可以尋找神廟鑰匙，這將帶你回到你的家鄉 Ufouria。

你互動的世界是自由形式的，這意味著你可以隨心所欲地漫步。要到達新區域，您需要獲得能力提升和/或具有自己能力的新角色。角色切換是根據需要進行的，而不是按級別來定義的。遊戲的某些部分有老闆和小老闆，其中包括尚未恢復記憶的角色。

Spot - The Video Game (USA).name: 任天堂GameCube
Spot - The Video Game (USA).original_desc:
A puzzle game loosely featuring licensing from the 7Up soft drink. The gameplay involves up to 4 players, which can be either human or computer, each taking on spots of a particular colour. Starting from opposite corners, they take it in turns to move, either by 'reproducing' one of their spots to form another one in an adjacent square, or by making a jump, losing the square you did have but taking one two spaces away.

When a piece lands next to one of another colour, that piece changes colour into that of their opponent. The winner of each round is either the last player with any pieces left, or the player who has the most pieces left when the level is full.
Spot - The Video Game (USA).desc:
一款益智遊戲，以 7Up 軟飲料的授權為特色。遊戲過程中最多需要 4 名玩家，可以是人類也可以是計算機，每個玩家都佔據特定顏色的斑點。他們從相對的角落開始，輪流移動，要么通過“複製”其中一個點，在相鄰的方格中形成另一個點，要么通過跳躍，失去你已有的方格，但帶走一兩個空格。

當一個棋子落在另一種顏色旁邊時，該棋子的顏色就會變成對手的顏色。每輪的獲勝者要么是最後剩下棋子的玩家，要么是關卡滿時剩餘棋子最多的玩家。

Kung Fu (Japan, USA).name: 斯巴達X
Kung Fu (Japan, USA).original_desc: You'll need lightning fast reactions to knock out the Knife Thrower, stop the Stick Fighter, and trip up the evil Tom Tom Brothers in this action-packed martial arts contest! Are you sure you're tough enough? Because it'll take all your strength and skill to master the moves in KUNG FU, beat your opponents, and rescue the fair Sylvia who's held captive on the top floor! The action is non-stop, and just when you think you've got your enemies licked there's always a Giant, a Snake, or a fire-breathing Dragon to contend with in KUNG FU!
Kung Fu (Japan, USA).desc: 在這場充滿動感的武術比賽中，你需要閃電般的快速反應來擊倒投刀者、阻止火柴人，並絆倒邪惡的湯姆湯姆兄弟！你確定你足夠堅強嗎？因為你需要運用所有的力量和技巧來掌握功夫動作，擊敗你的對手，並營救被囚禁在頂層的美麗的西爾維婭！動作是不間斷的，當你認為你已經打敗了你的敵人時，總會有一個巨人、一條蛇或一條噴火龍需要用功夫來對抗！

Palamedes (USA).name: 帕拉梅德斯
Palamedes (USA).original_desc:
The goal of Palamedes is to clear the screen which is, line by line, filling up with dice. Players control a small person situated near the bottom of the screen, who can only be moved to the left or right. The number of the dice the person is holding can be changed with the B button, pressing the A button will shoot the dice upwards. If the die hits another one with a matching number, the targeted dice disappears from the playing area and is added to a column at the bottom of the screen. Pressing down after lining up at least three dice of either the same number or consecutive numbers in the bottom row will destroy up to five lines at once.

There are three modes of play: The standard single player mode, which requires the player to destroy a set number of lines in order to advance to the next stage; a tournament mode in which the player has to duel a number of CPU-controlled opponents and a two player mode.
Palamedes (USA).desc:
Palamedes 的目標是清除屏幕，屏幕上一行一行地佈滿了骰子。玩家控制位於屏幕底部附近的一個小人，該人只能向左或向右移動。可以通過B按鈕改變人持有的骰子數量，按下A按鈕會將骰子向上發射。如果骰子擊中另一個具有匹配數字的骰子，則目標骰子將從遊戲區域消失並添加到屏幕底部的一列中。將至少三個相同數字或連續數字的骰子排列在底行後按下，將一次消除最多五行。

共有三種遊戲模式： 標准單人模式，要求玩家摧毀一定數量的線路才能進入下一階段；玩家必須與許多由 CPU 控制的對手決鬥的錦標賽模式和兩人模式。

Terra Cresta (USA).name: 泰拉克里斯塔
Terra Cresta (USA).original_desc: In the follow-up to Moon Cresta, a well-guarded planet is being invaded. You will have to make a succession of passes over the landscape, shooting out ground turrets and aliens. Numbered bases release power-ups when shot - these can either be used in combination or (by pressing the space bar) in Formation Mode, covering a wider range of shooting positions. Each pass over the planet ends with a boss; the third and final one with a boss who can only be killed if you are at maximum power. Death puts you back to the start of the world.
Terra Cresta (USA).desc: 在《月峰》的後續中，一顆戒備森嚴的星球正在遭到入侵。你必須連續穿越整個地形，射擊地面砲塔和外星人。編號底座在射擊時會釋放能量 - 這些可以組合使用或（通過按空格鍵）在編隊模式下使用，覆蓋更廣泛的射擊位置。每次穿越星球都會遇到一個 Boss；第三個也是最後一個，老闆只有在你處於最大力量時才能被殺死。死亡讓你回到世界的起點。

Rodland (Europe).name: 羅德·蘭德
Rodland (Europe).original_desc:
Taking a rather literal view of the term 'slap-stick humour', Rodland features two fairies called Tam and Rit, whose mission is to rescue their mum who's been captured and taken to a castle. 

There are 40 screens to clear, all full of baddies, who are disposed of by grabbing them with a stick, and flipping them from side to side to inflict damage. The hits needn't all be inflicted at the same time, as it's possible to release them to move them out of the way.
Rodland (Europe).desc:
從字面意義上理解“打鬧幽默”這個詞，羅德蘭扮演了兩個名叫塔姆和瑞特的仙女，她們的任務是營救被俘虜並被帶到城堡的媽媽。

有 40 個屏幕需要清除，裡面全都是壞人，用棍子抓住他們，然後左右翻轉以造成傷害即可消滅他們。不需要同時進行所有攻擊，因為可以釋放它們以將它們移開。

Krion Conquest, The (USA).name: 克里昂征服
Krion Conquest, The (USA).original_desc:
The Krion Empire chose the year 1999 in which to stage an invasion of earth. The planet's defenses were no match for the alien robot invaders. Fortunately, a witch named Francesca has taken it upon herself to single-handedly free mankind from this scourge.

The gameplay and artistic style are heavily influenced by the NES Mega Man games (some contend the elements are "borrowed" or "stolen", in fact). The game is a side scroller in which the heroine can wield a variety of different offensive capabilities (all available from the start of the game), selectable via a subscreen in her quest to wipe out wave after wave of robot invaders throughout the four levels. You also have a limited range broomstick at your disposal for riding across chasms and such.
Krion Conquest, The (USA).desc:
克里昂帝國選擇了1999年來入侵地球。這個星球的防禦能力無法與外星機器人入侵者相比。幸運的是，一位名叫弗朗西斯卡的女巫獨自一人將人類從這一禍害中解放出來。

遊戲玩法和藝術風格深受 NES 洛克人遊戲的影響（有些人認為這些元素實際上是“借用”或“竊取”的）。該遊戲是一款橫向捲軸遊戲，其中女主角可以運用各種不同的進攻能力（所有這些能力從遊戲一開始就可用），可以通過子屏幕進行選擇，以在四個關卡中消滅一波又一波的機器人入侵者。你還有一把有限範圍的掃帚可供你使用，可以跨越峽谷等。

Romance of the Three Kingdoms II (USA).key: Romance of the Three Kingdoms II (USA)
Romance of the Three Kingdoms II (USA).original_name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms II
Romance of the Three Kingdoms II (USA).name: 三國演義II
Romance of the Three Kingdoms II (USA).original_desc: The sequel to Romance of the Three Kingdoms. The game concept is still the same, though they did improve a lot of features that one may consider 'disturbing' from RTK I (e.g. Generals dying easily due to disease, etc.). RTK can be said to be much more 'stable' where players no longer have to worry that much about time length in the game, as the game take a slower time rate to allow the players to build up their forces without much interference. The RTK II gameplay and interface is closely similar to Nobunaga's Ambition II.
Romance of the Three Kingdoms II (USA).desc: 《三國演義》的續集。遊戲概念仍然是相同的，儘管它們確實改進了許多人們可能認為 RTK I '令人不安' 的功能（例如將軍容易因疾病而死亡等）。RTK可以說更加“穩定”，玩家不再需要太擔心遊戲的時間長度，因為遊戲需要較慢的時間速率來讓玩家在沒有太多干擾的情況下建立自己的力量。RTK II 的遊戲玩法和界面與 Nobunaga 的 Ambition II 非常相似。

8 Eyes (USA).name: 8 眼的
8 Eyes (USA).original_desc: 8 Eyes chronicles the adventures of Orin, the falconer, who must visit 8 different houses in 8 different lands and defeat 8 different guardians in order to collect 8 different jewels called eyes. It is a side-scrolling action/adventure game where the lead character can attack with a sword of somewhat limited reach. However, that is not the most powerful tool at his disposal - Orin also has his trusty falcon that he can send around the room to attack enemies or trigger remote switches. In single-player mode, the player controls both the falconer and the falcon. However, the game also offers a cooperative mode where the first player controls Orin and the second player controls his falcon in a mode which offers greater flight capability.
8 Eyes (USA).desc: 《8 隻眼睛》講述了獵鷹人 Orin 的冒險故事，他必須訪問 8 個不同土地上的 8 個不同的房屋，並擊敗 8 個不同的守護者，才能收集 8 種被稱為眼睛的不同珠寶。這是一款橫向捲軸動作/冒險遊戲，主角可以使用觸及範圍有限的劍進行攻擊。然而，這並不是他可以使用的最強大的工具 - 奧林還有他值得信賴的獵鷹，他可以派它在房間裡攻擊敵人或觸發遠程開關。在單人遊戲模式中，玩家同時控制獵鷹者和獵鷹。然而，遊戲還提供了一種合作模式，其中第一個玩家控制奧林，第二個玩家在提供更大飛行能力的模式下控制他的獵鷹。

Dragon Spirit - The New Legend (USA).name: 龍魂:新傳奇
Dragon Spirit - The New Legend (USA).original_desc:
Galda has decided to attack earth and it is up to you to stop him.  Galda has taken Iris, the sister of Lace captive.  You are Lace who, taking his father's sword, goes off to defeat Galda.

You have the ability to change into a dragon and are in that form throughout the game.  As a dragon, you can pick up power-ups, or upgrades, that will help you in your fight.  Upgrades can include extra heads on your dragon, health, faster shots, and more.

Fly around and destroy everything in your path.  At the end of each stage, you will need to defeat a boss.  Having good upgrades that are not lost from being hit before reaching the bosses will help.
Dragon Spirit - The New Legend (USA).desc:
加爾達決定攻擊地球，你需要阻止他。加爾達俘虜了蕾絲的妹妹艾麗絲。你是雷斯，帶著父親的劍，前去擊敗加爾達。

你有能力變成一條龍，並在整個遊戲中保持這種形態。作為一條龍，你可以獲得能量提升或升級，這將有助於你的戰鬥。升級可以包括額外的龍頭、生命值、更快的射擊速度等等。

四處飛行並摧毀你路徑上的一切。在每個階段結束時，您都需要擊敗老闆。在到達 Boss 之前擁有良好的升級不會因為被擊中而丟失將會有所幫助。

Bonk's Adventure (USA).name: 邦克的冒險
Bonk's Adventure (USA).original_desc:
A platform game where you have to guide Bonk, a headstrong little caveboy, through six prehistoric worlds comprised of several levels while avoiding all manner of nasties. Journey through all of Dinosaur Land to save the Moon Princess from the evil King Drool.

The gameplay is similar to other platform games, but Bonk does have his own unique abilities such as climbing vertical walls with his teeth and a diving head butt he can use to "bonk" enemies. Temporary power-ups come in the form of pieces of meat that give Bonk increased strength and, in the second stage of the power-up, invulnerability.
Bonk's Adventure (USA).desc:
在一款平台遊戲中，你必須引導邦克，一個任性的小穴居男孩，穿越由多個關卡組成的六個史前世界，同時避免各種危險。穿越整個恐龍王國，從邪惡的流口水國王手中拯救月亮公主。

遊戲玩法與其他平台遊戲類似，但 Bonk 確實有自己獨特的能力，例如用牙齒攀爬垂直的牆壁，以及可以用頭撞來“撞”敵人。臨時能量提升以肉塊的形式出現，可以增強邦克的力量，並且在能量提升的第二階段，使他刀槍不入。

Shatterhand (USA).name: 碎手
Shatterhand (USA).original_desc:
Shatterhand is an action game with 8-direction scrolling. You control Shatterhand in his quest to find and defeat General Grover, leader of the Metal Command. Through the game you'll encounter all kinds of mechanical and biomechanical creatures. Shatterhand's primary weapon is his cybernetic fists and therefore most enemies must be defeated by punching them.

Additional help can be given from any of the 8 hovering satellite robots, each of which has it's own weapon that fires automatically when Shatterhand throws a punch. These satellite robots can be obtained by collecting combinations of alpha-beta letters that appear when you punch some of the white boxes that are scattered throughout each stage.

The game has 7 stages. The first and the last must be played first and last respectively, but the five middle stages can be played in any order.
Shatterhand (USA).desc:
Shatterhand 是一款 8 向滾動動作遊戲。你控制碎手尋找並擊敗金屬司令部領導人格羅弗將軍。在遊戲中你會遇到各種機械和生物機械生物。碎手的主要武器是他的控制論拳頭，因此大多數敵人必須通過拳頭來擊敗。

8 個懸停衛星機器人中的任何一個都可以提供額外的幫助，每個機器人都有自己的武器，當碎手出拳時會自動開火。這些衛星機器人可以通過收集 alpha-beta 字母的組合來獲得，這些組合是在你打散在每個階段的一些白色盒子時出現的。

遊戲有7個階段。第一個和最後一個必須分別先玩和最後玩，但中間的五個階段可以按任意順序玩。

Deja Vu (USA).name: 已經看過了
Deja Vu (USA).original_desc:
Deja Vu was the first game ever made by ICOM, the makers of such famous adventure games as Shadowgate and Uninvited. It featured mouse support, a multi-window interface, and bitmapped graphics at a time when text-based interactive fiction was the norm. 

In Deja Vu your character wakes up in a toilet stall of a sleazy pub with no memory of who you are or what you're doing there. To make matters worse, you soon stumble upon a very dead corpse upstairs with three bullets buried in him. Sure enough, you find there's a gun in your pocket with three bullets missing. From there you have to figure out what happened and who you are before whatever is happening to your brain turns you into a mindless vegatable. To make matters worse the cops would very much like to have a word with you about that stiff.

In 1991 a remake of this game was made for Windows 3.x, featuring improved graphics etc.
Deja Vu (USA).desc:
Deja Vu 是 ICOM 製作的第一款遊戲，ICOM 是《Shadowgate》和《Uninvited》等著名冒險遊戲的製作者。它具有鼠標支持、多窗口界面和位圖圖形的特點，當時基於文本的交互式小說已成為常態。

在《似曾相識》中，你的角色在一家骯髒酒吧的廁所隔間裡醒來，不記得自己是誰，也不記得自己在那裡做什麼。更糟糕的是，你很快就在樓上發現了一具死屍，身上埋著三顆子彈。果然，你發現口袋裡有一把槍，裡面少了三顆子彈。從那時起，你必須弄清楚發生了什麼以及你是誰，然後你的大腦發生的任何事情都會把你變成一個沒有頭腦的植物人。更糟糕的是，警察很想和你談談這件事。

1991 年，該遊戲針對 Windows 3.x 進行了重製，具有改進的圖形等特點。

Ganbare Goemon Gaiden - The Missing Gold.key: Ganbare Goemon Gaiden - The Missing Golden Pipe (Japan) (Translated)
Ganbare Goemon Gaiden - The Missing Gold.original_name: Ganbare Goemon Gaiden : Kieta Ougon Kiseru
Ganbare Goemon Gaiden - The Missing Gold.name: 盡力而為。
Ganbare Goemon Gaiden - The Missing Gold.original_desc:
This is a semi-humorous console-style RPG set in medieval Japan. It tells us about the adventures of Goemon, the noble thief and skillful martial artist. One day Goemon returns home and finds out his favorite smoking pipe is gone. Who could have done such a horrible crime? Goemon's friend Ebisumaru offers to help him to find out the criminal, and both embark on a journey full of adventures and danger.

Like most console-style RPGs of the time, "Goemon Gaiden" utilizes a simple turn-based battle system. You talk to town people to gather information, buy weapons, armor and items, fight random enemies, descend into dungeons and find treasures.
Ganbare Goemon Gaiden - The Missing Gold.desc:
這是一款以中世紀日本為背景的半幽默主機風格角色扮演遊戲。它講述了高貴的盜賊和高超的武術家五右衛門的冒險經歷。有一天，五右衛門回到家，發現他最喜歡的煙斗不見了。誰能犯下如此可怕的罪行？五右衛門的朋友惠美須丸主動提出幫助他找出罪犯，兩人踏上了充滿冒險和危險的旅程。

與當時大多數主機風格的角色扮演遊戲一樣，《五右衛門外傳》採用了簡單的回合製戰鬥系統。你與鎮上的人們交談來收集信息，購買武器、盔甲和物品，與隨機的敵人戰鬥，進入地牢並尋找寶藏。

Parodius (Europe).name: 顯示後
Parodius (Europe).original_desc:
This is mostly the parody of Gradius (Nemesis on some systems), with some flavor from other shoot-em-ups, like Twinbee. The series is available on numerous platforms.

The game is a right-to-left scrolling shoot-em-up. You can choose from 4 different flying creatures, with different weapons. You must finish 7 stages, each having a boss at the end. You may start at either one, but must complete every level to advance to the final stage.
Parodius (Europe).desc:
這主要是對 Gradius（某些系統上的 Nemesis）的模仿，帶有一些來自其他射擊遊戲（如 Twinbee）的味道。該系列可在多個平台上使用。

該遊戲是一款從右到左滾動的射擊遊戲。您可以從 4 種不同的飛行生物中進行選擇，並配備不同的武器。你必須完成 7 個階段，每個階段最後都有一個 Boss。您可以從任一級別開始，但必須完成每個級別才能進入最後階段。

Monopoly (USA).name: 壟斷
Monopoly (USA).original_desc:
This special MONOPOLY™ game brings to life all the wheeling, dealing, money-making fun of the world's most popular board game - and adds the fast action, hands-on excitement of the Nintendo Entertainment System! 
There's visual entertainment with the animated Rich Uncle Pennybags and Community Chest and Chance Cards, and the speedy sports car and other tokens that zoom around the board. Now listen for voice-enhancements such as the "jailer" who kicks Rich Uncle Pennybags out of Jail, and the digitized sound of the train whistles on the Railroad spaces!
Like a real estate big shot, you let computer "accounting" keep track of your cash, assets, properties, houses and hotels. You can play with real, live real estate moguls, or take on the computer opponents, who might be beginners - or savvy big-time traders!
The MONOPOLY game everyone grows up with, plus the Nintendo Entertainment System... all in all, it's a real sweet deal!
Monopoly (USA).desc:
這款特殊的 MONOPOLY™ 遊戲將世界上最受歡迎的棋盤遊戲的所有駕駛、發牌、賺錢的樂趣帶入生活 - 並增加了任天堂娛樂系統的快速動作和動手刺激！
動畫豐富的叔叔錢袋、公益金和機會卡、快速跑車和其他在棋盤上縮放的代幣帶來了視覺娛樂。現在聆聽語音增強功能，例如將富有的 Pennybags 叔叔踢出監獄的“獄卒”，以及鐵路空間中火車汽笛的數字化聲音！
就像房地產大亨一樣，您讓計算機“會計”跟踪您的現金、資產、房產、房屋和酒店。您可以與真實的、現場的房地產大亨一起玩，或者與電腦對手對戰，他們可能是初學者，也可能是精明的大牌交易員！
每個人都伴隨著成長的《大富翁》遊戲，再加上任天堂娛樂系統……總而言之，這真是一筆超值優惠！

Crackout (Europe).name: 破解
Crackout (Europe).original_desc:
In the year 30XX, the mankind has exhausted all the metal resources on the Earth, so they had to travel into space in order to find more. They find a planet high in minerals, and they name it Selim.

But soon they discover that there is someone watching, spying on them; it's some kind of alien race. These aliens find a hole in the humans' main computer and get inside it. The computer, programmed to self-destruct in case of a failure, starts its countdown.

There is only one way to avoid self-destruction, which is entering a 14 digit code into the machine; but these digits are hidden in the walls of the corridors in the complex. Your mission is to find these letters and avoid self-destruction, aboard the "Red Warrior", and using your only weapon, an energy ball.

Crackout is an Arkanoid clone for the NES, but it's probably one of the most singular clones. You'll have to destroy all blocks but also the walls surrounding them, as the 14 letters are spread inside them, apart from killing the alien bosses here and there. In your way, you will find a bizarre mixture of enemies, from alien forms to parts of the body (eyes, lips, skulls...), who will make your game tougher by changing the direction of your ball; but also happier by dropping a sweet variety of power-ups such as the cherries (extra life), the clock (the enemies freeze), a rocket (to throw into the blocks), a fire device (the ball fires missiles), a parachute (slows the ball) an extra ball, or the weirdest of them all, the so-called Konami Man, who will take you to a secret parallel complex with different (and harder) levels.
Crackout (Europe).desc:
30XX年，人類耗盡了地球上所有的金屬資源，不得不前往太空尋找更多。他們發現了一顆富含礦物質的行星，並將其命名為塞利姆。

但很快他們就發現有人在監視、監視他們；這是某種外星種族。這些外星人在人類的主計算機上找到了一個洞並進入了其中。計算機被編程為在出現故障時自毀，並開始倒計時。

只有一種方法可以避免自毀，那就是在機器中輸入14位密碼；但這些數字隱藏在建築群走廊的牆壁中。你的任務是登上“紅色戰士”並使用你唯一的武器——能量球，找到這些字母並避免自毀。

Crackout 是 NES 的打磚塊克隆，但它可能是最獨特的克隆之一。除了殺死各處的外星首領之外，你還必須摧毀所有方塊以及它們周圍的牆壁，因為 14 個字母散佈在它們內部。在你的路上，你會發現各種各樣的敵人，從外星人到身體部位（眼睛、嘴唇、頭骨……），他們會通過改變你的球的方向來讓你的遊戲變得更加艱難；更令人高興的是，掉落各種甜蜜的能量道具，如櫻桃（額外生命）、時鐘（敵人凍結）、火箭（扔進方塊）、射擊裝置（球發射導彈）、降落傘（減慢球速度）、額外的球，或者是其中最奇怪的，即所謂的“Konami Man”，他會帶你到一個具有不同（和更難）關卡的秘密平行複合體。

Gyruss (USA).name: 吉魯斯
Gyruss (USA).original_desc: The entire solar system is being attacked by the vicious Gyrusians, and it's up to you to save the day! You will need to fly your spaceship to each of the nine planets and then clear three stages of enemies to rid that planet of the Gyrusians. You start the game with a single canon, and can gain a double canon after shooting a power up satelite. After clearing each planet, there is another bonus stage where additional weapons and bonus points can be collected. Gyruss is an arcade action shooter, however instead of piloting your spaceship horizontally or vertically, you move in a circle around the perimeter of the screen. The NES version of Gyruss adds to the original arcade version additional music, additional weapons, new enemies, and a large boss at the end of each level.
Gyruss (USA).desc: 整個太陽係正在遭受邪惡的吉魯斯人的攻擊，只有你才能拯救世界！你需要駕駛你的宇宙飛船飛往九個行星中的每一個，然後清除三個階段的敵人，以消滅該行星上的吉魯斯人。您以單炮開始遊戲，在射擊衛星後可以獲得雙炮。清除每個星球後，還有另一個獎勵階段，可以收集額外的武器和獎勵積分。Gyruss 是一款街機動作射擊遊戲，但你不是水平或垂直駕駛你的宇宙飛船，而是圍繞屏幕周邊繞一圈移動。NES 版本的 Gyruss 在原始街機版本的基礎上添加了額外的音樂、額外的武器、新的敵人以及每個關卡末尾的大頭目。

Double Dragon III - The Sacred Stones (U.key: Double Dragon III - The Sacred Stones (USA)
Double Dragon III - The Sacred Stones (U.original_name: Double Dragon III : The Sacred Stones
Double Dragon III - The Sacred Stones (U.name: 雙截龍3:聖石
Double Dragon III - The Sacred Stones (U.original_desc:
The final game in the trilogy.

Billy and Jimmy Lee are returning from martial arts training when their paths cross a fortune teller. She tells them of a great evil in Egypt, their strongest adversary yet, and how the Rosetta Stones can aid them.

This game features weapon shops where Billy and Jimmy can buy power-ups, tricks, energy and extra lives to aid them in 
their quest.

Power-ups make Billy and Jimmy twice their size, increasing their damage done and range of attack.

The character graphics have changed, moving away from cartoon style graphics to more realistic looking characters.
Double Dragon III - The Sacred Stones (U.desc:
三部曲中的最後一款遊戲。

比利和吉米·李剛從武術訓練回來，就遇到了一位算命先生。她告訴他們埃及有一個巨大的邪惡，這是他們迄今為止最強大的對手，以及羅塞塔石碑如何幫助他們。

該遊戲設有武器商店，比利和吉米可以在那裡購買能量提升、技巧、能量和額外生命來幫助他們
他們的追求。

能量提升使比利和吉米的體型增加了一倍，增加了他們的傷害和攻擊範圍。

角色圖形發生了變化，從卡通風格圖形轉向更逼真的角色。

Journey to Silius (USA).name: 西流斯之旅
Journey to Silius (USA).original_desc: The year is 0373 in the new space age calendar. The earth's population is growing rapidly, and people are now forced to start space colonies. Jay McCray is among those leaving earth and heading to the colony in the Silius solar system. Unfortunately, terrorists have destroyed a research colony there. Jay's father was killed in this attack, and now Jay vows to destroy the terrorists responsible and to continue the research his father was working on. Journey To Silius is a side scrolling platform game. On each level there are a wide variety of robot enemies guarding the terrorist's fortress, along with several weapons to find which make your mission easier. There are a total of six stages, each ending with a very large boss.
Journey to Silius (USA).desc: 新太空時代日曆的年份是0373。地球人口正在迅速增長，人們現在被迫建立太空殖民地。傑伊·麥克雷是離開地球前往西利厄斯太陽系殖民地的人之一。不幸的是，恐怖分子摧毀了那裡的一個研究殖民地。傑伊的父親在這次襲擊中喪生，現在傑伊發誓要消滅肇事者，並繼續他父親正在進行的研究。Journey To Silius 是一款橫向捲軸平台遊戲。每個關卡都有各種各樣的機器人敵人守衛著恐怖分子的堡壘，還有多種武器可供尋找，讓你的任務變得更容易。總共有六個階段，每個階段都有一個非常大的老闆。

Dragon Warrior II (USA).name: 勇者鬥惡龍II 惡靈的眾神
Dragon Warrior II (USA).original_desc:
Dragon Warrior II is an early top-down RPG that expands and improves on its predecessor, Dragon Warrior. Taking the role of a descendant of Erdrick, the player once again ventures forth in an effort to save the world.

Unlike the first game, Dragon Warrior II allows the player to join forces with two other characters, a magic-using princess and a wizard-warrior prince. Also including expanded monster battles involving up to 6 creatures and a much larger world, Dragon Warrior II is an important step in the evolution of the Dragon Warrior series.
Dragon Warrior II (USA).desc:
《龍戰士 II》是一款早期的自上而下的角色扮演遊戲，在其前身《龍戰士》的基礎上進行了擴展和改進。玩家扮演厄德里克的後裔，再次冒險，努力拯救世界。

與第一款遊戲不同，《龍戰士 II》允許玩家與另外兩個角色聯手，即使用魔法的公主和巫師戰士王子。《龍戰士 II》還包括涉及多達 6 種生物和更大世界的擴展怪物戰鬥，是龍戰士系列發展的重要一步。

Willow (USA).name: 柳
Willow (USA).original_desc:
Willow is an action RPG based on the movie with the same name. The player assumes the role of Willow, the chosen one who must restore human form to the benevolent sorceress Fin Raziel and destroy the evil sorceress, Bavmorda. While the game follows the movie's plot somewhat most of the time, it also expands on it and introduces characters, races and enemies not found in the movie.

Gameplay is similar to other action RPGs and The Legend of Zelda. Willow is seen from a top down perspective and all enemies are visible on screen. Slaying enemies will give Willow experience points, which will eventually lead to him increasing his stats automatically. New weapons, shields and magic items are found in various treasure chests scattered across the land or given to Willow as part of the plot. Aside from battling minor enemies Willow will also face off against several boss monsters as well as characters from the movie.
Willow (USA).desc:
《Willow》是一款根據同名電影改編的動作角色扮演遊戲。玩家扮演威洛（Willow）的角色，被選中的人必須將仁慈的女巫芬·拉齊爾（Fin Raziel）恢復人類形態，並消滅邪惡的女巫巴夫莫達（Bavmorda）。雖然遊戲大部分時間都遵循電影的情節，但它也對其進行了擴展，並引入了電影中沒有的角色、種族和敵人。

遊戲玩法與其他動作角色扮演遊戲和《塞爾達傳說》類似。Willow 是從自上而下的角度觀看的，所有敵人都在屏幕上可見。殺死敵人會給威洛帶來經驗值，這最終會導致他自動增加他的屬性。新的武器、盾牌和魔法物品可以在散落在各地的各種寶箱中找到，或者作為劇情的一部分交給威洛。除了與小敵人戰鬥之外，威洛還將面對幾個頭目怪物以及電影中的角色。

Klax (USA) (Unl).name: 克拉克斯
Klax (USA) (Unl).original_desc: An action/puzzle game, the object is to catch assorted color falling tiles and create rows, columns, or diagonals of a single color. Each level requires a different pattern to be made, and the tiles fall faster, more at a time, and in an increasing number of colors as the game progresses.
Klax (USA) (Unl).desc: 一款動作/益智遊戲，目標是捕捉各種顏色掉落的瓷磚並創建單一顏色的行、列或對角線。每個關卡都需要製作不同的圖案，隨著遊戲的進行，瓷磚掉落的速度更快、一次更多，並且顏色數量也越來越多。

Smash T.name: 粉碎電視
Smash T.original_desc:
The year is 1999. The world's most popular television show is Smash T.V., an ultra-violent contest between two armed-to-the-teeth combatants, set loose in a series of deadly arenas that are filled to bursting with hordes of mindless beasts and killer robots. The aim of the game is to blast everything in sight and try to grab more cash and prizes than the other guy. Toaster ovens, VCRs, fancy cars and luxury holidays are there for the taking... for anyone who can survive long enough to enjoy them.

Smash T.V. is an insane shoot-em-up from the brain of Eugene Jarvis, creator of Robotron: 2084. It retains that game's frantic style of play and two-joystick control method, but adds plenty of gore, violence, a hint of satire and that all-important two player mode.
Smash T.desc:
時間是 1999 年。世界上最受歡迎的電視節目是《Smash T.V.》，這是一場兩名全副武裝的戰鬥人員之間的極端暴力競賽，在一系列致命的競技場中展開，競技場中充滿了成群結隊的無意識野獸和殺手機器人。遊戲的目的是炸毀眼前的一切，並嘗試比其他人搶到更多的現金和獎品。烤麵包機、錄像機、豪華汽車和豪華假期都可供您享用……任何能活得足夠久的人都可以享受它們。

Smash T.V. 是一款由《Robotron: 2084》的創造者尤金·賈維斯 (Eugene Jarvis) 創作的瘋狂射擊遊戲。它保留了該遊戲的瘋狂遊戲風格和兩操縱桿控制方法，但添加了大量血腥、暴力、諷刺意味以及最重要的兩人模式。

Mafat Conspiracy, The (USA).name: 沒有陰謀
Mafat Conspiracy, The (USA).original_desc:
You play as Golgo 13 aka Duke Togo, ace sharpshooter and assassin. Based off a character of various manga comics, Golgo is a down-to-business man at the end of a gun. Stuck in the world of espionage among such groups as the FBI and the CIA, Golgo is constantly in mortal danger, and a lethal weapon in his own right. 

The Mafat Conspiracy is the sequel to the NES game Top Secret Episode. In this chapter, Golgo must track down a missing satellite from the SDI laser defense system, as well as rescue a top scientist and stop those who would use the satellite for blackmail and terror on the world's nations. 

While Golgo is outdoors, the game is a side-scrolling romp where the player can fire and jump. This changes when Golgo enters a building, at which point the game switches to a first person 3D maze. Navigating past soldiers and between floors, Golgo collects various clues to advance the storyline. There is also a driving sequence, and several sniper sequences in which precision aiming is required.
Mafat Conspiracy, The (USA).desc:
你扮演 Golgo 13，又名 Duke Togo，王牌神槍手和刺客。戈爾戈以各種漫畫中的角色為原型，是一個腳踏實地的商人。戈爾戈被困在聯邦調查局和中央情報局等組織的間諜世界中，經常處於致命的危險之中，而他本身就是一個致命武器。

《馬法特陰謀》是 NES 遊戲《最高機密》的續集。在本章中，Golgo 必須追踪 SDI 激光防禦系統中一顆失踪的衛星，營救一名頂尖科學家，並阻止那些利用該衛星對世界各國進行勒索和恐怖活動的人。

當 Golgo 在戶外時，遊戲是一款橫向捲軸遊戲，玩家可以射擊和跳躍。當 Golgo 進入建築物時，情況會發生變化，此時遊戲切換到第一人稱 3D 迷宮。戈爾戈在士兵身邊和樓層之間穿梭，收集各種線索來推進故事情節。還有一個駕駛序列和幾個需要精確瞄準的狙擊序列。

Dragon Fighter (USA).name: 龍鬥士
Dragon Fighter (USA).original_desc:
In Dragon Fighter the protagonist is a fighter who can turn into a dragon. In this side-scrolling action game the hero can walk, jump, and slash with his sword. He can also charge his sword to fire a magical projectile. The real power-up, however, is that he can transform into a flying dragon. When this happens, the game turns into a shmup-style game in which the scrolling moves at a constant rate and the dragon can shoot fireballs in a spread formation. Transforming into a dragon is restricted by a power meter.

The game features six levels of action-- a snow level, a cave level, a water level, an industrial level, and a haunted castle level. The sixth and final level is fought entirely as a dragon with unlimited flight capability.
Dragon Fighter (USA).desc:
在《龍鬥士》中，主角是一位可以變成龍的戰士。在這款橫向捲軸動作遊戲中，英雄可以行走、跳躍和用劍砍殺。他還可以給他的劍充電來發射魔法射彈。然而，真正的能力提升是他可以變成一條飛龍。當這種情況發生時，遊戲就變成了shmup風格的遊戲，其中滾動以恆定的速度移動，龍可以以分散的形式發射火球。變龍是受到力量計的限制。

該遊戲有六個動作關卡——雪關卡、洞穴關卡、水關卡、工業關卡和鬧鬼城堡關卡。第六個也是最後一個關卡完全是作為具有無限飛行能力的龍進行戰鬥。

Tecmo World Wrestling (USA).name: 特克摩世界摔跤
Tecmo World Wrestling (USA).original_desc:
In Tecmo World Wrestling, you select from 10 fictional wrestlers and compete against the others for the coveted Tecmo World Wrestling Title. When your match begins you'll find you've got all the moves of the pros. You can run, climb to the top ropes, climb outside the ring, pick up your opponent, throw them over the ropes, pin them, and escape from a pin yourself. The wrestlers, such as "The British Star" Rex Beat and "The Technician" Dr. Guildo have a full assortment of professional wrestling moves and holds such as the Pile Driver, Shoulder Throw, Cobra Twist, as well as the ever-popular Slam the Guys Face Into the Metal Post maneuver. 

Before selected matches you'll be able to beef up you're wrestler's strength with three different exercises. The bottom portion of the screen is where the energetic announcer describes what is going on in the ring, move by move.
Tecmo World Wrestling (USA).desc:
在 Tecmo World Wrestling 中，您可以從 10 名虛構的摔跤手中進行選擇，並與其他選手爭奪令人垂涎的 Tecmo World Wrestling 冠軍頭銜。當你的比賽開始時，你會發現你已經掌握了職業選手的所有動作。你可以奔跑、爬到最上面的繩索、爬到環外、抱起你的對手、把他們扔到繩索上、釘住他們，然後自己從繩子上逃脫。“英國明星”雷克斯·比特和“技術員”吉爾多博士等摔跤手擁有各種各樣的職業摔跤動作和動作，如打樁機、肩投、眼鏡蛇扭轉，以及廣受歡迎的“將伙計們的臉猛撞到金屬柱上”動作。

在選定的比賽之前，您將能夠通過三種不同的練習來增強摔跤手的力量。屏幕的底部是精力充沛的播音員逐一介紹擂台上正在發生的事情。

Battle of Olympus, The (USA).name: 奧林匹斯之戰
Battle of Olympus, The (USA).original_desc:
This game is much like Zelda II: The Adventure of Link turned into ancient Greece. You play as Orpheus, whose girlfriend, Helene, has been kidnapped by the demonic ruler of the netherworld called Hades. So begins the journey.

Just like in Zelda II, there is a top-down map of Greece with towns and other locations to explore. Each of these has side-scrolling sections in which Orpheus fights his way through the minions of Hades. There are various items one must get to continue to the next location, including swords, shields and crystals. There are three fragments of love hidden around; Orpheus has to find them before he can enter Tartarus and fight Hades to save his beloved Helene.

The monsters of the game are also based on the Greek mythology and it is pretty entertaining to confront cyclopes, minotaurs and pegasuses.
Battle of Olympus, The (USA).desc:
這款遊戲很像塞爾達二世：林克的冒險變成了古希臘。你扮演奧菲斯，他的女朋友海倫被地獄的惡魔統治者哈迪斯綁架了。旅程就這樣開始了。

就像《塞爾達傳說 II》一樣，有一張自上而下的希臘地圖，其中有城鎮和其他地點可供探索。其中每一個都有橫向捲軸部分，其中奧菲斯與哈迪斯的爪牙戰鬥。要繼續前往下一個地點，必須獲得各種物品，包括劍、盾牌和水晶。周圍隱藏著三段愛情的碎片；奧菲斯必須先找到他們，然後才能進入塔耳塔洛斯並與哈迪斯戰鬥以拯救他心愛的海倫。

遊戲中的怪物也取材於希臘神話，與獨眼巨人、牛頭怪和天馬對抗非常有趣。

Adventure Island IV (Japan) (Translated).name: 高橋大師的冒險-島醫V
Adventure Island IV (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
Master Higgins and his lover Tina were having a good time with their dinosaur friends on the peaceful Adventure Island. One day, suddenly a suspicious shadow appeared in the sky and kidnapped the dinosaur friends one after another. The animals of the island were brainwashed by the suspicious shadows, and the terrain of the island was completely changed. Master Higgins embarks on an adventure to rescue the kidnapped dinosaurs and restore the peace of the island.

Adventure Island IV marks a notable departure from previous games in regards to the gameplay, ditching the linear arcade-style platforming in favor of a more open-ended, exploration-oriented game with light RPG elements, more closely resembling later games in the Monster World series.
Adventure Island IV (Japan) (Translated).desc:
希金斯大師和他的愛人蒂娜正在寧靜的冒險島上與他們的恐龍朋友們度過了愉快的時光。有一天，天空中突然出現一道可疑的黑影，並綁架了一批又一批的恐龍朋友。島上的動物被可疑的影子洗腦，島嶼的地形也被徹底改變。希金斯大師踏上冒險之旅，拯救被綁架的恐龍並恢復島上的和平。

《冒險島 IV》在遊戲玩法上與之前的遊戲有顯著不同，它放棄了線性街機風格的平台遊戲，轉而採用更開放、以探索為導向的遊戲，帶有輕型 RPG 元素，更類似於《怪物世界》系列的後續遊戲。

Perman - Return the Space Saucer! (Japan.name: 帕爾曼 - 拿回磁盤！！
Perman - Return the Space Saucer! (Japan.original_desc:
Perman: Enban wo Torikaese!! is an action platformer for the Nintendo Entertainment System. The game is based on a Japanese comics and has an animated television show.
Birdman's space saucer was stolen by Dr. Mad and its up to Perman to recover it and save the day.
The game features standard platforming and has two playable characters, Perman and Booby the monkey. There is also the boss battle that resembles a boardgame.
Perman - Return the Space Saucer! (Japan.desc:
帕爾曼：Enban wo Torikaese！是任天堂娛樂系統的動作平台遊戲。該遊戲改編自日本漫畫，並有動畫電視節目。
鳥人的太空飛碟被瘋狂博士偷走了，珀曼必須將其找回並拯救世界。
該遊戲採用標準平台遊戲，並有兩個可玩角色：Perman 和 Booby the Monkey。還有類似桌遊的boss戰。

Captain America and the Avengers (USA).name: 美國隊長和復仇者聯盟
Captain America and the Avengers (USA).original_desc:
The Mandarin has knocked out Iron Man and Vision. This time it is personal.

You play as Captain America or Hawkeye. You must fight your way through various thugs to rescue Iron Man and Vision. This game is a side scroller, somewhat reminiscent of Bionic Commando in which you fight through a level then move to an overhead map to decide where to go next.

Captain America's attacks are: when he is standing, shield throw; when he is crouching, punch and when he is jumping, kick. Also, if you push twice in a direction, Cap can do a powerful forward charge with his shield for a short distance.

Hawkeye's attacks are all arrow shots. He can shoot left, right, up, upper-left or upper-right.
