In battle mode, this is a two player, one-on-one battle. Player one chooses from Captain America or Hawkeye (the good guys) and player two chooses from Wizard, Ultron or Crossbones (the bad guys). You fight each other until one player has won three rounds.
Captain America and the Avengers (USA).desc:
滿大人擊敗了鋼鐵俠和幻視。這次是個人的。

你扮演美國隊長或鷹眼。你必須與各種暴徒戰鬥，拯救鋼鐵俠和幻視。這款遊戲是一款橫向捲軸遊戲，有點讓人想起《仿生突擊隊》，你在關卡中戰鬥，然後移動到俯視地圖來決定下一步該去哪裡。

美國隊長的攻擊方式是：站立時，投擲盾牌；站立時，投擲盾牌；站立時，投擲盾牌。當他蹲下時，用拳打；當他跳躍時，用腳踢。此外，如果你向一個方向推動兩次，隊長可以用他的盾牌在短距離內進行強大的向前衝鋒。

鷹眼的攻擊都是箭矢。他可以向左、向右、向上、左上或右上射擊。

在戰鬥模式中，這是一場兩人一對一的戰鬥。玩家一選擇美國隊長或鷹眼（好人），玩家二選擇巫師、奧創或交叉骨（壞人）。你們互相戰鬥，直到一名玩家贏得三輪勝利。

Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Trouble in Wack.key: Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Trouble in Wackyland (USA)
Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Trouble in Wack.original_name: Tiny Toon Adventures 2 : Trouble in Wackyland
Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Trouble in Wack.name: 小小卡通歷險記 2 : 古怪樂園的麻煩
Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Trouble in Wack.original_desc:
Buster Bunny receives an invitation to a newly opened amusement park. He gladly accepts, unaware of the fact this invitation is a trap. Now he and his friends have to overcome all the obstacles and to survive in the Wackyland...

"Trouble in Wackyland" consists of several mini-games which you can complete in no particular order. You have to reach the engine of a train in a standard side-scrolling platformer, keep your balance on a wooden plank while diving down dangerous waterfalls, compete in toy car tournament, etc. Once you gain enough tickets, you can access the Castle, that is standing behind the Amusement Park.
Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Trouble in Wack.desc:
巴斯特兔收到了去新開的遊樂園的邀請。他欣然接受，卻沒有意識到這個邀請是一個陷阱。現在，他和他的朋友們必須克服所有障礙，在古怪之地生存下去……

“Trouble in Wackyland”由幾個小遊戲組成，您可以不按特定順序完成這些小遊戲。你必須在標準的橫向捲軸平台遊戲中到達火車引擎，在木板上保持平衡，同時跳下危險的瀑布，參加玩具車錦標賽等。一旦你獲得足夠的門票，你就可以進入遊樂園後面的城堡。

Jetsons, The - Cogswell's Caper (USA).name: 傑森一家：科格斯韋爾的跳躍！
Jetsons, The - Cogswell's Caper (USA).original_desc:
The Jetsons: Cogwell's Caper is based on the well-known Jetsons property from Hanna-Barbera. In this spin-off adventure, George Jetson is tasked my his employer to put a stop to the profit-making schemes of the rival Cogswell's company. To do this, George must hop from location to location in his jet and conquer each level using the resources available to him, as well as with the assistance of the other Jetson franchise characters.

Cogswell's Caper is a side-scrolling action game where George Jetson can walk, crouch, and jump (actually, he's too lazy to jump and a jet pack handles the jumping duty for short bursts). Each level is littered with crates and other items that George can pick up and toss at enemies, while finding useful items (and occasionally even more enemies) underneath them. Since the game is set in the futuristic world of the Jetsons, there are also copious switches on walls which activate all kinds of features of the surroundings, such as a switch that reverses gravity for a brief time.
Jetsons, The - Cogswell's Caper (USA).desc:
《傑森一家》：科格韋爾的《Caper》以漢納-巴伯拉著名的傑森一家財產為基礎。在這部衍生冒險片中，喬治·傑特森的雇主責成他制止競爭對手科格斯韋爾公司的營利計劃。為此，喬治必須駕駛他的噴氣式飛機從一個地點跳到另一個地點，並利用他可用的資源以及其他《傑特森》系列角色的幫助來征服每個關卡。

Cogswell's Caper 是一款橫向捲軸動作遊戲，喬治·傑森可以行走、蹲伏和跳躍（實際上，他懶得跳躍，噴氣背包負責短時間的跳躍任務）。每個關卡都散佈著板條箱和其他物品，喬治可以撿起這些物品並扔向敵人，同時在它們下面找到有用的物品（有時甚至更多的敵人）。由於遊戲以傑森一家的未來世界為背景，因此牆壁上也有大量的開關，可以激活周圍環境的各種功能，例如可以短暫反轉重力的開關。

M.name: MC孩子們
M.original_desc: In McDonaldland you play as Mick or Mac on a mission to retrieve Ronald McDonald's stolen magic bag from the Hamburglar. Across more than 30 colorful levels, you meet characters like Birdie and Grimace, jump across platforms, ride boats, and collect Ronald's cards. To fend off animals and enemies, you throw bricks you collect along the way. The game features seven worlds and hidden bonus stages.
M.desc: 在麥當勞樂園中，您扮演米克或麥克，執行一項任務，從漢堡拉取回麥當勞叔叔被盜的魔法袋。在 30 多個色彩繽紛的關卡中，您會遇到小鳥和鬼臉等角色，跳過平台、乘船並收集羅納德的卡片。為了抵禦動物和敵人，你可以扔掉沿途收集的磚塊。該遊戲有七個世界和隱藏的獎勵階段。

Legendary Wings (USA).name: 傳奇之翼
Legendary Wings (USA).original_desc:
Legendary Wings is an arcade shooter influenced by Greek mythology. A heroic figure from ancient times thrust into a strange futuristic world, you must fight your way through six levels to defeat "The Devil" and save the day.

The primary gameplay mode is a top-down, vertical-scrolling shooter similar to Xevious and 1943. Your main weapon is used to attack flying enemies, and your secondary missile weapon is used to attack fixed placement, land-based enemies. Numerous powerups are available along the way, and these both improve your weapons and your resistance to damage (every "upgrade" is worth a free hit from enemies without dying).

Several secondary gameplay modes (Danger, Lucky, and Palace) are also triggered at key points in the vertical-scrolling mode. All of them are side-scrolling. The Danger stage requires you to face a gauntlet of enemies, while the Lucky stage is full of powerups, game continues, and other bonuses. The Palace stage is triggered when you defeat a mini-boss; you must get past the palace defenses before you can face the end-of-stage boss.
Legendary Wings (USA).desc:
Legendary Wings 是一款受希臘神話影響的街機射擊遊戲。一位遠古英雄人物被帶入了一個陌生的未來世界，你必須殺出一條血路，闖過六個關卡，打敗“魔鬼”並拯救世界。

主要遊戲模式是一個自上而下的垂直滾動射擊遊戲，類似於《Xevious》和《1943》。你的主要武器用於攻擊飛行的敵人，而你的輔助導彈武器則用於攻擊固定位置的陸基敵人。一路上有大量的能力提升，這些都可以提高你的武器和你對傷害的抵抗力（每一次“升級”都值得敵人免費攻擊而不會死亡）。

垂直滾動模式中的關鍵點還會觸發多種輔助遊戲模式（危險、幸運和宮殿）。所有這些都是橫向捲軸的。危險階段要求你面對敵人的挑戰，而幸運階段則充滿了能量提升、遊戲繼續和其他獎勵。擊敗小boss後會觸發宮殿關卡；你必須突破宮殿的防禦才能面對末日boss。

Kid Dracula (World) (Castlevania Anniver.name: 惡魔城特輯 - 德古拉君
Kid Dracula (World) (Castlevania Anniver.original_desc:
Kid Dracula is an unusual side-scroller from Konami.  It's  a parody of the company's popular Castlevania series. Instead of playing as a member of the Belmont family, you play as young Kid Dracula.

You have been woken up from your sleep by the evil demon Garamos, who's been wrecking havoc in Dracula's Castle. It's up to you to stop him by traveling across several different locations, including Dracula's Castle, New York, the Sea, and Egypt!

Gameplay consists of very standard jump and shoot platform action.  As you progress through the 8 levels, you gain the ability to perform spells, such as turning into a bat, and different special attacks, such as a spread / homing attack. You can also spend the coins you get when you defeat enemies in one of several mini-games that show up when you're between levels.
Kid Dracula (World) (Castlevania Anniver.desc:
Kid Dracula 是 Konami 推出的一款不尋常的橫向捲軸遊戲。這是對該公司流行的惡魔城系列的模仿。你不再扮演貝爾蒙特家族的成員，而是扮演年輕的德古拉小子。

你被邪惡的惡魔加拉莫斯從睡夢中叫醒，他一直在德古拉的城堡裡造成嚴重破壞。你需要穿越幾個不同的地點來阻止他，包括德古拉城堡、紐約、大海和埃及！

遊戲玩法包括非常標準的跳躍和射擊平台動作。當你通過 8 個級別時，你將獲得執行咒語的能力，例如變成蝙蝠，以及不同的特殊攻擊，例如擴散/歸巢攻擊。您還可以在關卡之間出現的多個迷你游戲之一中花費擊敗敵人時獲得的硬幣。

Dragon Warrior (USA) (Rev 1).name: 神龍大俠
Dragon Warrior (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
Dragon Warrior is the first famous console RPG. You assume the role of a descendant of Erdrick, a brave warrior of the past. Once upon a time, Erdrick defeated the evil Dragonlord with the help of the Ball of Light. Now, Dragonlord stole the Ball of Light, and your mission is to recover it and to restore peace in the world.

In Dragon Warrior, you move your character around in a top-down world. In cities and palaces you can talk to people, rest in inns and buy stuff in shops. There's a variety of weapons, equipment and armor to buy. 

When wandering around in the wilderness, you occasionally encounter enemies, and fight them from 1st person perspective. Combat is turn based: you select menu options while fighting - you can attack with your weapon, cast a spell (using up some of your magic energy), use and item or try to run. Killing monsters gives you experience, and, as is typical for RPGs, you level up and improve your stats when you gain enough experience. 

Like in later RPGs, you have limited hit points, lose them when you are attacked by enemies, and die when you run out of them. When your character dies in a battle, he is automatically restored in a nearby town.
Dragon Warrior (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
《龍戰士》是第一款著名的主機角色扮演遊戲。你扮演埃爾德里克的後裔，他是過去勇敢的戰士。曾幾何時，艾德里克在光球的幫助下擊敗了邪惡的龍王。現在，龍王偷走了光之球，你的任務是找回它並恢復世界和平。

在《龍大俠》中，你可以在自上而下的世界中移動你的角色。在城市和宮殿裡，你可以與人交談，在旅館休息，在商店購買東西。有各種武器、裝備和盔甲可供購買。

在荒野中徘徊時，偶爾會遇到敵人，並以第一人稱視角與他們戰鬥。戰鬥是回合製的：你在戰鬥時選擇菜單選項 - 你可以用你的武器攻擊，施展咒語（用掉你的一些魔法能量），使用物品或嘗試逃跑。殺死怪物會給你經驗，並且，正如角色扮演遊戲的典型特徵，當你獲得足夠的經驗時，你可以升級並提高你的統計數據。

就像後來的角色扮演遊戲一樣，你的生命值有限，當你被敵人攻擊時就會失去生命值，當你耗盡生命值時就會死亡。當你的角色在戰鬥中死亡時，他會自動在附近的城鎮中恢復。

Digital Devil Story - Megami Tensei II (.key: Digital Devil Story - Megami Tensei II (Japan) (Rev A) (Translated)
Digital Devil Story - Megami Tensei II (.original_name: Digital Devil Story : Megami Tensei II
Digital Devil Story - Megami Tensei II (.name: 數碼惡魔物語：女神轉生II
Digital Devil Story - Megami Tensei II (.original_desc:
In year 199X, a terrible disaster occurred. An atomic explosion destroyed large parts of the Earth and opened the way to a demonic invasion. The world lies in ruins, and the demons are ripping it apart. You control a group known as Devil Busters. Your mission is to prevent the demonic minions and their evil lord from dominating the entire planet.

In the beginning of the game, you create a party and allocate available skill points at your wish (upgrading strength, stamina, magic, etc.). When you level up, you can also distribute the gained points the way you like. Upon meeting a hostile creature, you can talk your way out of the battle or even convince a demon to fight for you. The game world is viewed partly from top-down perspective, and party from first-person perspective (in dungeons and battles).
Digital Devil Story - Megami Tensei II (.desc:
199X年，發生了一場可怕的災難。原子彈爆炸摧毀了地球的大部分地區，並為惡魔的入侵開闢了道路。世界已成為廢墟，惡魔正在將其撕裂。你控制著一個名為“惡魔剋星”的組織。你的任務是阻止惡魔爪牙和他們的邪惡領主統治整個星球。

在遊戲開始時，您創建一個隊伍並根據您的意願分配可用的技能點（升級力量、耐力、魔法等）。當你升級時，你還可以按照你喜歡的方式分配獲得的積分。當遇到敵對生物時，你可以通過說服退出戰鬥，甚至說服惡魔為你而戰。遊戲世界部分是從自上而下的角度來看的，而派對則是從第一人稱視角（在地下城和戰鬥中）。

Fire Emblem - Shadow Dragon and the Blad.key: Fire Emblem - Shadow Dragon and the Blade of Light (Japan) (Translated)
Fire Emblem - Shadow Dragon and the Blad.original_name: Fire Emblem : Ankoku Ryuu to Hikari no Tsurugi
Fire Emblem - Shadow Dragon and the Blad.name: 火之紋章：安國龍與光之劍
Fire Emblem - Shadow Dragon and the Blad.original_desc: Dark Forces have attacked the land of Aritia. You're controlling some of the members of the Aritan's forces that escaped from their country and came on the island of Tamis for safety. Unfortunately, a group of pirates is invading the Tamis, and it's up to you to control the island again.
Fire Emblem - Shadow Dragon and the Blad.desc: 黑暗勢力襲擊了阿里蒂亞的土地。你控制著阿里坦軍隊的一些成員，他們逃離了自己的國家，來到塔米斯島尋求安全。不幸的是，一群海盜正在入侵塔米斯群島，你需要再次控制該島。

EarthBound Beginnings (USA, Europe) (Vir.name: Mother Game～她們的階級～
EarthBound Beginnings (USA, Europe) (Vir.original_desc: Mother is a first person role playing game on Nes. You play as a young boy whose house is possessed by a tortured spirit. You soon discover that a tragedy has taken place there. With three other companions, you go on an adventure to understand the ins and outs of this mystery. Encounters with enemies are random and you can use special psychic powers to destroy them.
EarthBound Beginnings (USA, Europe) (Vir.desc: 《母親》是 Nes 上的第一人稱角色扮演遊戲。你扮演一個小男孩，他的房子被一個飽受折磨的靈魂佔據。你很快發現那裡發生了一場悲劇。你與另外三個同伴一起踏上冒險之旅，以了解這個謎團的來龍去脈。與敵人的遭遇是隨機的，你可以使用特殊的心靈力量來消滅他們。

Felix the Cat (USA).name: 菲利克斯貓
Felix the Cat (USA).original_desc:
Felix The Cat is a platformer based on the famous cartoon character.

The Professor has kidnapped Kitty, Felix girlfriend, trying to exchange her for Felix' magic bag. Naturally, Felix is not going to let himself be blackmailed, and instead sets out to free Kitty. 

There are four different types of levels. 

1. Typical platforming levels in which Felix has to make his way to the exit while jumping about obstacles and chasms, killing enemies using different weapons.

Swimming levels in which Felix rides a float or on the back of a dolphin.

Levels that take place entirely under water.

Flying levels that put Felix in control of different flying devices, such as a plane, a hot-air balloon or an umbrella.

Throughout all levels, Felix can collect cat symbols to improve his weapons. After collecting a certain number of cat symbols, milk bottles or hearts will appear. Hearts improve Felix' current weapon. What types of weapon Felix can use, depends on what type of level he is in. There are lots of different weapons ranging from a boxing glove to motorcycles to tanks to spaceships. All weapons that are better than the standard weapon have an energy bar that diminishes over time and can be refilled by collecting milk bottles. Getting hit by an enemy decreases the level of Felix' current weapon. If he gets hit while carrying the standard weapon, he loses a life.

The Game Boy version plays virtually identically to the NES version, but features less levels.
Felix the Cat (USA).desc:
菲利克斯貓是一款基於著名卡通人物的平台遊戲。

教授綁架了菲利克斯的女友凱蒂，試圖用她換取菲利克斯的魔法袋。菲利克斯自然不會讓自己被勒索，而是著手解救凱蒂。

有四種不同類型的級別。

1. 典型的平台關卡，菲利克斯必須在跳過障礙物和裂縫的同時到達出口，使用不同的武器殺死敵人。

菲利克斯騎在漂浮物上或騎在海豚背上的游泳關卡。

關卡完全發生在水下。

飛行關卡讓菲利克斯控制不同的飛行設備，例如飛機、熱氣球或雨傘。

在所有級別中，菲利克斯都可以收集貓符號來改進他的武器。收集一定數量的貓符號後，就會出現奶瓶或心形。紅心改進了菲利克斯當前的武器。菲利克斯可以使用什麼類型的武器，取決於他所在的關卡類型。有很多不同的武器，從拳擊手套到摩托車到坦克到宇宙飛船。所有比標準武器更好的武器都有一個能量條，該能量條會隨著時間的推移而減少，並且可以通過收集牛奶瓶來補充。被敵人擊中會降低菲利克斯當前武器的等級。如果他在攜帶標準武器時被擊中，他就會失去生命。

Game Boy 版本的玩法與 NES 版本幾乎相同，但關卡較少。

Golgo 13 - Top Secret Episode (USA).name: Golgo 13：絕密劇集
Golgo 13 - Top Secret Episode (USA).original_desc:
You play as Golgo 13, the greatest assassin for hire in the world. A vial of the deadliest biological weapon known to man, codenamed "Cassandra G.", has been stolen and you need to recover it before someone uses it on the unsuspecting world.

This is a traditionial side-scrolling game that uses a third-person view in cutscenes.
Golgo 13 - Top Secret Episode (USA).desc:
你扮演 Golgo 13，世界上最偉大的僱傭刺客。一瓶人類已知的最致命的生物武器，代號為“卡桑德拉 G.”，已被盜，你需要在有人在毫無戒心的世界上使用它之前將其找回。

這是一款傳統的橫向捲軸遊戲，在過場動畫中使用第三人稱視角。

Go Go! Nekketu Hockey Club - Multi-Sport.key: Go Go! Nekketu Hockey Club - Multi-Sport Battle (Japan) (Translated)
Go Go! Nekketu Hockey Club - Multi-Sport.original_name: Ike Ike! Nekketsu Hockey Bu : Subette Koronde Dai
Go Go! Nekketu Hockey Club - Multi-Sport.name: 走吧走吧！我跌倒了：我滑倒了。
Go Go! Nekketu Hockey Club - Multi-Sport.original_desc: Hey there, this is the Nekketsu High School Paper. Our own Kunio has become famous as a leader. With him we won both the dodge ball and soccer championships. They competed and won at the world stage, it is truly amazing. But did you know, Nekketsu High also has an ice hockey club? Sadly, our team is very weak... We probably won't even make the playoffs in the next national championship. Perhaps Kunio can lead our ice hockey team to victory as well. With him, would it become a successful team, or still be in the minor leagues? Passionate ice hockey spirit! Good luck everyone!
Go Go! Nekketu Hockey Club - Multi-Sport.desc: 嘿，這裡是熱結高中論文。我們自己的國夫已經作為領導者而聞名。和他一起，我們贏得了躲避球和足球冠軍。他們在世界舞台上競爭並獲勝，這確實令人驚嘆。但你知道熱結高中也有冰球部嗎？可悲的是，我們的隊伍很弱……下一屆全國錦標賽我們可能連季后賽都進不了。也許國夫也能帶領我們的冰球隊取得勝利。有了他，球隊會成為一支成功的球隊，還是仍然停留在小聯盟？熱情的冰球精神！祝大家好運！

Magic of Scheherazade, The (USA).name: 山魯佐德的魔法
Magic of Scheherazade, The (USA).original_desc:
The evil wizard Sabaron summoned a horde of demons to invade Arabia. One brave magician tried to fight Sabaron, but was trapped in the holes of time. This magician is you. Traveling through different time periods, you'll have to stop Sabaron's evil plans and to rescue the beautiful princess Scheherazade he kidnapped.

"Magic of Scheherazade" is a mixture of action- and turn-based combat RPG styles. Wandering through Arabia, you'll encounter enemies whom you'll fight in real time, using various weapons. You'll also be attacked by enemies with whom you'll engage in strategic, party-vs.-party combat. You can choose from three character classes: Fighter, Saint, and Magician. Each class has its own special abilities that you'll use in battles as well as during your exploration of the game world.
Magic of Scheherazade, The (USA).desc:
邪惡巫師薩巴倫召喚了一群惡魔入侵阿拉伯。一位勇敢的魔法師試圖與薩巴隆戰鬥，但被困在時間的縫隙中。這個魔術師就是你。穿越不同的時空，你必須阻止薩巴隆的邪惡計劃，並營救他綁架的美麗公主山魯佐德。

《Magic of Scheherazade》是動作和回合製戰鬥角色扮演遊戲風格的混合體。漫步阿拉伯半島，你會遇到敵人，並使用各種武器實時戰鬥。你還會受到敵人的攻擊，你將與他們進行戰略性的黨對黨戰鬥。您可以從三個角色類別中進行選擇：戰士、聖者和魔術師。每個職業都有自己的特殊能力，您可以在戰鬥以及探索遊戲世界時使用它們。

Mega Man 2 (USA).name: 洛克人2 威利博士之謎
Mega Man 2 (USA).original_desc:
After defeating Dr. Light's six robots that were reprogrammed by the villainous Dr. Wily in Mega Man, it seemed like the world was safe. But it was not to be. Dr. Wily has escaped from prison and is madder than ever, this time creating eight new Robot Masters of his own to take over the world and crush Mega Man! Is the world doomed?

In this game, Metal Man, Air Man, Bubble Man, Quick Man, Crash Man, Flash Man, Heat Man and Wood Man are Dr. Wily's eight prize creations that have been sent to take over the world. As Mega Man defeats these bosses, he can steal their powers and use them for himself. Each Robot Master is weak against another's weapon, and through experimentation, Mega Man can gain the upper hand by using the weapon they're vulnerable against.
This game introduces the 'E-Tank' - an item that can be used at any time to completely refill Mega Man's energy, and a Password System, which allows players to continue their game by recording which Robot Masters have been defeated and how many E-Tanks they have.
Mega Man 2 (USA).desc:
在擊敗《洛克人》中被邪惡的威利博士重新編程的萊特博士的六台機器人後，世界似乎安全了。但事實並非如此。威利博士越獄了，他比以往任何時候都更加瘋狂，這一次他自己創造了八個新的機器人大師來接管世界並粉碎洛克人！世界注定了嗎？

在這款遊戲中，金屬人、空氣人、泡泡人、快人、撞車人、閃電人、熱力人和木人是威利博士的八個獎品，他們被派去統治世界。當洛克人擊敗這些 Boss 時，他可以竊取他們的力量並為自己所用。每個機器人大師在對抗其他武器時都很弱，通過實驗，洛克人可以通過使用他們易受攻擊的武器來佔據上風。
該遊戲引入了“電子坦克”——一種可以隨時使用來完全補充洛克人能量的物品，以及密碼系統，該系統允許玩家通過記錄哪些機器人大師已被擊敗以及他們擁有多少電子坦克來繼續遊戲。

Battletoads-Double Dragon (USA).name: 戰蟾蜍和雙龍
Battletoads-Double Dragon (USA).original_desc:
Earth is under fire by Colossus, a battleship the size of a city. Using powerful laser cannons, it has destroyed most of Earth's defence forces, while its many troops clean up the rest of the planet. All expect for 5 warriors.

The Battletoads, who are well aware of evil forces in the galaxy, join forces with Billy and Jimmy Lee from Double Dragon to defend Earth from the deadly ship and its troops. Using a range of special moves you must fight your way through the streets into the heart of the ship and destroy it.
Battletoads-Double Dragon (USA).desc:
地球正遭受一艘城市大小的戰艦巨像的攻擊。它使用強大的激光炮摧毀了地球的大部分防禦力量，同時它的許多部隊清理了地球的其餘部分。所有人都期待 5 名戰士。

戰蟾蜍們深知銀河系中的邪惡勢力，他們與《雙截龍》中的比利和吉米·李聯手，保衛地球免受致命飛船及其部隊的侵害。你必須使用一系列特殊動作穿過街道進入船的中心並摧毀它。

Bucky O'Hare (USA).name: 巴基·奧黑爾
Bucky O'Hare (USA).original_desc:
Captain Bucky O'Hare and his loyal crew; Blinky, Deadeye, Jenny and Willy, fight to save the Aniverse from the scourge of the Toad Armada. That is until Bucky's ship is attacked and his crew taken prisoner. Now a lone bunny on a mission, Bucky must fight to rescue his comrades from four hostile planets and then confront the Air Marshall on his flagship.

Buck O'Hare is a side-scroller game based off of the cartoon of the same name. Bucky's main abilities are a jump and a blaster weapon, which he can charge up to make an even more powerful jump. Life and Weapon bars are displayed at the bottom of the screen. Bucky can obtain new weapons throughout the game from his crew members.
Bucky O'Hare (USA).desc:
巴基·奧黑爾船長和他忠誠的船員；布林基、神槍手、珍妮和威利，為拯救 Aniverse 免受蟾蜍艦隊的禍害而戰鬥。直到巴基的船遭到攻擊，他的船員被俘。巴基現在是一隻孤獨的兔子，正在執行一項任務，他必須努力從四個敵對的星球上營救他的戰友，然後在他的旗艦上對抗空軍元帥。

《Buck O'Hare》是一款根據同名漫畫改編的橫向捲軸遊戲。巴基的主要能力是跳躍和爆能武器，他可以充能以進行更強大的跳躍。生命和武器欄顯示在屏幕底部。巴基可以在整個遊戲過程中從他的船員那裡獲得新武器。

Toki (USA).name: 當然
Toki (USA).original_desc:
The hero of the game is a young jungle-man named Toki. One day the evil wizard Dr. Stark kidnaps his girlfriend Wanda. When Toki tries to save her, he is turned into a monkey! Now Toki has to find Dr. Stark in his palace, to rescue Wanda, and to become a human being again!

It is a platform game with a lot of various levels: jungle, underwater, volcanic caves, on the ice... Toki's only weapons are spitting on the enemies or jumping on them and crashing them. There are many possibilities to upgrade his spitting "weapon";  for example, if he finds an upgrade, he can spit fireballs. 

This game is ported from an older arcade version.
Toki (USA).desc:
遊戲的英雄是一位名叫 Toki 的年輕叢林男子。有一天，邪惡巫師斯塔克博士綁架了他的女朋友旺達。當托奇試圖救她時，他變成了一隻猴子！現在託基必須在斯塔克博士的宮殿裡找到他，拯救旺達，並重新成為人類！

這是一個平台遊戲，有很多不同的關卡：叢林、水下、火山洞穴、冰上……Toki 唯一的武器是向敵人吐口水或跳到他們身上並撞毀他們。升級他的吐痰“武器”有很多可能性； 例如，如果他發現升級，他可以吐出火球。

該遊戲是從較舊的街機版本移植而來的。

Devil World (Europe).name: 惡魔世界
Devil World (Europe).original_desc: Devil World is a scrolling maze game, strikingly similar to the classic Pac-Man, only with an undeniable religious bent. Collect dots in an automatically-scrolling maze directed by the devil himself, use crosses to power up and destroy his minions, and be careful not to get crushed by the walls. After collecting all the dots, you must collect bibles to seal up the source of the enemies and make the devil temporarily retreat. After this, there is a timed bonus stage where the player can control the scrolling, then the next round starts the cycle over from the beginning.
Devil World (Europe).desc: 《Devil World》是一款滾動迷宮遊戲，與經典的吃豆人極其相似，只是帶有不可否認的宗教傾向。在魔鬼親自指揮的自動滾動迷宮中收集點，使用十字來增強並摧毀他的爪牙，並小心不要被牆壁壓碎。收集完所有的點後，你必須收集聖經來封印敵人的源頭，讓惡魔暫時退卻。此後，有一個定時獎勵階段，玩家可以控制滾動，然後下一輪從頭開始循環。

Rockin' Kats (USA).name: 搖滾貓
Rockin' Kats (USA).original_desc:
Willy is a young jazz cat who goes by the name of "The Rockin' Kat". His girlfriend, Jill, was kidnapped by Mugsy, the local crime boss.

In this side scrolling game, you must help Rockin' Kat Willy to save his girlfriend through 7 stages. Each stage is a TV show broadcast through different channels of a TV set, and you must thus choose which channel you want to play. Through the channels Willy it will be sent to different themed shows such as western movies, gangster movies, etc, as well as some bonus channels.

Willy can walk and jump around, and carries as a weapon a spring-load Super Punch Gun, which he can put in diverse uses:

1. Knock his enemies: by pressing A.
Perform higher jumps: by jumping (B) and pressing down + A.
Spin Attack: by grabbing a ledge (A) and rotating with the d-pad.
Spin Jump: by grabbing a ledge (A), rotating with the d-pad and jumping (B).
Catch and Trow: by holding A, grabbing an object and releasing A.

He can also buy attachments that will make his gun more powerful, such as the Bomber, the Twin Balls, the Hammer Punch and the Jet Sneakers. 

Rockin' Kats is so cartoonish that you might expect to see it on Saturday morning TV.
Rockin' Kats (USA).desc:
威利是一隻年輕的爵士貓，綽號“搖滾貓”。他的女友吉爾被當地犯罪頭目穆格西綁架。

在這款橫向捲軸遊戲中，您必須幫助 Rockin' Kat Willy 通過 7 個關卡來拯救他的女朋友。每個階段都是通過電視機的不同頻道播放的電視節目，因此您必須選擇要播放的頻道。通過Willy頻道，它會被發送到不同主題的節目，如西部片、黑幫片等，以及一些獎勵頻道。

威利可以行走和跳躍，並攜帶一把彈簧超級拳擊槍作為武器，他可以將其用於多種用途：

1.擊倒敵人：按A鍵。
執行更高的跳躍：跳躍 (B) 並按下 + A。
旋轉攻擊：抓住壁架 (A) 並使用方向鍵旋轉。
旋轉跳躍：抓住壁架 (A)，用方向鍵旋轉並跳躍 (B)。
Catch and Trow：按住 A，抓住物體並釋放 A。

他還可以購買使他的槍更加強大的附件，例如轟炸機、雙球、錘擊和噴氣運動鞋。

《Rockin' Kats》非常卡通化，您可能會在周六早間的電視節目中看到它。

Mega Man 3 (USA).name: 洛克人 3
Mega Man 3 (USA).original_desc:
It's the robot revolt, and no one is safe! Mega Man is even less safe than anyone else. This time, our super-powered cybernetic friend is up against a horde of metal crazies who are sick and tired of obeying!

Mega Man 3 is a traditional action-platformer: you jump from brick to brick while avoiding pits and shooting robots.
It's the first time in a Mega Man that you can slide instead of merely walking and that you get a sidekick. Rush is your dog who helps out by offering other modes of transportation when you need it.
Enemies will often supply you with both energy and ammo refills. You can also collect Energy Tanks which can only be used once but will entirely restore your health. And, of course, you do get infinite continues and a password feature to resume play at the beginning of any level.
Mega Man 3 (USA).desc:
這是一場機器人叛亂，沒有人是安全的！洛克人比其他人更不安全。這一次，我們的超能力控制論朋友面對的是一群厭倦了服從的金屬狂人！

《洛克人 3》是一款傳統的動作平台遊戲：您需要從一塊磚跳到另一塊磚，同時避開坑並射擊機器人。
這是《洛克人》中第一次你可以滑行而不僅僅是行走，而且你還得到了一個夥伴。Rush 是您的狗，它會在您需要時提供其他交通方式來提供幫助。
敵人通常會為你提供能量和彈藥補充。您還可以收集只能使用一次的能量罐，但會完全恢復您的生命值。當然，您確實可以獲得無限繼續和密碼功能，可以在任何級別開始時恢復遊戲。

Moon Crystal (Japan) (Translated).name: 月亮水晶
Moon Crystal (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
Moon Crystal is a platform action game where you control Ricky Slater on his mission to free his kidnapped father from the evil Count Crimson. The Count is forcing his father, a great scientist, to use the power of the moon crystal to turn the dead into living and rule the world.

There are 7 stages, each ending with a boss fight. The themes of the stages follow the story closely. The player begins each stage with only small knife to defend yourself. The player can find power-ups that can extend the range of your knife, give additional health containers, allow Ricky to make double jumps etc. The player has 3 lives and also an unlimited amount of continues.

The game is notable for its fluid animations and rich graphic cut scenes which moves the story forward. It was never officially released outside of Japan, but an unofficial English translation patch exists.
Moon Crystal (Japan) (Translated).desc:
Moon Crystal 是一款平台動作遊戲，您將控制 Ricky Slater 執行任務，將他被綁架的父親從邪惡的 Crimson 伯爵手中解救出來。伯爵逼迫他偉大的科學家父親利用月晶的力量起死回生，統治世界。

有 7 個階段，每個階段都以 Boss 戰結束。舞台的主題與故事密切相關。玩家在每個階段開始時只用小刀來保護自己。玩家可以找到可以擴大刀射程的能量提升，提供額外的生命值容器，允許瑞奇進行二段跳等。玩家有 3 條生命，並且連續次數不受限制。

該遊戲以其流暢的動畫和豐富的圖形過場動畫而聞名，推動了故事的發展。它從未在日本以外的地區正式發布，但存在非官方的英文翻譯補丁。

Castlevania III - Dracula's Curse (USA).name: 惡魔城 III : 德古拉的詛咒
Castlevania III - Dracula's Curse (USA).original_desc:
Only you can stop Dracula from drawing first blood!

Led by the immortal Count Dracula, the greatest army of evil ever assembled is poised to bury mankind in a Tomb of Terror. Destroying this legion of Swamp Dragons, Slasher Skeletons and Forces of the Undead will be the supreme challenge for the mightiest of warriors.

Your place in history is 100 years before Simon Belmont's birth. Dracula is young at heart, and it will take more than a stake to penetrate his evil. Luckily, you command the role of Trevor - Simon's forefather and the origin of the Belmont Warlord Chromosones.
Castlevania III - Dracula's Curse (USA).desc:
只有你才能阻止德古拉吸第一滴血！

在不朽的德古拉伯爵的領導下，有史以來最強大的邪惡軍隊集結起來，準備將人類埋葬在恐怖之墓中。對於最強大的戰士來說，消滅這支由沼澤巨龍、骷髏殺手和不死軍團組成的軍團將是一項至高無上的挑戰。

您在歷史上的地位是西蒙·貝爾蒙特出生前 100 年。德古拉心地年輕，要洞察他的邪惡，需要的不僅僅是一根木樁。幸運的是，你扮演特雷弗這個角色，他是西蒙的祖先，也是貝爾蒙特軍閥克羅莫索斯的起源。

Iron Tank - The Invasion of Normandy (US.key: Iron Tank - The Invasion of Normandy (USA)
Iron Tank - The Invasion of Normandy (US.original_name: Iron Tank : The Invasion of Normandy
Iron Tank - The Invasion of Normandy (US.name: 鋼鐵坦克:諾曼底入侵
Iron Tank - The Invasion of Normandy (US.original_desc: In 1944 the United Forces are preparing their final assault on the Normandy coast. The mission is to break through the front lines and destroy enemy headquarters. To spearhead the invasion, they have chose Paul from Command Unit 88, also known as Iron Snake. To succeed in his mission, Paul will need all the firepower of the mightiest fighting vehicle, the Iron Tank. Iron Tank is played from an overhead view with a scrolling screen. You need to control the Iron Tank and it's varied weapons and power ups to rescue hostages and defeat enemy forces.
Iron Tank - The Invasion of Normandy (US.desc: 1944 年，聯軍正在準備對諾曼底海岸進行最後的進攻。任務是突破前線並摧毀敵方總部。為了帶頭入侵，他們選擇了來自 88 號指揮部隊（也被稱為鐵蛇）的保羅。為了成功完成他的使命，保羅需要最強大的戰車“鋼鐵坦克”的所有火力。《鋼鐵坦克》是通過滾動屏幕從俯視角度進行遊戲的。你需要控製鋼鐵坦克及其各種武器和能量提升來營救人質並擊敗敵軍。

Destiny of an Emperor (USA).name: 皇帝的命運
Destiny of an Emperor (USA).original_desc: A role-playing game for the NES set within the Romance of the Three Kingdoms mythos that has spawned games on nearly every platform imaginable.  A party is formed by selecting up to five officers from a huge pool, many of whom would only join you after be bribed or defeated in combat.  Officers in turn each had a certain amount of soldiers, which essentially acted as hit points (i.e. Si Ma Ye leads 40000 men, and when he is hit by Zhang Bao, he loses 5000 men, so his manpower is now at 35000).  One of the first games on the NES to attempt to simulate large scale combat between different forces, although obviously in a very limited way.
Destiny of an Emperor (USA).desc: 這是一款以三國傳奇神話為背景的紅白機角色扮演遊戲，幾乎在所有可以想像的平台上都衍生出了遊戲。一支隊伍的組建是從一個巨大的人才庫中選出最多五名軍官，其中許多人只有在被賄賂或在戰鬥中被擊敗後才會加入你。軍官們又各有一定數量的士兵，實質上是作為生命值（即司馬夜率領四萬人，被張苞擊中後損失五千人，所以兵力現在為三萬五千）。這是 NES 上最早嘗試模擬不同勢力之間大規模戰鬥的遊戲之一，儘管方式顯然非常有限。

Rollergames (USA).name: 輪滑遊戲
Rollergames (USA).original_desc:
This is a platform game in the same fashion as Turtles II, that is that it's a sidescroller were you can move up and down on the screen, but you go on rollerskates. This makes the game go much faster than its counterpart, which adds difficulty and also a sense of speed.

It includes a silly story about three different roller skates gangs (somewhat like motor cycle gangs) in a close future, which is most an excuse for the game to exist.

You can choose between three different gangs, one is all-around, one is fast and weak (and consists of women) and one is slow and strong, you get the fashion. This adds some replayability, but in reality, they are kind of the same.

The game also suffers from trial and error; you must learn the courses if you want to master them. Luckily, the game has unlimited continues.
Rollergames (USA).desc:
這是一款與《海龜 II》風格相同的平台遊戲，即它是一款橫向捲軸遊戲，你可以在屏幕上上下移動，但你需要滑旱冰鞋。這使得遊戲比同類游戲快得多，這增加了難度，也增加了速度感。

它包括一個關於不久的將來三個不同的輪滑幫（有點像摩托車幫）的愚蠢故事，這最多是遊戲存在的藉口。

你可以在三種不同的幫派之間進行選擇，一種是全能的，一種是快速而弱的（由女性組成），一種是緩慢而強大的，你會得到時尚。這增加了一些可重玩性，但實際上，它們是相同的。

遊戲也會經歷反複試驗；如果你想掌握這些課程，你就必須學習它們。幸運的是，遊戲可以無限繼續。

Flintstones, The - The Surprise at Dinos.key: Flintstones, The - The Surprise at Dinosaur Peak! (USA)
Flintstones, The - The Surprise at Dinos.original_name: The Flintstones : The Surprise at Dinosaur Peak
Flintstones, The - The Surprise at Dinos.name: 摩登原始人:恐龍峰的驚喜
Flintstones, The - The Surprise at Dinos.original_desc:
Fred and Barney are searching for their children, Pebbles and Bam-Bam who got lost. When they finally find them, a volcanic eruption blocks their way and so they start going all the way around the mountain to find out why this happened and of course to save their children. 

The Surprise at Dinosaur Peak is the second Flintstones-licensed game for the NES. There are two characters you can play with. By pressing the Select button you can change from Fred to Barney and vice versa. Each character has unique abilities that are needed to complete certain parts of each stage. For example Fred can grab the edges of a roof or a hill and climb while Barney can hang from ropes and vines. In terms of weapons Fred has a bat which is stronger and can also be charged for extra power but it takes more time to use. Barney on the other hand has a slingshot and can shoot small rocks for ranged attacks but rather weak. There are also weapons like throwing axes and bowling balls that both can use.
Flintstones, The - The Surprise at Dinos.desc:
弗雷德和巴尼正在尋找迷路的孩子佩布爾斯和巴姆巴姆。當他們終於找到他們時，火山爆發擋住了他們的去路，所以他們開始繞山尋找發生這種情況的原因，當然也是為了拯救他們的孩子。

《恐龍峰的驚喜》是第二款獲得 Flintstones 授權的 NES 遊戲。有兩個角色可以玩。通過按選擇按鈕，您可以從 Fred 更改為 Barney，反之亦然。每個角色都有完成每個階段的某些部分所需的獨特能力。例如，弗雷德可以抓住屋頂或山丘的邊緣並攀爬，而巴尼可以掛在繩子和藤蔓上。在武器方面，弗雷德有一把球棒，它的力量更大，也可以充電以獲得額外的力量，但使用起來需要更多的時間。另一方面，巴尼有彈弓，可以發射小石頭進行遠程攻擊，但相當弱。還有一些武器，如投擲斧頭和保齡球，兩者都可以使用。

Raging Fire - Recca (Japan) (Translated).name: 夏季嘉年華 '92：雷卡
Raging Fire - Recca (Japan) (Translated).original_desc: Conceived as an entry for a game development competition, this game would later be published by Naxat Soft in 1992.  This frenetic shoot-'em-up taxes the Famicom system and the player's reflexes with huge quantities of enemies while maintaining smooth, fast gameplay!  In addition to a single player campaign, there are also score attack and time attack modes available.
Raging Fire - Recca (Japan) (Translated).desc: 這款遊戲最初是作為遊戲開發競賽的參賽作品而構思的，後來由 Naxat Soft 於 1992 年發布。這款瘋狂的射擊遊戲對 Famicom 系統和玩家的反應能力造成了巨大的考驗，同時還要保持流暢、快速的遊戲體驗！除了單人戰役外，還有得分攻擊和時間攻擊模式可供選擇。

Legend of Fuma, The (Japan) (Translated).name: 月風按摩電動
Legend of Fuma, The (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
In the first years of the Demon Age, a horrible demon named "Dragon Master" was revived by his minions in hell. To protect the peace of the overworld, the two eldest Fuuma brothers fought the Dragon Master. Both were unable to defeat him and were killed, losing their legendary Wave Swords, also called Hadoukens. To avenge their deaths, the last of the Fuuma brothers vowed to slay the Dragon Master, and take back the Hadoukens.

Getsufuma Den is an action game with slight RPG elements. You travel through the overworld on pre-determined paths, which branch most of the time, leading you to shops, places where you can encounter other characters, and dungeons. Once you descend into a dungeon, you navigate your character on a platform, jumping and fighting enemies with your sword or other weapons. There are also a few first-person dungeons later in the game. In the dungeons you can collect money and then use it to buy weapons and other accessories on the overworld.
Legend of Fuma, The (Japan) (Translated).desc:
惡魔時代的最初幾年，一個名為“龍主”的可怕惡魔被他的爪牙在地獄中復活。為了保護世界的和平，風魔兩位大兄弟與龍王展開了戰鬥。兩人都無法擊敗他並被殺，失去了傳奇的波動劍，也稱為波動劍。為了報仇，最後的風魔兄弟發誓要殺死龍王，奪回波道劍。

Getsufuma Den 是一款帶有輕微 RPG 元素的動作遊戲。你沿著預先確定的路徑穿越主世界，這些路徑大部分時間都是分支的，引導你前往商店、可以遇到其他角色的地方和地牢。一旦你進入地牢，你就可以在平台上導航你的角色，跳躍並用你的劍或其他武器與敵人戰鬥。遊戲後期還有一些第一人稱地下城。在地下城中，你可以收集金錢，然後用它在主世界上購買武器和其他配件。

Kung-Fu Heroes (USA).name: 功夫英雄
Kung-Fu Heroes (USA).original_desc:
Kung-Fu masters Jacky and Lee (Lee and Loo in the arcade version) return to their kingdom from a long trip. They discover that in their absence, Princess Min-min has been kidnapped and the 10 treasures of the kingdom stolen. Jacky and Lee must fight their way into eight different castles in order to defeat the monsters and rescue the princess.

Chinese Hero is a top-down action game for one or two players, both playing on the same screen. Each ninja has the ability to move in any of four directions: up, down, left and right, as well as punch directly in front of them and do a "Moon Sault Kick" (which can be powered up to a "Miracle Kick") whereby they jump and somersault directly in front. Both punches and the Moon Sault Kick can harm enemies. Defeating a certain number of enemies on each level will open the doorway into the next level. Occasionally extra passages (named "Quick Passage Zone") can be found to take shortcuts through areas with stronger enemies. At times, defeated enemies will leave power-ups behind which either player can collect in order to increase their abilities temporarily. While power-ups are diverse, here are examples of some of the effects: weakening specific enemies, invincibility, increased attack, extra lives and the ability to use projectile attacks.
Kung-Fu Heroes (USA).desc:
功夫大師 Jacky 和 Lee（街機版中的 Lee 和 Loo）結束長途旅行回到他們的王國。他們發現，在他們不在的情況下，敏敏公主被綁架了，王國的 10 件寶藏也被盜了。傑基和李必須殺入八座不同的城堡才能打敗怪物並拯救公主。

《中華英雄》是一款自上而下的動作遊戲，可供一或兩名玩家在同一屏幕上玩。每個忍者都有能力在四個方向中的任何一個方向移動：上、下、左、右，以及直接在他們面前出拳，並做“月衝踢”（可以增強為“奇蹟踢”），從而在正前方跳躍和翻筋斗。拳擊和月衝踢都可以傷害敵人。在每個關卡中擊敗一定數量的敵人將打開進入下一個關卡的大門。偶爾會發現額外的通道（稱為“快速通道區”），以走捷徑穿過敵人更強的區域。有時，被擊敗的敵人會留下能量道具，玩家可以收集這些能量道具來暫時增強自己的能力。雖然能力提升多種多樣，但以下是一些效果的示例：削弱特定敵人、無敵、攻擊力增加、額外生命以及使用投射物攻擊的能力。

Krazy Kreatures (USA) (Rev A) (Unl).name: 瘋狂的生物
Krazy Kreatures (USA) (Rev A) (Unl).original_desc: Krazy Kreatures is an action strategy game for one or two players. Critters of all sorts will fill up the game board and you need to move them around to line up creatures of the same type before the entire board becomes filled. Depending on the type of creature, you will need to line up 3, 4, 5, or 6 of the same type of creature for them to disappear. After you have cleared a certain number of creatures, the board will stop filling up and you have a limited amount of time to try to clear as many creatures as possible for bonus points. As the levels progress the game board changes shape and will fill up faster and faster with different creatures.
Krazy Kreatures (USA) (Rev A) (Unl).desc: Krazy Kreatures 是一款適合一到兩名玩家的動作策略遊戲。各種生物都會填滿遊戲板，您需要在整個板被填滿之前移動它們以排列相同類型的生物。根據生物的類型，您需要將 3、4、5 或 6 個相同類型的生物排成一行才能讓它們消失。當你清除了一定數量的生物後，棋盤將停止填充，並且你有有限的時間來嘗試清除盡可能多的生物以獲得獎勵積分。隨著關卡的進展，遊戲板的形狀會發生變化，並且會越來越快地充滿不同的生物。

Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!! (Japan, USA) (R.name: 邁克·泰森的出拳！ ！
Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!! (Japan, USA) (R.original_desc:
Step into the ring as Little Mac, a 17-year-old fighter from the Bronx, ranked number three in the minor circuit. Your goal is to work your way up through the rankings so that you can challenge Mike Tyson, in a dream fight.

The rules of the World Video Boxing Association govern your bouts. Each match is three three-minute rounds long. Any boxer knocked down for a 10 count is Knocked Out (KO). If a boxer goes down three times, he'll find himself a Technical Knock Out (TKO). If both boxers make it to the end of the third round, the ref determines the winner.

Once you're in the ring you'll have to beat your opponent with smart fighting. Use left and right punches, as well as uppercuts to knock your opponent to the mat. Dodge your opponent's blows with some fancy footwork. Dazzle them with your brilliance and you'll be the World Video Boxing Association Champion. On the other hand, you might find yourself down for the count.
Mike Tyson's Punch-Out!! (Japan, USA) (R.desc:
來自布朗克斯的 17 歲拳擊手小麥克 (Little Mac) 踏入拳擊場，在小巡迴賽中排名第三。你的目標是不斷提升排名，以便在一場夢想之戰中挑戰邁克·泰森。

世界視頻拳擊協會的規則管轄您的比賽。每場比賽分為三輪，每輪三分鐘。任何拳擊手數到 10 次被擊倒即被擊倒 (KO)。如果一名拳擊手失敗了 3 次，他就會被技術擊倒 (TKO)。如果兩名拳擊手都進入第三輪結束，則由裁判決定獲勝者。

一旦你進入擂台，你就必須通過巧妙的戰鬥擊敗對手。使用左右拳以及上勾拳將對手擊倒在墊子上。用一些花哨的步法躲避對手的攻擊。用你的才華讓他們眼花繚亂，你將成為世界視頻拳擊協會冠軍。另一方面，你可能會發現自己在倒計時。

Darkwing Duck (USA).name: 迪士尼的黑翼鴨
Darkwing Duck (USA).original_desc: The kingpins of crime are at it again! The mysterious criminal organization F.O.W.L. has hatched a plan to take control of the peaceful city of St. Canard. Six of their most heinous henchmen are running rampant through the city and only the daring Darkwing Duck can bring them to justice! Join Darkwing as he explores the woods to weed out Bushroot's evil plan. Search the warehouses along the wharf for Mega Volt and pull the plug on an electrifying scheme. Track down all six of FOWL's crafty criminals and then prepare yourself as Darkwing squares off against the sinister Steelbeak in his fiendish floating fortress!
Darkwing Duck (USA).desc: 犯罪頭目再次作案！神秘犯罪組織F.O.W.L.制定了一項計劃來控制寧靜的聖卡納德市。他們的六名最令人髮指的追隨者正在城市中橫行，只有勇敢的暗翼鴨才能將他們繩之以法！與暗翼一起探索森林，消滅布什根的邪惡計劃。在碼頭沿線的倉庫中搜索兆伏特並停止一項電氣化計劃。追踪 FOWL 的所有六名狡猾的罪犯，然後做好準備，讓暗翼在他邪惡的浮動堡壘中對抗險惡的鋼喙！

Mysterious Murasame Castle, The (Japan).name: Nazo no Murasamejou
Mysterious Murasame Castle, The (Japan).original_desc:
In feudal Japan, an evil alien descends upon Murasame castle and takes over a giant statue, which then continues to spread its influence over four neighbouring castles. The samurai apprentice Takamaru is thus summoned to recapture the castles and then take on the alien itself.

Nazo no Murasamejou is a fast-paced action game that has some similarities with The Legend of Zelda, although it is faster and has none of the RPG/Adventure elements. It is also much more linear: You fight through the castles one after the other, with each stage consisting of the path to the castle and the castle itself, where the boss is waiting.

Your have two weapons: (unlimited) shurikens for ranged attacks and a sword for melee combat. The sword is automatically used when you are close enough to an enemy, and it can also be used to deflect enemy shurikens. But since you are constantly under attack by ninjas from all directions and also have only a limited time to finish each stage, the game is still quite hard.
Mysterious Murasame Castle, The (Japan).desc:
在封建日本，一個邪惡的外星人降臨村雨城堡並佔領了一座巨大的雕像，然後該雕像繼續將其影響力擴展到四個鄰近的城堡。武士學徒高丸因此被召喚來奪回城堡，然後對抗外星人。

Nazo no Murasamejou 是一款快節奏的動作遊戲，與《塞爾達傳說》有一些相似之處，儘管它速度更快並且沒有任何 RPG/冒險元素。它也更加線性：你在一個又一個的城堡中戰鬥，每個階段都由通往城堡的路徑和城堡本身組成，老闆正在那裡等待。

你有兩種武器：（無限）用於遠程攻擊的手裡劍和用於近戰的劍。當你距離敵人足夠近時，劍會自動使用，它也可以用來偏轉敵人的手裡劍。但由於你不斷受到來自四面八方的忍者的攻擊，而且完成每個關卡的時間也有限，所以遊戲還是相當困難的。

Metal Slader Glory (Japan) (Translated).name: 金屬斯萊德的榮耀
Metal Slader Glory (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
Metal Slader Glory is a graphic adventure game where the player interacts with the protagonist's surrounding via a menu-based commands. The commands the player can choose varies between context, which usually ranges from talking to supporting characters to investigating the surrounding. The player must explore every possible option in order for new choices to appear. However, if the player makes a wrong selection, the game will end and the player must restart the game from where they left off. The player can quit at any point of the game and continue later via a password feature.
The game takes place eight years after a great war was waged between colonies in outer space, and peace has finally settled back onto the Earth. The main character, a 17-year-old war orphan named Tadashi Himukai, purchases a used worker-mech in order to start a construction business with his girlfriend, Elina Furfa. However, when he first activates it, the worker-mech disguise falls away, revealing a combat model Metal Slader, which were all supposedly dismantled after the war, and an enigmatic message is displayed in the cockpit: "EARTH IN PERIL... SEEK THE CREATOR". Prompted by this warning, Tadashi, his sister Azusa, and Elina head out into space to find the answers behind it.
It was the final game released by HAL Laboratory as an independent third-party developer before their buy-out by Nintendo. The game's story and character designs were done by manga artist Yoshimiru Hoshi, who loosely based the game on his 1984 manga Akûtensô Fixallia
Metal Slader Glory (Japan) (Translated).desc:
Metal Slader Glory 是一款圖形冒險遊戲，玩家通過基於菜單的命令與主角周圍的環境進行交互。玩家可以選擇的命令因環境而異，通常範圍從與支持角色交談到調查周圍環境。玩家必須探索每一個可能的選項，以便出現新的選擇。然而，如果玩家做出錯誤的選擇，遊戲就會結束，玩家必須從上次中斷的地方重新開始遊戲。玩家可以在遊戲的任何時刻退出並通過密碼功能稍後繼續。
遊戲發生在外太空殖民地之間爆發大戰八年後，和平終於回到了地球。主角是一名 17 歲的戰爭孤兒，名叫 Tadashi Himukai，他購買了一台二手工人機甲，以便與女友 Elina Furfa 一起開展建築業務。然而，當他第一次激活它時，工人機甲的偽裝消失了，露出了戰鬥模型金屬史萊德，據說這些模型在戰後都被拆除了，駕駛艙中顯示了一條神秘的信息：“地球處於危險之中……尋找造物主”。受到這個警告的啟發，正、他的妹妹梓和艾琳娜前往太空尋找其背後的答案。
這是 HAL Laboratory 在被任天堂收購之前作為獨立第三方開發商發行的最後一款遊戲。該遊戲的故事和角色設計由漫畫家 Yoshimiru Hoshi 完成，該遊戲大致基於他 1984 年的漫畫 Akûtensô Fixallia

Monster in My Pocket (USA).name: 我口袋裡的怪物
Monster in My Pocket (USA).original_desc:
The evil Warlock wants to take over the world! He calls his fellow monsters to join him, but several refuse - and after casting a shrinking spell that backfires and shrinks down all the monsters around him, transporting them to different homes in Los Angeles.

Warlock didn't let his size impairment get in the way of world domination, however, so it's up to The Vampire and The Monster to stop him! Along the way, both characters will have to fight through Warlock's henchmonsters through the streets, sewers, a construction area and even a Japanese garden.

The game features classic platforming action. The player only has one all-purpose attack and they can also double jump to avoid enemies or reach high ledges. The player can also pick up small objects and use them to attack several enemies at once. If there's only one player, they can choose between The Vampire or The Monster. Or if they don't want to go alone, a friend can join in and help them beat Warlock in the two player co-op mode.

The game is based on the Monster In My Pocket toy franchise. The package also included a limited edition Monster in My Pocket toy, Blemmyea (#81), which was only available with this game.
Monster in My Pocket (USA).desc:
邪惡的術士想要統治世界！他召喚他的怪物同伴加入他的行列，但有幾個拒絕了——在施展了一個縮小咒語後，適得其反，他周圍的所有怪物都縮小了，把它們傳送到了洛杉磯的不同家中。

然而，術士並沒有讓他的體型缺陷妨礙他統治世界，所以吸血鬼和怪物來阻止他！一路上，兩個角色都必須穿過街道、下水道、建築區甚至日本花園，與術士的追隨怪物戰鬥。

該遊戲以經典的平台動作為特色。玩家只有一種全能攻擊，他們還可以二段跳來躲避敵人或到達高處。玩家還可以撿起小物體並用它們同時攻擊多個敵人。如果只有一名玩家，他們可以在吸血鬼或怪物之間進行選擇。或者，如果他們不想單獨行動，朋友可以加入並幫助他們在兩人合作模式中擊敗術士。

該遊戲基於“我的口袋裡的怪物”玩具系列。該套裝還包括限量版《口袋裡的怪物》玩具 Blemmyea (#81)，僅在本遊戲中提供。

Pinball Quest (USA).name: 彈球任務
Pinball Quest (USA).original_desc: Billed as a pinball role-playing game, though the term is used loosely, as you only earn gold to buy stoppers and more powerful flippers.  Actually, there are four different modes of play.  The RPG-mode has six, multi-screen pinball tables, where you use your flippers to knock the pinball into enemies, find keys, and eventually rescue Princess Bali.  The other modes, POP!POP!, Viva Golf, and Circus, are each specialized multi-screen pinball tables involving sports, golf, and the circus.  The latter has a slot machine and a bonus game in which you throw balls at animals to save the girl they are chasing.
Pinball Quest (USA).desc: 宣傳為一款彈球角色扮演遊戲，但這個詞的使用很寬鬆，因為你只能賺取金幣來購買球塞和更強大的腳蹼。實際上，有四種不同的遊戲模式。RPG 模式有六個多屏幕彈球桌，您可以使用腳蹼將彈球撞向敵人，找到鑰匙，並最終營救巴厘島公主。其他模式，POP！ POP！ 、Viva Golf 和 Circus，都是專門的多屏幕彈球桌，涉及體育、高爾夫和馬戲。後者有一台老虎機和一個獎勵遊戲，您可以向動物扔球以拯救它們正在追趕的女孩。

Metal Gear (USA).name: Metal Gear (虛構武器)
Metal Gear (USA).original_desc:
Crazed Colonel Vermon CaTaffy poses new terrorist threat to the world.
Outer Heaven leader CaTaffy has activated the ultimate super weapon: Metal Gear!
Responding to the crisis, covert unit "Fox Hound" is called into action, and that's where you come into play. Trained in hand-to-hand combat and skilled in every weapon known to man, you're Fox Hound's lethal fighting machine, code named "Solid Snake".
But on this mission you better be sly as well, to surprise heavily armed enemies, busting 'em up quietly and rescuing their hostages before alarms are triggered.
Plus you gottamaintain radio contact with Commander South, who'll feed you you crucial info on Metal Gear's whereabouts. To survive, capture submachine guns, Barettas, grenade launchers, and plastic explosives...
Until you find and destroy Metal Gear, ending CaTaffy's reign of terror.
For one player only.
Metal Gear (USA).desc:
瘋狂的弗蒙·卡塔菲上校對世界構成了新的恐怖威脅。
外天堂領袖卡塔菲激活了終極超級武器：合金裝備！
為了應對危機，秘密單位“獵狐犬”被召集起來採取行動，這就是你發揮作用的地方。你接受過肉搏戰訓練，精通人類已知的每種武器，是獵狐犬的致命戰鬥機器，代號為“Solid Snake”。
但在這次任務中，你最好也要狡猾，讓全副武裝的敵人出其不意，悄悄地消滅他們，並在警報觸發之前解救他們的人質。
另外，你必須與南方指揮官保持無線電聯繫，他會向你提供有關《合金裝備》行踪的重要信息。為了生存，奪取衝鋒槍、巴雷塔槍、榴彈發射器和塑料炸藥......
直到您找到並摧毀《合金裝備》，結束卡塔菲的恐怖統治。
僅限一名玩家。

Alfred Chicken (USA).name: 阿爾弗雷德·雞
Alfred Chicken (USA).original_desc:
Alfred the chicken must rescue his friends and his bird (pardon the pun) Floella from the Meka Chickens. The result is a platform game across differently-themed levels, which are finished by either climbing to the top of the level or killing a boss. Bonus games and secret rooms have been included, and progression sometimes requires solving positional puzzles.

Alfred cannot fly, but he can use ramps to jump up and hit enemies with his bionic beak - this kills them, but any other contact will hurt Alfred. Watch out for spiked snails though. Other enemies include whales armed with guns, and stray bombs.
Alfred Chicken (USA).desc:
小雞阿爾弗雷德必須從梅卡雞手中救出他的朋友和他的鳥（請原諒這個雙關語）弗洛埃拉。結果是一款跨越不同主題關卡的平台遊戲，通過爬到關卡頂部或殺死 Boss 來完成。獎勵遊戲和秘密房間已包括在內，並且進展有時需要解決位置謎題。

阿爾弗雷德不會飛，但他可以使用坡道跳起來並用他的仿生喙擊中敵人 - 這會殺死他們，但任何其他接觸都會傷害阿爾弗雷德。不過要小心帶刺的蝸牛。其他敵人包括攜帶槍支的鯨魚和流彈。

Adventure Island (USA).name: 盧卡斯藝術冒險遊戲
Adventure Island (USA).original_desc:
In the South Pacific, Master Higgins lives peacefully wearing only a grass skirt and a cap. That is until the Evil Witch Doctor decides to capture the Princess Leilani and hold her as his own. It's up to Master Higgins to gather throwing axes, fireballs and skateboards in order to aid his noble quest.

The game is a side scroller, Master Higgins moves across the screen from left to right and finds his power-ups in giant eggs. This includes a skateboard which results in a great speed enhancement - until Master Higgins gets hit and loses his power. If he is not on a skateboard a hit means instant death. Another game mechanic is starvation which gets indicated through a meter which steadily decreases. If it hits zero the hero dies and the only way to fill it up is by collecting food on the way. Bosses await him at the end of levels, all the way to the Evil Witch Doctor himself.
Adventure Island (USA).desc:
在南太平洋，希金斯大師只穿著草裙，戴著帽子，過著平靜的生活。直到邪惡巫醫決定抓住萊拉妮公主並將她據為己有。希金斯大師需要收集投擲斧頭、火球和滑板來幫助他完成崇高的任務。

該遊戲是一款橫向捲軸遊戲，希金斯大師從左到右在屏幕上移動，並在巨大的雞蛋中找到他的能量道具。其中包括一塊滑板，它可以極大地提高速度 - 直到希金斯大師被擊中並失去力量。如果他不在滑板上，那麼被擊中就意味著立即死亡。另一個遊戲機制是飢餓，它通過逐漸減少的計量表來指示。如果它為零，英雄就會死亡，唯一的方法就是在途中收集食物。頭目們在關卡的最後等待著他，一直到邪惡巫醫本人。

Super Spy Hunter (USA).name: 超級間諜獵人
Super Spy Hunter (USA).original_desc:
In the year 2525, things are a mess. politically. Terrorists led by someone named "X" want to attack the United Nations. The CIA is in charge of discouraging the attacks. To that end, and since all of their best agents have failed the task, they send out an unofficial agent -- you, the Super Spy Hunter.

The Super Spy Hunter has a super spy car. It's actually a well-armed car that can turn into a boat or a plane at opportune times. The action is fast vertical scrolling as the vehicle faces all manner of powerful vehicle threats from a well-funded terrorist enemy -- cars, trucks, helicopters, etc. Luckily, there are many powerups to collect along the way, both defensive and offensive.
Super Spy Hunter (USA).desc:
2525年，事情一團糟。政治上。以“X”為首的恐怖分子想要襲擊聯合國。中央情報局負責阻止襲擊。為此，由於他們所有最好的特工都未能完成任務，他們派出了一名非官方特工——你，超級間諜獵人。

超級間諜獵人有一輛超級間諜車。它實際上是一輛裝備精良的汽車，可以在適當的時候變成一艘船或一架飛機。遊戲的動作是快速垂直滾動，因為車輛面臨著來自資金雄厚的恐怖分子敵人（汽車、卡車、直升機等）的各種強大車輛威脅。幸運的是，沿途有許多防禦性和進攻性的能量道具可供收集。

Guerrilla War (USA).name: 游擊戰
Guerrilla War (USA).original_desc:
A tropical island (specified as Cuba in the Japanese original) is being oppressed by a dictator, but fortunately one or two brave US soldiers (Ernesto "Che" Guevara in the Japanese version) are on hand to restore justice. March through the rivers, swamps and forests to overthrow the dictator (specified as Batista in Japan) in this evolution of the Commando style.

The game scrolls vertically, as you move up the screen shooting enemies, finding good strategic firing points and collecting powerups. As the enemy soldiers come towards you in groups, some care is required when picking them off, either using your gun or the grenades. There are also hostages carried by some soldiers, with points bonuses for not shooting these but shooting their captors. Each level ends with a boss.
Guerrilla War (USA).desc:
一個熱帶島嶼（日文版中指定為古巴）正在遭受獨裁者的壓迫，但幸運的是，有一兩個勇敢的美國士兵（日文版中為埃內斯托·“切”·格瓦拉）在場以恢復正義。在這款突擊隊風格的演變中，行軍穿過河流、沼澤和森林，推翻獨裁者（在日本被稱為巴蒂斯塔）。

遊戲垂直滾動，當你向上移動屏幕射擊敵人時，找到良好的戰略射擊點並收集能量。當敵方士兵成群地向你襲來時，使用槍或手榴彈消滅他們時需要小心。還有一些士兵攜帶人質，如果不射殺這些人質，而是射殺俘虜他們的人，則會獲得積分。每個級別都以一個老闆結束。

Sky Kid (USA).name: 天空小子
Sky Kid (USA).original_desc:
You are the legendary Red Baron, flying a plane through a horizontal side-scrolling scenery set during World War I. To complete a mission, you simply need to get to the landing spot on the other side without being shot down, but you can gain extra points by destroying enemy vehicles and planes. For huge points, pick up a bomb hidden in the level (you will be warned by a sound when approaching it) and drop it on a large structure. If you fail to land on the landing strip, you run out of fuel and crash.

You can only shoot horizontally and diagonally by tilting the plane's nose. When in trouble, perform an aerial loop with the secondary button, this often destroys other planes and avoids bullets. There is a co-op mode with the character Max as well.
Sky Kid (USA).desc:
你是傳說中的紅男爵，駕駛飛機穿越一戰時期的橫向捲軸風景。要完成任務，你只需要在不被擊落的情況下到達另一邊的著陸點，但你可以通過摧毀敵方車輛和飛機來獲得額外積分。對於巨大的點，拿起隱藏在關卡中的炸彈（接近它時會發出聲音警告）並將其扔到大型建築物上。如果你未能降落在跑道上，你就會耗盡燃料並墜毀。

您只能通過傾斜飛機機頭進行水平和對角拍攝。當遇到麻煩時，使用輔助按鈕執行空中循環，這通常會摧毀其他飛機並避免子彈。還有與角色 Max 的合作模式。

Snake Rattle n Roll (USA).name: 蛇的嘎嘎聲和滾動
Snake Rattle n Roll (USA).original_desc:
Brilliant 3-D graphics and a colorful new duo - Rattle and Roll!

It's a race to the moon! But first you must travel through 11 levels of adventure. Hurtling anvils, exploding Nibbley Pibbleys, flying carpets, ferocious 3-D terrain, plus BIGFOOT and more!

The action is non-stop. The challenge is terrific. Help Rattle and Roll, the two snakes, make their way up the perilous mountain.

Gobble up Nibbley Pibbleys to gain enough weight to advance to the next level. Defeat enemies while you gather points, food, and extra lives along the way.

Play alone or with a friend, and get ready to Snake Rattle N Roll!
Snake Rattle n Roll (USA).desc:
絢麗的 3D 圖形和色彩繽紛的新組合 - Rattle 和 Roll！

這是一場登月競賽！但首先您必須經歷 11 個冒險關卡。猛烈撞擊的鐵砧、爆炸的 Nibbley Pibbleys、飛毯、兇猛的 3D 地形，以及大腳怪等等！

動作不間斷。挑戰是巨大的。幫助拉特和羅爾這兩條蛇爬上危險的山。

吞下尼布利皮布利 (Nibbley Pibbleys) 以獲得足夠的體重以晉級到下一個級別。擊敗敵人，同時收集積分、食物和額外生命。

獨自玩耍或與朋友一起玩耍，準備好玩 Snake Rattle N Roll！

Kid Niki 3 (Japan) (Translated).original_name: Kaiketsu Yancha Maru III : Taiketsu! Zouringen
Kid Niki 3 (Japan) (Translated).name: Kai-ketsu 調皮丸 iiii: Tai-ketsu！佐林根
Kid Niki 3 (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
The princess has been kidnapped again, this time by a pair of menacing-looking figures. Locked in a tower, she manages to write a plea for help on a scrap of paper and then sends a paper airplane out of her prison. Miraculously, it reaches her boyfriend Yanchamaru who, being the upstanding samurai that he is, immediately sets out to save her.

Kaiketsu Yanchamaru 3 is the final sequel to Kid Niki and is a significant departure from the first two games. Not only does the game feature full four-way scrolling and large maps to explore, but Yanchamaru himself sports a completely new look and numerous new abilities. His trademark spinning sword now seems to more closely resemble a bo, and Yanchamaru can now use it to shoot waves of energy at foes, bounce on the end, spin in place, and even launch off of walls and corners. Taking a cue from Mega Man, he also now has the ability to slide through narrow spaces and underneath dangerous spikes.

Each stage contains numerous keys and locked doors. Any key will open any door, and it is possible to complete a stage without even finding all the keys and doors. The final door in each stage leads to the boss room. After clearing each stage, your performance is tallied, and depending on what you did, bonuses such as points or lives are given.
Kid Niki 3 (Japan) (Translated).desc:
公主再次被綁架，這次是被一對看上去兇惡的人綁架了。她被關在一座塔樓裡，設法在一張紙片上寫下求助信，然後將一架紙飛機送出了監獄。奇蹟般地，它到達了她的男朋友嚴茶丸那裡，他是一個正直的武士，立即出發去拯救她。

《Kaiketsu Yanchamaru 3》是《Kid Niki》的最終續作，與前兩款遊戲有很大不同。遊戲不僅具有完整的四向滾動和大地圖可供探索，而且 Yanchamaru 本人也擁有全新的外觀和眾多新能力。他標誌性的旋轉劍現在看起來更像是一把博，而Yanchamaru現在可以用它向敵人發射能量波，在末端彈跳，原地旋轉，甚至從牆壁和角落髮射。受到《洛克人》的啟發，他現在還能夠滑過狹窄的空間並在危險的尖刺下滑行。

每個階段都包含許多鑰匙和鎖著的門。任何鑰匙都可以打開任何門，甚至無需找到所有鑰匙和門也可以完成一個階段。每個階段的最後一扇門通向老闆房間。清除每個階段後，您的表現將被記錄，並根據您的表現給予積分或生命等獎勵。

Kabuki - Quantum Fighter (USA).name: 歌舞伎量子鬥士
Kabuki - Quantum Fighter (USA).original_desc: In this futuristic platform game, a computer virus has affected the Earth's defense systems. A lone warrior is transferred into digital data and sent inside the mainframe, where he becomes a Kabuki warrior. Gameplay is similar to other ninja-platformers (such as Ninja Gaiden) but with some interesting modifications, such as using your long red hair as a whip to attack enemies!
Kabuki - Quantum Fighter (USA).desc: 在這款未來平台遊戲中，計算機病毒影響了地球的防禦系統。孤獨的武士被轉換成數字數據並發送到主機內，在那裡他成為歌舞伎武士。遊戲玩法與其他忍者平台遊戲（例如忍者龍劍傳）類似，但有一些有趣的修改，例如使用紅色長發作為鞭子來攻擊敵人！

Micro Machines (USA) (Unl).name: 微型機械
Micro Machines (USA) (Unl).original_desc: Choose your vehicle and go! Feel the power, feel the traction - excellent! Performance sports cars, Formula One racing cars, Power boats, Combat Monster trucks & Turbo Wheels. Absolutely Brilliant!!
Micro Machines (USA) (Unl).desc: 選擇您的車輛並出發！感受力量，感受牽引力——太棒了！高性能跑車、一級方程式賽車、動力船、戰鬥怪物卡車和渦輪車輪。絕對精彩！

Ghosts'n Goblins (USA).name: 鬼與妖精
Ghosts'n Goblins (USA).original_desc:
Ghosts'n Goblins is a sideways scrolling action platformer spread over six levels, each of which must be completed within three minutes (or a life is lost), taking in forest, village, mountain and cavern settings with increasing difficulty.

Arthur the brave knight must rescue his beloved Princess from the Demon King Astaroth and his forces - amongst them are the various undead (ghosts, zombies), bats, ogres and goblins. Other challenges include moving platforms, ladders and water/fire hazards. 

As in most games in this genre, the player can pick up power-ups such as daggers and bombs during the course of the game, giving the player greater firepower.
Ghosts'n Goblins (USA).desc:
《Ghosts'n Goblins》是一款橫向捲軸動作平台遊戲，共分為六個關卡，每個關卡都必須在三分鐘內完成（否則就會喪命），森林、村莊、山脈和洞穴場景的難度不斷增加。

勇敢的騎士亞瑟必須從魔王阿斯塔羅斯和他的軍隊手中拯救他心愛的公主——其中包括各種不死生物（幽靈、殭屍）、蝙蝠、食人魔和妖精。其他挑戰包括移動平台、梯子和水/火危險。

與大多數此類游戲一樣，玩家可以在遊戲過程中拾取匕首和炸彈等能量道具，從而賦予玩家更強的火力。

Fester's Quest (USA).name: 費斯特的任務
Fester's Quest (USA).original_desc:
Uncle Fester was out one night, moonbathing in the yard of the Addams Family property one day when suddenly, out of the sky, a UFO descended and started beaming alien creatures to the planet. Grabbing his gun, Fester sets off to stop the aliens and slay their boss creatures, encountering other Addams Family members along the way who will aid him.

Fester's Quest is an overhead-view game in which Uncle Fester uses his gun, or later, a whip to attack enemies near him. Enemies drop money and power-ups. The money can be used at Hot Dog stands to replenish health. A variety of items can be collected, each with a different effect. Fester and the rest of the Addams family are based on their characters from the popular 1960s TV show (this game was made before the remakes in  both series and movie form).
Fester's Quest (USA).desc:
一天晚上，費斯特叔叔外出，在亞當斯家族莊園的院子裡享受月光浴，突然，一架不明飛行物從天而降，開始向地球發射外星生物。費斯特拿起槍，出發去阻止外星人並殺死他們的頭目生物，一路上遇到了其他願意幫助他的亞當斯家族成員。

Fester's Quest 是一款俯視遊戲，其中 Fester 叔叔使用他的槍，或者後來的鞭子來攻擊他附近的敵人。敵人會掉落金錢和能量。這些錢可以在熱狗攤上用來補充生命值。可以收集多種物品，每種物品都有不同的效果。費斯特和亞當斯家族的其他成員是根據 20 世紀 60 年代熱門電視節目中的角色改編的（該遊戲是在重製系列和電影形式之前製作的）。

Little Ninja Brothers (USA).name: 小忍者兄弟
Little Ninja Brothers (USA).original_desc: Blu Boltar, lord of the Yoma clan has invaded Chinaland and captured the Emperor. Sending out a TV broadcast across the realm, Blu Boltar declares himself the ruler. Jack and Ryu are the ninja masters of Chinaland, training under their mentor at Mt. Epin. Having heard the news of the Emperor's capture they set out to defeat Blu Boltar and his Yoma Clan.
Little Ninja Brothers (USA).desc: 尤瑪氏族領主布魯·博塔入侵中國大陸並俘虜了皇帝。布魯·博爾塔向全國范圍內發送電視廣播，宣布自己是統治者。傑克和龍是中國大陸的忍者大師，在埃平山接受導師的訓練。聽到皇帝被俘的消息後，他們出發去擊敗布魯·博塔和他的尤瑪氏族。

Final Fantasy (USA).name: Final Fantasy VII 重生
Final Fantasy (USA).original_desc:
Hironobu Sakaguchi's Final Fantasy... the first of one of the longest role-playing game series known to mankind. Final Fantasy is the game for the NES console that started it all.

The world is veiled in darkness. Winds don't blow, the seas are stormy, and the earth rots. All people can hope for is that the ancient prophecy will be finally fulfilled. "When the world is veiled in darkness, four warriors will come..." And indeed, they come - the four characters you have previously chosen. Their first quest is to free a princess from the evil Garland, and then the real journey begins...
Final Fantasy (USA).desc:
《Final Fantasy IV》（日語：ファイナルファンタジーIV，英語：Final Fantasy IV，台灣舊譯「太空戰士IV」）是由史克威爾（今史克威爾艾尼克斯）開發並發行的電子角色扮演遊戲，為Final Fantasy系列的第四部本傳作品。1991年首發日文的超級任天堂版，後於多個平臺移植或重製。由於《Final Fantasy II》和《Final Fantasy III》的初版並未發行日文以外版本，故本作最初在北美發行時取名為「Final Fantasy II」（Final Fantasy II）以順應當地編號，但後來移植或重製的歐美版本則改回了原標題。
遊戲圍繞主角暗騎士塞西爾，講述他試圖阻止法師高貝茲侵吞世界的故事。在旅程中不斷有隊員加入，亦有人因死亡、受傷或其他不幸事件而離隊。《Final Fantasy IV》引入的部分新元素成為了Final Fantasy系列及往後角色扮演遊戲的模板。和系列前作不同，遊戲使用了「即時戰鬥」系統，此系統也應用於多部系列續作中，同時《IV》中每個角色有固定的職業設定。
《Final Fantasy IV》以角色推動劇情，使用了新技術以及植松伸夫廣受歡迎的配樂，被視為系列與角色扮演遊戲的里程碑。《Final Fantasy IV》被視作最早使用複雜劇情的遊戲之一，並被認為開創了角色扮演遊戲導入戲劇性劇情的理念。任天堂DS重製版採3D建模完全重製，於2007年在任天堂DS平台發行。其後傳《Final Fantasy IV The After -月之歸還-》於2008年在日本手機平台發行，並於2009年6月1日通過Wii商店頻道開放全球下載。2011年發行的《Final Fantasy IV 完全收藏輯》收錄了《Final Fantasy IV》及《月之歸還》。任天堂DS重製版的iOS移植版於2012年12月20日發行，Android版和Windows版分別於2013年和2014年發行。

Maniac Mansion (USA).name: 瘋狂大廈
Maniac Mansion (USA).original_desc:
The Edison mansion has always been a creepy old house on the edge of town. There have been rumors of strange experiments going on and of odd creatures living amongst the Edison family. There is even a story that a meteorite once crashed near the home nearly 20 years ago. More immediately, a girl named Sandy has gone missing from the local highschool and her boyfriend Dave swears that he saw Dr. Fred abducting her. Dave knows that he cannot do it alone and will need help from two other students if he has any hope of infiltrating the mansion and rescuing Sandy.
nnPlayers start by choosing 2 students to accompany Dave to the Edison mansion, and can then switch between these three characters at will. Most actions are carried out by selecting verbs on the screen and applying them to an object (such as "OPEN Door"). Each character maintains a separate personality and may have a different way to solve a problem from his classmates.
Maniac Mansion (USA).desc:
愛迪生宅邸一直是城鎮邊緣一座令人毛骨悚然的老房子。有傳言稱愛迪生家族中正在進行奇怪的實驗和生活著奇怪的生物。甚至有一個故事說，大約20年前，一顆隕石曾墜落在他家附近。更緊的是，一個名叫桑迪的女孩在當地高中失踪，她的男朋友戴夫發誓他看到弗雷德博士綁架了她。戴夫知道他無法獨自完成任務，如果他有希望潛入豪宅並營救桑迪，他需要另外兩名學生的幫助。
玩家一開始選擇2名學生陪戴夫去愛迪生宅邸，然後可以在這三個角色之間隨意切換。大多數操作是通過選擇屏幕上的動詞並將其應用於對象（例如“打開門”）來執行的。每個角色都保持著獨特的個性，並且可能會採用與同學不同的方式來解決問題。

Adventure Island 3 (USA).name: 盧卡斯藝術冒險遊戲
Adventure Island 3 (USA).original_desc:
Your girlfriend is once again kidnapped by aliens, and you have to rescue her, forcing your way through various levels.

The gameplay and the design haven't much changed since Adventure Island II: Aliens in Paradise: there is a world map, you can choose items before starting a level, the levels themselves are quite short (unlike Adventure Island, where each large level contained several stages). You perform standard "adventure island" activities: ride various types of dinosaurs, throw boomerangs at snails, birds, snakes, and skulls, collect grapes and apples, jump over stones, and of course, ride your old trusty skateboard.
Adventure Island 3 (USA).desc:
你的女朋友再次被外星人綁架，你必須營救她，闖過各個關卡。

遊戲玩法和設計與《冒險島2：天堂裡的外星人》相比沒有太大變化：有一張世界地圖，你可以在開始關卡之前選擇物品，關卡本身很短（不像冒險島，每個大關卡都包含多個階段）。你可以進行標準的“冒險島”活動：騎乘各種類型的恐龍，向蝸牛、鳥類、蛇和頭骨投擲迴旋鏢，收集葡萄和蘋果，跳過石頭，當然，還可以騎你值得信賴的舊滑板。

Captain Tsubasa Vol.original_name: Captain Tsubasa Vol. II : Super Striker
Captain Tsubasa Vol.name: 小翼隊長 Vol. II : 超級前鋒
Captain Tsubasa Vol.original_desc: Captain Tsubasa Vol. II: Super Striker is the second game in the Captain Tsubasa series, role-playing soccer games based off the anime of the same name. Super Striker was released on July 20, 1990 in Japan for the Famicom, published and developed by Tecmo. The game allows players to make choices, and then watch how they play out in the field.
Captain Tsubasa Vol.desc: 小翼隊長 Vol. II：超級前鋒是《足球小將》系列的第二款遊戲，是根據同名動漫改編的角色扮演足球遊戲。《Super Striker》於 1990 年 7 月 20 日在日本為 Famicom 發行，由 Tecmo 發行和開發。遊戲允許玩家做出選擇，然後觀察他們在場上的表現。

Double Dragon II - The Revenge (USA) (Re.name: 雙截龍2：復仇
Double Dragon II - The Revenge (USA) (Re.original_desc:
The lovely Marian was rescued from the clutches of the Black Warriors gang by Billy & Jimmy Lee in the first Double Dragon game, but now the gang has killed her in retaliation of their early defeat. The Dragons must now embark on a mission to avenge her death and defeat the Black Warriors for the second and final time.

"Double Dragon II" ix essentially an improved version of the first game. In addition to offering renewed audio and visuals, as well as new traps, moves and enemy characters, it discards the conventional punch and kick buttons in favor of a direction-oriented attacking system similar to the original Technos beat-em-up Renegade. The NES version offered new stages, new moves and illustrated cut-scenes, as well as a new final boss and a new ending. 
Unlike the first NES game, it offered 2-Player Co-Op gameplay with the option to turn off the friendly fire.
Double Dragon II - The Revenge (USA) (Re.desc:
在第一部《雙截龍》遊戲中，可愛的瑪麗安被比利和吉米·李從黑武士團伙的手中救了出來，但現在黑武士團伙為了報復他們早期的失敗而殺死了她。龍之隊現在必須執行一項任務，為她報仇，並第二次也是最後一次擊敗黑武士。

《雙龍II》本質上是第一款遊戲的改進版本。除了提供更新的音頻和視覺效果以及新的陷阱、動作和敵人角色之外，它還放棄了傳統的拳擊和踢腿按鈕，轉而採用類似於原始 Technos 格鬥遊戲 Renegade 的定向攻擊系統。NES 版本提供了新的關卡、新的動作和插圖過場動畫，以及新的最終 Boss 和新的結局。
與第一款 NES 遊戲不同，它提供了 2 人合作遊戲，並且可以選擇關閉友軍火力。

Town & Country Surf Designs - Thrilla's.key: Town & Country Surf Designs - Thrilla's Surfari (USA)
Town & Country Surf Designs - Thrilla's.original_name: Town & Country Surf Designs : Thrilla's Surfari
Town & Country Surf Designs - Thrilla's.name: 城鎮和鄉村衝浪設計：Thrilla's Surfari
Town & Country Surf Designs - Thrilla's.original_desc:
In order to restore his immortal powers, Wazula, an evil Kahuna, is ordered to travel to Hawaii to kidnap Barbi Bikini. Barbi Bikini happens to be Thrilla Gorilla's girlfriend so now he's off to Africa so he can rescue her.

The game features 7 worlds each containing 5 stages (except for the 1st and 3rd world where each contain only 4 stages). Most of the game involves controlling Thrilla on a skateboard, dodging or jumping over various obstacles and enemies while attempting to get to the end of the stage. There will also be times when Thrilla will get to be on a surfboard, but gameplay remains the same as it was on the skateboard. Thrilla also rides a shark underwater with the goal still being to get to the end of the stage while either dodging enemies or throwing spears at them. There are also boss battles where Thrilla throws either coconuts or spears trying to deplete all the health of his adversary. 

There is also a shell game between stages which allows the player to obtain extra lives. The game also contains powerups throughout its levels such as a banana which restores health.
Town & Country Surf Designs - Thrilla's.desc:
為了恢復不朽的力量，邪惡的魔王瓦祖拉奉命前往夏威夷綁架芭比比基尼。芭比比基尼恰好是 Thrilla Gorilla 的女朋友，所以現在他要去非洲營救她。

遊戲有 7 個世界，每個世界包含 5 個階段（第一和第三個世界除外，每個世界僅包含 4 個階段）。遊戲的大部分內容涉及控制滑板上的 Thrilla，躲避或跳過各種障礙物和敵人，同時嘗試到達舞台的盡頭。有時 Thrilla 也會出現在衝浪板上，但遊戲玩法與滑板上的相同。Thrilla 還在水下騎著鯊魚，目標仍然是到達舞台盡頭，同時躲避敵人或向他們投擲長矛。還有一些 Boss 戰，Thrilla 會投擲椰子或長矛，試圖耗盡對手的所有生命值。

關卡之間還有一個騙局，可以讓玩家獲得額外的生命。遊戲在各個關卡中還包含能量道具，例如可以恢復生命值的香蕉。

Mega Man 4 (USA) (Rev 1).name: 洛克人 4
Mega Man 4 (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
In Mega Man 4, Dr. Wily is declared as having been killed by the explosion of Gamma. A year passes and Rock, Roll, and Dr. Light are living in peace. But soon, the peace is broken by a new threat.

A supposed colleague of Dr. Light's, the mysterious Dr. Cossack, has sent out eight of his own Robot Masters to find Mega Man, whom Cossack blames for the kidnapping of his daughter. Mega Man, hoping to clear his name, sets out to find Dr. Cossack, this time armed with a powerful new weapon: the Rock Buster!!

Rockman must now battle with Cossack's fiendish Robot Masters and find Cossack's daughter before it's too late!

Originally for the NES, Mega Man 4 was also released for the PSX in Japan as the fourth installment in the Rockman Complete Works series.
Mega Man 4 (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
在《洛克人 4》中，威利博士被宣布被伽瑪爆炸殺死。一年過去了，搖滾樂和光博士過著平靜的生活。但很快，和平就被新的威脅打破了。

神秘的哥薩克博士被認為是萊特博士的同事，他派出了八名自己的機器人大師去尋找洛克人，哥薩克指責洛克人綁架了他的女兒。洛克人希望洗清自己的罪名，開始尋找哥薩克博士，這次他裝備了強大的新武器：岩石剋星！

洛克人現在必須與哥薩克邪惡的機器人大師戰鬥，並在為時已晚之前找到哥薩克的女兒！

《洛克人 4》最初是在 NES 上推出的，後來也在日本的 PSX 上發布，作為《洛克人》全集系列的第四部作品。

Mighty Final Fight (USA).name: 強大的最終戰鬥
Mighty Final Fight (USA).original_desc:
Capcom's only 8-bit port of the Final Fight series, Mighty Final Fight follows the storyline and characters of the first Final Fight game. Mayor of Metro City Mike Haggar, his ninja friend Guy and his daughter's boyfriend, Cody learn that Haggar's daughter, Jessica,  has been kidnapped by the Mad Gear Gang whose leader has fallen in love with her, and also wants the meddling Mike Haggar to leave town. Now it's personal! Choosing one of the three fighters, the player embarks on a beat-em-up quest through the streets of Metro City.

The game is a side-scrolling beat 'em up and a one-player only game (unlike other Final Fight ports). Also exclusive to this particular Final Fight game is the experience system which allows gaining levels to learn additional moves, similar to the first Double Dragon game. The characters have all been squished down to super-deformed 8-bit likenesses.  Graphically this looks similar to River City Ransom. Each character has a button for attack and a button for jumping. Pressing the two together unleashes a character-specific super-move. Various grabbing moves and throws can also be done by moving the player near an enemy.
Mighty Final Fight (USA).desc:
《火影忍者疾風傳 終極風暴4》（日版名：NARUTO －ナルト－疾風伝 ナルティメットストーム4，英文版名：Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm 4）, 是由CyberConnect2開發，萬代南夢宮遊戲於2016年在PlayStation 4、Xbox One與Windows發售的對戰動作遊戲，作為《火影忍者疾風傳 終極風暴革命》的續篇。在PlayStation 4與Xbox One進行開發，制定了為期兩年的開發計劃。
收錄追加下載內容《ROAD TO BORUTO》的《火影忍者疾風傳 終極風暴4 慕留人傳》於2017年2月2日發售。2020年4月23日在Nintendo Switch發售《火影忍者疾風傳 終極風暴4 慕留人傳》，追加下載內容《NEXT GENERATIONS》更新發佈可遊玩角色大筒木桃式與大筒木金式，. 這是為了慶祝《火影忍者 終極忍者》系列在全球銷量超過2000萬片。

TwinBee 3 - The Aimless Demon King (Japa.name: Tinbee 3：Poko Poko Daimaou
TwinBee 3 - The Aimless Demon King (Japa.original_desc:
Third game in the Twinbee series of vertically-scrolling surreal cute 'em ups. Once again you take the role of either Twinbee or Winbee (Gwinbee having been kidnapped by the final boss) as they fly through the fantasy kingdom shooting the hell out of their... uhm... enemies, or whatever they are.

As in other games in the series you can gain power-ups after defeating certain amounts of enemies by shooting the magical bells they leave behind, depending on the amount of times you shoot them, they change color and thus give different power-ups such as multiple shots, options, etc.

If correctly powered-up both ships can join-up to perform a screen-clearing attack, and you can choose your starting stage from any of the first four stages (the fifth and last remaining locked until you clear all the others).
TwinBee 3 - The Aimless Demon King (Japa.desc:
Twinbee 系列垂直滾動超現實可愛遊戲的第三款遊戲。你再次扮演 Twinbee 或 Winbee 的角色（Gwinbee 被最終的 Boss 綁架），他們飛過幻想王國，射擊他們的……呃……敵人，或者無論他們是什麼。

與該系列的其他遊戲一樣，你可以在擊敗一定數量的敵人後，通過射擊他們留下的魔法鈴來獲得能量提升，根據你射擊它們的次數，它們會改變顏色，從而提供不同的能量提升，例如多次射擊、選項等。

如果正確啟動，兩艘船都可以聯合執行清屏攻擊，並且您可以從前四個階段中的任何一個中選擇起始階段（第五個也是最後一個保持鎖定，直到您清除所有其他階段）。

Joy Mech Fight (Japan) (Translated).name: 歡樂機甲戰鬥
Joy Mech Fight (Japan) (Translated).original_desc:
The evil scientist Warunachi has hacked all the otherwise peaceful robots in Japan and now plans to launch an attack for world domination the likes of which the world has never seen. Fortunately his former partner, Dr. Eamon, saved one robot from the takeover and has now programmed him to defeat the other robots and foil Dr. Warunachi's evil plans.

Joy Mecha Fight is a one-on-one 2D fighter, in which you control a robot and attempt to defeat your opponent by attacking him with your basic moves and special attacks triggered by specific control motions. Each robot is composed of six hovering segments: the head, torso and limbs, which hover around each other forming a basic humanoid shape. 

The game features story, instant fight, and Vs modes. In the story mode you start with the Sukapon robot, and as you defeat other robots they become available for selection as you advance through the story with all moves being explained via a pre-fight tutorial if you want to.
Joy Mech Fight (Japan) (Translated).desc:
邪惡的科學家 Warunachi 入侵了日本所有原本和平的機器人，現在計劃發起一場世界從未見過的攻擊，以統治世界。幸運的是，他的前搭檔埃蒙博士從接管中拯救了一個機器人，現在已經對他進行了編程，以擊敗其他機器人並挫敗瓦魯納奇博士的邪惡計劃。

Joy Mecha Fight 是一款一對一的 2D 格鬥遊戲，您控制一個機器人，並嘗試通過基本動作和特定控制動作觸發的特殊攻擊來攻擊對手，從而擊敗對手。每個機器人由六個懸停部分組成：頭部、軀乾和四肢，它們相互懸停，形成基本的人形形狀。

遊戲具有故事、即時戰鬥和對戰模式。在故事模式中，您從 Sukapon 機器人開始，當您擊敗其他機器人時，隨著您在故事中前進，它們就可供選擇，如果您願意，所有動作都會通過戰前教程進行解釋。

Hammerin' Harry (Europe).name: 錘擊哈利
Hammerin' Harry (Europe).original_desc:
In the peaceful town of Carpentersville, some workers known as The Rusty Nailers decide to bulldoze a house that belongs to Harry. Harry is certainly not happy with this, and goes on a rampage, destroying workers that get in his way. As Harry, you can destroy workers in one of two ways: you can smash them when one of them gets near them, or you can pound the ground, and by doing this, you will send shockwaves in both directions. 

There are four environments in which Harry needs to get through: construction sites, sewer, ship, and the mansion where Harry meets the leader who ordered the demolition of his house. At the end of each environment, a boss needs to be defeated in order to proceed to the next environment. In between these, there are bonus stages in which you have to destroy a number of enemies before time runs out.
Hammerin' Harry (Europe).desc:
在寧靜的卡彭特斯維爾小鎮，一些被稱為“生鏽釘子”的工人決定推平哈利的一棟房子。哈利對此當然不滿意，並開始狂暴，摧毀阻礙他的工人。作為哈利，你可以通過兩種方式之一摧毀工人：當其中一個靠近他們時，你可以粉碎他們，或者你可以敲擊地面，通過這樣做，你會向兩個方向發送衝擊波。

哈利需要穿越四種環境：建築工地、下水道、船隻以及哈利遇到下令拆除他房屋的領導的豪宅。在每個環境結束時，都需要擊敗 Boss 才能進入下一個環境。在這些之間，有一些獎勵階段，你必須在時間耗盡之前消滅一些敵人。

Wai Wai World (Japan) (Translated).name: 水世界
Wai Wai World (Japan) (Translated).original_desc: The player starts the game as Konami Man, and can switch between Konami Man and Konami Lady. If two players are gaming, then one will play as Konami Man and the other as Konami Lady. Both players are not able to switch characters until they rescue at least one character from one of the six levels. The player must play through six different selectable levels that take place in different Konami games and save that game's star character with a key who the player can then play as. Each character has different abilities to begin with as well as ones they can eventually gain. The player ventures through these first six levels in a sort on non-linear fashion with gameplay.
Wai Wai World (Japan) (Translated).desc: 玩家以Konami Man開始遊戲，並可以在Konami Man和Konami Lady之間切換。如果兩名玩家進行遊戲，則一名玩家將扮演 Konami Man，另一名玩家將扮演 Konami Lady。兩名玩家都無法切換角色，直到他們從六個關卡之一中救出至少一名角色。玩家必須玩不同 Konami 遊戲中發生的六個不同的可選關卡，並用鑰匙保存該遊戲的明星角色，然後玩家可以扮演該角色。每個角色都有不同的開始能力以及最終獲得的能力。玩家以一種非線性的方式通過遊戲玩法冒險通過前六個關卡。

Best of the Best - Championship Karate (.key: Best of the Best - Championship Karate (USA)
Best of the Best - Championship Karate (.original_name: Best of the Best : Championship Karate
Best of the Best - Championship Karate (.name: 最佳中的最佳：空手道錦標賽
Best of the Best - Championship Karate (.original_desc:
Best of the Best Championship Karate is a realistic fighting game.
After you choose your fighter for his parameters (strength, stamina and resistance), you can choose from 55 different moves.
You can now train your fighter at a gym before the real fights.
To master the game, one must alternate training and fights, as training improves stamina, strength and resistance.
Be careful, loosing a fight reduces those parameters, so you have to be ready before getting on the ring !
Best of the Best - Championship Karate (.desc:
最佳冠軍空手道是一款逼真的格鬥遊戲。
根據戰士的參數（力量、耐力和抵抗力）選擇戰士後，您可以從 55 種不同的動作中進行選擇。
現在，您可以在真正的戰鬥之前在健身房訓練您的拳擊手。
為了掌握這項運動，必須交替訓練和戰鬥，因為訓練可以提高耐力、力量和抵抗力。
小心，輸掉一場比賽會降低這些參數，所以你必須在上擂台之前做好準備！

Nintendo World Cup (USA) (Rev 1).name: 任天堂世界杯
Nintendo World Cup (USA) (Rev 1).original_desc:
This soccer game was made at the time when Nintendo introduced their four player adapter, and was probably made for the four playing purpose. This is shown clearly when you choose to play 2 or more players. Then you can choose between many different ground layers, like ice, grass and stone, which adds to the replayability.

When you play a one player game you play the world cup as one of the top soccer countries of that time, and you meet countries in a fixed order. Cameroon in the first match and the final is against West Germany. In an old-school fashion you lose when you play a draw, there's no extra time whatsoever.

In the game you always steer only one character, which you choose before the match starts. You can then give simple orders to you team-mates, like pass, tackle and shoot. Your moves are also limited to these moves. The game is totally lawless, so feel free to make elbow tackles without a wink from the referee. Probably it was made this way to be funnier to play against friends.
Nintendo World Cup (USA) (Rev 1).desc:
這款足球遊戲是在任天堂推出四人適配器時製作的，並且可能是為了四人比賽而製作的。當您選擇與 2 名或更多玩家一起玩時，這一點會清楚地顯示出來。然後你可以在許多不同的地面層之間進行選擇，比如冰、草和石頭，這增加了可重玩性。

當你玩單人遊戲時，你將作為當時頂級足球國家之一參加世界杯，並且你會按照固定的順序遇到國家。喀麥隆隊的首場比賽和決賽都是對陣西德隊。按照老式的方式，當你打平局時你就輸了，沒有任何額外的時間。

在遊戲中，您始終只能駕駛一個角色，該角色是您在比賽開始前選擇的。然後，您可以向隊友發出簡單的命令，例如傳球、攔截和射門。你的動作也僅限於這些動作。這場比賽完全無法無天，所以你可以在裁判不眨眼的情況下隨意用肘部鏟球。這樣做可能是為了讓與朋友一起玩更有趣。

Metal Storm (USA).name: 金屬風暴
Metal Storm (USA).original_desc:
Metal Storm is an action game in which the player takes control of the giant mecha M-308 Gunner in order to put a stop to a malfunctioning computer menace. 

To save it from becoming another generic action game, innovation is shown through fast paced gameplay and the "gravity flip" ability, which enables the character to freely switch between moving along the floor or ceiling. While the game is only seven levels long, the difficulty ramps up quickly, so mastery of the gravity technique and memorization of the levels become absolute necessities for survival.
Metal Storm (USA).desc:
《金屬風暴》是一款動作遊戲，玩家控制巨型機甲 M-308 砲手，以阻止出現故障的計算機威脅。

為了避免它成為另一種通用動作遊戲，創新通過快節奏的遊戲玩法和“重力翻轉”能力來體現，這使得角色能夠在沿著地板或天花板移動之間自由切換。雖然遊戲只有七個關卡，但難度卻迅速上升，因此掌握重力技術和記住關卡成為生存的絕對必要條件。

Heavy Barrel (USA).name: 重桶
Heavy Barrel (USA).original_desc: Heavy Barrel is a shooter with a top-down view similar to Commando and Ikari Warriors. Terrorists have seized the underground control complex of a nuclear missile site. It is up to the player to infiltrate the installation and eliminate the leader of the terrorist army before they can launch the missiles. To stop the terrorists you will need the powerful weapon Heavy Barrel. The problem is that the weapon still is in the installation. Before the fortress fell the weapon was taken apart and locked in six different storage lockers. To defeat the terrorists you must collect all keys and reassemble the weapon. The game supports co-op for two players.
Heavy Barrel (USA).desc: Heavy Barrel 是一款類似於 Commando 和 Ikari Warriors 的俯視視角射擊遊戲。恐怖分子佔領了一個核導彈基地的地下控制中心。玩家需要潛入裝置並在恐怖分子發射導彈之前消滅他們的領導人。要阻止恐怖分子，您將需要強大的武器重型槍管。問題是武器仍在安裝中。在堡壘陷落之前，武器被拆開並鎖在六個不同的儲物櫃中。要擊敗恐怖分子，您必須收集所有鑰匙並重新組裝武器。遊戲支持兩名玩家合作。

Little Samson (USA).name: 小參孫
Little Samson (USA).original_desc:
Ta-Keed, the Prince of Darkness, has managed to escape from his supernatural penitentiary where he has had centuries to plot exactly how he will take revenge on those that locked him away. Emperor Hans sends his troops to deal with this threat, but they are no match for the ultimate evil one. As an alternative, the emperor summons the bearers of 4 Magical Bells. They must make their way to the castle and work as a team if they are to destroy Ta-Keed.

Throughout the game, the player can switch between any of the 4 characters.
Samson is a human who is reasonably fast and also possesses magnificent rock climbing prowess.
Kikira is the Dragon Lord. Since she has claws, she does not slip on ice. When she jumps, she can also fly for short bursts.
Gamm is the Rock Lord. Since he is a living rock he is very strong.
K.O. is the Mouse Lord. He is tiny which allows him to enter areas that other team members can not.
Little Samson (USA).desc:
黑暗王子塔基德成功逃離了他的超自然監獄，他花了幾個世紀的時間來策劃如何向那些關押他的人報仇。漢斯皇帝派出軍隊應對這一威脅，但他們不是終極邪惡的對手。作為替代方案，皇帝召喚 4 個魔法鈴的持有者。如果他們想要摧毀塔基德，他們就必須前往城堡並團結一致。

在整個遊戲過程中，玩家可以在 4 個角色中任意切換。
薩姆森是一個速度相當快的人類，還擁有出色的攀岩能力。
奇奇拉是龍王。因為她有爪子，所以她不會在冰上滑倒。當她跳躍時，她還可以進行短時間的飛行。
加姆是岩石領主。因為他是一塊活石，所以他非常堅強。
K.O.是鼠王。他個子很小，這使他能夠進入其他團隊成員無法進入的區域。

Battletoads (USA).name: 戰蟾蜍
Battletoads (USA).original_desc:
The Dark Queen has attacked and kidnapped (toadnapped?) your best buddy.. To make matters worse, she nabbed the best looking girl around! So, what will you do? Cry? Whimper? Hide? Call the Starcops? NO! Cause you're a Battletoad! Battletoads don't cry, hide or call for help! And they certainly don't whimper! They get MAD then they get EVEN! So grab your blaster, hop on the Toadster and go get 'em!

You will control a battletoad through various levels. Some are side-scrolling beat-em-ups, other are vertical drops down a shaft, fighting as you go, others have you riding a rocket or surfboard, shooting or avoiding enemies. At the end of each area, there is a boss. In some areas, about half-way through, you may have a mini-boss.
Battletoads (USA).desc:
黑暗女王襲擊並綁架了（蟾蜍？）你最好的朋友。更糟糕的是，她綁架了周圍最漂亮的女孩！那麼，你會怎麼做？哭？嗚咽？隱藏？打電話給星際警察？不！因為你是戰蟾蜍！戰蟾蜍不會哭泣、隱藏或呼救！他們當然不會嗚咽！他們變得瘋狂，然後他們變得平等！所以，拿起你的爆能槍，跳上 Toadster 去拿它們吧！

您將控制戰蟾蜍通過各個級別。有些是橫向捲軸格鬥遊戲，有些是從豎井垂直下降，邊走邊戰鬥，還有一些讓你騎火箭或衝浪板，射擊或躲避敵人。每個區域的盡頭都有一個boss。在某些區域，大約進行到一半時，您可能會遇到一個小老闆。
